GSP33bhgsbh_u:3: upodghāṭaḥ oṃ nārāyaṇaḥ paro 'vyaktād aṇḍam avyakta-sambhavam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4: aṇḍasyāntas tv ime lokāḥ sapta-dvīpā ca medinī ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6: tasya ca sthitiṃ cikīrṣuḥ marīḍyādīn agre sṛṣṭvā prajāpatīn pravṛtti-lakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ grāhayāmāsa vedoktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:13: prāṇināṃ sākṣād abhyudaya-niḥśreyasa-hetur yaḥ sa dharmo brāhmaṇādyair varṇibhir āśramibhiś ca śreyo 'rthibhir anuṣṭhīyamānaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:14: dīrgheṇa kālena anuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ kāmodbhavād dhīyamāna-viveka-jñāna-hetukena adharmeṇa abhibhūyamāne dharme, pravardhamāne ca adharme, jagataḥ sthitiṃ paripipālayiṣuḥ sa ādi-kartā nārāyaṇākhyo viṣṇur bhaumasya brahmaṇo brāhmaṇatvasya cābhirakṣaṇārthaṃ devakyāṃ vasudevād aṃśena kṛṣṇaḥ kila sambabhūva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:15: brāhmaṇatvasya hi rakṣaṇena rakṣitaḥ syād vaidiko dharmaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:17: sa ca bhagavān jñānaiśvarya-śakti-bala-vīrya-tejobhiḥ sadā sampannas triguṇātmikāṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ svāṃ māyāṃ mūla-prakṛtiṃ vaśīkṛtya, ajo 'vyayo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:19: dehavān iva jāta iva ca lokānugrahaṃ kurvan lakṣyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:22: śoka-moha-mahodadhau nimagnāya upadideśa guṇādhikair hi gṛhīto 'nuṣṭhīyamānaś ca dharmaḥ pracayaṃ gamiṣyatīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:23: taṃ dharmaṃ bhagavatā yathopadiṣṭaṃ veda-vyāsaḥ sarvajño bhagavān gītākhyaiḥ saptabhiḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:30: tasya asya gītā-śāstrasya saṃkṣepataḥ prayojanaṃ paraṃ niḥśreyasaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:32: tac ca sarva-karma-sannyāsa-pūrvakād ātma-jñāna-niṣṭhā-rūpād dharmād bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:33: tathā imam eva gītārtha-dharmam uddiśya bhagavataivoktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:34: sa hi dharmaḥ suparyāpto brahmaṇaḥ pada-vedane [Mbh 14.16.12] ity anugītāsu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:35: tatraiva coktaṃ - naiva dharmī na cādharmī na caiva hi śubhāśubhī [Mbh 14.19.7],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:36: yaḥ syād ekāyane līnas tūṣṇīṃ kiṃcid acintayan [Mbh 14.19.1], jñānaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:39: sarva-dharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja [Gītā 18.66] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:40: abhyudayārtho 'pi yaḥ pravṛtti-lakṣaṇo dharmo varṇān āśramāṃś coddiśya vihitaḥ sa devādi-sthāna-prāpti-hetur api san,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:46: tathā cemam evārtham abhisandhāya vakṣyati brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi [Gītā 5.10], yoginaḥ karma
GSP33bhgsbh_u:49: paramārtha-tattvaṃ ca vāsudevākhyaṃ para-brahmābhidheya-bhūtaṃ viśeṣataḥ abhivyañjayad viśiṣṭa-prayojana-sambandhābhidheyavad gītā-śāstram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:55: māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva kim akurvata saṃjaya ||BhG_1.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:56: saṃjaya uvāca dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavānīkaṃ vyūḍhaṃ duryodhanas tadā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:61: yuyudhāno virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ ||BhG_1.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:63: purujit kuntibhojaś ca śaibyaś ca nara-puṃgavaḥ ||BhG_1.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:64: yudhāmanyuś ca vikrānta uttamaujāś ca vīryavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:65: saubhadro draupadeyāś ca sarva eva mahā-rathāḥ ||BhG_1.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:66: asmākaṃ tu viśiṣṭā ye tān nibodha dvijottama |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:67: nāyakā mama sainyasya saṃjñārthaṃ tān bravīmi te ||BhG_1.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:68: bhavān bhīṣmaś ca karṇaś ca kṛpaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:70: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā mad-arthe tyakta-jīvitāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:73: paryāptaṃ tv idam eteṣāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam ||BhG_1.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:75: bhīṣmam evābhirakṣantu bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi ||BhG_1.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:78: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānaka-gomukhāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:80: tataḥ śvetair hayair yukte mahati syandane sthitau |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:81: mādhavaḥ pāṇḍavaś caiva divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ ||BhG_1.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:86: kāśyaś ca parameṣvāsaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahā-rathaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:89: saubhadraś ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak ||BhG_1.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:91: nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo vyanunādayan ||BhG_1.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:94: hṛṣīkeśaṃ tadā vākyam idam āha mahī-pate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:95: senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṃ sthāpaya me 'cyuta ||BhG_1.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:97: kair mayā saha yoddhavyam asmin raṇa-samudyame ||BhG_1.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:103: uvāca pārtha paśyaitān samavetān kurūn iti ||BhG_1.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:104: tatrāpaśyat sthitān pārthaḥ pitṝn atha pitāmahān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:105: ācāryān mātulān bhrātṝn putrān pautrān sakhīṃs tathā ||BhG_1.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:106: śvaśurān suhṛdaś caiva senayor ubhayor api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:107: tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥ sarvān bandhūn avasthitān ||BhG_1.27||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:110: sīdanti mama gātrāṇi mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:111: vepathuś ca śarīre me romaharṣaś ca jāyate ||BhG_1.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:112: gāṇḍīvaṃ sraṃsate hastāt tvak caiva paridahyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:113: na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ ||BhG_1.30||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:115: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave ||BhG_1.31||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:116: na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ kṛṣṇa na ca rājyaṃ sukhāni ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:117: kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā ||BhG_1.32||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:118: yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitaṃ no rājyaṃ bhogāḥ sukhāni ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:119: ta ime 'vasthitā yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā dhanāni ca ||BhG_1.33||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:120: ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrās tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:121: mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ śyālāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā ||BhG_1.34||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:122: etān na hantum icchāmi ghnato 'pi madhusūdana |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:123: api trailokya-rājyasya hetoḥ kiṃ nu mahī-kṛte ||BhG_1.35||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:124: nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāj janārdana |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:126: tasmān nārhā vayaṃ hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān sva-bāndhavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:127: svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava ||BhG_1.37||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:128: yady apy ete na paśyanti lobhopahata-cetasaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:130: kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:133: dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmo 'bhibhavaty uta ||BhG_1.40||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:142: aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:145: dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṃ bhavet ||BhG_1.46||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:151: saṃjaya uvāca taṃ tathā kṛpayāviṣṭam aśrupūrṇākulekṣaṇam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:153: kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:155: klaibyaṃ mā sma gamaḥ pārtha naitat tvayy upapadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:157: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:159: gurūn ahatvā hi mahānubhāvāñ śreyo bhoktuṃ bhaikṣyam apīha loke |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:162: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:163: yān eva hatvā na jijīviṣāmas te 'vasthitāḥ pramukhe dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ ||BhG_2.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:166: yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me śiṣyas te 'haṃ śādhi māṃ tvāṃ prapannam ||BhG_2.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:167: na hi prapaśyāmi mamāpanudyād yac chokam ucchoṣaṇam indriyāṇām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:168: avāpya bhūmāv asapatnam ṛddhaṃ rājyaṃ surāṇām api cādhipatyam ||BhG_2.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:169: saṃjaya uvāca evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ guḍākeśaḥ parantapaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:170: na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha ||BhG_2.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:171: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:172: senayor ubhayor madhye viṣīdantam idaṃ vacaḥ ||BhG_2.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:173: atra ca dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavānīkam ity ārabhya yāvat na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha ity etad-antaḥ prāṇināṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:179: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye ity ādinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:180: śoka-mohābhyāṃ hy abhibhūta-viveka-vijñānaḥ svata eva kṣatra-dharme yuddhe pravṛtto 'pi tasmād yuddhād upararāma |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:184: svabhāvata eva svadharma-parityāgaḥ pratiṣiddha-sevā ca syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:191: tayoś ca sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa-pūrvakād ātma-jñānāt nānyato nivṛttir iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:192: tad-upadidikṣuḥ sarva-lokānugrahārtham arjunaṃ nimittīkṛtya āha bhagavān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:194: atra kecid āhuḥ-sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa-pūrvakād ātma-jñāna-niṣṭhā-mātrād eva kevalāt kaivalyaṃ na prāpyata eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:196: agnihotrādi-śrauta-smārta-karma-sahitāt jñānāt kaivalya-prāptir iti sarvāsu gītāsu niścito 'rtha iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:198: atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi [Gītā 2.33] karmaṇy evādhikāras te [Gītā 2.47], kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvam [Gītā 4.15] ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:199: hiṃsādi-yuktatvāt vaidikaṃ karma adharmāya itīyam apy āśaṅkā na kāryā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:201: atyantaṃ krūram api sva-dharma iti kṛtvā nādharmāya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:202: tad-akaraṇe ca tataḥ sva-dharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi [Gītā 2.33] iti bruvatā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:203: jīvādi-śruti-coditānāṃ paśv-ādi-hiṃsā-lakṣaṇānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ prāg eva nādharmatvam iti suniścitam uktaṃ bhavati -- iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:206: aśocyān ity ādinā bhagavatā yāvat svadharmam api cāvekṣya ity etad-antena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:208: tad-viṣayā buddhir ātmano janmādi-ṣaḍ-vikriyābhāvād akartā ātmeti prakaraṇārtha-nirūpaṇād yā jāyate, sā sāṃkhya-buddhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:209: sā yeṣāṃ jñāninām ucitā bhavati, te sāṃkhyāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:213: sā yeṣāṃ karmiṇām ucitā bhavati te yoginaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:214: tathā ca bhagavatā vibhakte dve buddhī nirdiṣṭe eṣā te 'bhihitā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:215: sāṃkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:217: jñāna-yogena niṣṭhāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ vibhaktāṃ vakṣyati purā vedātmanā mayā proktā iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:218: tathā ca yoga-buddhy-āśrayāṃ karma-yogena niṣṭhāṃ vibhaktāṃ vakṣyati - karma-yogena yoginām iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:219: evaṃ sāṃkhya-buddhiṃ yoga-buddhiṃ ca āśritya dve niṣṭhe vibhakte bhagavataiva ukte jñāna-karmaṇoḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:223: tathaiva darśitaṃ śātapathīye brāhmaṇe - etam eva pravrājino lokam icchanto brāhmaṇāḥ pravrajanti [BAU 4.4.22] iti sarva-karma-saṃnyāsaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:224: vidhāya tac-cheṣeṇa kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yam ātmāyaṃ lokaḥ [BAU
GSP33bhgsbh_u:226: tatraiva ca prāg dāra-parigrahāt puruṣa ātmo prākṛto
GSP33bhgsbh_u:228: putraṃ, dvi-prakāraṃ ca vittaṃ mānuṣaṃ dvi-prakāraṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:235: [BAU 4.4.22] iti vyutthānam ātmānam eva lokam icchato 'kāmasya vihitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:236: tad etad vibhāga-vacanam anupapannaṃ syād yadi śrauta-karma-jñānayoḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:238: na cārjunasya praśna upapanno bhavati jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te [Gītā 3.1]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:240: eka-puruṣānuṣṭheyatvāsaṃbhavaṃ buddhi-karmaṇoḥ bhagavatā pūrvam anuktaṃ katham arjuno 'śrutaṃ buddhā ca karmaṇo jyāyastvaṃ bhagavaty adhyāropayen mṛṣaiva jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhiḥ iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:241: kiṃ ca -- yadi buddhi-karmaṇoḥ sarveṣāṃ samuccaya uktaḥ syāt arjunasyāpi sa ukta eveti, yac chrāya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam iti katham ubhayor upadeśe sati anyatara-viṣaya eva praśnaḥ syāt ? na hi pitta-praśamanārthinaḥ vaidyena madhuraṃ śītalaṃ ca bhoktavyam ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:242: upadiṣṭe tayor anyatarat-pitta-praśamana-kāraṇaṃ brūhi iti praśnaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:245: kalpyeta, tathāpi bhagavatā praśnānurūpaṃ prativacanaṃ deyam -- mayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:246: buddhi-karmaṇoḥ samuccaya uktaḥ kim artham itthaṃ tvaṃ bhrānto 'si -- iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:247: | na tu punaḥ prativacanam ananurūpaṃ pṛṣṭād anyad eva dve niṣṭhā mayā purā proktā iti vaktuṃ yuktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:248: nāpi smārtenaiva karmaṇā buddheḥ samuccaye abhiprete vibhāga-vacanādi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:250: kiṃ ca -- kṣatriyasya yuddhaṃ smārtaṃ karma sva-dharma
GSP33bhgsbh_u:251: iti jānataḥ tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghoro māṃ niyojayasi ity upālambho 'nupapannaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:252: tasmād gītā-śāstre īṣan-mātreṇāpi śrautena smārtena vā karmaṇā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:253: ātma-jñānasya samuccayo na kenacid darśayituṃ śakyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:255: rāgādi-doṣato vā karmaṇi pravṛttasya yajñena dānena tapasā vā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:256: viśuddha-sattvasya jñānam utpannaṃ paramārtha-tattva-viṣayam ekam evedaṃ sarvaṃ brahma akartṛ ca iti, tasya karmaṇi karma-prayojane ca nivṛtte 'pi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:257: loka-saṃgrahārthaṃ yatna-pūrvaṃ yathā pravṛttiḥ, tathaiva pravṛttasya yat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:258: pravṛtti-rūpaṃ dṛśyate na tat karma yena buddheḥ samuccayaḥ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:259: yathā bhagavato vāsudevasya kṣatra-dharma-ceṣṭitaṃ na jñānena samuccīyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:261: tattvavin nāhaṃ karomīti manyate, na ca tat-phalam abhisandhatte
GSP33bhgsbh_u:263: āhitāgneḥ kāmye eva agnihotrādau pravṛttasya sāmi kṛte vinaṣṭā 'pi kāme tad eva agnihotrādy-anutiṣṭhato 'pi na tat-kāmyam agnihotrādi bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:264: tathā ca darśayati bhagavān - kurvann api na lipyate na karoti na lipyate iti tatra tatra
GSP33bhgsbh_u:265: yac ca pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam karmaṇaiva hi saṃsiddhim āsthitā janakādayaḥ iti, tat tu pravibhajya vijñeyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:266: tat katham ? yadi tāvat pūrve janakādayaḥ tattva-vido 'pi pravṛtta-karmāṇaḥ syuḥ, te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:267: loka-saṃgrahārtham guṇā guṇeṣu vartante iti jñānenaiva saṃsiddhim
GSP33bhgsbh_u:268: āsthitāḥ, karma-saṃnyāse prāpte 'pi karmaṇā sahaiva saṃsiddhim āsthitāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:272: saṃsiddhiṃ sattva-śuddhim, jñānotpatti-lakṣaṇāṃ vā saṃsiddhim, āsthitā janakādaya iti vyākhyeyam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:276: vindati mānavaḥ ity uktvā siddhiṃ prāptasya punar-jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ vakṣyati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:277: -- siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma ity ādinā ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:278: tasmād gītā-śāstre kevalād eva tattva-jñānān mokṣa-prāptiḥ na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:280: yathā cāyam arthaḥ, tathā prakaraṇaśo vibhajya tatra tatra darśayiṣyāmaḥ ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:282: nimagnasya arjunasya anyatrātma-jñānād uddharaṇam apaśyan bhagavān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:283: vāsudevaḥ tataḥ kṛpayā arjunam uddidhārayiṣuḥ ātma-jñānāyāvatārayann āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:284: śrī-bhagavān uvāca aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñā-vādāṃś ca bhāṣase |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:288: nityatvāt, tān aśocyān anvaśoco 'nuśocitavān asi te mriyante man-nimittam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:289: ahaṃ tair vinābhūtaḥ kiṃ kariṣyāmi rājya-sukhādinā iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:291: prajñāvatāṃ buddhimatāṃ vādāṃś ca vacanāni ca bhāṣase |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:292: tad etat mauḍhyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ ca viruddham ātmani darśayasi unmatta iva ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:293: yasmāt gatāsūn gata-prāṇān mṛtān, agatāsūn agata-prāṇān jīvataś ca nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ ātmajñāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:294: paṇḍā ātma-viṣayā buddhir yeṣāṃ te hi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:296: paramārthatas tu tān nityān aśocyān anuśocasi, ato mūḍho 'si ity abhiprāyaḥ ||BhGS_2.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:299: na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:300: na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param ||BhG_2.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:301: na tv eva jātu kadācid ahaṃ nāsam kintv āsam eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:303: dehotpatti-vināśeṣu ghaṭādiṣu viyad iva nitya eva aham āsam ity abhiprāyaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:304: | tathā na tvaṃ nāsīḥ, kintv āsīr eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:305: tathā neme janādhipā āsan kintv āsann eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:306: tathā na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ, kintu bhaviṣyāma eva, sarve vayam ato 'smād deha-vināśāt param uttara-kāle 'pi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:307: triṣv api kāleṣu nityā ātma-svarūpeṇa ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:310: tatra katham iva nitya ātmeti dṛṣṭāntam āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:311: dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:312: tathā dehāntara-prāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati ||BhG_2.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:313: deho 'sya astīti dehī, tasya dehino dehavataḥ ātmano 'smin vartamāne dehā yathā yena prakāreṇa kaumāraṃ kumāra-bhāvo bālyāvasthā, yauvanaṃ yūno bhāvo madhyamāvasthā, jarā vayo-hāniḥ jīrṇāvasthā, ity etāḥ tisro 'vasthāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:319: tathā tadvad eva dehād anyo deho dehāntaram, tasya prāptiḥ dehāntara-prāptiḥ avikriyasyaiva ātmana ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:321: dhīro dhīmān tatraivaṃ sati na muhyati na moham āpadyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:322: yadyapy ātma-vināśa-nimitto moho na saṃbhavati nitya ātmā iti vijānataḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:325: ity etad arjunasya vacanam āśaṅkaya bhagavān āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:328: mātrā ābhiḥ mīyante śabdādaya iti śrotrādīni indriyāṇi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:332: athavā spṛśyanta iti sparśā viṣayāḥ śabdādayaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:339: yasmāt te mātrā-sparśādayaḥ āgamāpāyinaḥ āgamāpāyaśīlāḥ tasmāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:342: teṣu harṣaṃ viṣādaṃ vā mā kārṣīḥ ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_2.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:343: śītoṣṇādīn sahataḥ kiṃ syād iti śṛṇu ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:344: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:346: yaṃ hi puruṣaṃ same duḥkha-sukhe yasya taṃ sama-duḥkha-sukhaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:347: sukha-duḥkha-prāptau harṣa-viṣāda-rahitaṃ dhīraṃ dhīmantaṃ na vyathayanti na cālayanti nityātma-darśanāt ete yathoktāḥ śītoṣṇādayaḥ, sa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:350: itaś ca śoka-mohau akṛtvā śītoṣṇādi-sahanaṃ yuktam, yasmāt ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:351: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:352: ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattva-darśibhiḥ ||BhG_2.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:353: na asato 'vidyamānasya śītoṣṇādeḥ sa-kāraṇasya na vidyate nāsti bhāvo bhavanam astitā ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:354: na hi śītoṣṇādi sa-kāraṇaṃ pramāṇair nirūpyamāṇaṃ vastu sambhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:355: vikāro hi saḥ, vikāraś ca vyabhicarati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:356: yathā ghaṭādi-saṃsthānaṃ cakṣuṣā nirūpyamāṇaṃ mṛd-vyatirekeṇānupalabdher asat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:365: yad-viṣayā buddhir na vyabhicarati, tat sat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:369: sarvatra dve buddhī sarvair upalabhyete samānādhikaraṇe na nīlotpalavat, san ghaṭaḥ san paṭaḥ, san hastī iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:377: ghaṭe vinaṣṭe ghaṭa-buddhau vyabhicarantyāṃ sad-buddhir api vyabhicaratīti cet na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:381: sad-buddhivat ghaṭa-buddhir api ghaṭāntarā dṛśyata iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:383: sad-buddhir api naṣṭe ghaṭe na dṛśyata iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:386: kiṃ-viṣayā syāt ? na tu punaḥ sad-buddheḥ viṣayābhāvāt ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:387: ekādhikaraṇatvaṃ ghaṭādi-viśeṣyābhāve na yuktam iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:388: idam udakam iti marīcy-ādau anyatarābhāve 'pi sāmānādhikaraṇya-darśanāt ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:389: tasmād dehāder dvandvasya ca sa-kāraṇasya asato na vidyate bhāva iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:390: tathā sataś ca ātmano 'bhāvo 'vidyamānatā na vidyate, sarvatrāvyabhicārāt ity avocāma ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:391: evam ātmānātmanoḥ sad-asatoḥ ubhayor api dṛṣṭaḥ upalabdho 'nto nirṇayaḥ sat sad eva, asat asad eveti, tv anayoḥ yathoktayoḥ tattva-darśibhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:392: tad iti sarva-nāma sarvaṃ ca brahma, tasya nāma tad iti, tad-bhāvas tattvam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:394: tad draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te tattva-darśinaḥ, tais
GSP33bhgsbh_u:396: tvam api tattva-darśināṃ dṛṣṭim āśritya śokaṃ mohaṃ ca hitvā śītoṣṇādīni niyatāniyata-rūpāṇi dvandvāni vikāro 'yam asann eva marīci-jalavan mithyāvabhāsate iti manasi niścitya titikṣasva ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:398: kiṃ punas tat yat sad eva sarvadaiva astīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:400: avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:401: vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaścit kartum arhati ||BhG_2.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:405: kim ? yena sarvam idaṃ jagat tataṃ vyāptaṃ sad-ākhyena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:408: avyayasya na vyeti upacayāpacayau na yāti iti avyayaṃ tasya avyayasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:409: naitat sadākhyaṃ brahma svena rūpeṇa vyeti vyabhicarati, niravayavatvāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:413: vyeti, na tu evaṃ brahma vyeti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:414: ato 'vyayasya asya brahmaṇaḥ vināśaṃ na kaścit kartum arhati, na kaścit atmānaṃ vināśayituṃ śaknoti īśvaro 'pi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:415: ātmā hi brahma, svātmani ca kriyāvirodhāt ||BhGS_2.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:416: kiṃ punas tad asat yat svātma-sattāṃ vyabhicaratīti, ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:419: antaḥ vināśaḥ vidyate yeṣāṃ te antavantaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:420: yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikādau sad-buddhiḥ anuvṛttā pramāṇanirūpaṇānte vicchidyate, sa tasya antaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:421: tathā ime dehāḥ svapnamāyādehādivaca antavantaḥ nityasya śarīriṇaḥ śarīravato 'nāśino 'prameyarya ātmano 'ntavanta iti uktāḥ vivekibhirity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:425: yathā deho bhasmībhūto 'darśanaṃ gato naṣṭa ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:426: vidyamāno 'pi yathā anyathā pariṇato vyādhyādi-yukto jāto naṣṭa ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:427: tatra nityasya ṭh anāśinaḥ iti dvividhenāpi nāśena asaṃbandho 'syety
GSP33bhgsbh_u:429: anyathā pṛthivyādivad api nityatvaṃ syāt ātmanaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:430: tat mā bhūditi nityasya anāśinaḥ ityāha |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:433: nanu āgamena ātmā paricchidyate, pratyakṣādinā ca pūrvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:436: sirā hi ātmani pramātari pramitsoḥ pramāṇānveṣaṇā bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:437: na hi pūrvam itthamaham iti ātmānamapramāya pa cāt prameyaparicchādāya pravartate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:438: na hi ātmā nāma kasyacit aprasiddho bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:440: atad-dharmādhyāropaṇa-mātra-nivartakatvena pramāṇatvam ātmanaḥ pratipadyate, na hy ajñātārthajñāpakatvena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:441: tathā ca śrutiḥ --- yat sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaraḥ [BAU 3.4.1] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:442: yasmād evaṃ nityo 'vikriyaś cātmā tasmād yudhyasva, yuddhād uparamaṃ mā kārṣīḥ ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:443: na hy atra yuddha-kartavyatā vidhīyate, yuddhe pravṛtta eva hi asau śoka-moha-pratibaddhaḥ tūṣṇīm āste |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:446: tasmād yudhyasva iti anuvāda-mātram, na vidhiḥ ||BhGS_2.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:449: yat tu manyase yuddhā bhīṣmādayo mayā hanyante aham eva teṣāṃ hantā iti, eṣā buddhir mṛṣaiva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:451: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:452: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate ||BhG_2.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:453: ya enaṃ prakṛtaṃ dehinaṃ vetti vijānāti hantāraṃ hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartāraṃ ya ca enam anyo manyate hataṃ deha-hananena hato 'ham iti hanana-kriyāyāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:455: tau ubhau na vijānītaḥ na jñātavantau avivekena ātmānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:456: hantā ahaṃ, hato 'smy aham iti deha-hananena ātmānam ahaṃ pratyaya-viṣayaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:457: yau vijānītaḥ tau ātma-svarūpānabhijñau ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:458: yasmāt na ayam atmā hanti na hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartā bhavati, na ca hanyate na ca karma
GSP33bhgsbh_u:461: na jāyate mriyate vā kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:462: ajo nityaḥ śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre ||BhG_2.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:463: na jāyate notpadyate, jani-lakṣaṇā vastu-vikriyā na ātmano vidyate ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:466: na mriyate ca iti antyā vināśa-lakṣaṇā vikriyā pratiṣidhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:467: kadācic chabdaḥ sarva-vikriyā-pratiṣedhaiḥ saṃbadhyate -- na kadācit jāyate, na kadācit mriyate, ity evam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:468: yasmāt ayam ātmā bhūtvā bhavana-kriyām anubhūya paścāt abhavitā abhāvaṃ gantā na bhūyaḥ punaḥ, tasmāt na mriyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:469: yo hi bhūtvā na bhavitā sa mriyata ity ucyate lokā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:471: abhūtvā vā bhavitā dehavat na bhūyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:473: yo hi abhūtvā bhavitā sa jāyata ity ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:476: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt ajaḥ, yasmāt na mriyate tasmāt nityaś ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:477: yadyapi ādy-antayor vikriyayoḥ pratiṣedhe sarvā vikriyāḥ pratiṣiddhā bhavanti, tathāpi madhya-bhāvinīnāṃ vikriyāṇāṃ sva-śabdair eva pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyo 'nuktānām api yauvanādi-samasta-vikriyāṇāṃ pratiṣedho yathā syāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:484: apakṣaya-viparītāpi vṛddhi-lakṣaṇā vikriyā pratiṣidhyate --- purāṇa iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:485: yo hi avayavāgamena upacīyate sa vardhate abhinava iti ca ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:486: ayaṃ tu ātmā niravayavatvāt purāpi nava eveti purāṇaḥ na vardhate ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:495: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt ubhau tau na vijānītaḥ iti pūrveṇa mantreṇa asya saṃbandhaḥ ||BhGS_2.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:496: ya enaṃ vetti hantāram ityanena mantreṇa hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartā karma ca na bhavati iti pratijñāya, na jāyate ity anena avikriyatvaṃ hetum uktvā pratijñātārtham upasaṃharati--
GSP33bhgsbh_u:497: vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:498: kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam ||BhG_2.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:501: enaṃ pūrveṇa matreṇokta-lakṣaṇam ajaṃ janma-rahitam avyayam apakṣaya-rahitaṃ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa sa vidvān puruṣo 'dhikṛtaḥ hanti hanana-kriyāṃ karoti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:503: na kathaṃcit kaṃcit hanti, na kathaṃcit kaṃcit ghātayati iti ubhayatra ākṣepaḥ evārthaḥ praśnārthāsaṃbhavāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:508: hetu-viśeṣaṃ paśyan karmāṇy ākṣipati bhagavān kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:511: na tu sa kāraṇa-viśeṣaḥ, anyatvāt viduṣo 'vikriyād ātmanaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:512: | na hi avikriyaṃ sthāṇuṃ viditavataḥ karma na saṃbhavati iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:515: ataḥ pāriśeṣyāt asaṃhata ātmā vidvān avikriyaḥ iti tasya viduṣaḥ karmāsaṃbhavāt ākṣepo yuktaḥ kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:517: avikriya eva san buddhi-vṛtty-aviveka-vijñānena avidyayā upalabdhā ātmā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:518: kalpyate, evam eva ātmānātma-viveka-jñānena buddhi-vṛttyā vidyā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:519: asatya-rūpayaiva paramārthato 'vikriya eva ātmā vidvān ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:521: karmāsaṃbhava-vacanāt yāni karmāṇi śāstreṇa vidhīyante tāni aviduṣo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:523: nanu vidyāpi aviduṣa eva vidhīyate, vidita-vidyasya piṣṭa-peṣaṇavat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:525: tatra aviduṣaḥ karmāṇi vidhīyante na viduṣaḥ iti viśeṣo nopapadyate iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:528: aneka-sādhanopasaṃhāra-pūrvakam anuṣṭheyaṃ kartā aham, mama kartavyam ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:529: evaṃ prakāra-vijñānavato 'viduṣaḥ yathā anuṣṭheyaṃ bhavati, na tu tathā na jāyate ity ādy ātma-svarupa-vidhy-artha-jñānottara-kāla-bhāvi kiṃcid anuṣṭheyaṃ bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:530: kintu nāhaṃ kartā, nāhaṃ bhoktā ity ādy
GSP33bhgsbh_u:531: ātmaikatvākartṛtvādi-viṣaya-jñānāt nānyad utpadyate iti eṣa viśeṣa upapadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:532: yaḥ punaḥ kartā aham iti vetti ātmānam, tasya mama idaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:536: sa ca avidvān ubhau tau na vijānītaḥ iti vacanāt viśeṣitasya ca viduṣaḥ karmākṣepa-vacanāt kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:538: tasmāt viśeṣitasya avikriyātma-darśinaḥ viduṣaḥ mumukṣo ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:540: ata eva bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ sāṃkhyān viduṣo 'viduṣa ca karmiṇaḥ pravibhajya dve niṣṭhe grāhayati-jñāna-yogena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:542: tathā ca putrāya āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:543: - dvāv imāv atha panthānau [MahāŚā 241.6] ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:545: caiva purastāt paścāt saṃnyāsaś ca iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:546: etam eva vibhāgaṃ punaḥ punar darśayiṣyati bhagavān --- atattvavit ahaṃkāra-vimūḍhātmā kartāham iti manyate, tattvavit tu, nāhaṃ karomi iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:547: tathā ca sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasyāste ityādi ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:549: 'vikriyo 'kartā eko 'ham ātmā iti na kasyacit jñānam utpadyate, yasmin sati sarva-karma-saṃnyāsaḥ upadiśyate iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:560: | tathā ca tad adhigamāya anumāne āgame ca sati jñānaṃ notpadyata iti sāhasa-mātram etat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:561: jñānaṃ ca utpadyamānaṃ tad-viparītam ajñānam avaśyaṃ bādhate ity abhyupagantavyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:562: tac ca ajñānaṃ darśitam hantā aham, hato
GSP33bhgsbh_u:563: 'smi iti ubhau tau na vijānīta iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:565: kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ hetu-kartṛtvaṃ ca ajñāna-kṛtaṃ darśitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:566: tac ca sarva-kriyāsv api samānaṃ kartṛtvādeḥ avidyā-kṛtatvam avikriyatvāt ātmanaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:567: vikriyāvān hi kartā ātmanaḥ karma-bhūtam anyaṃ prayojayati kuru iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:568: tad etat aviśeṣeṇa viduṣaḥ sarva-kriyāsu kartṛtvaṃ hetu-kartṛtvaṃ ca pratiṣedhati bhagavān vāsudevo viduṣaḥ karmādhikārābhāva-pradarśanārthaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:569: vedāvināśinaṃ, kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ ity ādinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:570: kva punaḥ viduṣo 'dhikāra iti etad uktaṃ pūrvam eva jñāna-yogena sāṃkhyānām iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:571: tathā ca sarva-karma-saṃnyāsaṃ vakṣyati sarva-karmāṇi manasā ity ādinā ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:572: nanu manasā iti vacanāt na vācikānāṃ kāyikānā ca saṃnyāsaḥ iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:574: mānasānām eva sarva-karmaṇām iti cet, na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:578: varjayitvā anyāni sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasyed iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:579: naiva kurvan na kārayan iti viśeṣaṇāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:580: sarva-karma-saṃnyāso 'yaṃ bhagavatā uktaḥ mariṣyato na jīvata iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:581: nava-dvāre pure dehī āste iti viśeṇānupapatteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:582: na hi sarva-karma-saṃnyāsena mṛtasya tad-dehe āsanaṃ saṃbhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:583: akurvato 'kārayata ca dehe saṃnyasya iti saṃbandho na dehe āste iti cet,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:589: saṃpūrvas tu nyāsa-śabdo 'tra tyāgārthaḥ, na nikṣepārthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:591: ātma-jñānavataḥ saṃnyāsa eva adhikāro na karmaṇīti tatra tatra upariṣṭāt ātma-jñāna-prakaraṇe darśayiṣyāmaḥ ||BhGS_2.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:595: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:596: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī ||BhG_2.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:597: vāsāṃsi vastrāṇi jīrṇāni durbalatāṃ gatāni yathā loke vihāya parityajya navāni abhinavāni gṛhṇāti upādatte naraḥ puruṣo 'parāṇi anyāni, tathā tadvad eva śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni anyāni saṃyāti saṃgacchati navāni dehī ātmā puruṣavat avikriya evety arthaḥ ||BhGS_2.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:599: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:600: na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ ||BhG_2.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:601: enaṃ prakṛtaṃ dehinaṃ na chindanti śastrāṇi, niravayavatvāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:607: apāṃ hi sāvayavasya vastuna ādrībhāva-karaṇena avayava-viśleṣāpādane
GSP33bhgsbh_u:612: enaṃ tv ātmānaṃ na śoṣayati māruto 'pi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:616: yasmāt anyonya-nāśa-hetu-bhūtāni enam ātmānaṃ nāśayituṃ notsahante asyādīni tasmāt nityaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:621: ataḥ sanātanaś cirantanaḥ, na kāraṇāt kutaścin niṣpannaḥ, abhinava ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:622: naiteṣāṃ lokānāṃ paunaruktyaṃ codanīyam, yataḥ ekenaiva lokān ātmanaḥ nityatvam avikriyatvaṃ coktam na jāyate mriyate vā ity ādinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:623: tatra yad eva ātma-viṣayaṃ kiṃcid ucyate, tad etasmāt lokārthān nātiricyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:624: kiṃcic chabdataḥ punaruktam, kiṃcid arthataḥ iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:626: punaḥ punaḥ prasaṅgam āpādya śabdāntareṇa tad eva vastu nirūpayati bhagavān vāsudevaḥ kathaṃ nu nāma saṃsāriṇām asaṃsāritva-buddhi-gocaratām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:627: āpannaṃ sat avyaktaṃ tattvaṃ saṃsāra-nivṛttaye syāt iti ||BhGS_2.24||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:631: avyaktaḥ sarva-karaṇāviṣayatvāt na vyajyata iti avyakto 'yam ātmā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:633: yad dhi indriya-gocaras tac cintā-viṣayatvam āpadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:635: ataeva avikāryaḥ, yathā kṣīraṃ dadhyātañcanādinā vikāri na tathā ayam ātmā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:637: na hi niravayavaṃ kiṃcit vikriyātmakaṃ dṛṣṭām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:639: tasmāt evaṃ yathokta-prakāreṇa enam ātmānaṃ viditvā tvaṃ na anuśocitum arhasi hantāham eṣām, mayaite hanyanta iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:641: atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:642: tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho naivaṃ śocitum arhasi ||BhG_2.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:645: loka-prasiddhayā praty aneka-śarīrotpatti jāto jāta iti manyase |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:647: prati-tat-tad-vināśaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtaṃ mṛto mṛta iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:648: tathāpi tathābhāve 'py ātmani tvaṃ mahābāho, na evaṃ śocitum arhasi, janmavato nāśo nāśavato janma cety etāv avaśyaṃbhāvināv iti ||BhGS_2.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:650: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:651: tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi ||BhG_2.27||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:652: jātasya hi labdha-janmanaḥ dhruvo 'vyabhicārī mṛtyur maraṇaṃ dhruva janma mṛtasya ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:654: tasminn aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi ||BhGS_2.27||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:655: kārya-karaṇa-saṃghātātma-kānyapi bhūtāny uddiśya śoko na yuktaḥ kartum,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:659: avyaktādīny avyaktam adarśanam anupalabdhiḥ ādir yeṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:662: avyakta-nidhanāny eva punar avyaktam adarśanaṃ nidhanaṃ maraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni avyakta-nidhanāni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:663: maraṇād ūrdhvam apy avyaktatām eva pratipadyante ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:666: nāsau tava na tasya tvaṃ vṛthā kā paridevanā || [Mahā. Strī. 2.13] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:667: tatra kā paridevanā ko vā pralāpo 'dṛṣṭa-dṛṣṭa-pranaṣṭa-bhrānti-bhūteṣu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:672: āścaryavat paśyati kaścid enam āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:673: āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścit ||BhG_2.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:674: āścaryavat āścaryam adṛṣṭa-pūrvam adbhutam akasmād dṛśyamānaṃ tena tulyaṃ āścaryavat āścaryam iva enam ātmānaṃ paśyati kaścit |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:677: śrutvā dṛṣṭvā uktvāpi enam ātmānaṃ veda na caiva kaścit |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:678: athavā yo 'yam ātmānaṃ paśyati sa āścarya-tulyaḥ, yo vadati ya ca sṛṇoti so 'neka-sahasreṣu kaścid eva bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:681: dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:682: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi ||BhG_2.30||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:683: dehī śarīrī nityaṃ sarvadā sarvāvasthāsu avadhyaḥ niravayavatvān nityatvāc ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:684: tatra avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe śarīre sarvasya sarva-gatatvāt sthāvarādiṣu sthito 'pi sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya dehe vadhyamāne 'py ayaṃ dehī na vadhyo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:685: yasmāt, tasmād bhīṣmādīni sarvāṇi bhūtāni uddiśya na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:686: iha paramārtha-tattvāpekṣāyāṃ śoko moho vā na saṃbhavatīty uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:687: na kevalaṃ paramārtha-tattvāpekṣāyām eva, kiṃ tu ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:688: sva-dharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:689: dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate ||BhG_2.31||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:690: svadharmam api svo dharmaḥ kṣatriyasya yuddhaṃ tam api avekṣya tvaṃ na vikampituṃ pracalitum nārhasi kṣatriyasya svābhāvikād dharmād
GSP33bhgsbh_u:693: dharmārthaṃ prajā-rakṣaṇārthaṃ ceti dharmād anapetaṃ paraṃ dharmyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:694: tasmād dharmyād yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate hi yasmāt ||BhGS_2.31||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:695: kutaś ca tat yuddhaṃ kartavyam iti, ucyate ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:697: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam ||BhG_2.32||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:698: yadṛcchayā ca aprārthitatayā upapannam āgataṃ svarga-dvāram apāvṛtam udghāṭitaṃ ya etad īdṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ labhante kṣatriyāḥ he pārtha, kiṃ na sukhinas te ? ||BhGS_2.32||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:700: atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:701: tataḥ sva-dharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi ||BhG_2.33||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:702: atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ dharmād anapetaṃ vihitaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ yuddhaṃ na kariṣyasi cet, tataḥ tad-akaraṇāt svadharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:707: akīrtiṃ cāpi yuddhā bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti te tava avyayāṃ dīrgha-kālām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:708: dharmātmā śūra ity evam ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ saṃbhāvitasya ca akīrtiḥ maraṇāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:709: atiricyate, saṃbhāvitasya ca akīrteḥ varaṃ maraṇam ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:711: bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:712: yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam ||BhG_2.35||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:713: bhayāt karṇādibhyaḥ raṇāt yuddhāt uparataṃ nivṛttaṃ maṃsyante cintayiṣyanti na kṛpayeti tvāṃ mahārathāḥ duryodhana-prabhṛtayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:714: yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ duryodhanādīnāṃ bahu-mato bahubhir guṇair yuktaḥ ity evaṃ mataḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:715: bahumato bhūtvā punar yāsyasi lāghavaṃ laghu-bhāvam ||BhGS_2.35||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:718: nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim ||BhG_2.36||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:719: avācya-vādān avaktavya-vādāṃś ca bahūn aneka-prakārān vadiṣyanti tavāhitāḥ śatravaḥ nindantaḥ kutsayantaḥ tava tvadīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:721: tatas tasmāt nindā-prāpter duḥkhāt duḥkhataraṃ nu kim ? tataḥ kaṣṭataraṃ duḥkhaṃ nāstīty arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:723: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:725: hato vā prāpsyasi svargam, hataḥ san svargaṃ prāpsyasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:726: jitvā vā karṇādīn śūrān bhokṣyase mahīm |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:728: yata evaṃ tasmāt uttiṣṭha kaunteya yuddhāya kṛtāni ca yaḥ jeṣyāmi śatrūn,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:729: mariṣyāmi vā iti niścayaṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ ||BhGS_2.37||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:730: tatra yuddhaṃ svadharma ity evaṃ yudhyamānasyopadeśam imaṃ sṛṇu -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:732: tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi ||BhG_2.38||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:733: sukha-duḥkhe same tulye kṛtvā, rāga-dveṣāv apy akṛtvety etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:734: tathā lābhālābhau jayājayau ca samau kṛtvā tato yuddhāya yujyasva ghaṭāsva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:735: na evaṃ yuddhaṃ kurvan pāpam avāpsyasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:737: śoka-mohāpanayanāya laukiko nyāyaḥ svadharmam api cāvekṣya ity ādyaiḥ lokair uktaḥ, na tu tātparyeṇa |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:739: tac coktam upasaṃhriyate -- eṣā te 'bhihitā iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:743: yoginām iti niṣṭhā-dvaya-viṣayaṃ śāstraṃ sukhaṃ pravartiṣyate, śrotāraś ca viṣaya-vibhāgena sukhaṃ grahīṣyanti ity ata āha ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:744: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:745: buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi ||BhG_2.39||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:746: eṣā te tubhyam abhihitā uktā sāṃkhye paramārtha-vastu-viveka-viṣaye
GSP33bhgsbh_u:749: īśvarārādhanārthe karma-yoge karmānuṣṭhāne samādhi-yoge cemām anantaram evocyamānāṃ buddhiṃ śṛṇu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:750: tāṃ ca buddhiṃ stauti prarocanārtham -- buddhyā yayā yoga-viṣayayā yuktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:751: he pārtha, karma-bandhaṃ karmaiva dharmādharmākhyo bandhaḥ karma-bandhas taṃ prahāsyasi īśvara-prasāda-nimitta-jñāna-prāpter ity abhiprāyaḥ ||BhGS_2.39||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:754: svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt ||BhG_2.40||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:755: neha mokṣa-mārge karma-yoge abhikrama-nāśo 'bhikramaṇam abhikramaḥ prārambhas tasya nāśo nāsti yathā kṛṣyādeḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:756: yoga-viṣaye prārambhasya na anaikāntika-phalatvam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:757: kiṃ ca nāpi cikitsāvat pratyavāyo vidyate bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:758: kiṃ tu svalpam api asya dharmasya yoga-dharmasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:759: anuṣṭhitaṃ trāyate rakṣati mahataḥ bhayāt saṃsāra-bhayāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:761: yeyaṃ sāṃkhye buddhir uktā yoge ca, vakṣyamāṇa-lakṣaṇā sā -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:767: he kurunandana ! yāḥ punar itarā viparīta-buddhayaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:770: pramāṇa-janita-viveka-buddhi-nimitta-vaśāc ca uparatāsv ananta-bheda-buddhiṣu saṃsāro 'py uparamate tā buddhayo bahu-śākhāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:771: bahvvayaḥ śākhāḥ yāsāṃ tāḥ bahu-śākhāḥ, bahu-bhedā ity etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:776: yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ pravadanty avipaścitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:778: yām imāṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ puṣpitāṃ puṣpita iva vṛkṣaḥ śobhamānāṃ śrūyamāṇa-ramaṇīyāṃ vācaṃ vākya-lakṣaṇāṃ pravadanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:783: na anyat svarga-prāpty-ādi-phala-sādhanebhyaḥ karmabhyo 'sti ity evaṃ vādinaḥ vadana-śīlāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:788: svarga-parāḥ svargaḥ paraḥ puruṣārthaḥ yeṣāṃ te svarga-parāḥ svarga-pradhānāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:793: kriyā-viśeṣa-bahulāṃ kriyāṇāṃ viśeṣāḥ kriyā-viśeṣāḥ te bahulā yasyāṃ vāci tāṃ svarga-paśu-putrādy-arthāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:796: aiśvaryaṃ ca bhogaiśvarye, tayor gatiḥ prāptiḥ bhogaiśvarya-gatiḥ, tāṃ prati sādhana-bhūtāḥ ye kriyā-viśeṣāḥ tad-bahulāṃ tāṃ vācaṃ pravadantaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:801: bhogaiśvarya-prasaktānāṃ bhogaḥ kartavyaḥ caiśvaryaṃ ca iti bhogaiśvaryayor eva praṇayavatāṃ tad-ātma-bhūtānām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:804: vyavasāyātmikā sāṃkhye yoge vā buddhiḥ samādhau samādhīyate asmin puruṣopabhogāya sarvam iti samādhiḥ antaḥkaraṇaṃ buddhiḥ tasmin samādhau,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:805: na vidhīyate na bhavati ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_2.44||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:806: ya evaṃ viveka-buddhi-rahitāḥ teṣāṃ kāmātmanāṃ yat phalaṃ tad āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:809: traiguṇya-viṣayāḥ traiguṇyaṃ saṃsāro viṣayaḥ prakāśayitavyaḥ yeṣāṃ te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:811: tvaṃ tu nistraiguṇyo bhava arjuna, niṣkāmo bhava ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:818: yoga-kṣema-pradhānasya śreyasi pravṛttir duṣkarā ity ataḥ niryoga-kṣemo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:823: sarveṣu vedokteṣu karmasu yāny uktāny anantāni phalāni tāni nāpekṣyante
GSP33bhgsbh_u:824: cet, kim arthaṃ tāni īśvarāyety anuṣṭhīyante ity ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:828: yathā loke kūpa-taḍāgādy-anekasmin udapāne paricchinnodake yāvān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:829: yāvat-parimāṇaḥ snāna-pānādir arthaḥ phalaṃ prayojanaṃ sa sarvo 'rthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:830: sarvataḥ saṃplutodake 'pi yo 'rthaḥ tāvān eva saṃpadyate, tatra antarbhavatīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:831: evaṃ tāvān tāvat-parimāṇa eva saṃpadyate sarveṣu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:832: vedeṣu vedokteṣu karmasu yo 'rthaḥ yat karma-phalaṃ so 'rthaḥ brāhmaṇasya saṃnyāsinaḥ paramārtha-tattvaṃ vijānataḥ yo 'rthaḥ yat vijñāna-phalaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:833: sarvataḥ saṃplutodaka-sthānīyaṃ tasmin tāvān eva saṃpadyate tatraivāntarbhavatīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:834: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃcit prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti yas tad veda yat sa veda [ChāU 4.1.2] iti śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:836: tasmāt prāk jñāna-niṣṭhādhikāra-prāpteḥ karmaṇy adhikṛtena kūpa-taḍāgādy-artha-sthānīyam api karma kartavyam ||BhGS_2.46||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:838: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:839: mā karma-phala-hetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi ||BhG_2.47||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:840: karmaṇy evādhikāro na jñāna-niṣṭhāyāṃ te tava |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:841: tatra ca karma kurvataḥ mā phaleṣu adhikāro 'stu, karma-phala-tṛṣṇā mā bhūt kadācana kasyāṃcid apy avasthāyām ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:842: yadā karma-phale tṛṣṇā te syāt tadā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:843: karma-phala-prāpter hetuḥ syāḥ, evaṃ mā karma-phala-hetuḥ bhūḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:844: yadā hi karma-phala-tṛṣṇā-prayuktaḥ karmaṇi pravartate tadā karma-phalasyaiva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:846: yadi karma-phalaṃ neṣyate, kiṃ karmaṇā duḥkha-rūpeṇa ? iti mā te tava saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi akaraṇe prītir mā bhūt ||BhGS_2.47||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:847: yadi karma-phala-prayuktena na kartavyaṃ karma, kathaṃ tarhi kartavyam iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:849: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:850: siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate ||BhG_2.48||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:851: yoga-sthaḥ san kuru karmāṇi kevalam īśvarārtham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:852: tatrāpīśvaro me tuṣyatu iti saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:853: phala-tṛṣṇā-śūnyena kriyamāṇe karmaṇi sattva-śuddhijā jñāna-prāpti-lakṣaṇā siddhiḥ, tad-viparyayajā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:854: tayoḥ siddhy-asiddhyor api samaḥ tulyo bhūtvā kuru karmāṇi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:856: yatra-sthaḥ kuru ity uktam ? idam eva tat --- siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samatvaṃ yoga ucyate ||BhGS_2.48||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:857: yat punaḥ samatva-buddhi-yuktam īśvarārādhanārthaṃ karmoktam, etasmāt karmaṇaḥ --
GSP33bhgsbh_u:858: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhi-yogād dhanaṃjaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:860: dūreṇa ativiprakarṣeṇa atyantam eva hy avaram adhamaṃ nikṛṣṭaṃ karma phalārthinā kriyamāṇaṃ buddhi-yogāt samatva-buddhi-yuktāt karmaṇaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:862: he dhanaṃjaya, yata evaṃ tataḥ yoga-viṣayāyāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:863: buddhau tat-paripāka-jāyāṃ vā sāṃkhya-buddhau śaraṇam āśrayam abhaya-prāpti-kāraṇam anviccha prārthayasva, paramārtha-jñāna-śaraṇo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:865: yato 'varaṃ karma kurvāṇāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ dīnāḥ phala-hetavaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:866: phala-tṛṣṇā-prayuktāḥ santaḥ, yo vā etad akṣaraṃ gārgy aviditvāsmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇaḥ [BAU 3.8.10] iti śruteḥ ||BhGS_2.49||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:867: samatva-buddhi-yuktaḥ san svadharmam anutiṣṭhan yat phalaṃ prāpnoti tac chṛṇu --
GSP33bhgsbh_u:869: tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam ||BhG_2.50||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:870: buddhi-yuktaḥ karma-samatva-viṣayayā buddhyā yukto buddhi-yuktaḥ saḥ jahāti parityajati iha asmin loke ubhe sukṛta-duṣkṛte puṇya-pāpe
GSP33bhgsbh_u:873: yogo hi karmasu kauśalam sva-dharmākhyeṣu karmasu vartamānasya yā siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samatva-buddhir īśvarārpita-cetastayā tat kauśalaṃ kuśala-bhāvaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:874: tad dhi kauśalaṃ yad bandhana-svabhāvāny api karmāṇi samatva-buddhyā svabhāvān nivartante
GSP33bhgsbh_u:878: karmajaṃ buddhi-yuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:880: karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā iti vyavahitena sambandhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:881: iṣṭāniṣṭa-deha-prāptiḥ karmajaṃ phalaṃ karmabhyo jātaṃ buddhi-yuktāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:882: samatva-buddhi-yuktāḥ santaḥ hi yasmāt phalaṃ tyaktvā parityajya manīṣiṇaḥ jñānino bhūtvā, janma-bandha-vinirmuktāḥ janmaiva bandhaḥ janma-bandhaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:883: tena vinirmuktāḥ jīvanta eva janma-bandhāt vinirmuktāḥ santaḥ, padaṃ paramaṃ viṣṇoḥ mokṣākhyaṃ gacchanti anāmayaṃ sarvopadrava-rahitam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:888: yogānuṣṭhāna-janita-sattva-śuddhajā buddhiḥ kadā prāpsyate ity ucyate ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:890: tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca ||BhG_2.52||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:891: yadā yasmin kāle te tava moha-kalilaṃ mohātmakam aviveka-rūpaṃ kāluṣyaṃ yena ātmānātma-viveka-bodhaṃ kaluṣīkṛtya viṣayaṃ pratyantaḥ-karaṇaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:892: pravartate, tat tava buddhiḥ vyatitariṣyati vyatikramiṣyati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:894: tadā tasmin kāle gantāsi prāpsyasi nirvedaṃ vairāgyaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca, tadā śrotavyaṃ śrutaṃ ca te niṣphalaṃ pratibhātīty abhiprāyaḥ ||BhGS_2.52||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:896: phalaṃ paramārtha-yogam avāpsyāmīti cet, tat sṛṇu --
GSP33bhgsbh_u:898: samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasyi ||BhG_2.53||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:900: śravaṇaiḥ pravṛtti-nivṛtti-lakṣaṇaiḥ vipratipannā nānā-pratinnā vikṣiptā satī te tava buddhir yadā yasmin kāle sthāsyati sthirībhūtā bhaviṣyati niścalā vikṣepa-calana-varjitā satī samādhau, samādhīyate cittam asminn
GSP33bhgsbh_u:901: iti samādhir ātmā, tasmin ātmani ity etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:905: tadā tasmin kāle yogam avāpsyasi viveka-prajñāṃ samādhiṃ prāpsyasi ||BhGS_2.53||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:908: arjuna uvāca sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā samādhi-sthasya keśava |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:909: sthita-dhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim ||BhG_2.54||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:910: sthitā pratiṣṭhitā aham asmi paraṃ brahma iti prajñā yasya saḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:911: sthita-prajñas tasya sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā kiṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ vacanaṃ katham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:912: asau parair bhāṣyate samādhi-sthasya samādhau sthitasya he keśava |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:913: sthita-dhīḥ sthita-prajñaḥ svayaṃ vā kiṃ prabhāṣeta |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:914: kim āsīta vrajeta kim āsanaṃ vrajanaṃ vā tasya katham ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:916: yo hy ādita eva saṃnyasya karmāṇi jñāna-yoga-niṣṭhāyāṃ pravṛttaḥ, yaś ca karma-yogena, tayoḥ prajahāti ity ārabhya ā adhyāya-parisamāpteḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:918: sarvatraiva hi adhyātma-śāstre kṛtārtha-lakṣaṇāni yāni tāny eva sādhanāni upadiśyante,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:920: yāni yatna-sādhyāni sādhanāni lakṣaṇāni ca bhavanti tāni śrī-bhagavān uvāca--
GSP33bhgsbh_u:921: prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha mano-gatān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:923: prajahāti prakarṣeṇa jahāti parityajati yadā yasmin kāle sarvān samastān kāmān icchā-bhedān he pārtha, mano-gatān manasi praviṣṭāan hṛdi praviṣṭān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:924: | sarva-kāma-parityāge tuṣṭi-kāraṇābhāvāt śarīra-dhāraṇa-nimitta-śeṣe ca sati unmatta-pramattasyeva pravṛttiḥ prāptā, ity ata ucyate --- ātmany eva pratyag-ātma-svarūpe eva ātmanā svenaiva bāhya-lābha-nirapekṣas tuṣṭāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:926: sthita-prajñaḥ sthitā pratiṣṭhitā ātmānātma-vivekajā prajñā yasya saḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:928: tyakta-putra-vitta-lokaiṣaṇaḥ saṃnyāsī ātmārāma ātma-krīḍāḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_2.55||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:932: duḥkheṣv ādhyātmikādiṣu prāpteṣu na udvignaṃ na prakṣubhitaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:934: tathā sukheṣu prāpteṣu vigatā spṛhā tṛṣṇā yasya, na agnir iva indhanādy-ādhāne sukhāny anu vivardhate sa vigata-spṛhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:935: vīta-rāga-bhaya-krodhaḥ rāga ca bhayaṃ ca krodha ca vītā vigatā yasmāt sa vīta-rāga-bhaya-krodhaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:939: yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:940: nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā ||BhG_2.57||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:941: yaḥ muniḥ sarvatra deha-jīvitādiṣv api anabhisneho 'bhisneha-varjitas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubhaṃ tat tat śubhaṃ aśubhaṃ vā labdhvā nābhinandati na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:942: dveṣṭi śubhaṃ prāpya na tuṣyati na hṛṣyati, aśubhaṃ ca prāpya na dveṣṭi ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:943: tasya evaṃ harṣa-viṣāda-varjitasya vivekajā prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati ||BhGS_2.57||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:947: yadā saṃharate samyag upasaṃharate cāyaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāyāṃ pravṛtto yatiḥ kūrmo 'ṅgāni iva yathā kūrmo bhayāt svāny aṅgāni upasaṃharati sarvaśaḥ sarvataḥ, evaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhaḥ indriyāṇi indriyārthebhyaḥ sarva-viṣayebhya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:949: tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā ity uktārthaṃ vākyam ||BhGS_2.58||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:950: tatra viṣayān anāharataḥ āturasyāpi indriyāṇi kūrmāṅgānīva saṃhriyante na tu tad-viṣayo rāgaḥ sa kathaṃ saṃhriyate ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:952: rasa-varjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate ||BhG_2.59||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:953: yadyapi viṣayāḥ viṣayopalakṣitāni viṣaya-śabda-vācyāni indriyāṇi nirāhārasya anāhriyamāṇa-viṣayasya kaṣṭe tapasi sthitasya mūrkhasyāpi vinivartante dehino dehavataḥ rasa-varjaṃ raso rāgo viṣayeṣu yas taṃ varjayitvā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:954: rasa-śabdo rāge prasiddhaḥ, sva-rasena pravṛttaḥ rasikaḥ rasajñaḥ, ity ādi-darśanāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:955: so 'pi raso rañjana-rūpaḥ sūkṣmo 'sya yateḥ paraṃ paramārtha-tattvaṃ brahma dṛṣṭvā upalabhya aham eva tat iti vartamānasya nivartate nirbījaṃ viṣaya-vijñānaṃ saṃpadyate ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:961: yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:963: yatataḥ prayatnaṃ kurvataḥ hi yasmāt kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ medhāvino 'pi iti vyavahitena saṃbandhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:964: indriyāṇi pramāthīni pramathana-śīlāni viṣayābhimukhaṃ hi puruṣaṃ vikṣobhayanti ākulīkurvanti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:965: ākulīkṛtya ca haranti prasabhaṃ prasahya prakāśam eva paśyato viveka-vijñāna-yuktaṃ manaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:967: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta mat-paraḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:968: vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā ||BhG_2.61||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:969: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya saṃyamanaṃ vaśīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā yuktaḥ samāhitaḥ san āsīta mat-paro 'haṃ vāsudevaḥ sarva-pratyag-ātmā paro yasya sa mat-paraḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:970: nānyo 'haṃ tasmāt ity āsīta ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:971: evam āsīnasya yater vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi vartante abhyāsa-balāt tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:977: dhyāyataś cintayato viṣayāt śabdādīn viṣaya-viśeṣān ālocayataḥ puṃsaḥ puruṣasya saṅgaḥ āsaktiḥ prītis teṣu viṣayeṣu upajāyate utpadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:978: saṅgāt prīteḥ saṃjāyate samutpadyate kāmas tṛṣṇā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:981: kruddho hi saṃmūḍhaḥ san gurum apy ākrośati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:990: tāvad eva hi puruṣaḥ yāvad antaḥkaraṇaṃ tadīyaṃ kāryākārya-viṣaya-viveka-yogyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:992: ataḥ tasyāntaḥ-karaṇasya buddher nāśāt praṇaśyati puruṣārthāyogyo bhavatīty arthaḥ ||BhGS_2.62-63||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:997: rāga-dveṣa-viyuktai rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca rāga-dveṣau, tat-puraḥsarā hi indriyāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ svābhāvikī, tatra yo mumukṣuḥ bhavati saḥ tābhyāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:998: viyuktaiḥ śrotrādibhir indriyair viṣayān avarjanīyān caran upalabhamānaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:999: ātma-vaśyair ātmano vaśyāni vaśībhūtāni indriyāṇi tair ātma-vaśyair
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1000: vidheyātmā icchātaḥ vidheya ātmā antaḥ-karaṇaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ prasādam adhigacchati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1002: prasāde sati kiṃ syāt ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1005: prasāde sarva-duḥkhānām ādhyātmikādīnāṃ hānir vināśo 'sya yater upajāyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1006: kiṃ ca - prasanna-cetasaḥ svasthāntaḥ-karaṇasya hi yasmāt āśu śīghraṃ buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate ākāśam iva pari samantāt avatiṣṭhate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1009: rāga-dveṣa-viyuktair indriyaiḥ śāstrā-viruddheṣu avarjanīyeṣu yuktaḥ samācaret iti vākyārthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1012: na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham ||BhG_2.66||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1013: nāsti na vidyate na bhavatīty arthaḥ, buddhiḥ ātma-svarūpa-viṣayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1015: na ca asti ayuktasya bhāvanā ātma-jñānābhiniveśaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1018: aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham ? indriyāṇāṃ hi viṣaya-sevā-tṛṣṇātaḥ nivṛttir yā tat-sukham, na viṣaya-viṣayā tṛṣṇā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1020: na tṛṣṇāyāṃ satyāṃ sukhasya gandha-mātram apy upapadyate ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_2.66||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1021: ayuktasya kasmād buddhir nāsti ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1023: tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi ||BhG_2.67||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1024: indriyāṇāṃ hi yasmāt caratāṃ sva-sva-viṣayeṣu pravartamānānāṃ yat mano
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1025: 'nuvidhīyate anupravartate tat indriya-viṣaya-vikalpanena pravṛttaṃ mano 'sya yateḥ harati prajñām ātmānātma-vivekajāṃ nāśayati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1026: katham ? vāyuḥ nāvam iva ambhasi udake jigamiṣatāṃ mārgāduddhṛtya unmārge yathā vāyuḥ nāvaṃ pravartayati, evam ātma-viṣayāṃ prajñāṃ hṛtvā mano viṣaya-viṣayāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1028: yatato hi ity upanyastasyārthasya anekadhā upapattim uktvā taṃ cārtham upapādya upasaṃharati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1031: indriyāṇāṃ pravṛttau doṣa upapādito yasmāt tasmāt yasya yateḥ he mahābāho,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1032: nigṛhītāni sarvaśaḥ sarva-prakāraiḥ mānasādi-bhedaiḥ indriyāṇi indriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyas tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā ||BhGS_2.68||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1033: yo 'yaṃ laukiko vaidika ca vyavahāraḥ sa utpanna-viveka-jñānasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1034: sthita-prajñasya avidyākāryatvāt avidyā-nivṛttau nivartate, avidyāyā ca vidyā-virodhāt nivṛttiḥ, ity etam arthaṃ sphuṭīkurvann āha ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1035: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1036: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ ||BhG_2.69||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1037: yā niśā rātriḥ sarva-padārthānām aviveka-karī tamaḥ-svabhāvatvāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1041: yathā naktaṃ-carāṇām ahar eva sad anyeṣāṃ niśā bhavati, tadvat naktaṃ-cara-sthānīyānām ajñānāṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ niśeva niśā paramārtha-tattvam, agocaratvād atad-buddhīnām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1047: jāgrati iti ucyante, yasyāṃ niśāyāṃ prasuptā iva svapna-dṛśaḥ, sā niśā avidyā-rūpatvāt paramārtha-tattvaṃ paśyato muneḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1048: ataḥ karmāṇi avidyāvasthāyām eva codyante, na vidyāvasthāyām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1049: vidyāyāṃ hi satyām udite savitari śārvaram iva tamaḥ praṇāśam upagacchati avidyā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1054: vedena mama coditaṃ kartavyaṃ karma iti hi karmaṇi kartā pravartate, na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1055: avidyā-mātram idaṃ sarvaṃ bheda-jātam iti jñānaṃ tasya ātmajñasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1058: tad-buddhayas tad-ātmānaḥ ity ādinā jñāna-niṣṭhāyām eva tasya adhikāram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1059: tatrāpi pravartaka-pramāṇābhāve pravṛtty-anupapattiḥ iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1065: na hy ātma-svarūpādhigame sati punaḥ pramāṇa-prameya-vyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1066: pramātṛtvaṃ hy ātmanaḥ nivartayati antyaṃ pramāṇam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1070: | tasmān nātma-vidaḥ karmaṇy adhikāra iti siddham ||BhGS_2.69||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1071: viduṣas tyaktaiṣaṇasya sthita-prajñasya yater eva mokṣa-prāptiḥ, na tu asaṃnyāsinaḥ kāma-kāminaḥ ity etam arthaṃ dṛṣṭāntena pratipādayiṣyan āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1074: tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāma-kāmī ||BhG_2.70||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1075: āpūryamāṇam adbhir acala-pratiṣṭham acalatayā pratiṣṭhā avasthitiḥ yasya tam acala-pratiṣṭhaṃ samudram āpaḥ sarvato gatāḥ praviśanti svātmastham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1076: avikriyam eva santaṃ yadvat, tadvat kāmāḥ viṣaya-saṃnidhāv api sarvataḥ icchā-viśeṣāḥ yaṃ puruṣam --- samudram iva āpaḥ -- avikurvantaḥ praviśanti sarve ātmany eva pralīyante na svātma-vaśaṃ kurvanti, sa śāntir mokṣam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1077: āpnoti, netaraḥ kāma-kāmī, kāmyanta iti kāmāḥ viṣayāḥ tān kāmayituṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ kāma-kāmī, naiva prāpnotīty arthaḥ ||BhGS_2.70||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1079: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1081: vihāya parityajya kāmān yaḥ saṃnyāsī pumān sarvān aśeṣataḥ kārtsnyena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1084: śarīra-jīvana-mātre 'pi nirgatā spṛhā yasya saḥ niḥspṛhaḥ san nirmamaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1087: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ brahmavit śāntiṃ sarva-saṃsāra-duḥkhoparama-lakṣaṇāṃ nirvāṇākhyām adhigacchati prāpnoti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1090: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1092: eṣā yathoktā brāhmī brahmaṇi bhavā iyaṃ sthitiḥ sarvaṃ karma saṃnyasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1095: labdhvā na vimuhyati na mohaṃ prāpnoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1096: sthitvāsyāṃ sthitau brāhmyāṃ yathoktāyāṃ anta-kāle 'pi antye vayasy api brahma-nirvāṇaṃ brahma-nirvṛtiṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1098: kim u vaktavyaṃ brahmacaryād eva saṃnyasya yāvaj jīvaṃ yo brahmaṇy eva avatiṣṭhate sa brahma-nirvāṇam ṛcchati iti ||BhGS_2.72||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1104: śāstrasya pravṛtti-nivṛtti-viṣaya-bhūte dve buddhī bhagavatā nirdiṣṭe,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1105: sāṅkhye buddhir yoge buddhir iti ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1106: tatra prajahāti yadā kāmān ity ārabhya ā adhyāya-parisamāpteḥ sāṅkhya-buddhy-āśritānāṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kartavyam uktvā teṣāṃ tan-niṣṭhatayaiva ca kṛtārthatā uktā eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1107: arjunāya ca karmaṇy evādhikāras te, mā saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi iti karma eva kartavyam uktavān yoga-buddhim āśritya, na tata eva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1109: tad etad ālakṣya paryākulībhūta-buddhir arjuna uvāca - kathaṃ bhaktāya śreyo 'rthine yat sākṣāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1114: praśnāpākaraṇa-vākyaṃ ca bhagavatā uktaṃ yathokta-vibhāga-viṣaye śāstre |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1115: kecit tu arjunasya praśnārtham anyathā kalpayitvā tat-pratikūlaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1118: gītārtho nirūpitas tat-pratikūlaṃ ceha punaḥ praśna-prativacanayor arthaṃ nirūpayanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1119: kathaṃ ? tatra sambandha-granthe tāvat sarveṣām āśramiṇāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1120: jñāna-karmaṇoḥ samuccayo gītā-śāstre nirūpito 'rtha ity uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1121: punaḥ viśeṣitaṃ ca yāvaj-jīva-śruti-coditāni karmāṇi parityajya kevalād eva jñānān mokṣaḥ prāpyata ity etad ekāntenaiva pratiṣiddham iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1122: iha tv āśrama-vikalpaṃ darśayatā yāvaj-jīva-śruti-coditānām eva karmaṇāṃ parityāga uktaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1123: tat katham īdṛśaṃ viruddham artham arjunāya brūyād
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1124: bhagavān, śrotā vā kathaṃ viruddham artham avadhārayet |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1125: tatraitat syād gṛhasthānām eva śrauta-karma-parityāgena kevalād eva jñānān mokṣaḥ pratiṣidhyate na tv āśramāntarāṇām iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1128: samuccayo gītā-śāstre niścito 'rtha iti pratijñāya iha kathaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1129: tad-viruddhaṃ kevalād eva jñānān mokṣaṃ brūyād āśramāntarāṇām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1130: atha mataṃ śrauta-karmāpekṣayaitad-vacanaṃ kevalād eva jñānāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1132: tatra gṛhasthānāṃ vidyamānam api smārtaṃ karmāvidyamānavad upekṣya jñānād eva kevalān na mokṣa ity ucyata iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1135: gṛhasthasyaiva smārta-karmaṇā samuccitād jñānān mokṣaḥ pratiṣidhyate na tu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1136: āśramāntarāṇām iti kathaṃ vivekibhiḥ śakyam avadhārayitum |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1137: kiṃ ca, yadi mokṣa-sādhanatvena smārtāni karmāṇi ūrdhva-retasāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1138: samuccīyante tathā gṛhasthasyāpi iṣyatāṃ smārtair eva samuccayo na śrautaiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1139: atha śrautaiḥ smārtaiś ca gṛhasthasyaiva samuccayo mokṣāya ūrdhva-retasāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1141: tatraivaṃ sati gṛhasthasyāyāsa-bāhulyaṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ ca bahu-duḥkha-rūpaṃ karma śirasi aropitaṃ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1149: siddhas tarhi sarvāśramiṇāṃ jñāna-karmaṇoḥ samuccayaḥ ? na, mumukṣoḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1152: 3.5.1], tasmāt saṃnyāsam eṣāṃ tapasām atiriktam āhuḥ [NāU 2.79], nyāsa evātyarecayet [NāU 2.78], iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1153: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1157: tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1158: ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi tat tyaja ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1160: pravrajanty akṛtodvāhāḥ paraṃ vairāgyam āśritāḥ || iti bṛhaspatir api
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1162: karmaṇā badhyate jantur vidyayā ca vimucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1163: tasmāt karma na kurvanti yatayaḥ pāra-darśinaḥ || [Mbh 12.241.7] iti śukānuśāsanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1164: ihāpi sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasya ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1166: nityāni pratyavāya-parihārārtham anuṣṭheyāni iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1168: na hi agnikāryādy-akaraṇāt saṃnyāsinaḥ pratyavāyaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyo yathā brahmacāriṇām asaṃnyāsinām api karmiṇām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1169: na tavan nityānāṃ karmaṇām abhāvād eva bhāva-rūpasya pratyavāyasya utpattiḥ kalpayituṃ śakyā katham asataḥ sajjāyate [ChāU 6.2.2] iti asataḥ sajjanmāsambhava-śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1170: yadi vihitākaraṇād asambhāvyam api pratyavāyaṃ brūyād vedas tadā anartha-karo vedaḥ apramāṇam ity uktaṃ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1172: tathā ca kārakaṃ śāstraṃ na jñāpakam iti anupapannārthaṃ kalpitaṃ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1174: tasmān na saṃnyāsināṃ karmāṇi ato jñāna-karmaṇoḥ samuccayānupapattiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1175: jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhir iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1177: yadi hi bhagavatā dvitīye adhyāye jñānaṃ karma ca samuccayena tvayānuṣṭheyam ity uktaṃ syāt tato 'rjunasya praśno 'nupapanno jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhir janārdana iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1179: tvayānuṣṭheye iti ukte yā karmaṇo jyāyasī buddhiḥ sā apy uktā eveti tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghore māṃ niyojayasi keśava iti praśno na kathaṃcana upapadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1180: na cārjunasyaiva jyāyasī buddhir nānuṣṭheyeti bhagavatoktaṃ pūrvam iti kalpayituṃ yuktam, yena jyāyasī ced iti praśnaḥ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1181: yadi punar ekasya puruṣasya jñāna-karmaṇor virodhād yugapad anuṣṭhānaṃ na sambhavatīti bhinna-puruṣānuṣṭheyatvaṃ bhagavatā pūrvam uktaṃ syāt tato 'yaṃ praśna upapannaḥ jyāyasī ced ity ādiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1182: avivekataḥ praśna-kalpanāyām api bhinna-puruṣānuṣṭheyatvena bhagavataḥ prativacanaṃ nopapadyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1187: tasmāt kevalād eva jñānān mokṣa ity eṣo 'rtho niścito gītāsu sarvopaniṣatsu ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1188: jñāna-karmaṇor ekaṃ vada niścitya iti ca eka-viṣayaiva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1190: kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvam iti ca jñāna-niṣṭhā-sambhavam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1192: arjuna uvāca jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhir janārdana |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1193: tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghore māṃ niyojayasi keśava ||BhG_3.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1194: jyāyasī śreyasī cet yadi karmaṇaḥ sakāśāt te tava matā abhipretā buddhir jñānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1195: he janārdana ! yadi buddhi-karmaṇī samuccite iṣṭe tadaikaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1196: śreyaḥ-sādhanam iti karmaṇo jyāyasī buddhir iti karmaṇo 'tirikta-karaṇaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1198: na hi tad eva tasmāt phalato
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1200: tathā ca, karmaṇaḥ śreyaskarī bhagavatoktā buddhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1201: aśreyaskaraṃ ca karma kurv iti māṃ pratipādayati, tat kiṃ nu kāraṇam iti bhagavata upālambham iva kurvan tat kiṃ kasmāt karmaṇi ghore krūre
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1202: hiṃsā-lakṣaṇe māṃ niyojayasi keśava iti ca yad āha, tac ca nopapadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1203: atha smārtenaiva karmaṇā samuccayaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhagavatokto 'rjunena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1204: cāvadhārita cet, tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghore māṃ niyojayasi ity ādi kathaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1208: tad ekaṃ vada niścitya yena śreyo 'ham āpnuyām ||BhG_3.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1209: vyāmiśreṇeva, yadyapi vivaktābhidhāyī bhagavān, tathāpi mama manda-buddher
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1212: mama buddhi-vyāmohāpanayāya hi pravṛttas tvaṃ tu kathaṃ mohayasi ? ataḥ bravīmi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1213: buddhiṃ mohayasi iva me mama iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1215: jñāna-karmaṇor eka-puruṣānuṣṭhānāsaṃbhavaṃ yadi manyase, tatraivaṃ sati tat tayor ekaṃ buddhiṃ karma vā idam evārjunasya yogyaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1216: buddhi-śakty-avasthānurūpam iti niścitya vada brūhi, yena jñānena karmaṇā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1218: yadi hi karma-niṣṭhāyāṃ guṇa-bhūtam api jñānaṃ bhagavatoktaṃ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1219: tat kathaṃ tayor ekaṃ vada ity eka-viṣayaivārjunasya śuśrūṣā syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1220: na hi bhagavatā pūrvam uktam anyatarad eva jñāna-karmaṇoḥ vakṣyāmi, naiva dvayam iti, yena ubhaya-prāpty-asaṃbhavam ātmano manyamāna ekam eva prārthayet ||BhGS_3.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1222: śrī-bhagavān uvāca loke 'smin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayānagha |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1225: dvi-prakārā niṣṭhā sthitiḥ anuṣṭheya-tātparyaṃ purā pūrvaṃ sargādau prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tāsām abhyudaya-niḥśreyasa-prāpti-sādhanaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1226: āviṣkurvatā proktā mayā sarvajñena īśvareṇa he anaghāpāpa |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1227: tatra kā sā dvividhā niṣṭhā ity āha - tatra jñāna-yogena jñānam eva yogas tena sāṃkhyānām ātmānātma-viṣaya-viveka-vijñānavatāṃ brahmacaryāśramād eva kṛta-saṃnyāsānāṃ vedānta-vijñāna-suniścitārthānāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1229: karma-yogena karma eva yogaḥ karma-yogas tena karma-yogena yogināṃ karmiṇāṃ niṣṭhā proktā ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1230: yadi caikena puruṣeṇa ekasmai puruṣārthāya jñānaṃ karma ca samuccityānuṣṭheyaṃ bhagavatā iṣṭam uktaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ vā gītāsu vedeṣu coktam, katham ihārjunāya upasannāya priyāya viśiṣṭābhinna-puruṣa-kartṛke
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1231: eva jñāna-karma-niṣṭhe brūyāt ? yadi punar arjuno jñānaṃ karma ca dvayaṃ śrutvā svayam evānuṣṭhāsyati anyeṣāṃ tu bhinna-puruṣānuṣṭheyatāṃ vakṣyāmi iti mataṃ bhagavataḥ kalpyeta, tadā rāga-dveṣavān apramāṇa-bhūto bhagavān kalpitaḥ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1233: tasmāt kayāpi yuktyā na samuccayo jñāna-karmaṇoḥ ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1234: yad arjunenoktaṃ karmaṇo jyāyastvaṃ buddhes tac ca sthitam anirākaraṇāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1238: māṃ ca bandha-kāraṇe karmaṇy eva niyojayasi iti viṣaṇṇa-manasam arjunam karma nārabhe ity evaṃ manvānam ālakṣya āha bhagavān - na karmaṇāman ārambhād iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1239: athavā - jñāna-karma-niṣṭhayoḥ paraspara-virodhād ekena puruṣeṇa yugapad anuṣṭhātum aśakyatve sati itaretarānapekṣayor eva puruṣārtha-hetutve prāpte karma-niṣṭhāyā jñāna-niṣṭhā-prāpti-hetutvena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1243: anyānapekṣā, ity etam arthaṃ pradarśayiṣyan āha bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1245: na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati ||BhG_3.4 ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1246: na karmaṇā kriyāṇāṃ yajñādīnām iha janmani janmāntare vā anuṣṭhitānām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1249: jñānam utpadyate puṃsāṃ kṣayāt pāpasya karmaṇaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1250: yathādarśatala-prakhye paśyaty ātmānam ātmani || [Mbh 12 208.8] ity ādi smaraṇāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1254: karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyaṃ nāśnuta iti vacanāt tad-viparyayāt teṣām ārambhān naiṣkarmyam aśnuta iti gamyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1255: kasmāt punaḥ kāraṇāt karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyaṃ nāśnute iti ? ucyate, karmārambhasyaiva naiṣkarmyopāyatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1256: na hy upāyam antareṇa upeya-prāptir asti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1257: karma-yogopāyatvaṃ ca naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇasya jñāna-yogasya, śrutau iha ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1259: śrutau tāvat prakṛtasyātma-lokasya vedyasya vedanopāyatvena tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena [BAU 4.4.22] ity ādinā karma-yogasya jñāna-yogopāyatvaṃ pratipāditam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1260: ihāpi ca - saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ [kraītā 5.6], yoginaḥ karma kurvanti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1261: saṅgaṃ tyaktvātmaśuddhaye [kraītā 5.11], yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām [kraītā 18.5] ity ādi pratipādayiṣyati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1262: nanu cābhayaṃ sarva-bhūtebhyo dattvā naiṣkarmyam ācaret ity ādau kartavya-karma-saṃnyāsād api naiṣkarmya-prāptiṃ darśayati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1263: loke ca karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyam iti prasiddhataram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1264: ataś ca naiṣkarmyārthinaḥ kiṃ karmārambheṇa ? iti prāptam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1265: ata āha- na ca saṃnyasanād eveti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1267: eva jñāna-rahitāt siddhiṃ naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇāṃ jñāna-yogena niṣṭhāṃ samadhigacchati na prāpnoti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1268: kasmāt punaḥ kāraṇāt karma-saṃnyāsa-mātrād eva kevalāt jñāna-rahitāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1269: siddhiṃ naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇāṃ puruṣo nādhigacchati iti hetv-ākāṅkṣāyām āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1270: na hi kaścit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1271: kāryate hy avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛtijair guṇaiḥ ||BhG_3.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1272: na hi yasmāt kṣaṇam api kālaṃ jātu kadācit kaścit tiṣṭhaty akarma-kṛt san
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1273: | kasmāt ? kāryate pravartyate hi yasmād avaśa evāsvatantra eva karma sarvaḥ prāṇī prakṛti-jaiḥ prakṛtito jātaiḥ sattva-rajas-tamobhiḥ guṇaiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1274: ajña iti vākya-śeṣaḥ, yato vakṣyati guṇair yo na vicālyate iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1275: sāṃkhyānāṃ pṛthak-karaṇāt ajñānām eva hi karma-yogaḥ, na jñāninām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1276: jñānināṃ tu guṇair acālyamānānāṃ svataś calanābhāvāt karma-yogo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1278: tathā ca vyākhyātam vedāvināśinam [kraītā 2.21] ity atra ||BhGS_3.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1279: yat tv anātmajñaḥ coditaṃ karma nārabhate iti tad asad evety āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1280: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1282: karmendriyāṇi hastādīni saṃyamya saṃhṛtya ya āste tiṣṭhati manasā smaran cintayan indriyārthān viṣayān vimūḍhātmā vimūḍhāntaḥ-araṇo mithyācāro mṛṣācāraḥ pāpācāraḥ sa ucyate ||BhGS_3.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1285: yas tu punaḥ karmaṇy adhikṛto 'jñaḥ buddhīndriyāṇi manasā niyamya ārabhate arjuna karmendriyaiḥ vāk-pāṇy-ādibhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1287: asaktaḥ san phalābhisandhi-varjitaḥ sa viśiṣyate itarasmāt mithyācārāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1289: niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1290: śarīrayātrāpi ca te na prasidhyed akarmaṇaḥ ||BhG_3.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1292: yo yasmin karmaṇy adhikṛtaḥ phalāya cāśrutaṃ tan niyataṃ karma, tat kuru tvaṃ he arjuna ! yataḥ karma jyāyo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1296: śarīra-yātrā śarīra-sthitir api ca te tava na prasidhyet prasiddhiṃ na gacchet akarmaṇo 'karaṇāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1298: yac ca manyase bandhārthatvāt karma na kartavyam iti tad apy asat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1301: tad arthaṃ karma kaunteya muktasaṅgaḥ samācara ||BhG_3.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1302: yajño vai viṣṇuḥ [TaittS 1.7.4] iti śruter yajña īśvaraḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1303: tad-arthaṃ yat kriyate tat yajñārthaṃ karma |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1304: tasmāt karmaṇo 'nyatrānyena karmaṇā loko 'yam adhikṛtaḥ karma-kṛt karma-bandhanaḥ [Taitt.Bhā. 3.1.6] karma bandhanaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ karma-bandhano lokaḥ, na tu yajñārthāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1311: saha-yajñāḥ yajña-sahitāḥ prajās trayo varṇās tāḥ sṛṣṭvotpādya purā pūrvaṃ sargādāv uvāca uktavān prajāpatiḥ prajānāṃ srāṣṭā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1312: anena yajñena prasaviṣyadhvaṃ prasavo vṛddhir utpattis tāṃ kurudhvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1313: eṣa yajño vo yuṣmākam astu bhavatu iṣṭa-kāma-dhuk |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1317: devān bhāvayatānena te devā bhāvayantu vaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1320: te devā bhāvayantu āpyāyayantu vṛṣṭy-ādinā vo yuṣmān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1321: evaṃ parasparam anyonyaṃ bhāvayantaḥ śreyaḥ paraṃ mokṣa-lakṣaṇaṃ vijñāna-prāpti-krameṇāvāpsyatha
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1324: iṣṭān bhogān hi vo devā dāsyante yajña-bhāvitāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1325: tair dattān apradāyaibhyo yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ ||BhG_3.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1326: iṣṭān abhipretān bhogān hi vo yuṣmabhyaṃ devā dāsyante vitariṣyanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1327: strī-paśu-putrādīn yajña-bhāvitā yajñair vardhitās toṣitā ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1328: tair devair dattān bhogān apradāyādattvā, ānṛṇyam akṛtvety arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1330: yo bhuṅkte sva-dehendriyāṇy eva tarpayati stena eva taskara eva sa devādi-svāpahārī ||BhGS_3.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1333: bhuñjate te tv aghaṃ pāpā ye pacanty ātma-kāraṇāt ||BhG_3.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1334: deva-yajñādīn nirvartya tac-chiṣṭam aśanam amṛtākhyam aśituṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te yajña-śiṣṭāśinaḥ santo mucyante sarva-kilbiṣaiḥ sarva-pāpaiś
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1336: ye tv ātmaṃbharayo bhuñjate te tv aghaṃ pāpaṃ svayam api pāpā ye pacanti pākaṃ nirvartayanti ātma-kāraṇāt ātma-hetoḥ ||BhGS_3.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1342: annād bhuktāl lohita-retaḥ-pariṇatāt pratyakṣaṃ bhavanti jāyante bhūtāni |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1346: ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ || [Manu 3.76] iti smṛteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1349: ṛtvig-yajamānayoś ca vyāpāraḥ karma, tad-samudbhavo yasya yajñasyāpūrvasya sa yajñaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1351: tac caivaṃvidhaṃ karma kuto jātam ity āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1353: tasmāt sarva-gataṃ brahma nityaṃ yajñe pratiṣṭhitam ||BhG_3.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1356: sa udbhavaḥ kāraṇaṃ prakāśako yasya tat karma brahmodbhavaṃ viddhi vijānīhi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1358: akṣara-samudbhavam akṣaraṃ brahma paramātmā samudbhavo yasya tat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1361: yasmāt sākṣāt paramātmākhyād akṣarāt puruṣa-niḥśvāsavat samudbhūtaṃ brahma tasmāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1366: aghāyur indriyārāmo moghaṃ pārtha sa jīvati ||BhG_3.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1367: evam ittham īśvareṇa veda-yajña-pūrvakaṃ jagac-cakraṃ pravartitaṃ nānuvartayatīha loke yaḥ karmaṇy adhikṛtaḥ sann aghāyur aghaṃ pāpam āyur jīvanaṃ yasya so 'ghāyuḥ pāpa-jīvana iti yāvat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1368: indriyārāmaḥ indriyair ārāmaḥ āramaṇam ākrīḍā viṣayeṣu yasya sa indriyārāmo moghaṃ vṛthā he
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1370: tasmād ajñenādhikṛtena kartavyam eva karmeti prakaraṇārthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1372: karma-yogānuṣṭhānam adhikṛtenānātmajñena kartavyam evety etan na karmaṇām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1373: anārambhād [Gītā 3.4] ity ata ārabhya śarīra-yātrāpi ca te na prasidhyed akarmaṇa [Gītā 3.8] ity evam antena pratipādya, yajñārthāt karmaṇo 'nyatra
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1374: [Gītā 3.9] ity ādinā moghaṃ pārtha sa jīvati ity evam antenāpi granthena prāsaṅgikam adhikṛtasyānātmavidaḥ karmānuṣṭhāne bahu kāraṇam uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1376: evaṃ sthite kim evaṃ pravartitaṃ caktraṃ sarveṇānuvartanīyam ? āho svit pūrvokta-karma-yogānuṣṭhānopāya-prāpyām anātma-vidā jñāna-yogenaiva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1377: niṣṭhām ātma-vidbhiḥ sāṃkhyair anuṣṭheyām aprāptenaiva ? ity evam artham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1378: arjunasya praśnam āśaṅkaya svayam eva vā śāstrārthasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1379: viveka-pratipatty-artham etaṃ vai tam ātmānaṃ viditvā nivṛtta-mithyā-jñānāḥ santo brāhmaṇā mithyā-jñānavadbhyo 'vaśyaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1382: na teṣām ātma-jñāna-niṣṭhā-vyatirekeṇānyat kāryam asti [BAU 3.5.1] ity evaṃ śruty-artham iha gītā-śāstre pratipipādayiṣitam āviṣkurvann āha bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1383: yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ātma-tṛptaś ca mānavaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1384: ātmany eva ca saṃtuṣṭas tasya kāryaṃ na vidyate ||BhG_3.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1385: yas tu sāṃkhya ātma-jñāna-niṣṭha ātma-ratiḥ ātmany eva ratir na viṣayeṣu yasya sa ātma-ratir eva syād bhaved ātma-tṛptaś cātmanaiva tṛpto nānna-rasādinā sa mānavo manuṣyaḥ saṃnyāsī ātmany eva ca santuṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1386: santoṣo hi bāhyārtha-lābhe sarvasya bhavati, tam anapekṣya ātmany eva ca santuṣṭaḥ sarvato vīta-tṛṣṇa ity etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1387: ya īdṛśaḥ ātma-vit tasya kāryaṃ karaṇīyaṃ na vidyate nāstīty arthaḥ ||BhGS_3.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1391: naiva tasya paramātma-rateḥ kṛtena karmaṇārthaḥ prayojanam asti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1393: nākṛteneha loke kaścana kaścid api pratyavāya-prāpti-rūpaḥ ātma-hāni-lakṣaṇo vā naivāsti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1394: na cāsya sarva-bhūteṣu brahmādi-sthāvarānteṣu bhūteṣu kaścid artha-vyapāśrayaḥ prayojana-nimitta-kriyā-sādhyo vyapāśrayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1395: vyapāśrayaṇam ālambanaṃ kaṃcit bhūta-viśeṣam āśritya na sādhyaḥ kaścid artho 'sti, yena tad-arthā kriyā anuṣṭheyā syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1399: tasmād asaktaḥ satataṃ kāryaṃ karma samācara |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1400: asakto hy ācaran karma param āpnoti pūruṣaḥ ||BhG_3.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1401: tasmāt asaktaḥ saṅgavarjitaḥ satataṃ sarvadā kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ nityaṃ karma samācara nirvartaya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1402: asakto hi yasmāt samācaran īśvarārthaṃ karma kurvan paraṃ mokṣam āpnoti pūruṣaḥ sattvaśuddhidvāreṇa ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_3.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1406: karmaṇaiva hi yasmāt pūrve kṣatriyāḥ vidvāṃsaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ mokṣaṃ gantum āsthitāḥ pravṛttāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1408: yadi te prāptasamyagdarśanāḥ, tataḥ lokasaṃgrahārthaṃ prārabdhakarmatvāt karmaṇā sahaivāsaṃnyasyaiva karma saṃsiddhimāsthitā ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1409: athāprāptasamyagadarśanāḥ janakādayaḥ, tadā karmaṇā sattvaśuddhisādhanabhūtena ktrameṇa saṃsiddhimāsthitā iti vyākhyeyaḥ lokaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1410: | atha manyase pūrverapi janakādibhiḥ ajānadbhireva kartavyaṃ karma kṛtam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1412: tathāpi prārabdhakarmāyattaḥ tvaṃ lokasaṃgraham evāpi lokasya unmārgapravṛttinivāraṇaṃ lokasaṃgrahaḥ, tamevāpi prayojanaṃ saṃpaśyan
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1414: loka-saṃgrahaḥ kim arthaṃ kartavya ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1415: yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1416: sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokas tad anuvartate ||BhG_3.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1417: yadyat karma ācarati karoti śreṣṭhaḥ pradhānaḥ tattadeva karma ācarati itaro 'nyaḥ janaḥ tadanugataḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1418: kiṃ ca saḥ śreṣṭhaḥ yat pramāṇaṃ kurute laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ vā lokaḥ tat anuvartate tadeva pramāṇīkaroti ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_3.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1419: yady atra te loka-saṃgraha-kartavyatāyāṃ vipratipattis tarhi māṃ kiṃ na paśyasi ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1420: na me pārthāsti kartavyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃcana |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1422: na me mama pārtha nāsti na vidyate kartavyaṃ triṣv api lokeṣu kiṃcana kiṃcid api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1424: tathāpi varta eva ca karmaṇy aham ||BhGS_3.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1425: yadi hy ahaṃ na varteyaṃ jātu karmaṇy atandritaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1427: yadi hi punar ahaṃ na varteya jātu kadācit karmaṇy atandrito 'nalasaḥ san mama śreṣṭhasya sato vatrma mārgam anuvartante manuṣyāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1430: utsīdeyur ime lokā na kuryāṃ karma ced aham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1431: saṃkarasya ca kartā syām upahanyām imāḥ prajāḥ ||BhG_3.24||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1432: utsīdeyur vinaśyeyur ime sarve lokāḥ loka-sthiti-nimittasya karmaṇo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1434: kiṃ ca, saṃkarasya ca kartā syām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1436: prajānām anugrahāya pravṛtta upahatim upahananaṃ kuryām ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1438: yadi punar aham iva tvaṃ kṛtārtha-buddhiḥ, ātmavid anyo vā, tasyāpi ātmanaḥ kartavyābhāve 'pi parānugraha eva kartavya ity āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1439: saktāḥ karmaṇy avidvāṃso yathā kurvanti bhārata |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1441: saktāḥ karmaṇy asya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ mama bhaviṣyatīti kecid avidvāṃso yathā kurvanti bhārata, kuryād vidvān ātmavit tathāsaktaḥ san |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1442: tadvat kim arthaṃ karoti ? tat sṛṇu - cikīrṣuḥ kartum icchuḥ loka-saṃgraham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1443: evaṃ loka-saṃgrahaṃ cikīrṣer na mamātma-vidaḥ kartavyam asti anyasya vā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1448: buddhi-bhedo buddhi-bhedo mayā idaṃ kartavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ cāsya karmaṇaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1449: phalam iti niścaya-rūpāyā buddher bhedanaṃ cālanaṃ buddhi-bhedas taṃ na janayen notpādayed ajñānām avivekināṃ karma-saṅgināṃ karmaṇy āsaktānāṃ āsaṅgavatām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1450: kiṃ nu kuryāt ? joṣayet kārayet sarva-karmāṇi vidvān svayaṃ tad evāviduṣāṃ karma yukto 'bhiyuktaḥ samācaran ||BhGS_3.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1451: avidvān ajñaḥ kathaṃ karmasu sajjate ? ity āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1454: prakṛteḥ prakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ sattva-rajas-tamasāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyāvasthā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1455: tasyāḥ prakṛteḥ guṇaiḥ vikāraiḥ kārya-karaṇa-rūpaiḥ kriyamāṇāni karmāṇi laukikāni śāstrīyāṇi ca sarvaśaḥ sarva-prakārair ahaṃkāra-vimūḍhātmā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1456: kārya-karaṇa-saṃghātātma-pratyayo 'haṃkāras tena vividhaṃ nānāvidhaṃ mūḍha ātmā antaḥ-karaṇaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ kārya-karaṇa-dharmā kārya-karaṇābhimānī
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1457: avidyayā karmāṇi ātmani manyamānaḥ tat-tat-karmaṇām ahaṃ karteti manyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1460: guṇā guṇeṣu vartanta iti matvā na sajjate ||BhG_3.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1462: kasya tattvavit ? guṇakarmavibhāgayoḥ guṇavibhāgasya karmavibhāgasya ca tattvavit ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1463: guṇāḥ karaṇātmakāḥ guṇeṣu viṣayātmakeṣu vartante na ātmā iti matvā na sajjate saktiṃ na karoti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1466: tān akṛtsna-vido mandān kṛtsnavin na vicālayet ||BhG_3.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1467: prakṛteḥ guṇaiḥ samyak mūḍhāḥ saṃmohitāḥ santaḥ sajjante guṇānāṃ karmasu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1468: guṇa-karmasu vayaṃ karma kurmaḥ phalāya iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1471: ātma-vit svayaṃ na vicālayet buddhi-bheda-karaṇam eva cālanaṃ tan na kuryāt ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_3.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1472: kathaṃ punaḥ karmaṇy adhikṛtenājñena mumukṣuṇā karma kartavyam iti, ucyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1475: mayi vāsudeve parameśvare sarvajñe sarvātmani sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya nikṣipyādhyātma-cetasā viveka-buddhyā, ahaṃ kartā īśvarāya bhṛtyavat karomi ity anayā buddhyā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1476: kiṃ ca, nirāśīs tyaktāśīḥ nirmamo mama-bhāvaś
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1477: ca nirgato yasya tava sa tvaṃ nirmamo bhūtvā yudhyasva vigata-jvaro
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1479: yad etan mama mataṃ karma kartavyam iti sa-pramāṇam uktaṃ tat tathā -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1480: ye me matam idaṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1482: ye me madīyam idaṃ mataṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti anuvartante mānavā manuṣyāḥ śraddhāvantaḥ śraddadhānā anasūyanto 'sūyāṃ ca mayi parama-gurau vāsudeve
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1484: ye tv etad abhyasūyanto nānutiṣṭhanti me matam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1486: ye tu tad-viparītā etan mama matam abhyasūyanto nindanto nānutiṣṭhanti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1489: sarva-jñāna-vimūḍhāṃs tān viddhi jānīhi naṣṭān nāśaṃ gatān acetaso
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1491: kasmāt punaḥ kāraṇāt tvadīyaṃ mataṃ nānutiṣṭhantaḥ para-dharmān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1492: anutiṣṭhanti ? sva-dharmaṃ ca nānuvartante ? tvat-pratikūlāḥ kathaṃ na bibhyati tvac-chāsanātikrama-doṣāt ? tatrāha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1493: sadṛśaṃ ceṣṭate svasyāḥ prakṛter jñānavān api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1494: prakṛtiṃ yānti bhūtāni nigrahaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati ||BhG_3.33||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1500: tasyāḥ sadṛśam eva sarvo jantur jñānavān api ceṣṭate, kiṃ punar mūrkhaḥ ? tasmāt prakṛtiṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1503: vānyasya vā ? durnigrahā prakṛtir iti vākya-śeṣaḥ ||BhGS_3.33||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1504: yadi sarvo jantur ātmanaḥ prakṛti-sadṛśam eva ceṣṭate, na ca prakṛti-śūnyaḥ kaścid asti, tataḥ puruṣakārasya viṣayānupapatteḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1507: tayor na vaśam āgacchet tau hy asya paripanthinau ||BhG_3.34||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1508: indriyasyendriyasyārthe sarvendriyāṇām arthe śabdādi-viṣaye iṣṭe rāgo 'niṣṭe dveṣa ity evaṃ pratīndriyārthaṃ rāgadveṣāv avaśyaṃbhāvinau tatrāyaṃ puruṣakārasya śāstrārthasya ca viṣaya ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1509: śāstrārthe pravṛttaḥ pūrvam eva rāga-dveṣayor vaśaṃ nāgacchet |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1510: yā hi puruṣasya prakṛtiḥ sā rāga-dveṣa-puraḥsaraiva sva-kārye puruṣaṃ pravartayati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1513: yadā punā rāga-dveṣau tat-pratipakṣeṇa niyamayati tadā śāstra-dṛṣṭir eva puruṣo bhavati, na prakṛti-vaśaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1515: yatas tau hy asya puruṣasya paripanthinau śreyo-mārgasya vighna-kartārau
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1517: tatra rāga-dveṣa-prayukto manyate śāsrārtham apy anyathā para-dharmo 'pi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1518: dharmatvād anuṣṭheya eva iti, tad asat -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1521: śreyān praśasyataraḥ svo dharmaḥ svadharmo viguṇo 'pi vigata-guṇo 'pi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1522: anuṣṭhīyamānaḥ para-dharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt sādguṇyena saṃpāditād api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1523: sva-dharme sthitasya nidhanaṃ maraṇam api śreyaḥ para-dharme sthitasya jīvitāt |
