GSP33bhgsbh_u:1524: kasmāt ? para-dharmaḥ bhayāvahaḥ narakādi-lakṣaṇaṃ bhayam āvahatīti yataḥ ||BhGS_3.35||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1525: yadyapi anartha-mūlam dhyāyato viṣayān puṃsa [Gītā 2.62] iti rāga-dveṣau
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1528: tat saṃkṣiptaṃ niścitaṃ ca idam eveti jñātum icchan arjuna uvāca jñāte hi tasmin tad-ucchedāya yatnaṃ kuryām iti arjuna uvāca-
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1529: atha kena prayukto 'yaṃ pāpaṃ carati pūruṣaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1530: anicchann api vārṣṇeya balād iva niyojitaḥ ||BhG_3.36||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1531: atha kena hetu-bhūtena prayuktaḥ san rājñeva bhṛtyo 'yaṃ pāpaṃ karma carati ācarati pūruṣaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam anicchann api he vārṣṇeya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1532: vṛṣṇi-kula-prasūta ! balād iva niyojito rājñevety ukto dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1533: śṛṇu tvaṃ taṃ vairiṇaṃ sarvānartha-karaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ pṛcchasīti bhagavān uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1535: mahāśano mahā-pāpmā viddhy enam iha vairiṇam ||BhG_3.37||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1538: ity aiśvaryādi-ṣaṭkaṃ yasmin vāsudeve nityam apratibaddhatvena sāmastyena ca vartate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1539: utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1540: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti || [ViP 6.5.78]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1541: utpatty-ādi-viṣayaṃ ca vijñānaṃ yasya sa vāsudevo vācyo bhagavān iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1545: sa eṣa kāmaḥ pratihataḥ kenacit krodhatvena pariṇamate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1546: ataḥ krodho 'py eṣa eva rajo-guṇa-samudbhavo rajaś ca tad-guṇaś ca rajo-guṇaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1547: sa samudbhavo yasya sa kāmo rajo-guṇa-samudbhavaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1549: kāmo hy udbhūto rajaḥ pravartayan puruṣaṃ pravartayati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1550: tṛṣṇayā hy ahaṃkārita iti duḥkhināṃ rajaḥ-kārye sevādau pravṛttānāṃ pralāpaḥ śrūyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1554: kāmena hi prerito jantuḥ pāpaṃ karoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1555: ato viddhy enaṃ kāmam iha saṃsāre vairiṇam ||BhGS_3.37||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1559: dhūmena sahajenāvriyate vahniḥ prakāśātmako 'prakāśātmakena, yathā vā ādarśo malena ca, yatholbena ca jarāyuṇā garbha-veṣṭanena cāvṛta ācchādito garbhas tathā tenedam āvṛtam ||BhGS_3.38||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1560: kiṃ punas tad idaṃ-śabda-vācyaṃ yat kāmenāvṛtam ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1563: āvṛtam etena jñānaṃ jñānino nitya-vairiṇā, jñānī hi jānāty anenāham anarthe prayuktaḥ pūrvam eveti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1567: sa hi kāmaṃ tṛṣṇā-kāle mitram iva paśyan tat-kārye duḥkhe prāpte jānāti tṛṣṇayāhaṃ duḥkhitvam āpādita iti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1571: kāma icchaiva rūpam asyeti kāmarūpas tena duṣpūreṇa duḥkhena pūraṇam asyeti duṣpūras tenānalena nāsyālaṃ paryāptir vidyata ity analas tena ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1572: kim adhiṣṭhānaḥ punaḥ kāmo jñānasyāvaraṇatvena vairī sarvasya lokasya ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1573: ity apekṣāyām āha, jñāte hi śatror adhiṣṭhāne sukhena nibarhaṇaṃ kartuṃ śakyata iti-
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1575: etair vimohayaty eṣa jñānam āvṛtya dehinam ||BhG_3.40||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1576: indriyāṇi mano buddhiś cāsya kāmasyādhiṣṭhānam āśraya ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1577: etair indriyādibhir āśrayair vimohayati vividhaṃ mohayaty eṣa kāmo jñānam āvṛtya ācchādya dehinaṃ śarīriṇam ||BhGS_3.40||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1579: tasmāt tvam indriyāṇy ādau niyamya bharatarṣabha |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1581: tasmāt tvam indriyāṇy ādau pūrvam eva niyamya vaśīkṛtya bharatarṣabha pāpmānaṃ pāpācāraṃ kāmaṃ prajahihi parityaja enaṃ prakṛtaṃ vairiṇaṃ jñāna-vijñāna-nāśanaṃ jñānaṃ śāstrata ācāryataś cātmādīnām avabodhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1583: śreyaḥ-prāpti-hetvor nāśanaṃ nāśa-karaṃ prajahihi ātmanaḥ parityajety
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1585: indriyāṇy ādau niyamya kāmaṃ śatruṃ jahihi ity uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1586: tatra kim āśrayaḥ kāmaṃ jahyāt ity ucyate --
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1587: indriyāṇi parāṇy āhur indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1588: manasas tu parā buddhir yo buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ ||BhG_3.42||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1590: dehaṃ sthūlaṃ bāhyaṃ paricchinnaṃ cāpekṣya saukṣmyāntaratva-vyāpitvādy-apekṣayā parāṇi prakṛṣṭāny āhuḥ paṇḍitāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1592: tathā manasas tu parā buddhir niścayātmikā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1594: 'bhyantaro yaṃ dehinam indriyādibhir āśrayair yuktaḥ kāmo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1600: evaṃ buddheḥ paraṃ buddhvā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1602: evaṃ buddheḥ param ātmānaṃ buddhvā jñātvā saṃstabhya samyak stambhanaṃ kṛtvātmānaṃ svenaivātmanā saṃskṛtena manasā samyak samādhāyety arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1603: jahy enaṃ śatruṃ he mahābāho ! kāma-rūpaṃ durāsadaṃ duḥkhenāsada āsādanaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1604: prāptir yasya taṃ durāsadaṃ durvijñeyāneka-viśeṣam iti ||BhGS_3.43||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1612: yo 'yaṃ yogo 'dhyāya-dvayenokto jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇaḥ sa sannyāsaḥ karma-yogopāyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1614: nivṛtti-lakṣaṇaś ca gītāsu ca sarvāsv ayam eva yogo vivakṣito bhagavatā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1615: ataeva parisamāptaḥ pravṛttiṃ vedārthaṃ manvānas taṃ vaṃśa-kathanena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1617: śrī-bhagavān uvāca imaṃ vivasvate yogaṃ proktavān aham avyayam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1619: imam adhyāya-dvayenoktaṃ yogaṃ vivasvate ādityāya sargādau proktavān aham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1621: tena yoga-balena yuktāḥ samarthā bhavanti brahma parirakṣituṃ, brahma-kṣatre paripālite jagat paripālayitum alam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1628: sa kāleneha mahatā yogo naṣṭaḥ parantapa ||BhG_4.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1629: evaṃ kṣatriya-paramparā-prāptam imaṃ rājarṣayo rājānaś ca te ṛṣayaś ca rājarṣayo vidur imaṃ yogam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1630: sa yogaḥ kāleneha mahatā dīrgheṇa naṣṭo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1631: vicchinna-sampradāyaḥ saṃvṛtto he parantapa ! ātmano vipakṣa-bhūtāḥ para ucyante tān śaurya-tejo-gabhastibhir bhānur iva tāpayatīti parantapaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1633: durlabhān ajitendriyān prāpya naṣṭaṃ yogam imam upalabhya lokaṃ cāpuruṣārtha-sambandhinam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1634: sa evāyaṃ mayā te 'dya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1635: bhakto 'si me sakhā ceti rahasyaṃ hy etad uttamam ||BhG_4.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1636: sa evāyam mayā te tubhyam adya idānīṃ yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1639: rahasyaṃ hi yasmād etad uttamaṃ yogo jñānam ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1640: bhagavatā vipratiṣiddham uktam iti mā bhūt kasyacid buddhir iti parihārārthaṃ codyam iva kurvann arjuna uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1641: aparaṃ bhavato janma paraṃ janma vivasvataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1642: katham etad vijānīyāṃ tvam ādau proktavān iti ||BhG_4.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1643: aparam arvāg vasudeva-gṛhe bhavato janma paraṃ pūrvaṃ sargādau janma
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1645: tat katham etad vijānīyām aviruddhārthatayā yas tvam evādau proktavān imaṃ yogam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1646: sa eva tvam idānīṃ mahyaṃ proktavān asīti ||BhGS_4.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1647: yā vāsudeve anīśvarāsarvajñāśaṅkā mūrkhāṇāṃ tāṃ pariharan śrī-bhagavān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1649: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1650: tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha parantapa ||BhG_4.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1651: bahūni me mama vyatītāni atikrāntāni janmāni tava ca he arjuna tāny ahaṃ veda jāne sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha jānīṣe |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1653: ahaṃ punar nitya-śuddha-buddha-mukta-svabhāvatvād anāvaraṇa-jñāna-śaktir iti vedāham he parantapa ||BhGS_4.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1654: kathaṃ tarhi tava nityeśvarasya dharmādharmābhāve 'pi janma ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1655: ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1658: san, tathā bhūtānāṃ brahmādi-stamba-paryantānām īśvara īśana-śīlo 'pi san
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1659: | prakṛtiṃ svāṃ mama vaiṣṇavīṃ māyāṃ triguṇātmikāṃ yasyā vaśe sarvam idaṃ jagad vartate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1660: yayā mohitaṃ jagat sat svam ātmānaṃ vāsudevaṃ na jānāti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1661: tāṃ prakṛtiṃ svām adhiṣṭhāya vaśīkṛtya saṃbhavāmi dehavān iva bhavāmi jāta
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1663: tac ca janma kadā kim-arthaṃ ca ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1664: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1666: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir hānir varṇāśramādi-lakṣaṇasya prāṇinām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1668: bhārata ! abhyutthānam udbhavo 'dharmasya tadātmānaṃ sṛjāmy ahaṃ māyayā ||BhGS_4.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1677: janma karma ca me divyam evaṃ yo vetti tattvataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1678: tyaktvā dehaṃ punar janma naiti mām eti so 'rjuna ||BhG_4.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1679: taj-janma māyā-rūpaṃ, karma ca sādhu-paritrāṇādi, me mama divyam aprākṛtam aiśvaram evaṃ yathoktaṃ yo vetti tattvatas tattvena yathāvat tyaktvā deham imaṃ punar janma punar utpattiṃ naiti na prāpnoti, mām ety āgacchati, sa mucyate he 'rjuna ||BhGS_4.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1684: vīta-rāga-bhaya-krodhāḥ - rāgaś ca bhayaṃ ca krodhaś ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1685: rāga-bhaya-krodhāḥ, vītā vigatā rāga-bhaya-krodhā yebhyas te vīta-rāga-bhaya-krodhāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1690: jñāna-tapasā jñānam eva ca paramātma-viṣayaṃ tapaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1700: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1702: ye yathā yena prakāreṇa yena prayojanena yat-phalārthitayā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva tat-phala-dānena bhajāmy anugṛhṇāmy aham ity etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1704: na hy ekasya mumukṣutvaṃ phalārthitvaṃ ca yugapat sambhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1705: ato ye yat-phalārthinas tāṃs tat-phala-pradānena, ye
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1706: yathokta-kāriṇas tv aphalārthino mumukṣavaś ca tān jñāna-pradānena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1707: ye jñāninaḥ sannyāsino mumukṣavaś ca tān mokṣa-pradānena,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1708: tathārtānārti-haraṇena ity evaṃ yathā prapadyante ye tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1709: na punār rāga-dveṣa-nimittaṃ moha-nimittaṃ vā kaṃcid bhajāmi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1710: sarvathāpi sarvāvasthasya mameśvarasya vartma mārgam anuvartante manuṣyāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1711: yat-phalārthitayā yasmin karmaṇy adhikṛtā ye prayatante te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1712: manuṣyā atra ucyante he pārtha sarvaśaḥ sarva-prakāraiḥ ||BhGS_4.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1713: yadi taveśvarasya rāgādi-doṣābhāvāt sarva-prāṇiṣv anujighṛkṣāyāṃ tulyāyāṃ sarva-phala-pradāna-samarthe ca tvayi sati vāsudevaḥ sarvaṃ [Gītā 7.19]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1714: iti jñānenaiva mumukṣavaḥ santaḥ kasmāt tvām eva sarve na pratipadyante ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1716: kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1717: kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā ||BhG_4.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1718: kāṅkṣanto 'bhīpsantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ phala-niṣpattiṃ prārthayanto yajanta ihāsmin loke devatā indrādgny-ādyāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1719: atha yo 'nyāṃ devatām upāste 'nyo 'sāv anyo 'ham asmīti na sa veda, yathā paśuḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1722: teṣāṃ hi bhinna-devatāyājināṃ phalākāṅkṣiṇāṃ kṣipraṃ śīghraṃ hi yasmān mānuṣe loke |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1724: kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke iti viśeṣaṇāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1727: teṣāṃ ca varṇāśramādhikāriṇāṃ karmiṇāṃ phala-siddhiḥ kṣipraṃ bhavati karmajā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1732: athavā varṇāśramādi-pravibhāgopetā manuṣyā mama vartmānuvartante sarvaśa [Gītā 4.11] ity uktaṃ kasmāt punaḥ kāraṇān niyamena tavaiva vartmānuvartante, nānyasya kim ? ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1734: tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam ||BhG_4.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1735: cāturvarṇyaṃ catvāra eva varṇāś cāturvarṇyaṃ mayeśvareṇa sṛṣṭam utpāditaṃ brāhmaṇo 'sya mukham āsīt [Ṛk 8.4.19.2, Yajuḥ 32.11] ity ādi śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1739: tatra sāttvikasya sattva-pradhānasya brāhmaṇasya śamo damas tapaḥ [Gītā 18.42] ity ādīni karmāṇi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1744: ity evaṃ guṇa-karma-vibhāgaśaś cāturguṇyaṃ mayā sṛṣṭam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1747: hanta tarhi cāturvarṇya-sargādeḥ karmaṇaḥ kartṛtvāt tat-phalena yujyase 'to na tvaṃ nitya-mukto nityeśvaraś ceti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1748: ucyate - yadyapi māyā-saṃvyavahāreṇa tasya karmaṇaḥ kartāram api santaṃ māṃ paramārthato viddhy
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1750: yeṣāṃ tu karmaṇāṃ kartāraṃ māṃ manyase paramārthatas teṣām akartaivāham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1752: na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karma-phale spṛhā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1753: iti māṃ yo 'bhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate ||BhG_4.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1754: na māṃ tāni karmāṇi limpanti dehādy-ārambhakatvenāhaṅkārābhāvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1755: na ca teṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ phale me mama spṛhā tṛṣṇā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1756: yeṣāṃ tu saṃsāriṇām ahaṃ kartety ābhimānaḥ karmasu spṛhā tat-phaleṣu ca tān karmāṇi limpantīti yuktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1758: evaṃ yo 'nye 'pi mām ātmatvenābhijānāti nāhaṃ kartā na me karma-phale spṛheti na karmabhir na badhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1759: tasyāpi na dehādy-ārambhakāni karmāṇi bhavantīty arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1760: nāhaṃ kartā, na me karma-phale spṛheti -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1761: evaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair api mumukṣubhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1762: kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ||BhG_4.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1763: evaṃ jñātvā kṛtam karma pūrvair apy atikrāntair mumukṣubhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1765: na tuṣṇīm āsanaṃ nāpi saṃnyāsaḥ kartavyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1767: tvat-pūrvair apy anuṣṭhitatvād yady anātmajñas tvaṃ tad ātma-śuddhy-artham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1771: tatra karma cet kartavyaṃ tvad-vacanād eva karomy aham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1776: kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1777: tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt ||BhG_4.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1778: kiṃ karma kim cākarmeti kavayo medhāvino 'py atrāsmin karmādi-viṣaye
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1780: atas te tubhyam ahaṃ karmākarma ca pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā viditvā karmādi mokṣyase 'śubhāt saṃsārāt ||BhGS_4.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1781: na caitat tvayā mantavyaṃ, karma nāma dehādi-ceṣṭā loka-prasiddhaṃ, akarma nāma tad-akriyā tūṣṇīm āsanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1785: karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1786: akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ ||BhG_4.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1787: karmaṇaḥ śāstra-vihitasya hi yasmād apy asti boddhavyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1789: tathākarmaṇaś ca tūṣṇīmbhāvasya boddhavyam astīti triṣv apy adhyāhāraḥ kartavyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1790: yasmād gahanā viṣamā durjñānā karmaṇa ity upalakṣaṇārthaṃ karmādīnāṃ karmākarma-vikarmaṇāṃ gatir yāthātmyaṃ tattvam ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_4.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1791: kiṃ punas tattvaṃ karmāder yad boddhavyam vakṣyāmīti pratijñātam ? ucyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1792: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1793: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsna-karma-kṛt ||BhG_4.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1795: karma kriyata iti karma vyāpāra-mātraṃ, tasmin karmaṇy akarma
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1798: pravṛtti-nivṛttyor vastv aprāpyaiva hi sarva eva kriyākārakādi-vyavahāro
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1800: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu, sa yukto yogī ca kṛtsna-karma-kṛt samasta-karma-kṛc ca sa iti stūyate karmākarmaṇor itaretara-darśī |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1801: nanu kim idaṃ viruddham ucyate karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1803: na hi karmākarma syād akarma vā karma, tatra viruddhaṃ kathaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1808: yathābhūta-darśanārtham āha bhagavān karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1812: na ca viparīta-jñānād aśubhān mokṣaṇaṃ syāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1814: tasmāt karmākarmaṇī viparyayeṇa gṛhīte prāṇibhis tad-viparyaya-grahaṇa-nivṛtty-arthaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1815: bhagavato vacanaṃ karmaṇy akarma yaḥ ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1818: ato viparīta-gṛhīte eva karmākarmaṇī laukikaiḥ, yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikāyām udakaṃ śuktikāyāṃ vā rajatam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1819: nanu karma karmaiva sarveṣāṃ na kvacid vyabhicarati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1821: nāvi gacchantyāṃ taṭasthesv agatiṣu nageṣu pratikūla-gati-darśanāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1823: evam ihāpy akarmaṇy ahaṃ karomīti karma-darśanaṃ karmaṇi cākarma-darśanaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1824: viparīta-darśanaṃ yena, tan-nirākaraṇārtham ucyate karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyet ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1825: tad etad ukta-prativacanam apy asakṛd atyanta-viparīta-darśana-bhāvitatayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1826: momuhyamāno lokaḥ śrutam apy asakṛt tattvaṃ vismṛtya vismṛtya mithyā-prasaṅgam avatāryāvatārya codayatīti punaḥ punar uttaram āha
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1830: [Gītā 2.25], na jāyate mriyate [Gītā 2.27] ity ādinātmani karmābhāvaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1833: yataḥ kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ [Gītā 4.16] dehādy-āśrayaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1835: ahaṃ kartā mamaitat karma, mayāsya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1837: tathā ahaṃ tūṣṇīṃ bhavāmi, yenāhaṃ nirāyāso 'karmā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1838: sukhī syām iti kārya-karaṇāśraya-vyāpāroparamaṃ tat-kṛtaṃ casukhitvam ātmany adhyāropya na karomi kiṃcit tūṣṇīṃ sukham āsam ity abhimanyate lokaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1839: tatredaṃ lokasya viparīta-darśanāpanayanāyāha bhagavān karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed ity ādi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1840: atra ca karma karmaiva sat kārya-karaṇāśrayaṃ karma-rahito 'vikriya ātmani sarvair adhyastam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1843: ātma-samavetatayā sarva-loka-prasiddhe karmaṇi nadī-kula-stheṣv iva gatiḥ pratilaumyena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1844: ato 'karma karmābhāvaṃ yathā-bhūtaṃ gaty-abhāvam iva vṛkṣeṣu yaḥ paśyet |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1845: akarmaṇi ca kārya-karaṇa-vyāpāroparame karmavad ātmany adhyāropite tūṣṇīm akurvan sukham āse ity ahaṅkārābhisandhi-hetutvāt tasminn akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ paśyet |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1846: ya evaṃ karmākarma-vibhāgajñaḥ sa buddhimān paṇḍito manuṣyeṣu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1852: īśvarārthe 'nuṣṭhīyamānānāṃ tat-phalābhāvād akarmāṇi tāny ucyante gauṇyā vṛttyā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1854: tac ca pratyavāya-phalatvāt karmocyate gauṇyaiva vṛttyā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1855: tatra nitye karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyet phalābhāvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1856: yathā dhenur api gaur agaur ucyate kṣīrākhyaṃ phalaṃ na prayacchatīti tadvat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1857: tathā nityākaraṇe tv akarmaṇi karmaḥ āśyen
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1863: katham ? nityānām anuṣṭhānād aśubhāt syān nāma mokṣaṇam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1865: na hi nityānāṃ phalābhāva-jñānam aśubha-mukti-phalatvena coditaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1869: na hy akarmaṇi karmeti darśanaṃ kartavyatayeha codyate, nityasya tu kartavyatā-mātram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1870: na cākaraṇān nityasya pratyavāyo bhavatīti vijñānāt kiṃcit phalaṃ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1873: buddhimattvaṃ, yuktatā, kṛtsna-karma-kṛttvādi ca phalam upapadyate stutir vā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1874: mithyā-jñānam eva hi sākṣād aśubha-rūpaṃ kuto
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1875: 'nyasmād aśubhān mokṣaṇam ? na hi tamas tamaso nivartakaṃ bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1876: nanu karmaṇi yad akarma-darśanam akarmaṇi vā karma-darśanaṃ, na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1883: śakyaṃ vaktuṃ nitya-karmaṇāṃ phalaṃ nāsty akaraṇāc ca teṣāṃ naraka-pātaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1885: tatra vyājena para-vyāmoha-rūpeṇa karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed ity ādinā kim ? tatraiva vyācakṣāṇena bhagavatoktaṃ vākyaṃ loka-vyāmohārtham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1887: na caitac chadma-rūpeṇa vākyena rakṣaṇīyaṃ vastu, nāpi śabdāntareṇa punaḥ punar ucyamānaṃ subodhaṃ syād ity evaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1889: karmaṇy evādhikāras te [Gītā 2.47] ity atra hi sphuṭatara ukto 'rtho na punar vaktavyo bhavati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1890: sarvatra ca praśastaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca kartavyam eva, na niṣprayojanaṃ boddhavyam ity ucyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1891: na ca mithyā-jñānaṃ boddhavyaṃ bhavati tat-pratyupasthāpitaṃ vā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1895: tat-katham asataḥ saj jāyate [ChāU 6.2.2] iti ca darśitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1898: sac cāsad bhaved ity uktaṃ syāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1900: na ca niṣphalaṃ vidadhyāt karma śāstraṃ duḥkha-svarūpatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1904: ubhayathāpi karaṇe 'karaṇe ca śāstraṃ niṣphalaṃ kalpitaṃ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1905: svābhyupagama-virodhaś ca nityaṃ niṣphalaṃ karmety abhyupagamya mokṣa-phalāyeti bruvataḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1906: tasmād yathā-śruta evārthaḥ karmaṇy akarma ya ity ādeḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1911: yasya yathokta-darśinaḥ sarve yāvantaḥ samārambhāḥ karmāṇi samārabhyanta iti samārambhāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1914: pravṛttena cel loka-saṅgrahārthaṃ, nivṛttena cej jīvana-mātrārthaṃ, taṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1915: jñānāgni-dagdha-karmāṇaṃ karmādāv akarmādi-darśanaṃ jñānaṃ, tad evāgnis tena jñānāgninā dagdhāni śubhāśubha-lakṣaṇāni karmāṇi yasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1916: tam āhuḥ paramārthataḥ paṇḍitaṃ budhāḥ brahma-vidaḥ ||BhGS_4.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1917: yas tu karmādāv akarmādi-darśī so 'karmādi-darśanād eva niṣkarmā sannyāsī
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1918: jīvana-mātrārtha-ceṣṭaḥ san karmaṇi na pravartate, yadyapi prāg-vivekataḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1921: utpannātma-samyag-darśanaḥ syāt, sa sarva-karmaṇi prayojanam apaśyan sa-sādhanaṃ karma pariyajaty eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1923: karma-parityāgāsambhave sati karmaṇi tat-phale ca saṅga-rahitatayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1924: sva-prayojanābhāvāl loka-saṅgrahārthaṃ pūrvavat karmaṇi pravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃcit karoti jñānāgni-dagdha-karmatvāt tadīyaṃ karmākarmaiva sampadyata
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1927: karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃcit karoti saḥ ||BhG_4.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1928: tyaktvā karmasv abhimānaṃ phalāsaṅgaṃ ca yathoktena jñānena nitya-tṛpto
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1931: āśrayo nāma yad āśritya puruṣārthaṃ sisādhayiṣati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1935: tenaivambhūtena sva-prayojanābhāvāt sa-sādhanaṃ karma parityaktavyam eveti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1939: yaḥ punaḥ pūrvokta-viparītaḥ prāg eva karmāmbhād brahmaṇi sarvāntare pratyag-ātmani niṣkriye saṃjātātma-darśanaḥ, sa dṛṣṭādṛṣṭeṣṭa-viṣayāśīr
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1940: vivarjitatayā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthe karmaṇi prayojanam apyaśyan sa-sādhanaṃ karma saṃnyasya śarīra-yātrā-mātra-ceṣṭo yatir jñāna-niṣṭho mucyata iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1943: śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam ||BhG_4.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1944: nirāśīr nirgatā āśiṣo yasmāt sa nirāśīḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1948: tāv ubhāv api yatau saṃyatau yasya sa yata-cittātmā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1949: tyakta-sarva-parigrahaḥ - tyaktaḥ sarvaḥ parigraho yena sa tyakta-sarva-parigrahaḥ |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:1952: nāpnoti na prāpnoti kilbiṣam aniṣṭa-rūpaṃ pāpaṃ dharmaṃ ca |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:1956: kiṃ ca śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karmety atra kiṃ śarīra-nirvartyaṃ śārīraṃ karmābhipretam ? āho svic charīra-sthiti-mātra-prayojanaṃ śārīraṃ karma ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1958: kiṃ cāto yadi śarīra-nirvartyaṃ śārīraṃ karma yadi vā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1961: śarīra-nirvartyaṃ karma śārīram abhipretaṃ syāt tadā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-prayojanaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1962: karma pratiṣiddham api śarīreṇa kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam iti bruvato viruddhābhidhānaṃ prasajyeta
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1964: śarīreṇa kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam ity api bruvato
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1966: śārīraṃ karma kurvan iti viśeṣaṇāt kevala-śabda-prayogāc ca vāṅ-manasa-nirvartyaṃ karma
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1967: vidhi-pratiṣedha-viṣayaṃ dharmādharma-śabda-vācyaṃ kurvan prāpnoti kilbiṣam ity uktaṃ syāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1972: yadā tu śarīra-sthiti-mātra-prayojanaṃ śārīraṃ karmābhipretaṃ bhavet, tadā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-prayojanaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1974: eva śarīrādibhiḥ śarīra-sthiti-mātra-prayojanaṃ kevala-śabda-prayogāt ahaṃ karomi ity abhimāna-varjitaḥ śarīrādi-ceṣṭā-mātraṃ loka-dṛṣṭyā kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1977: jñānāgni-dagdha-sarva-karmatvād apratibandhena mucyate eveti pūrvokta-samyag-darśana-phalānuvāda evaiṣaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1978: evaṃ śarīraṃ kevalaṃ karma ity asyārthasya parigrahe niravadyaṃ bhavati ||BhGS_4.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1980: parigrahasyābhāvād yācanādinā śarīra-sthitau kartavyatāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ ayācitam asaṃk ptam upapannaṃ yadṛcchayā [Mbh 14.46.19;
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1984: samaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca kṛtvāpi na nibadhyate ||BhG_4.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1985: yadṛcchā-lābha-santuṣṭaḥ prārthitopanato lābho yadṛcchā-lābhaḥ, tena santuṣṭaḥ saṃjātālaṃ-pratyayaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1986: dvandvātīto dvandvaiḥ śītoṣṇādibhir hanyamāno 'py aviṣaṇṇa-citto dvandvātīta ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1989: samas tulyo yadṛcchā-lābhasya siddhāv asiddhau ca, ya evambhūto yatir annādeḥ śarīra-sthiti-hetor lābhālābhayoḥ samo harṣa-viṣāda-varjitaḥ, karmādāv akarmādi-darśī,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1992: guṇā guṇeṣu vartanta [Gītā 3.28] ity evaṃ sadā samparicakṣāṇa ātmanaḥ kartṛtvābhāvaṃ paśyann eva kiṃcid bhikṣāṭanādikaṃ karma karoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1998: nibadhyate, bandha-hetoḥ karmaṇaḥ sahetukasya jñānāgninā dagdhatvād ity uktānuvāda evaiṣaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:1999: tyaktvā karma-phalāsaṅgaṃ [Gītā 4.20] ity anena ślokena yaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2000: prārabdha-karmā san yadā niṣkriya-brahmātma-darśana-sampannaḥ syāt tadā tasyātmanaḥ kartṛ-karma-prayojanābhāva-darśinaḥ karma-parityāge prāpte kutaścin nimittāt tad-asambhave sati pūrvavat tasmin karmaṇy abhipravṛttasyāpi naiva kiṃcit karoti sa [Gītā 4.20] itikarmābhāvaḥ pradarśitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2005: nivṛtta-dharmādharmādi-bandhanasya, jñānāvasthita-cetaso jñāna evāvasthitaṃ ceto yasya so 'yaṃ jñānāvasthita-cetāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2006: tasya yajñāya yajña-nirvṛtty-artham ācarato nirvartayataḥ karma samagraṃ sahāgreṇa phalena vartata iti samagraṃ karma tat-samagraṃ pravilīyate vinaśyatīty arthaḥ ||BhGS_4.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2007: kasmāt punaḥ kāraṇāt kriyamāṇaṃ karma svakāryārambham akurvat samagraṃ pravilīyata ity ucyate ? yataḥ -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2008: brahmārpaṇaṃ brahma havir brahmāgnau brahmaṇā hutam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2010: brahmārpaṇaṃ yena karaṇena brahmavid havir agnāv arpayati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2012: yathā śuktikāyāṃ rajatābhāvaṃ paśyati tad ucyate brahmaivārpaṇam iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2014: brahma arpaṇam ity asamaste pade yad-arpaṇa-buddhyā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2015: gṛhyate loke tad asya brahma-vido brahmaivety arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2016: brahma havis tathā yad dhavir buddhyā gṛhyamāṇaṃ tad brahmaivāsay |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2019: yatra hūyate brahmaṇā kartrā brahmaiva kartety arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2020: yat tena hutaṃ havana-kriyā tad brahmaiva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2021: yat tena gantavyaṃ phalaṃ tad api brahmaiva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2022: brahma-karma-samādhinā brahmaiva karma brahma-karma tasmin samādhir yasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2023: sa brahma-karma-samādhis tena brahma-karma-samādhinā brahmaiva gantavyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2024: evaṃ loka-saṅgrahaṃ cikīrṣuṇāpi kriyamāṇaṃ karam, paramārthato 'karma
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2029: yad-arpaṇādy-adhiyajñe prasiddhaṃ tad asyādhyātmaṃ brahmaiva paramārtha-darśina iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2032: tasmād brahmaivedaṃ sarvam ity abhijānato viduṣaḥ sarva-karmābhāvaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2042: tathā ca darśitaṃ karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyet [Gītā 4.18], karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃcit karoti saḥ [Gītā 4.20], guṇā guṇeṣu vartante
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2043: [Gītā 3.28], naiva kiṃcit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit [Gītā 5.8] ity ādibhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2044: tathā ca darśayaṃs tatra tatra kriyā-kāraka-phala-bheda-buddhy-upamardaṃ karoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2052: atra kecid āhuḥ - yad brahma tad arpaṇādīni |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2053: brahmaiva kilārpaṇādinā pañca-vidhena kārakātmanā vyavasthitaṃ sat tad eva karma karoti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2057: yathā pratimādau viṣṇv-ādi-buddhiḥ, yathā vā nāmādau brahma-buddhir iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2058: satyam evam api syād yadi jñāna-yajña-stuty-arthaṃ prakaraṇaṃ na syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2059: atra tu samyag-darśanaṃ jñāna-yajña-śabditam anekān yajña-śabditān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2060: kriyā-viśeṣān upanyasya śreyān dravya-mayād yajñāj jñāna-yajñaḥ parantapa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2062: atra ca samartham idaṃ vacanaṃ brahmārpaṇam ity ādi jñānasya yajñatva-sampādane, anyathā sarvasya brahmatve 'rpaṇādīnām eva viśeṣato brahmatvābhidhānam anarthakaṃ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2063: ye tv arpaṇādiṣu pratimāyāṃ viṣṇu-dṛṣṭivad brahma-dṛṣṭiḥ kṣipyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2064: nāmādiṣv iva ceti bruvate, na teṣāṃ brahma-vidyokteha vivakṣitā syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2069: viruddhaṃ ca samyag-darśanam antareṇa mokṣa-phalaṃ prāpyata iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2071: samyag-darśanaṃ ca prakṛtaṃ karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyet [Gītā 4.18] ity atrānte ca samyag-darśanaṃ tasyaivopasaṃhārāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2072: śreyān dravya-mayād yajñāj jñāna-yajñaḥ parantapa [Gītā 4.33] jñānaṃ labdhvā parāṃ śāntiṃ [Gītā 4.39] ity ādinā samyag-darśana-stutim eva kurvann upakṣīṇo 'dhyāyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2073: tatrākasmād arpaṇādau brahma-dṛṣṭir aprakaraṇe pratimāyām iva viṣṇu-dṛṣṭir ucyata ity anupapannam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2076: tatrādhunā samyag-darśanasya yajñatvaṃ sampādya tat-stuty-artham anye 'pi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2080: daivam eva devā ijyante yena yajñenāsau daivo yajñas tam evāpare yajñaṃ yoginaḥ karmiṇaḥ paryupāsate, kurvantīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2081: brahmāgnau satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma [TaittU 2.1] vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma [BAU 3.9.28], yat sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaraḥ [BAU 3.4.1], ity ādi vacanoktam aśanāyāpipāsādi-sarva-saṃsāra-dharma-varjitaṃ neti neti [BAU
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2084: ca sa homādhikaraṇatva-vivakṣayā brahmāgnis tasmin brahmāgnāv apare 'nye
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2085: brahma-vido yajñaṃ yajña-śabda-vācya ātmā ātma-nāmasu yajña-śabdasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2086: pāṭhāt [Nirukti 14.11] tam ātmānaṃ yajñaṃ paramārthataḥ param eva brahma santaṃ buddhyādy-upādhi-saṃyuktam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2088: sopādhikasyātmano nirupādhikena para-brahma-svarūpeṇaiva yad darśanaṃ, sa tasmin homas taṃ kurvanti, brahmātmaikatva-darśana-niṣṭhāḥ sannyāsina ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2090: yajñeṣūpakṣipyante brahmārpaṇam ity ād-ślokaiḥ prastutaḥ śreyān dravya-mayād yajñāj jñāna-yajñaḥ parantapa [Gītā 4.33] ity ādinā stuty-artham ||BhGS_4.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2093: śrotrādīnīndriyāṇy anye yoginaḥ saṃyamāgniṣu pratīndriyaṃ saṃyamo bhidyata iti bahu-vacanam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2096: śabdādīn viṣayān anya indriyāgniṣu juhvati, indriyāṇy evāgnayas teṣv indriyāgniṣu juhvati śrotrādibhir aviruddha-viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2103: prāṇa-karmāṇi prāṇo vāyur ādhyātmikas tat-karmāṇy ākuñcana-prasāraṇādīni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2104: tāni cāpara ātma-saṃyama-yogāgnau, ātmani saṃyama ātma-saṃyamaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2105: sa eva yogāgnis tasminn ātma-saṃyama-yogāgnau juhvati prakṣipanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2107: sneheneva pradīpite viveka-vijñānenojjvala-bhāvam āpādite pravilāpayantīty arthaḥ ||BhGS_4.27||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2110: dravya-yajñās tīrtheṣu dravya-viniyogaṃ yajña-buddhyā kurvanti ye te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2112: tapo-yajñās tapo yajño yeṣāṃ tapasvināṃ te tapo-yajñāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2113: yoga-yajñāḥ prāṇāyāma-pratyāhārādi-lakṣaṇo yogo yajño yeṣāṃ te yoga-yajñāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2114: | tathāpare svādhyāya-jñāna-yajñāś ca svādhyāyo yathā-vidhi ṛg-ādy-abhyāso
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2119: śaṃsita-vratāḥ samyak śitāni tanūkṛtāni tīkṣṇīkṛtāni vratāni yeṣāṃ te saṃśita-vratāḥ ||BhGS_4.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2123: apāne 'pāna-vṛttau juhvati pratikṣipanti prāṇaṃ prāṇa-vṛttiṃ, pūrakākhyaṃ prāṇāyāmaṃ kurvantīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2129: ete ruddhvā nirudhya prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇāḥ prāṇāyāma-tat-parāḥ kumbhakākhyaṃ prāṇāyāmaṃ kurvantīty arthaḥ ||BhGS_4.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2133: apare niyatāhārā niyataḥ parimita āhāro yeṣāṃ te niyatāhārāḥ santaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2135: yasya yasya vāyor jayaḥ kriyata itarān vāyu-bhedān tasmin tasmin juhvati, te tatra praviṣṭā iva bhavanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2136: sarve 'py ete yajña-vido yajña-kṣapitakalmaṣā yajñair yathoktaiḥ kṣapito
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2141: yajña-śiṣṭāmṛta-bhujo yajñānāṃ śiṣṭaṃ yajña-śiṣṭaṃ yajña-śiṣṭaṃ ca tad amṛtaṃ ca yajña-śiṣṭāmṛtaṃ tad bhuñjata iti yajña-śiṣṭāmṛta-bhujaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2142: yathoktān yajñān kṛtvā tac-chiṣṭena kālena yathā-vidhi-coditam annam amṛtākhyaṃ bhuñjate iti yajña-śiṣṭāmṛta-bhujo yānti gacchanti brahma
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2145: nāyaṃ lokaḥ sarva-prāṇi-sādhāraṇo 'py asti yathoktānāṃ yajñānām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2146: eko 'pi yajño yasya nāsti so 'yajñas tasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2149: evaṃ bahu-vidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2150: karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase ||BhG_4.32||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2151: evaṃ yathoktā bahu-vidhā bahu-prakārā yajñā vitatā vistīrṇā brahmaṇo vedasya mukhe dvāre veda-dvāreṇa avagamyamānā brahmaṇo mukhe vitatā ucyante |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2152: tad yathā vāci hi prāṇaṃ juhumaḥ ity ādayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2154: kāyika-vācika-mānasa-karmodbhavān viddhi tān sarvān anātmajān, nirvyāpāro hy ātmā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2157: nirvyāpāro 'ham udāsīna ity evaṃ jñātvāsmāt samyag-darśanān mokṣyase
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2159: brahmārpaṇam [Gītā 4.24] ity ādi lokena samyag-darśanasya yajñatvaṃ saṃpāditam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2166: śreyān dravya-mayāt dravya-sādhana-sādhyād yajñāj jñāna-yajño he paraṃtapa |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2167: dravya-mayo hi yajñaḥ phalasyārambhakaḥ, jñāna-yajño na phalārambhakaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2169: katham ? yataḥ sarvaṃ karma samastam akhilam apratibaddhaṃ pārtha jñāne mokṣa-sādhane sarvataḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2171: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃcit prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti yas tad veda yat sa veda [ChāU 4.1.4] iti śruteḥ ||BhGS_4.33||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2172: tad etad viśiṣṭāṃ jñānaṃ tarhi kena prāpyata ity ucyate ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2175: tat viddhi vijānīhi yena vidhinā prāpyate iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2177: praṇipātena prakarṣeṇa nīcaiḥ patanaṃ praṇipāto dīrgha-namaskāras tena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2178: kathaṃ bandhaḥ ? kathaṃ mokṣaḥ ? kā vidyā ? kā cāvidyā ? iti paripraśnena,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2180: praśrayeṇāvarjitā ācāryā upadekṣyanti kathayiṣyanti te jñānaṃ yathokta-viśeṣaṇaṃ jñāninaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2181: jñānavanto 'pi kecid yathāvat tattva-darśana-śīlāḥ, apare na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2183: | ye samyag-darśinas tair upadiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ kārya-kṣamaṃ bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2186: yaj jñātvā na punar moham evaṃ yāsyasi pāṇḍava |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2187: yena bhūtāny aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasy ātmany atho mayi ||BhG_4.35||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2188: yaj jñātvā yaj jñānaṃ tair upadiṣṭam adhigamya prāpya punar bhūyo moham evaṃ yathedānīṃ mohaṃ gato 'si punar evaṃ na yāsyasi he pāṇḍāva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2189: kiṃ ca ---- yena jñānena bhūtāny aśeṣeṇa brahmādīni stamba-paryantāni drakṣyasi sākṣād ātmani pratyag ātmani mat-saṃsthānīmāni bhūtānīty atho api mayi vāsudeve parameśvare cemānīti kṣetrajñeśvaraikatvaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2192: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpa-kṛttamaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2194: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ pāpa-kṛdbhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'tiśayena pāpa-kṛt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2195: pāpa-kṛttamaḥ sarvaṃ jñāna-plavenaiva jñānam eva plavaṃ kṛtvā vṛjinaṃ vṛjinārṇavaṃ pāpa-samudraṃ saṃtariṣyasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2197: jñānaṃ kathaṃ nāśayati pāpam ? iti sa-dṛṣṭāntam ucyate ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2200: yathaidhāṃsi kāṣṭhāni samiddhaḥ samyag iddho dīpto 'gnir bhasmasāt bhasmībhāvaṃ kurute he arjuna, jñānam eva agnir jñānāgniḥ sarva-karmāṇi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2202: na hi sākṣād eva jñānāgniḥ karmāṇīndhanavat bhasmīkartuṃ śaknoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2205: sāmarthyād yena karmaṇā arīram ārabdhaṃ tat pravṛtta-phalatvād upabhogenaiva kṣīyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2206: tasya tāvad eva ciraṃ yāvan na vimokṣye 'tha sampatsye [ChāU 6.14.1] ato yāny apravṛtta-phalāni jñānotpatteḥ prāk kṛtāni jñāna-sahabhāvīni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2207: cātītāneka-janma-kṛtāni ca tāny eva sarvāṇi bhasmasāt kurute ||BhGS_4.37||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2209: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2211: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ tulyaṃ pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ śuddhi-karam iha vidyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2212: taj jñānaṃ svayam eva yoga-saṃsiddho yogena karma-yogena samādhi-yogena ca saṃsiddhaḥ saṃskṛto yogyatām āpannaḥ san mumukṣuḥ kālena mahatā ātmani vindati labhate ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_4.38||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2213: yenaikāntena jñāna-prāptir bhavati sa upāya upadiśyate ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2217: śraddhālutve 'pi bhavati kaścin manda-prasthānaḥ, ata āha --- tat-paraḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2219: tat-paro 'py ajitendriyaḥ syāt ity ata āha --- saṃyatendriyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2220: saṃyatāni viṣayebhyo nivartitāni yasyendriyāṇi sa saṃyatendriyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2221: ya evaṃbhūtaḥ śraddhāvān tat-paraḥ saṃyatendriyaś ca so
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2225: na tu tat śraddhāvattvādau ity ekāntato
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2227: kiṃ punar jñāna-lābhāt syād ity ucyate -- jñānaṃ labdhvā paraṃ mokṣākhyāṃ śāntim uparatim acireṇa kṣipram evādhigacchati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2228: samyag-darśanāt kṣipram eva mokṣo bhavatīti sarva-śāstra-nyāya-prasiddhaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2230: atra saṃśayo na kartavyaḥ, pāpiṣṭho hi saṃśayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2233: nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ ||BhG_4.40||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2234: ajñaś cānātmajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca guru-vākya-śāstreṣv aviśvāsavāṃś ca saṃśayātmā ca saṃśaya-cittaś ca vinaśyati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2235: ajñāśraddadhānau yadyapi vinaśyataḥ, na tathā yathā saṃśayātmā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2245: yoga-saṃnyasta-karmāṇaṃ paramārtha-darśana-lakṣaṇena yogena saṃnyastāni karmāṇi yena paramārtha-darśinā dharmādharmākhyāni taṃ yoga-saṃnyasta-karmāṇam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2249: ya evaṃ yoga-saṃnyasta-karmā tam ātmavantam apramattaṃ guṇa-ceṣṭā-rūpeṇa dṛṣṭāni karmāṇi na nibadhnanty aniṣṭādi-rūpaṃ phalaṃ nārabhante |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2251: yasmāt karma-yogānuṣṭhānād aśuddhi-kṣaya-hetuka-jñāna-saṃchinna-saṃśayo na nibadhyate karmabhir jñānāgni-dagdha-karmatvād eva, yasmāc ca jñāna-karmānuṣṭhāna-viṣaye saṃśayavān vinaśyati tasmād ajñāna-saṃbhūtaṃ hṛt-sthaṃ jñānāsinātmanaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2253: tasmāt pāpiṣṭham ajñāna-saṃbhūtam ajñānād avivekāj jātaṃ hṛt-sthaṃ hṛdi buddhau sthitaṃ jñānāsinā śoka-mohādi-doṣa-haraṃ samyag darśanaṃ jñānaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2254: tad evāsiḥ khaḍgas tena jñānāsinā ātmanaḥ svasya, ātma-viṣayatvāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2256: na hi parasya saṃśayaḥ pareṇa cchettavyatāṃ prāptaḥ, yena svasyeti viśeṣyeta |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2258: chittvā enaṃ saṃśayaṃ sva-vināśa-hetu-bhūtam, yogaṃ samyag-darśanopāyaṃ karmānuṣṭhānam ātiṣṭha kurv ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2268: saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2269: yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam ||BhG_5.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2270: saṃnyāsaṃ parityāgaṃ karmaṇāṃ āstrīyāṇām anuṣṭheya-viśeṣāṇām śaṃsasi praśaṃsasi kathayasīty etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2271: punar yogaṃ ca teṣām eva anuṣṭhānam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2273: ato me katarat śreyaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ śreyaḥ, kiṃ vā tad-dhānam iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2275: ataś ca yat śreyaḥ praśasyataram etayoḥ karma-saṃnyāsa-karma-yogayor
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2276: yad-anuṣṭhānāt śreyo 'vāptir mama syād iti manyase, tad ekam anyatarat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2277: saha eka-puruṣānuṣṭheyatvāsaṃbhavāt me brūhi suniścitam abhipretaṃ taveti ||BhGS_5.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2282: saṃnyāsaḥ karmaṇāṃ parityāgaḥ karma-yogaś ca teṣām anuṣṭhānaṃ tāv ubhāv api niḥśreyasa-karau mokṣaṃ kurvāte jñānotpatti-hetutvena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2283: ubhau yadyapi niḥśreyasa-karau, tathāpi tayos tu niḥśreyasa-hetvoḥ karma-saṃnyāsāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2284: kevalāt karma-yogo viśiṣyata iti karma-yogaṃ stauti ||BhGS_5.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2287: jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2288: nirdvandvo hi mahā-bāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate ||BhG_5.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2289: jñeyo jñātavyaḥ sa karma-yogī nitya-saṃnyāsī iti yo na dveṣṭi kiṃcit na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2291: evaṃvidho yaḥ, karmaṇi vartamāno 'pi sa nitya-saṃnyāsī iti jñātavya ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2293: hi yasmāt mahābāho sukhaṃ bandhād anāyāsena pramucyate ||BhGS_5.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2297: na tūbhayor niḥśreyasa-karatvam eveti prāpta idam ucyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2298: sāṃkhya-yogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2299: ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate phalam ||BhG_5.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2300: sāṃkhya-yogau pṛthag viruddha-bhinna-phalau bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2301: paṇḍitās tu jñānina ekaṃ phalam aviruddham icchanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2302: katham ? ekam api sāṃkhya-yogayoḥ samyag āsthitaḥ samyag anuṣṭhitavān ity arthaḥ, ubhayor vindate phalam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2303: ubhayos tad eva hi niḥśreyasaṃ phalam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2305: nanu saṃnyāsa-karma-yoga-śabdena prastutya sāṃkhya-yogayoḥ phalaikatvaṃ katham ihāprakṛtaṃ bravīti ? naiṣa doṣaḥ - yadyapy arjunena saṃnyāsaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2306: karma-yogaṃ ca kevalam abhipretya praśnaḥ kṛtaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2307: bhagavāṃs tu tad-aparityāgenaiva svābhipretaṃ ca viśeṣaṃ saṃyojya śabdāntara-vācyatayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2313: ekasyāpi samyag anuṣṭhānāt katham ubhayoḥ phalaṃ vindate ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2314: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2315: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ||BhG_5.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2316: yat sāṃkhyair jñāna-niṣṭhaiḥ saṃnyāsibhiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ mokṣākhyam tad yogair api jñāna-prāpty-upāyatveneśvare samarpya karmāṇy ātmanaḥ phalam anabhisaṃdhāyānutiṣṭhanti ye te yogā yoginaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2317: tair api paramārtha-jñāna-saṃnyāsa-prāpti-dvāreṇa gamyata ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2318: ata ekaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati phalaikatvāt sa paśyati samyak paśyatīty arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2320: evaṃ tarhi yogāt saṃnyāsa eva viśiṣyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2321: kathaṃ tarhīdam uktam tayos tu karma-saṃnyāsāt karma-yogo viśiṣyate [Gītā 5.2] iti ? sṛṇu tatra kāraṇam -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2322: tvayā pṛṣṭāṃ kevalaṃ karma-saṃnyāsaṃ karma-yogaṃ cābhipretya tayor anyataraḥ kaḥ śreyān ? iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2323: tad-anurūpaṃ prativacanaṃ mayoktaṃ karma-saṃnyāsāt karma-yogo viśiṣyate iti jñānam anapekṣya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2324: jñānāpekṣas tu saṃnyāsaḥ sāṃkhyam iti mayābhipretaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2326: yas tu karma-yogo vaidikaḥ sa ca tādarthyāt yogaḥ saṃnyāsa iti copacaryate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2328: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2330: saṃnyāsas tu pāramārthiko duḥkham āptuṃ prāptum ayogato yogena vinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2337: nyāsa iti brahmā brahmā hi paraḥ [MahānārU
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2340: paramārtha-jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇaṃ na cireṇa kṣipram evādhigacchati prāpnoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2346: yogena yukto yoga-yukto viśuddhātmā viśuddha-sattvo vijitātmā vijita-deho
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2347: jitendriyaś ca sarva-bhūtātma-bhūtātmā sarveṣāṃ brahmādīnāṃ stamba-paryantānāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūta ātmā pratyak-cetano yasya sa sarva-bhūtātma-bhūtātmā samyag-darśīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2349: loka-saṃgrahāya karma kurvann api na lipyate na karmabhir badhyate ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2353: naiva kiṃ cit karomīti yukto manyeta tattva-vit |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2354: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan ||BhG_5.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2355: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2358: tattvavid ātmano yāthātmyaṃ tattvaṃ vettīti tattva-vit paramārtha-darśīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2359: kadā kathaṃ vā tattvam avadhārayan manyeta ? ity ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2361: yasyaivaṃ tattva-vidaḥ sarva-kārya-karaṇa-ceṣṭāsu karmasv akarmaiva paśyataḥ samyag-darśinas tasya sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa evādhikāraḥ karmaṇo 'bhāva-darśanāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2362: na hi mṛga-tṛṣṇikāyām udaka-buddhyā pānāya pravṛtta udakābhāva-jñāne 'pi tatraiva pāna-prayojanāya pravartate ||BhGS_5.8-9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2364: yas tu punar atattva-vit pravṛttaś ca karma-yoge -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2365: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2366: lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā ||BhG_5.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2367: brahmaṇīśvara ādhāya nikṣipya tad-arthaṃ karma karomīti bhṛtya iva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2369: mokṣe 'pi phale saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ sarva-karmāṇi, lipyate na sa pāpena na saṃbadhyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2372: kevalaṃ sattva-śuddhi-mātram eva phalaṃ tasya karmaṇaḥ syāt, yasmāt -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2373: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2375: kāyena dehena manasā buddhyā ca kevalair mamatva-varjitaiḥ īśvarāyaiva karma karomi, na mama phalāya iti mamatva-buddhi-śūnyair indriyair api -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2376: kevala-śabdaḥ kāyādibhir api pratyekaṃ saṃbadhyate, sarva-vyāpāreṣu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2378: yoginaḥ karmiṇaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgaṃ tyaktvā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2380: tasmāt tatraiva tavādhikāra iti kuru karmaiva ||BhGS_5.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2383: yuktaḥ karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2385: yukta īśvarāya karmaṇi karomi na mama phalāya ity evaṃ samāhitaḥ san karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā parityajya śāntiṃ mokṣākhyām āpnoti naiṣṭhikīṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2391: mama phalāya idaṃ karomi karma ity evaṃ phale sakto nibadhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2392: atas tvaṃ yukto bhava ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_5.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2396: nava-dvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan ||BhG_5.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2397: sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarva-karmāṇi saṃnyasya parityajya nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2402: nivṛtta-sarva-bāhya-prayojana iti sukham āste ity ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2404: kva katham āste ? ity āha - nava-dvāre pure |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2405: sapta śīrṣāṇyāny ātmana upalabdhi-dvārāṇi, arvāk dve mūtra-purīṣa-visargārthe,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2406: tair dvārair nava-dvāraṃ puram ucyate śarīram puram iva puram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2411: kiṃ viśeṣaṇena ? sarvo hi dehī saṃnyāsy asaṃnyāsī vā dehe evāste |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2414: dehendriya-saṃghāta-mātrātma-darśī sa sarvo 'pi gehe bhūmāv āsane vā ' 'sa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2416: na hi deha-mātrātma-darśino geha iva dehe āsa iti pratyayaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2418: dehādi-saṃghāta-vyatiriktātma-darśinas tu dehe āse iti pratyaya upapadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2420: avidyayayādhyāropitānāṃ vidyayā viveka-jñānena manasā saṃnyāsa upapadyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2421: | utpanna-viveka-jñānasya sarva-karma-saṃnyāsino 'pi geha iva deha eva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2424: dehe evāsta ity asty eva viśeṣaṇa-phalam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2426: yadyapi kārya-karaṇa-karmāṇy avidyayātmany adhyāropitāni saṃnyasyāste ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2427: uktam, tathāpi ātmasamavāyi tu kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvaṃ ca syāt ity āśaṅkyāha - naiva kurvan svayam na kārya-karaṇāni kārayan kriyāsu pravartayan |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2428: kiṃ ? yat tat kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvaṃ ca dehinaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2429: svātma-samavāyi sat saṃnyāsān na saṃbhavati ? yathā gacchato gatir
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2430: gamana-vyāpāra-parityāge na syāt tadvat ? kiṃ vā svata eva ātmano nāsti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2431: iti ? atrocyate - nāsty ātmanaḥ svataḥ kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2432: uktaṃ hi -- avikāryo 'yam ucyate [Gītā 2.55], śarīra-stho 'pi kaunteya na karoti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2437: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2439: na kartṛtvaṃ svataḥ kurv iti nāpi karmāṇi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2440: ratha-ghaṭa-prāsādādīnīpsitatamāni lokasya sṛjaty utpādayati prabhur ātmā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2441: nāpi rathādi kṛtavatas tat-phalena saṃyogaṃ na karma-phala-saṃyogam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2442: yadi kiṃcid api svato na karoti na kārayati ca dehī, kas tarhi kurvan
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2443: kārayan ca pravartata iti, ucyate - svabhāvas tu svo bhāvaḥ svabhāvo 'vidyā-lakṣaṇā prakṛtir māyā pravartate daivī hi [Gītā 7.14] ity ādinā vakṣyamāṇā ||BhGS_5.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2446: nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2448: nādatte na ca gṛhṇāti bhaktasyāpi kasyacit pāpam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2449: na caivādatte sukṛtaṃ bhaktaiḥ prayuktaṃ vibhuḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2451: yāga-dāna-homādikaṃ ca sukṛtaṃ prayujyate ity āha - ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ viveka-vijñānam, tena muhyanti karomi kārayāmi bhokṣye bhojayāmīty evaṃ mohaṃ gacchanty avivekinaḥ saṃsāriṇo jantavaḥ ||BhGS_5.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2453: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2455: jñānena tu yena ajñānena āvṛtāḥ muhyanti jantavas tat ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ jantūnāṃ viveka-jñānena ātma-viṣayeṇa nāśitam ātmano bhavati, teṣāṃ jantūnām ādityavat yathādityaḥ samastaṃ rūpa-jātam avabhāsayati tadvat jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vastu sarvaṃ prakāśayati tat paraṃ paramārtha-tattvam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2460: tasmin brahmaṇi gatā buddhir yeṣāṃ te tad-buddhayaḥ, tad-ātmānas tad eva paraṃ brahma ātmā yeṣāṃ te tad-ātmanāḥ, tan-niṣṭhāḥ niṣṭhā abhiniveśas tātparyaṃ sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya tasmin brahmaṇy eva avasthānaṃ yeṣāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2461: te tan-niṣṭhāḥ, tat-parāyaṇā ca tad eva param ayanaṃ parā gatir yeṣāṃ bhavati te tat-parāyaṇāḥ kevalātma-rataya ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2462: yeṣāṃ jñānena nāśitam ātmano 'jñānaṃ te gacchanti evaṃ-vidyāḥ apunar-āvṛttim
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2464: nāśitaḥ kalmaṣaḥ pāpādi-saṃsāra-kāraṇa-doṣo yeṣāṃ te jñāna-nirdhūta-kalmaṣā yatayaḥ ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_5.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2466: yeṣāṃ jñānena nāśitam ātmano 'jñānaṃ te paṇḍitāḥ kathaṃ tattvaṃ payantīty ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2468: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ sama-darśinaḥ ||BhG_5.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2469: vidyā-vinaya-saṃpanne vidyā ca vinayaś ca vidyā-vinayau, vinaya upāmaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2470: tābhyāṃ vidyā-vinayābhyāṃ saṃpanno vidyā-vinaya-saṃpanno vidvān vinītaś ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2471: yo brāhmaṇas tasmin brāhmaṇe gavi hastini śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ sama-darśinaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2473: sāttvike, madhyamāyāṃ ca rājasyāṃ gavi, saṃskāra-hīnāyām atyantam eva kevala-tāmase hasty-ādau ca, sattvādi-guṇais taj-jaiś ca saṃskārais tathā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2474: rājasais tathā tāmasaiś ca saṃskārair atyantam evāspṛṣṭāṃ samam ekam avikriyaṃ tad brahma draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te paṇḍitāḥ sama-darśinaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2476: nanv abhojyānnās te doṣavantaḥ, samāsamābhyāṃ viṣama-same pūjātaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2480: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2481: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ ||BhG_5.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2482: ihaiva jīvadbhireva taiḥ samadarśibhiḥ paṇḍitair jito vaīkṛtaḥ sargo janma, yeṣāṃ sāmye sarva-bhūteṣu brahmaṇi samabhāve sthitaṃ ni calībhūtaṃ mano 'ntaḥkaraṇam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2483: nirdoṣaṃ yadyapi doṣavatsu vapākādiṣu mūḍhais taddoṣair doṣavat iva vibhāvyate, tathāpi taddoṣair aspṛṣṭām iti nirdoṣaṃ doṣavarjitaṃ hi yasmāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2485: vakṣyati ca bhagavān icchādīnāṃ kṣetradharmatvam, anāditvānnirguṇatvāt iti ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2486: nāpy antyā viśeṣāḥ ātmano bhedakāḥ santi, pratiśarīraṃ teṣāṃ sattve pramāṇānupapatteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2491: dehādisaṃghātātma-darśanābhimānavadviṣayaṃ tu tat sūtram samāsamābhyāṃ viṣamasame pūjātaḥ iti, pūjāviṣayatvena viśeṣaṇāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2492: dṛśyate hi brahmavit ṣaḍāṅgavit caturvedavit iti pūjādānādau guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaḥ kāraṇam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2493: brahma tu sarvaguṇadoṣasaṃbandhavarjitamityatar brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ iti yuktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2495: idaṃ tu sarva-karma-saṃnyāsaviṣayaṃ prastutam, sarva-karmāṇi manasā ityārabhya ādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2498: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2500: na prahṛṣeyet praharṣaṃ na kuryāt priyam iṣṭāṃ prāpya labdhvā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2503: priyāpriya-prāptī harṣa-viṣādau kurvāte, na kevalātma-darśinaḥ, tasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2505: kiṃ ca - sarva-bhūteṣv ekaḥ samo nirdoṣa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2506: ātmeti sthirā nirvicikitsā buddhir yasya sa sthira-buddhir asaṃmūḍhaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2507: saṃmoha-varjitaś ca syāt yathokta-brahmavid brahmaṇi sthito 'karma-kṛt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2511: bāhya-sparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2513: bāhya-sparśeṣu bāhyā ca te sparśāś ca bāhya-sparśāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2514: spṛśyante iti sparśāḥ śabdādayo viṣayās teṣu bāhya-sparśeṣu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2516: yasya so 'yam asaktātmā viṣayeṣu prīti-varjitaḥ san vindati labhate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2517: ātmani yat sukhaṃ tad vindatīty etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2518: sa brahma-yoga-yuktātmā brahmaṇi yogaḥ samādhir brahma-yogas tena brahma-yogena yuktaḥ samāhitas
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2519: vyāpṛta ātmā antaḥ-karaṇaṃ yasya sa brahma-yoga-yuktātmā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2521: tasmād bāhya-viṣaya-prīteḥ kṣaṇikāyā indriyāṇi nivartayed ātmany akṣaya-sukhārthīty arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2524: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkha-yonaya eva te |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2525: ādy-anta-vantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ ||BhG_5.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2526: ye hi yasmāt saṃssparśajā viṣayendriya-saṃsparśebhyo jātā bhogā bhuktayo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2528: dṛśyante hy ādhyātmikādīni duḥkhāni tan-nimittāny eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2531: na saṃsāre sukhasya gandha-mātram apy astīti buddhvā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2534: ādy-anta-vantaś ca, ādir viṣayendriya-saṃyogo bhogānām antaś ca tad-viyoga
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2537: kaunteya, na teṣu bhogeṣu ramate budho viveky avagata-paramārtha-tattvaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2538: atyanta-mūḍhānām eva hi viṣayeṣu ratir dṛśyate, yathā paśu-prabhṛtīnām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2540: ayaṃ ca śreyo-mārga-pratipakṣī kaṣṭatamo doṣaḥ sarvānartha-prāpti-hetur
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2541: durnivāraś ceti tat-parihāre yatnādhikyaṃ kartavyam ity āha bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2543: kāma-krodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ ||BhG_5.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2544: śaknoty utsahata ihaiva jīvann eva yaḥ soḍhuṃ prasahituṃ prāk pūrvam śarīravimokṣaṇāt ā maraṇāt ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2546: 'vayaṃbhāvi hi kāma-krodhodbhavo vegaḥ, anantanimittavān hi saḥ iti yāvat maraṇaṃ tāvat na visrāmbhaṇīya ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2547: kāmaḥ indriyagocaraprāpte iṣṭo viṣaye śrūyamāṇe smaryamāṇe vā anubhūte sukhahetau yā gaṄdhas tṛṣṇā sa kāmaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2548: krodhaś cātmanaḥ pratikūleṣu duḥkha-hetuṣu dṛyamāneṣu śrūyamāṇeṣu smaryamāṇeṣu vā yo dveṣaḥ sa krodhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2549: tau kāma-krodhāv udbhavo yasya vegasya sa kāma-krodhodbhavo vegaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2554: taṃ kāma-krodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ ya utsahate prasahate soḍhuṃ prasahitum, so yukto yogī sukhī ceha loke naraḥ || ||BhGS_5.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2556: kathaṃ-bhūtaś ca brahmaṇi sthito brahma prāpnoti ? ity āha bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2559: yo 'ntaḥ-sukho 'ntar ātmani sukhaṃ yasya so 'ntaḥ-sukhaḥ, tathāntar evātmany ārāma āramaṇam ākrīḍā yasya so 'ntar-ārāmaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2560: tathaivāntar eva ātmany eva jyotiḥ prakāśo yasya so 'ntar-jyotir eva, ya īdṛśaḥ so yogī
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2561: brahma-nirvāṇaṃ brahmaṇi nirvṛtiṃ mokṣam iha jīvann eva brahma-bhūtaḥ sann adhigacchati prāpnoti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2566: labhante brahma-nirvāṇaṃ mokṣam ṛṣayaḥ samyag-darśinaḥ saṃnyāsinaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2568: yatātmānaḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ sarva-bhūta-hite ratāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ hite ānukūlye ratā ahiṃsakā ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_5.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2573: kāma-krodha-viyuktānāṃ kāmaś ca krodhaś ca kāma-krodhau tābhyāṃ viyuktānāṃ yatīnāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ yata-cetasāṃ saṃyatāntaḥ-karaṇānām abhita ubhayato jīvatāṃ mṛtānāṃ ca brahma-nirvāṇaṃ mokṣo vartate viditātmanāṃ vidito jñāta ātmā yeṣāṃ te viditātmanāṃ teṣāṃ viditātmanāṃ samyag-darśinām ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_5.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2578: sattva-śuddhi-jñāna-prāpti-sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa-krameṇa mokṣāya iti bhagavān pade pade 'bravīt, vakṣyati ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2580: samyag-darśanasya antaraṅgaṃ vistareṇa vakṣyāmīti tasya sūtra-sthānīyān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2582: sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2585: vigatecchā-bhaya-krodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ ||BhG_5.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2586: sparśān śabdādīn kṛtvā bahir bāhyān śrotrādi-dvāreṇāntar-buddhau
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2587: praveśitāḥ śabdādayo viṣayās tān acintayato śabdādayo bāhyā bahir eva kṛtā bhavanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2588: tān evaṃ bahiḥ kṛtvā cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ kṛtvety anuṣajyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2590: yatendriya-mano-buddhir yatāni saṃyatānīndriyāṇi mano buddhiś ca yasya sa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2594: deha-saṃsthānān mokṣa-parāyaṇo mokṣa eva param ayanaṃ parā gatir yasya so 'yaṃ mokṣa-parāyaṇo munir bhavet |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2596: ca krodhaś cecchā-bhaya-krodhās te vigatāḥ yasmāt sa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2598: ya evaṃ vartate sadā saṃnyāsī, mukta eva saḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2602: suhṛdaṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati ||BhG_5.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2603: evaṃ samāhita-cittena kiṃ vijñeyam ity ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2605: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ ca kartṛ-rūpeṇa devatā-rūpeṇa ca, sarva-loka-maheśvaraṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2606: sarveṣāṃ lokānāṃ mahāntam īśvaraṃ suhṛdaṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ sarva-prāṇināṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2616: atītānantarādhyāyānte dhyāna-yogasya samyag darśanaṃ praty antaraṅgasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2617: sūtra-bhūtāḥ ślokāḥ sparśān kṛtvā bahiḥ [Gītā 5.27] ity ādaya upadiṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2620: bahiraṅgaṃ karmeti yāvad dhyāna-yogārohaṇa-samarthas tāvad gṛhasthenādhikṛtena kartavyaṃ karma ity atas tat stauti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2621: nanu kim-arthaṃ dhyāna-yogārohaṇa-sīmā-karaṇam, yāvatānuṣṭheyam eva vihitaṃ karma yāvajjīvam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2622: na, ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2625: ārurukṣor ārūḍhasya ca śamaḥ karmaś cobhayaṃ kartavyatvenābhipretaṃ cet syāt tadārurukṣor ārūḍhasya ceti śama-karma-viṣaya-bhedena viśeṣaṇaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2631: tān apekṣyārurukṣor ārūḍhasya ceti viśeṣaṇaṃ vibhāga-karaṇaṃ copapadyata eveti cet, na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2635: ya āsīt pūrvaṃ yogam ārurukṣus tasyaivārūḍhasya śama eva kartavyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2637: ato na yāvaj-jīvaṃ kartavyatva-prāptiḥ kasyacid api karmaṇaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2639: gṛhasthasya cet karmiṇo yogo vihitaḥ ṣaṣṭhe 'dhyāye, sa yoga-vibhraṣṭo 'pi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2640: karma-gatiṃ karma-phalaṃ prāpnotīti tasya nāśāśaṅkānupapannā syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2641: avaśyaṃ hi kṛtaṃ karma kāmyaṃ nityaṃ vā mokṣasya nityatvād anārabhyatve svaṃ phalam ārabhata eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2646: na ca karmaṇi saty ubhaya-vibhraṣṭa-vacanam arthavat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2649: karma kṛtam īśvare saṃnyasyety ataḥ kartari karma phalaṃ nārabhateti cen, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2653: sva-karmaṇāṃ kṛtānām īśvare nyāso mokṣāyaiva, na phalāntarāya yoga-sahitaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2654: yogāc ca vibhraṣṭa ity atas taṃ prati nāśa-śaṅkā yuktaiveti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2657: na cātra gṛhasthasya nirāśīr aparigrahaḥ ity ādi-vacanam anukūlam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2659: anāśrita ity anena karmiṇa eva saṃnyāsitvaṃ yogitvaṃ coktam, pratiṣiddhaṃ ca niragneḥ akriyasya ca saṃnyāsitvaṃ yogitvaṃ ceti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2662: na kevalaṃ niragnir akriya eva saṃnyāsī yogī ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2665: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca bhavatīti stūyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2668: na ca prasiddhaṃ niragner akriyasya paramārtha-saṃnyāsinaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2669: śruti-smṛti-purāṇetihāsa-yoga-śāstreṣu vihitaṃ saṃnyāsitvaṃ yogitvaṃ ca pratiṣedhati bhagavān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2671: saṃnyasya... naiva kurvan na kārayan āste [Gītā 5.13] maunī saṃtuṣṭo yena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2672: kenacit... aniketaḥ sthira-matiḥ [Gītā 12.19] vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ [Gītā 2.71] sarvārambha-parityāgī [Gītā 12.16] iti ca tatra tatra bhagavatā sva-vacanāni darśitāni tair virudhyetaś caturthāśrama-pratiṣedhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2677: anāśritaḥ karma-phalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2678: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ ||BhG_6.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2680: kim ? karma-phalaṃ karmaṇāṃ phalaṃ karma-phalaṃ yat tad-anāśritaḥ, karma-phala-tṛṣṇā-rahita ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2681: yo hi karma-phale tṛṣṇāvān sa karma-phalam āśrito bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2683: evaṃbhūtaḥ san kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ nityaṃ kāmya-viparītam agnihotrādikaṃ karma karoti nirvartayati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2684: | yaḥ kaścid īdṛśaḥ karmī sa karmy antarebhyo viśiṣyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2685: ity evam artham āha - sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ceti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2686: saṃnyāsaḥ parityāgaḥ sa yasyāsti sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2687: yogaś citta-samādhānaṃ sa yasyāsti sa yogī ceti evaṃguṇa-saṃpanno 'yaṃ mantavyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2688: na kevalaṃ niragnir akriya eva saṃnyāsī yogī ceti mantavyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2689: nirgatāḥ agnayaḥ karmāṅga-bhūtā yasmāt sa niragniḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2690: akriyaś cānagni-sādhanāpy avidyamānāḥ kriyās tapo-dānādikā yasyāsāv akriyaḥ ||BhGS_6.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2691: nanu ca niragneḥ akriyasyaiva śruti-smṛti-yoga-śāstreṣu saṃnyāsitvaṃ yogitvaṃ ca prasiddham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2692: katham iha sāgneḥ sa-kriyasya ca saṃnyāsitvaṃ yogitvaṃ cāprasiddham ucyata iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2696: karma-phala-saṃkalpa-saṃnyāsāt saṃnyāsitvam, yogāṅgatvena ca karmānuṣṭhānāt karma-phala-saṃkalpasya ca citta-vikṣepa-hetoḥ parityāgād yogitvaṃ ceti gauṇam ubhayam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2697: na punar mukhyaṃ saṃnyāsitvaṃ yogitvaṃ cābhipretam ity etam arthaṃ darśayitum āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2698: yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2699: na hy asaṃnyasta-saṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaścana ||BhG_6.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2701: saṃnyāsam iti prāhuḥ śruti-smṛti-vidaḥ, yogaṃ karmānuṣṭhāna-lakṣaṇaṃ taṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2705: kīdṛśaṃ sāmānyam aṅgīkṛtya tad-bhāva ucyate ity apekṣāyām idam ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2706: asti hi paramārtha-saṃnyāsena sādṛśyaṃ kartṛ-dvārakaṃ karma-yogasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2710: ayam api karma-yogī karma kurvāṇa eva phala-viṣayaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2712: etam arthaṃ darśayiṣyann āha - na hi yasmād
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2713: asaṃnyasta-saṃkalpo 'saṃnyasto 'parityaktaḥ saṅkalpo 'bhisandhir yena so 'saṃnyasta-saṅkalpaḥ kaścana kaścid api karmī yogī samādhānavān bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2716: tasmād yaḥ kaścana karmī saṃnyasta-phala-saṃkalpo bhavet sa yogī samādhānavān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2720: yogāṅgatvena karmānuṣṭhānāt karma-phala-saṅkalpasya vā citta-vikṣepa-hetoḥ parityāgāt yogitvaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2721: saṃnyāsitvaṃ cety abhipretam ucyate |[*NOTE: This last sentence not found in all editions.]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2723: apekṣya yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍāva [Gītā 6.2] iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2726: phala-nirapekṣaḥ karma-yogo bahiraṅgaṃ sādhanam iti taṃ saṃnyāsatvena stutvādhunā karma-yogasya dhyāna-yoga-sādhanatvaṃ darśayati -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2727: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2735: yogārūḍhasya punas tasyaiva śamar upaśamaḥ sarva-karmabhyo nivṛttiḥ kāraṇaṃ yogārūḍhasya sādhanam ucyate ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2736: yāvad yāvat karmabhya uparamate, tāvat tāvat nirāyāsasya jitendriyasya cittaṃ samādhīyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2737: tathā sati sa jhaṭiti yogārūḍho bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2739: naitādṛśaṃ brāhmaṇasyāsti vittaṃ yathaikatā samatā satyatā ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2740: śīlaṃ sthitir daṇḍa-nidhānam ārjavaṃ tatas tataś coparamaḥ kriyābhyaḥ || [Mbh 12.175.37] iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2742: yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2744: yadā samādhīyamāna-citto yogī hīndriyārtheṣv indriyāṇām arthāḥ śabdādayas teṣv indriyārtheṣu karmasu ca nitya-naimittika-kāmya-pratiṣiddheṣu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2745: prayojanābhāva-buddhyā nānuṣajjate 'nuṣaṅgaṃ kartavyatā-buddhiṃ na karotīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2746: sarva-saṃkalpa-saṃnyāsī sarvān saṃkalpān ihāmutrārtha-kāma-hetūna saṃnyasituṃ śīlam asyeti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2747: | yogārūḍhaḥ prāpta-yoga ity etat, tadā tasmin kāla ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2748: sarva-saṃkalpa-saṃnyāsīti vacanāt sarvāṃś ca kāmān sarvāṇi ca karmāṇi saṃnyasyed ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2749: saṃkalpa-mūlā hi sarve kāmāḥ - saṃkalpa-mūlaḥ kāmo vai yajñāḥ saṃkalpa-saṃbhavāḥ [Manu 2.3]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2750: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpāt tvaṃ hi jāyase |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2751: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tena me na bhaviṣyasi || [Mabh 12.177.25] ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2755: yathā-kāmo bhavati tat-kratur bhavati yat kratur bhavati tat karma kurute
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2757: yad yad dhi kurute jantus tat tat kāmasya ceṣṭitam [Manu 2.4] ity ādi-smṛtibhyaś ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2758: nyāyāc ca - na hi sarva-saṃkalpa-saṃnyāse kaścit spanditum api śaktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2760: sarva-saṃkalpa-saṃnyāsīti vacanāt sarvān kāmān sarvāṇi karmāṇi ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2762: yadaivaṃ yogārūḍhaḥ, tadā tena ātmā udbhṛto bhavati saṃsārād anartha-jātāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2765: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ ||BhG_6.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2766: uddharet saṃsāra-sāgare nimagnam ātmanātmānaṃ tata ut ūrdhvaṃ hared
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2771: na hy anyaḥ kaścit bandhuḥ, yaḥ saṃsāra-muktaye bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2772: bandhur api tāvat mokṣaṃ prati pratikūla eva, snehādi-bandhanāyatanatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2773: tasmāt yuktam avadhāraṇam ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2776: 'pakārī bāhyaḥ śatruḥ so 'pi ātma-prayukta eveti yuktam evāvadhāraṇam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2778: ātmaiva bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmana ity uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2779: tatra kiṃ-lakṣaṇa ātmā ātmano bandhuḥ, kiṃ-lakṣaṇo vā ātmātmano ripur ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2782: bandhur ātmātmanas tasya, tasyātmanaḥ sa ātmā bandhur yenātmanātmaiva jitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2783: ātmā kārya-karaṇa-saṃghāto yena vaśīkṛtaḥ, jitendriya ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2784: anātmanas tv ajitātmanas tu śatrutve śatru-bhāve varteta ātmaiva śatruvat,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2785: yathānātmā śatrur ātmano 'pakārī, tathātmā ātmano 'pakāre varteta ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_6.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2788: jitātmanaḥ kārya-karaṇa-saṃghāta ātmā jito yena sa jitātmā tasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2789: jitātmanaḥ, praśāntasya prasannāntaḥ-karaṇasya sataḥ saṃnyāsinaḥ paramātmā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2791: kiṃ ca śītoṣṇa-sukha-duḥkheṣu tathā māne 'pamāne ca mānāpamānayoḥ pūjā-paribhavayoḥ samaḥ syāt ||BhGS_6.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2794: jñāna-vijñāna-tṛptātmā jñānaṃ śāstrokta-padārthānāṃ parijñānam, vijñānaṃ tu śāstrato jñātānāṃ tathaiva svānubhava-karaṇam, tābhyāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2795: jñāna-vijñānābhyāṃ tṛptaḥ saṃjātālaṃ-pratyayaḥ ātmāntaḥ-karaṇaṃ yasya sa jñāna-vijñāna-tṛptātmā, kūṭāstho 'prakampyaḥ, bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2797: ya īdṛśaḥ, yuktaḥ samāhita iti sa ucyate kathyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2798: sa yogī sama-loṣṭāśma-kāñcanaḥ loṣṭāśma-kāñcanāni samāni yasya saḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2802: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu sama-buddhir viśiṣyate ||BhG_6.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2803: suhṛd ity ādi lokārdham ekaṃ padam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2805: upakartā, mitraṃ snehavān, ariḥ śatruḥ, udāsīno na kasyacit pakṣaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2806: bhajate, madhya-stho yo viruddhayor ubhayoḥ hitaiṣī, dveṣya ātmano 'priyaḥ, bandhuḥ saṃbandhī ity eteṣu sādhuṣu śāstrānuvartiṣu api ca pāpeṣu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2811: yogārūḍhānāṃ sarveṣām ayam uttama ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_6.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2813: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2815: yogī dhyāyī yuñjīta samādadhyāt satataṃ sarvadātmānam antaḥ-karaṇaṃ rahasi ekānte giri-guhādau sthitaḥ san ekākī asahāyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2816: rahasi sthitaḥ ekākī ceti viśeṣaṇāt saṃnyāsaṃ kṛtvā ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2818: ātmā dehaś ca saṃyatau yasya sa yata-cittātmā, nirāśīr vīta-tṛṣṇo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2822: athedānīṃ yogaṃ yuñjataḥ āsanāhāra-vihārādīnāṃ yoga-sādhanatvena niyamo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2823: vaktavyaḥ, prāpta-yogasya lakṣaṇaṃ tat-phalādi ca, ity ata ārabhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2825: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2827: śucau śuddhe vivikte svabhāvataḥ saṃskārato vā, deśe sthāne pratiṣṭhāpya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2828: sthiram acalam ātmana āsanaṃ nātyucchritaṃ nātīva ucchritaṃ nāpy atinīcam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2829: tac ca cailājina-kuśottaraṃ cailam ajinaṃ kuśāś cottare yasminn āsane tad āsanaṃ cailājina-kuśottaram
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2834: tatra tasminn āsana upaviśya yogaṃ yuñjyāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2836: upasaṃhṛtya ekāgraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yata-cittendriya-kriyaś cittaṃ cendriyāṇi ca cittendriyāṇi teṣāṃ kriyāḥ saṃyatā yasya sa yata-cittendriya-kriyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2837: sa kim-arthaṃ yogaṃ yuñjyād ity āha - ātma-viśuddhaye 'ntaḥ-karaṇasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2843: samaṃ kāya-śiro-grīvaṃ kāyaś ca śiraś ca grīvā ca kāya-śiro-grīvaṃ tat samaṃ dhārayan acalaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2847: svaṃ nāsikāgraṃ saṃprekṣya samyak prekṣaṇaṃ darśanaṃ kṛtvaiveti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2854: sva-nāsikāgra-saṃprekṣaṇam eva ced vivakṣitam, manas tatraiva samādhīyeta, nātmani |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2855: ātmani hi manasaḥ samādhānaṃ vakṣyati ātma-saṃsthaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2857: tasmād iva-śabda-lopenākṣṇor dṛṣṭi-saṃnipāta eva saṃprekṣya ity ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2858: diśaś cānavalokayan diśāṃ cāvalokanam antarā kurvan ity etat ||BhGS_6.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2861: manaḥ saṃyamya mac-citto yukta āsīta mat-paraḥ ||BhG_6.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2862: praśāntātmā prakarṣeṇa śāntaḥ ātmāntaḥ-karaṇaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ praśāntātmā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2864: brahmacāriṇo vrataṃ brahmacaryaṃ guru-śuśrūṣā-bhikṣānna-bhukty-ādi tasmin sthitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2866: kiṃ ca, manaḥ saṃyamya manaso vṛttīr upasaṃhṛtya ity etat, mac-citto mayi parameśvare cittaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2867: mac-cittaḥ, yuktaḥ samāhitaḥ sann āsīta upaviśet |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2868: mat-paro 'haṃ paro yasya so 'yaṃ mat-paro bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2869: kaścit rāgī strī-cittaḥ, na tu striyam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2876: yujan samādhānāṃ kurvann evaṃ yathoktena vidhānena sadātmanāṃ sarvadā yogī
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2877: niyata-mānaso niyataṃ saṃyataṃ mānasaṃ mano yasya so 'yaṃ niyata-mānasaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2878: śāntim uparatiṃ nirvāṇa-paramāṃ nirvāṇaṃ mokṣas tat paramā niṣṭhā yasyāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2879: śānteḥ sā nirvāṇa-paramā tāṃ nirvāṇa-paramām. mat-saṃsthāṃ mad-adhīnām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2882: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2884: nātyaśnata ātma-saṃmitam anna-parimāṇam atītyāśnato 'tyaśnato na yogo 'sti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2886: yad u ha vā ātma-saṃmitam annaṃ tad avati tan na hinasti yad bhūyo hinasti tad yat kanīyo 'nnaṃ na tad avati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2888: tasmāt yogī na ātma-saṃmitād annād adhikaṃ nyūnaṃ vāśnīyāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2893: vāyoḥ saṃcaraṇārthaṃ tu caturtham avaśeṣayet || ity ādi parimāṇam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2894: tathā - na cātisvapna-śīlasya yogo bhavati naiva cātimātraṃ jāgrato bhavati cārjuna ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2898: yuktāhāra-vihārasya āhriyata ity āhāro 'nnam, viharaṇaṃ vihāraḥ pāda-kramaḥ, tau yuktau niyata-parimāṇau yasya sa yuktāhāra-vihāras tasya,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2899: tathā yukta-ceṣṭasya yuktā niyatā ceṣṭā yasya karmasu tasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2901: yukta-svapnāvabodhasya yuktau svapnaś cāvabodhaś ca tau niyata-kālau yasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2903: yogino yogo bhavati duḥkhahā duḥkhāni sarvāṇi hantīti duḥkhahā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2905: athādhunā kadā yukto bhavati ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2907: niḥspṛhaḥ sarva-kāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā ||BhG_6.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2908: yadā viniyataṃ viśeṣeṇa niyataṃ saṃyatam ekāgratām āpannaṃ cittaṃ hitvā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2909: bāhyārtha-cintām ātmany eva kevale 'vatiṣṭhate, svātmani sthitiṃ labhate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2911: niḥspṛhaḥ sarva-kāmebhyo nirgatā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-viṣayebhyaḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā yasya yoginaḥ sa yuktaḥ samāhita ity ucyate tadā tasmin kāle
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2912: tasya yoginaḥ samāhitaṃ yat cittaṃ tasyopamocyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2913: yathā dīpo nivāta-stho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2915: yathā dīpaḥ pradīpo nivāta-stho nivāte vāta-varjite deśe sthito neṅgate na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2916: calati, sopamā upamīyate 'nayety upamā yogajñaiś citta-pracāra-darśibhiḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2917: smṛtā cintitā yogino yata-cittasya saṃyatāntaḥ-karaṇasya yuñjato yogam anutiṣṭhata ātmanaḥ samādhim anutiṣṭhata ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_6.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2921: yatra yasmin kāle uparamate cittam uparatiṃ gacchati niruddhaṃ sarvato
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2922: nivārita-pracāraṃ yoga-sevayā yogānuṣṭhānena, yatra caiva yasmiṃś ca kāla ātmanā samādhi-pariśuddhenāntaḥ-karaṇenātmānaṃ paraṃ caitanyaṃ jyotiḥ-svarūpaṃ paśyann upalabhamānaḥ sva evātmani tuṣyati tuṣṭiṃ bhajate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2924: sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhi-grāhyam atīndriyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2925: vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ ||BhG_6.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2926: sukham ātyantikam atyantam eva bhavatīty ātyantikam anantam ity arthaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2927: yat tat buddhi-grāhyaṃ buddhyaiva indriya-nirapekṣayā gṛhyate iti buddhi-grāhyam atīndriyam indriya-gocarātītam aviṣaya-janitam ity arthaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2928: vetti tad īdṛśaṃ sukham anubhavati yatra yasmin kāle, na caivāyaṃ vidvān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2929: ātma-svarūpe sthitas tasmān naiva calati tattvatas tattva-svarūpān na pracyavata ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2931: yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2932: yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate ||BhG_6.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2933: yaṃ labdhvā yam ātma-lābhaṃ labdhvā prāpyaś cāparam anyal lābhaṃ lābhāntaraṃ tato 'dhikam astīti na manyate na cintayati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2935: ātma-tattve sthito duḥkhena śastra-nipātādi-lakṣaṇena guruṇā mahatāpi na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2937: yatroparamate ity ādyārabhya yāvadbhir viśeṣaṇair viśiṣṭa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2941: taṃ vidyād vijānīyād duḥkha-saṃyoga-viyogaṃ duḥkhaiḥ saṃyogo duḥkha-saṃyogaḥ, tena viyogo duḥkha-saṃyoga-viyogaḥ, taṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2942: duḥkha-saṃyoga-viyogaṃ yoga ity eva saṃjñitaṃ viparīta-lakṣaṇena vidyād vijānīyād ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2943: yoga-phalam upasaṃhṛtya punar anvārambheṇa yogasya kartavyatocyate niścayānirvedayor yoga-sādhanatva-vidhānārtham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2945: yathokta-phalo yogo niścayenādhyavasāyena yoktavyo 'nirviṇṇa-cetasā na nirviṇṇam anirviṇṇam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2946: kiṃ tat ? cetas tena nirveda-rahitena cetasā cittenety arthaḥ ||BhGS_6.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2950: saṃkalpa-prabhavān saṃkalpaḥ prabhavo yeṣāṃ kāmānāṃ te saṃkalpa-prabhavāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2951: kāmās tān tyaktvā parityajya sarvān aśeṣato nirlepena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2953: viveka-yuktena indriya-grāmam indriya-samudāyaṃ viniyamya niyamanaṃ kṛtvā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2956: ātmasaṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃcid api cintayet ||BhG_6.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2957: śanaiḥ śanair na sahasoparamed uparatiṃ kuryāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2959: kiṃ-viśiṣṭayā ? dhṛti-gṛhītayā dhṛtyā dhairyeṇa gṛhītayā dhṛti-gṛhītayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2962: sarvaṃ na tato 'nyat kiṃcid astīty evam ātma-saṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2965: tatra evam ātma-saṃsthaṃ manaḥ kartuṃ pravṛtto yogī -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2966: yato yato niścarati mana cañcalam asthiram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2967: tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet ||BhG_6.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2968: yato yato yasmād yasmān nimittāt śabdāder niścarati nirgacchati svabhāva-doṣān manaś cañcalam atyarthaṃ calam, ata evāsthiram, tatas tatas tasmāt tasmāt śabdāder nimittān niyamya tat-tan-nimittaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2970: yāthātmya-nirūpaṇena ābhāsīkṛtya vairāgya-bhāvanayā ca etat mana ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet ātma-vaśyatām āpādayet |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2971: evaṃ yogābhyāsa-balāt yogina ātmany eva praśāmyati manaḥ ||BhGS_6.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2972: praśānta-manasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2974: praśāntamanasaṃ prakarṣeṇa śāntaṃ mano yasya saḥ praśāntamanās taṃ praśāntamanasaṃ hi enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamaṃ nitiśayam upaiti upagacchati śānta-rajasaṃ prakṣīṇa-mohādi-kleśa-rajasam ity arthaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2975: brahma-bhūtaṃ jīvanmuktam brahmaiva sarvam ity evaṃ niścayavantaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2979: yuñjann evaṃ yathoktena krameṇa yogī yogāntarāya-varjitaḥ sadā sarvadātmānaṃ vigata-kalmaṣo vigata-pāpaḥ, sukhenānāyāsena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2980: brahma-saṃsparśaṃ brahmaṇā pareṇa saṃsparśo yasya tat brahma-saṃsparrśaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2981: sukham atyantam antam atītya vartata ity atyantam utkṛṣṭaṃ niratiśayam aśnute vyāpnoti ||BhGS_6.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2986: sarva-bhūta-sthaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthitaṃ svam ātmānaṃ sarva-bhūtāni ca ātmani brahmādīni stamba-paryantāni ca sarva-bhūtāni ātmany ekatāṃ gatāni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2987: īkṣate paśyati yoga-yuktātmā samāhitāntaḥ-karaṇaḥ sarvatra sama-darśanaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2988: sarveṣu brahmādi-sthāvarānteṣu viṣameṣu sarva-bhūteṣu samaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ brahmātmaikatva-viṣayaṃ darśanaṃ jñānaṃ yasya sa sarvatra sama-darśanaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2990: yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2991: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati ||BhG_6.30||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2992: yo māṃ paśyati vāsudevaṃ sarvasyātmānaṃ sarvatra sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarvaṃ ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2993: brahmādi-bhūta-jātaṃ mayi sarvātmani paśyati, tasya evaṃ ātmaikatva-darśino 'ham īśvaro na praṇaśyāmi na parokṣatāṃ gamiṣyāmi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2994: sa ca me na praṇaśyati sa ca vidvān me mama vāsudevasya na praṇaśyati na parokṣo bhavati, tasya ca mama caikātmakatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2995: svātmā hi nāmātmanaḥ priya eva bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2997: ity etat pūrva-lokārthaṃ samyag darśanam anūdya tat-phalaṃ mokṣo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2999: sarva-bhūta-sthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3000: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate ||BhG_6.31||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3001: sarvathā sarva-prakāraiḥ vartamāno 'pi samyag-darśī yogī mayi vaiṣṇave
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3002: parame pade vartate, nityam ukta eva saḥ, na mokṣaṃ prati kenacit pratibadhyate ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3005: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ ||BhG_6.32||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3007: tasyā upamāyā bhāva aupamyaṃ tenātmaupamyena, sarvatra sarva-bhūteṣu samaṃ tulyaṃ paśyati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3008: 'rjuna, sa ca kiṃ samaṃ paśyatīty ucyate - yathā mama sukham iṣṭaṃ tathā sarva-prāṇināṃ sukham anukūlam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3010: yadi vā yac ca duḥkhaṃ mama pratikūlam aniṣṭaṃ yathā tathā sarva-prāṇināṃ duḥkham aniṣṭaṃ pratikūlaṃ ity evam ātmaupamyena sukha-duḥkhe 'nukūla-pratikūle tulyatayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3011: sarva-bhūteṣu samaṃ paśyati, na kasyacit pratikūlam ācarati, ahiṃsaka ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3012: yaḥ evam ahiṃsakaḥ samyag darśana-niṣṭhaḥ, sa yogī parama utkṛṣṭo mato 'bhipretaḥ sarva-yogināṃ madhye ||BhGS_6.32||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3014: ālakṣya śuśruṣur dhruvaṃ tat-prāpty-upāyam arjuna uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3015: yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3016: etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām ||BhG_6.33||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3017: yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena samatvena he madhusūdana etasya yogasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi nopalabhe, cañcalatvān manasaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3020: cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3021: tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram ||BhG_6.34||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3024: bhakta-jana-pāpādi-doṣākarṣāṇāt kṛṣṇaḥ, tasya saṃbuddhiḥ he kṛṣṇa |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3025: hi yasmāt manaś cañcalaṃ na kevalam atyarthaṃ cañcalam, pramāthi ca pramathana-śīlam, pramathnāti śarīram indriyāṇi ca vikṣipat sat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3027: kiṃ ca - balavat prabalam, na kenacit niyantuṃ śakyam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3030: tasya evaṃbhūtasya manaso 'haṃ nigrahaṃ nirodhaṃ manye vāyor iva yathā vāyor duṣkaro nigrahas tato 'pi duṣkaraṃ manye ity abhiprāyaḥ ||BhGS_6.34||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3031: śrī-bhagavān uvāca, evam etad yathā bravīṣi -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3033: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇaś ca gṛhyate ||BhG_6.35||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3034: asaṃśayaṃ nāsti saṃśayo mano durnigrahaṃ calam ity atra he mahābāho |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3035: kiṃtv abhyāsena tv abhyāso nāmaś citta-bhūmau kasyāṃcit
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3039: tena ca vairāgyeṇa gṛhyate vikṣepa-rūpaḥ pracāraś cittasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3040: evaṃ tan mano gṛhyate nigṛhyate nirudhyata ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_6.35||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3045: asaṃyatātmā tenāsaṃyatātmanā yogo duṣprāpo duḥkhena prāpyateti me matiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3046: yas tu punar vaśyātmābhyāsa-vairāgyābhyāṃ vaśyatvam āpāditaḥ ātmā mano yasya so 'yaṃ vaśyātmā tena vaśyātmanā tu yatatā bhūyo 'pi prayatnaṃ kurvatā śakyo 'vāptuṃ yogar upāyato yathoktād upāyāt ||BhGS_6.36||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3048: saṃnyastāni, yoga-siddhi-phalaṃ ca mokṣa-sādhanaṃ samyag darśanaṃ na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3049: prāptam iti, yogī yoga-mārgāt maraṇa-kāle calita-citta iti tasya nāśam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3052: aprāpya yoga-saṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati ||BhG_6.37||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3053: ayatir aprayatnavān yoga-mārge śraddhayāstikya-buddhyā copeto yogād anta-kāle ca calitaṃ mānasaṃ mano yasya sa calita-mānaso bhraṣṭa-smṛtiḥ so
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3054: 'prāpya yoga-saṃsiddhiṃ yoga-phalaṃ samyag-darśanaṃ kāṃ gatiṃ he kṛṣṇa gacchati ||BhGS_6.37||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3057: kaścit kiṃ na ubhaya-vibhraṣṭaḥ karma-mārgāt yoga-mārgāc ca vibhraṣṭaḥ san
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3058: chinnābhram iva naśyati, kiṃ vā na naśyaty apratiṣṭho nirāśrayo he mahābāho vimūḍhaḥ san brahmaṇaḥ pathi brahma-prāpti-mārge ||BhGS_6.38||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3059: etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇaś chettum arhasy aśeṣataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3060: tvad-anyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya chettā na hy upapadyate ||BhG_6.39||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3061: etan me mama saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇaś chettum apanetum arhasy aśeṣataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3063: tvatto 'nyaḥ ṛṣir devo vā cchettā nāśayitā saṃśayasyāsya na hi yasmād
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3065: atas tvam eva cchettum arhasīty arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3067: pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3068: na hi kalyāṇa-kṛt kaścid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati ||BhG_6.40||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3069: he pārtha naiva iha loke nāmutra parasmin vā loke vināśas tasya vidyate nāsti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3070: nāśo nāma pūrvasmāt hīnajanmaprāptiḥ sa yogabhraṣṭasya nāsti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3071: na hi yasmāt kalyāṇakṛt śubhakṛt kaścit durgatiṃ kutsitāṃ gatiṃ he tāta,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3072: tanoti ātmānaṃ putrarūpeṇeti pitā tāta ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3078: prāpya puṇya-kṛtāṃ lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3080: yoga-mārge pravṛttaḥ saṃnyāsī sāmarthyāt prāpya gatvā puṇya-kṛtām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3081: aśvamedhādi-yājināṃ lokān, tatra coṣitvā vāsam anubhūya śāśvatīr nityāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3082: samāḥ saṃvatsarān, tad-bhoga-kṣaye śucīnāṃ yathokta-kāriṇāṃ śrīmatāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3084: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3085: etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam ||BhG_6.42||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3086: athavā śrīmatāṃ kulāt anyasmin yoginām eva daridrāṇāṃ kule bhavati jāyate dhīmatāṃ buddhimatām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3087: etat hi janma, yat daridrāṇāṃ yogināṃ kule,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3088: durlabhataraṃ duḥkha-labhyataraṃ pūrvam apekṣya loke janma yad īdṛśaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3092: yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana ||BhG_6.43||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3093: tatra yogināṃ kule taṃ buddhi-saṃyogaṃ buddhyā saṃyogaṃ buddhi-saṃyogaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3094: labhate paurvadehikaṃ pūrvasmin dehe bhavaṃ paurvadehikam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3095: yatate ca prayatnaṃ ca karoti tatas tasmāt pūrva-kṛtāt saṃskārāt bhūyo bahutaraṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3098: pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3100: yaḥ pūrva-janmani kṛto 'bhyāsaḥ sa pūrvābhyāsaḥ, tenaiva balavatā hriyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3101: saṃsiddhau hi yasmād avaśo 'pi sa yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3102: na kṛtaṃ ced yogābhyāsajāt saṃskārāt balavattaram adharmādi-lakṣaṇaṃ karma, tadā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3105: tena yogajo 'pi saṃskāro 'bhibhūyata eva, tat-kṣaye tu yogajaḥ saṃskāraḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3106: svayam eva kāryam ārabhate, na dīrgha-kālasthasyāpi vināśas tasyāstīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3107: ato jijñāsur api yogasya svarūpaṃ jñātum icchann api yoga-mārge
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3108: pravṛttaḥ saṃnyāsī yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ, sāmarthyāt so 'pi śabda-brahma
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3110: kim uta buddhvā yo yogaṃ tan-niṣṭho 'bhyāsaṃ kuryāt ||BhGS_6.44||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3114: prayatnād yatamānaḥ, adhikaṃ yatamāna ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3117: anekeṣu janmasu kiṃcit kiṃcit saṃskāra-jātam upacitya tena upacitenāneka-janma-kṛtena saṃsiddho 'neka-janma-saṃsiddhas tataḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3118: labdha-samyag-darśanaḥ san yāti parāṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ gatim ||BhGS_6.45||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3121: karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna ||BhG_6.46||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3122: tapasvibhyo 'dhiko yogī, jñānibhyo 'pi jñānam atra śāstrārtha-pāṇḍityam,
