GSP33bhgsbh_u:3125: karma, tadvadbhyo 'dhiko yogī viśiṣṭo yasmāt tasmād yogī bhavārjuna
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3127: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ ||BhG_6.47||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3128: yoginām api sarveṣāṃ rūdrādityādi-dhyāna-parāṇāṃ madhye mad-gatena mayi vāsudeve samāhitenāntarātmanāntaḥ-karaṇena śraddhāvān śraddadhānaḥ san
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3129: bhajate sevate yo mām, sa me mama yuktatamo 'tiśayena yukto mato 'bhipreta
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3139: śraddhāvānbhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ [Gītā 6.47]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3140: iti praśna-bījam upanyasya, svayam eva īdṛśaṃ madīyaṃ tattvam, evaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3141: mad-gatāntar-ātmā syād ity etat vivakṣuḥ śrī-bhagavān uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3142: mayy āsaktamanāḥ pārtha yogaṃ yuñjan madāśrayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3143: asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ māṃ yathā jñāsyasi tac chṛṇu ||BhG_7.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3144: mayi vakṣyamāṇa-viśeṣaṇe parameśvare āsaktaṃ mano yasya saḥ mayy
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3145: āsakta-manāḥ, he pārtha ! yogaṃ yuñjan manaḥ-samādhānaṃ kurvan, mad-āśrayo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3146: 'ham eva parameśvaraḥ āśrayo yasya saḥ mad-āśrayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3147: yo hi kaścit puruṣārthena kenacit arthī bhavati sa tat-sādhanaṃ karmāgnihotrādi tapo dānaṃ vā kiṃcid āśrayaṃ pratipadyate, ayaṃ tu yogī mām evāśrayaṃ pratipadyate, hitvānyat sādhanāntaraṃ mayy eva āsakta-manā bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3148: yas tvaṃ evaṃ-bhūtaḥ san asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ samastaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3149: vibhūti-bala-śakty-aiśvaryādi-guṇa-saṃpannaṃ māṃ yathā yena prakāreṇa jñāsyasi saṃśayam antareṇaivam eva bhagavān iti, tat sṛṇu ucyamānaṃ mayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3151: jñānaṃ te 'haṃ sa-vijñānam idaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3152: yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo 'nyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate ||BhG_7.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3153: jñānaṃ te tubhyam ahaṃ sa-vijñānaṃ vijñāna-sahitaṃ svānubhava-yuktam idaṃ vakṣyāmi kathayiṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ kārtsnyena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3154: taj jñānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ stauti śrotuḥ abhimukhīkaraṇāya - yaj jñātvā yaj jñānaṃ jñātvā neha bhūyaḥ punar anyat jñātavyaṃ puruṣārtha-sādhanam avaśiṣyate nāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3156: mat-tattva-jño yaḥ, sa sarvajño bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3160: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3161: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ ||BhG_7.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3162: manuṣyāṇāṃ madhye sahasreṣu anekeṣu kaścit yatati prayatnaṃ karoti siddhaye siddhy-artham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3163: teṣāṃ yatatām api siddhānām, siddhā eva hi te ye mokṣāya yatante, teṣāṃ kaścid eva hi māṃ vetti tattvato yathāvat ||BhGS_7.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3165: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3166: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā ||BhG_7.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3169: tathāb-ādayo 'pi tanmātrāṇy eva ucyante - āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ kham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3170: mana iti manasaḥ kāraṇam ahaṃkāro gṛhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3175: viṣa-saṃyuktam annaṃ viṣam ity ucyate, evam ahaṃkāra-vāsanāvad avyaktaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3176: mūla-kāraṇam ahaṃkāra ity ucyate, pravartakatvāt ahaṃkārasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3177: ahaṃkāra eva hi sarvasya pravṛtti-bījaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ loke |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3178: itīyaṃ yathoktā prakṛtir me mamaiśvarī māyā-śaktir aṣṭadhā bhinnā bhedam āgatā ||BhGS_7.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3179: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3183: 'syāḥ yathoktāyās tv anyāṃ viśuddhāṃ prakṛtiṃ mamātma-bhūtāṃ viddhi me parāṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ jīva-bhūtāṃ kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3184: prāṇa-dhāraṇa-nimitta-bhūtāṃ he mahābāho, yayā prakṛtyedaṃ dhāryate jagad
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3187: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā ||BhG_7.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3188: etad-yonīni ete parāpare kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇe prakṛtī yonir yeṣāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3189: bhūtānāṃ tāni etad-yonīni, bhūtāni sarvāṇīti evam upadhāraya jānīhi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3190: yasmāt mama prakṛti yoniḥ kāraṇaṃ sarva-bhūtānām, ato 'haṃ kṛtsnasya samastasya jagataḥ prabhava utpattiḥ pralayo vināśas tathā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3191: prakṛti-dvaya-dvāreṇāhaṃ sarvajña īśvaro jagataḥ kāraṇam ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3193: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiṃcid asti dhanaṃjaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3194: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva ||BhG_7.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3195: mattaḥ parameśvarāt parataram anyat kāraṇāntaraṃ kiṃcit nāsti na vidyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3196: aham eva jagat-kāraṇam ity arthaḥ, he dhanaṃjaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3197: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt mayi parameśvare sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarvam idaṃ jagat protam anusyūtam anugatam anuviddhaṃ grathitam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3198: dīrgha-tantuṣu paṭavat, sūtre ca maṇi-gaṇā iva ||BhGS_7.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3199: kena kena dharmeṇa viśiṣṭo tvayi sarvam idaṃ protam ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3201: praṇavaḥ sarva-vedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu ||BhG_7.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3202: raso 'ham, apāṃ yaḥ sāraṃ sa rasaḥ, tasmin rasa-bhūte mayi āpaḥ protā ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3204: yathāham apsu rasaḥ, evaṃ prabhāsmi śaśi-sūryayoḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3205: | praṇava oṃkāraḥ sarva-vedeṣu, tasmin praṇava-bhūte mayi sarve vedāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3207: tathā khe ākāśe śabdaḥ sāra-bhūtaḥ, tasmin mayi khaṃ protam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3208: tathā pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya bhāvaḥ pauruṣaṃ yataḥ puṃ-buddhir nṛṣu, tasmin mayi puruṣāḥ protāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3209: gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3213: puṇyatvaṃ gandhasya svabhāvata eva pṛthivyāṃ darśitam ab-ādiṣu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3217: | tejaś ca dīptiś cāsmi vibhāvasau agnau |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3219: yena jīvanti sarvāṇi bhūtāni tat jīvanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3220: tapaś cāsmi tapasviṣu, tasmin tapasi mayi tapasvinaḥ protāḥ ||BhGS_7.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3221: bījaṃ māṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3222: buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham ||BhG_7.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3223: bījaṃ praroha-kāraṇaṃ māṃ viddhi sarva-bhūtānāṃ he pārtha sanātanaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3225: kiṃ ca, buddhir viveka-śaktir antaḥ-karaṇasya buddhimatāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3233: kāmas tṛṣṇā-saṃnikṛṣṭeṣu viṣayeṣu, rāgo rañjanā prāpteṣu viṣayeṣu - tābhyāṃ kāma-rāgābhyāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3238: dharmeṇa śāstrārthenāviruddho yaḥ prāṇiṣu bhūteṣu kāmaḥ, yathā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3242: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3243: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi ||BhG_7.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3244: ye caiva sāttvikāḥ sattva-nirvṛttā bhāvāḥ padārthāḥ, rājasāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3245: rajo-nirvṛttās tāmasās tamo-nirvṛttāś ca, ye kecit prāṇināṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3246: sva-karma-vaśāt jāyante bhāvāḥ, tān matta eva jāyamānān iti evaṃ viddhi sarvān samastān eva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3247: evaṃ yady api te matto jāyante, tathāpi na tv ahaṃ teṣu tad-adhīnas tad-vaśaḥ, yathā saṃsāriṇaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3251: sarva-bhūtātmānaṃ nirguṇaṃ saṃsāra-doṣa-bīja-pradāha-kāraṇaṃ māṃ nābhijānāti jagad ity anukrośaṃ darśayati bhagavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3254: tribhir guṇa-mayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3255: mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam ||BhG_7.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3256: tribhir guṇa-mayaiḥ guṇa-vikāraiḥ rāga-dveṣa-mohādi-prakārair bhāvaiḥ padārthair ebhir yathoktaiḥ sarvam idaṃ prāṇi-jātaṃ jagan mohitam avivekitām āpāditaṃ san nābhijānāni mām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3257: ebhyo yathoktebhyo guṇebhyaḥ paraṃ vyatiriktaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ cāvyayaṃ vyaya-rahitaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3259: kathaṃ punar daivīm etāṃ triguṇātmikāṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ māyām atikrāmatīty ucyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3260: daivī hy eṣā guṇa-mayī mama māyā duratyayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3261: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te ||BhG_7.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3262: daivī devasya mameśvarasya viṣṇoḥ svabhāva-bhūtā hi yasmād eṣā yathoktā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3263: guṇa-mayī mama māyā duratyayā duḥkhenātyayo 'tikramaṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā duratyayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3264: tatraivaṃ sati sarva-dharmān parityajya mām eva māyāvinaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3265: svātma-bhūtaṃ sarvātmanā ye prapadyante te māyām etāṃ sarva-bhūta-mohinīṃ taranty atikrāmanti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3268: yadi tvāṃ prapannāḥ māyām etāṃ taranti, kasmāt tvām eva sarve na prapadyante ? ity ucyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3269: na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3271: na māṃ parameśvaraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ duṣkṛtinaḥ pāpa-kāriṇaḥ mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamā narāṇāṃ madhye 'dhamāḥ nikṛṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3276: ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha ||BhG_7.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3277: catur-vidhāś catuḥ-prakārā bhajante sevante māṃ janāḥ sukṛtinaḥ puṇya-karmāṇo he 'rjuna
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3283: jñānī viṣṇos tattva-vic ca he bharatarṣabha ||BhGS_7.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3285: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ ||BhG_7.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3286: teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ madhye jñānī tattva-vit tattva-vittvān nitya-yukto bhavati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3289: viśiṣyate viśeṣam ādhikyam āpadyate, atiricyata ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3290: priyo hi yasmād aham ātmā jñānino 'tas tasyāham atyarthaṃ priyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3291: prasiddhaṃ hi loke ātmā priyo bhavatīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3292: tasmāj jñānina ātmatvād vāsudevaḥ priyo bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3293: sa ca jñānī mama vāsudevasya ātmaiveti mamātyarthaṃ priyaḥ ||BhGS_7.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3294: na tarhy ārtādayas trayo vāsudevasya priyāḥ ? na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3296: udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3297: āsthitaḥ sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim ||BhG_7.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3300: na hi kaścin mad-bhakto vāsudevasyāpriyo bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3301: jñānī tv atyarthaṃ priyo bhavatīti viśeṣaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3302: tat kasmāt ? ity ata āha - jñānī tv ātmaiva, nānyo matta iti me mama mataṃ niścayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3303: āsthita āroḍhuṃ pravṛttaḥ sa jñānī hi yasmād aham eva bhagavān vāsudevo nānyo 'smīty evaṃ yuktātmā samāhita-cittaḥ san mām eva paraṃ brahma gantavyam anuttamāṃ gatiṃ gantuṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3306: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3307: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ ||BhG_7.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3308: bahūnāṃ janmanāṃ jñānārtha-saṃskārāśrayāṇām ante samāptau jñānavān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3309: prāpta-paripāka-jñāno māṃ vāsudevaṃ pratyag-ātmānaṃ pratyakṣataḥ prapadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3311: ya evaṃ sarvātmānaṃ māṃ nārāyaṇaṃ pratipadyate, sa mahātmā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3313: ataḥ sudurlabhaḥ, manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣv iti hy uktam ||BhGS_7.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3314: ātmaiva sarvṃ vāsudeva ity evam apratipattau kāraṇam ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3316: taṃ taṃ niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā ||BhG_7.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3318: apahṛta-viveka-vijñānāḥ prapadyante 'nya-devatāḥ prāpnuvanti vāsudevād ātmano 'nyā devatāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3319: taṃ taṃ niyamaṃ devatārādhane prasiddho yo yo niyamas taṃ tam āsthāya āśritya prakṛtyā svabhāvena janmāntarārjita-saṃskāra-viśeṣeṇa niyatāḥ niyamitāḥ svayātmīyayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3321: yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3322: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham ||BhG_7.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3323: yo yaḥ kāmī yāṃ yāṃ devatā-tanuṃ śraddhayā saṃyukto bhaktaś ca sann arcituṃ pūjayitum icchati, tasya tasya kāmino 'calāṃ sthirāṃ śraddhāṃ tām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3325: yayaiva pūrvaṃ pravṛttaḥ svabhāvato yo yāṃ devatā-tanuṃ śraddhayārcitum icchati -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3326: sa tayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyā rādhanam īhate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3327: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān hi tān ||BhG_7.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3328: sa tayā mad-vihitayā śraddhayā yuktaḥ san tasyā devatā-tanvā rādhanam ārādhanam īhate ceṣṭate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3329: labhate ca tatas tasyā ārādhitāyā devatā-tanvāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3330: kāmān īpsitān mayaiva parameśvareṇa sarvajñena karma-phala-vibhāga-jñatayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3331: vihitān nirmitān tān, hi yasmāt te bhagavatā vihitāḥ kāmās tasmāt tān avaśyaṃ labhate ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3332: hitān iti pada-cchede hitatvaṃ kāmānām upacaritaṃ kalpyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3334: yasmād antavat sādhana-vyāpārāvivekinaḥ kāminaś ca te |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3336: antavat tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpa-medhasām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3337: devān deva-yajo yānti mad-bhaktā yānti mām api ||BhG_7.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3338: antavad vināśi tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpa-medhasām alpa-prajñānām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3339: devān deva-yajo yānti devān yajantīti deva-yajaḥ, te devān yānti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3341: evaṃ samāne 'py āyāse mām eva na prapadyante 'nanta-phalāya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3342: aho khalu kaṣṭaṃ vartata ity anukrośaṃ darśayati bhagavān ||BhGS_7.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3343: kiṃ-nimittaṃ mām eva na prapadyanta ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3344: avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3346: avyaktam aprakāśaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ prakāśaṃ gatam idānīṃ manyante māṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3347: nitya-prasiddham īśvaram api santam abuddhayo 'vivekinaḥ paraṃ bhāvaṃ param ātma-svarūpam ajānanto 'vivekinaḥ mamāvyayaṃ vyaya-rahitam anuttamaṃ niratiśayaṃ madīyaṃ bhāvam ajānanto manyanta ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_7.24||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3350: mūḍho 'yaṃ nābhijānāti loko mām ajam avyayam ||BhG_7.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3351: nāhaṃ prakāśaḥ sarvasya lokasya, keṣāṃcid eva mad-bhaktānāṃ prakāśo 'ham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3353: yoga-māyā-samāvṛto yogo guṇānāṃ yuktir ghaṭanaṃ saiva māyā yoga-māyā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3354: tayā yogamāyayā samāvṛtaḥ, saṃchanna ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3355: ata eva mūḍho loko 'yaṃ nābhijānāti mām ajam avyayam ||BhGS_7.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3357: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaścana ||BhG_7.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3358: yayā yogamāyayā samāvṛtaṃ māṃ loko nābhijānāti, nāsau yogamāyā madīyā satī mameśvarasya māyāvino jñānaṃ pratibadhnāti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3360: yataḥ evam, ataḥ -- ahaṃ tu veda jāne samatītāni samatikrāntāni bhūtāni, vartamānāni cārjuna, bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni vedāham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3361: | māṃ tu veda na kaścana mad-bhaktaṃ mac-charaṇam ekaṃ muktvā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3363: kena punar mat-tattva-vedana-pratibandhena pratibaddhāni santi jāyamānāni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3364: sarva-bhūtāni māṃ na vidanti ? ity apekṣāyām idam āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3370: keneti viśeṣāpekṣāyām idam āha - dvandva-mohena dvandva-nimitto moho
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3376: sukha-duḥkha-tad-dhetu-saṃprāptyā labdhātmakau bhavataḥ, tadā tau sarva-bhūtānāṃ prajñāyāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3380: kim u vaktavyaṃ tābhyām āviṣṭa-buddheḥ saṃmūḍhasya pratyag-ātmani bahu-pratibandhe jñānaṃ notpadyateti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3382: bharatānvayaja, sarva-bhūtāni saṃmohitāni santi saṃmohaṃ saṃmūḍhatāṃ sarge janmani, utpatti-kāle ity etat, yānti gacchanti he paraṃtapa |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3384: eva sarva-bhūtāni jāyamānāni jāyanta ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3386: dvandva-mohena pratibaddha-prajñānāni sarva-bhūtāni saṃmohitāni mām ātma-bhūtaṃ na jānanti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3387: ata eva ātma-bhāvena māṃ na bhajante
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3388: ke punar anena dvandva-mohena nirmuktāḥ santas tvāṃ viditvā yathā-śāstram
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3389: ātma-bhāve bhajanta ity apekṣitam arthaṃ darśayitum ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3390: yeṣāṃ tv anta-gataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇya-karmaṇām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3392: yeṣāṃ tu punar anta-gataṃ samāpta-prāyaṃ kṣīṇaṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3393: puṇya-karmaṇāṃ puṇyaṃ karma yeṣāṃ sattva-śuddhi-kāraṇaṃ vidyate te puṇya-karmāṇas teṣāṃ puṇya-karmaṇām, te dvandva-moha-nirmuktā yathoktena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3394: dvandva-mohena nirmuktā bhajante māṃ paramātmanāṃ dṛḍha-vratāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3395: evam eva paramārtha-tattvaṃ nānyathety evaṃ sarva-parityāga-vratena niścita-vijñānā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3399: te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam ||BhG_7.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3400: jarā-maraṇa-mokṣāya jarā-maraṇayor mokṣārthaṃ māṃ parameśvaram āśritya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3401: mat-samāhita-cittāḥ santo yatanti prayatante ye, te yad brahma paraṃ tad viduḥ kṛtsnaṃ samastam adhyātmaṃ pratyag-ātma-viṣayaṃ vastu tad viduḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3403: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3404: prayāṇa-kāle 'pi ca māṃ te vidur yukta-cetasaḥ ||BhG_7.30||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3406: sahādhibhūtādhidaivena vartata iti sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ ca māṃ ye viduḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3407: sādhiyajñaṃ ca sahādhiyajñena sādhiyajñaṃ ye viduḥ, prayāṇa-kāle
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3417: te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam ity ādinā bhagavatārjunasya praśna-bījāni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3420: kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3421: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate ||BhG_8.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3424: eṣāṃ praśnānāṃ yathā-kramaṃ nirṇayāya śrī-bhagavān uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3427: akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīty akṣaraṃ para ātmā, etasya vākṣarasya praśāsane gārgi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3429: oṃkārasya ca om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma [Gītā 8.13]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3431: paramam iti ca niratiśaye brahmaṇy akṣare upapannataram viśeṣaṇam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3438: bhūta-bhāvodbhava-karo bhūtānāṃ bhāvo bhūta-bhāvas tasya udbhavo bhūta-bhāvodbhavas taṃ karotīti bhūta-bhāvodbhava-karaḥ, bhūta-vastūtpatti-kara ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3439: visargo visarjanaṃ devatoddeśena caru-puroḍāśāder dravyasya parityāgaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3440: sa eṣa visarga-lakṣaṇo yajñaḥ karma-saṃjñitaḥ karma-śabdita ity etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3441: etasmāt hi bīja-bhūtād vṛṣṭyaḍādi-krameṇa sthāvara-jaṅgamāni bhūtāny udbhavanti ||BhGS_8.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3445: ko 'sau ? kṣaraḥ kṣaratīti kṣaro vināśī, bhāvo yat kiṃcit janimat vastv ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3446: puruṣaḥ pūrṇam anena sarvam iti, puri śayanāt vā, puruṣaḥ ādityāntargato hiraṇyagarbhaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3449: sarva-yajñābhimāninī viṣṇv-ākhyā devatā, yajño vai viṣṇuḥ [TaittS 1.7.4]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3452: atrāsmin dehe yo yajñas tasyāham adhiyajñaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3455: anta-kāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3456: yaḥ prayāti sa mad-bhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ||BhG_8.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3457: anta-kāle maraṇa-kāle ca mām eva parameśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ smaran muktvā parityajya kalevaraṃ śarīraṃ yaḥ prayāti gacchati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3460: nāsti na vidyate 'trāsminn arthe saṃśayaḥ - yāti vā na veti ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3463: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3464: taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tad-bhāva-bhāvitaḥ ||BhG_8.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3465: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaṃ devatā-viśeṣaṃ smaran cintayan tyajati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3466: parityajaty ante 'nta-kāle prāṇa-viyoga-kāle kalevaraṃ śarīraṃ taṃ tam eva smṛtaṃ bhāvam eva eti nānyaṃ kaunteya, sadā sarvadā tad-bhāva-bhāvitas
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3467: tasmin bhāvas tad-bhāvaḥ sa bhāvitaḥ smaryamāṇatayābhyasto yena sa tad-bhāva-bhāvitaḥ san
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3468: yasmād evam antyā bhāvanā dehāntara-prāptau kāraṇam -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3469: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3471: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yathā-śāstram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3474: mayi vāsudeve 'rpite mano-buddhī yasya tava sa tvaṃ mayy arpita-mano-buddhiḥ san mām eva yathā-smṛtam eṣyasy āgamiṣyasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3480: tulya-pratyayāvṛtti-lakṣaṇo vilakṣaṇa-pratyayānantarito 'bhyāsaḥ sa cābhyāso yogas tena yuktaṃ tatraiva vyāpṛtaṃ yoginaś cetas tena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3482: nānya-gāminā nānyatra viṣayāntare gantuṃ śīlam asyeti nānya-gāmi tena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3483: nānya-gāminā, paramaṃ niratiśayaṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ divi sūrya-maṇḍāle bhavaṃ yāti gacchati he pārthānucintayan śāstrācāryopadeśam anudhyāyan ity etat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3484: kiṃ-viśiṣṭaṃ ca puraṣaṃ yāti ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3485: kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram aṇor aṇīyāṃsam anusmared yaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3488: kaviṃ krānta-darśinaṃ sarva-jñaṃ purāṇaṃ cirantanam anuśāsitāraṃ sarvasya jagataḥ praśāsitāram aṇoḥ sūkṣmād apy aṇīyāṃsaṃ sūkṣmataram anusmared
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3489: anucintayed yaḥ kaścit, sarvasya karma-phala-jātasya dhātāraṃ vidhātāraṃ vicitratayā prāṇibhyo vibhaktāram, acintya-rūpaṃ nāsya rūpaṃ niyataṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3490: vidyamānam api kenacit cintayituṃ śakyata ity acintya-rūpas tam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3491: āditya-varṇam ādityasyeva nitya-caitanya-prakāśo varṇo yasya tam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3492: āditya-varṇam, tamasaḥ parastāt, ajñāna-lakṣaṇān mohāndhakārāt paraṃ tam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3495: prayāṇa-kāle manasācalena bhaktyā yukto yoga-balena caiva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3496: bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya samyak sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam ||BhG_8.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3497: prayāṇa-kāle maraṇa-kāle manasācalena calana-varjitena bhaktyā yukto bhajanaṃ bhaktis tayā yukto yoga-balena caiva yogasya balaṃ yoga-balaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3498: samādhija-saṃskāra-pracaya-janita-citta-sthairya-lakṣaṇaṃ yoga-balaṃ tena ca yukta ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3500: ūrdhva-gāminyā nāḍyā bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya sthāpayitvā samyag-āpramattaḥ san, sa evaṃ buddhimān yogī kaviṃ purāṇam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3501: ity ādi-lakṣaṇaṃ taṃ paraṃ parataraṃ puruṣam upaiti pratipadyate divyaṃ dyotanātmakam ||BhGS_8.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3502: [yoga-mārgānugamanenaiva brahma-vidyām antareṇāpi brahma prāpyata ity evaṃ prāptam idam ucyate ] punar api vakṣyamāṇenopāyena pratipitsitasya brahmaṇo veda-vidvad-anādi-viśeṣaṇa-viśeṣyasyābhidhānaṃ karoti bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3503: yad akṣaraṃ veda-vido vadanti viśanti yad yatayo vīta-rāgāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3504: yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa pravakṣye ||BhG_8.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3505: yad akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīty akṣaram avināśi vedavido vedārthajñāḥ vadanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3506: tad vā etad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanti [BAU 3.8.8] iti śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3509: viśanti praviśanti samyag-darśana-prāptau satyāṃ yad yatayo yatana-śīlāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3510: saṃnyāsino vīta-rāgāḥ vīto vigataḥ rāgo yebhyas te vīta-rāgāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3511: yac cākṣaram icchanto jñātum iti vākya-śeṣaḥ brahmacaryaṃ gurau caranti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3512: ācaranti, tat te padaṃ tad akṣarākhyaṃ padaṃ padanīyaṃ te tava saṃgraheṇa,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3513: saṃgrahaḥ saṃkṣepas tena, saṃkṣepeṇa pravakṣye kathayiṣyāmi ||BhGS_8.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3514: sa yo ha vai tad bhagavan manuṣyeṣu prāyaṇāntam oṃkāram abhidhyāyīta |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3515: katamaṃ vāva sa tena lokaṃ jayatīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3516: tasmai sa hovāca - etad vai satya-kāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yad oṃkāraḥ [PraśnaU 5.1-2]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3517: upakramya, yaḥ punar etaṃ trimātreṇa om ity etenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3518: abhidhyāyīta sa sāmabhir unnīyate brahma-lokam [PraśnaU 5.5] ity ādinā vacanena, anyatra dharmād anyatrādharmād [KaṭhU 1.2.14] iti copakramya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3519: sarve vedā yat padam āmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yad vadanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3520: yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmy om ity etad [KaṭhU 1.2.15]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3521: ity ādibhiś ca vacanaiḥ parasya brahmaṇo vācaka-rūpeṇa, pratimāvat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3524: mukti-phalam uktaṃ yat, tad evehāpi kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram [Gītā 8.9]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3525: yad akṣaraṃ veda-vido vadanti [Gītā 8.11] iti copanyastasya parasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3528: prasaktānuprasaktaṃ ca yat kiṃcid ity evam artha uttare grantha ārabhyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3529: sarva-dvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3531: sarva-dvārāṇi sarvāṇi ca tāni dvārāṇi ca sarva-dvārāṇy upalabdhau, tāni sarvāṇi saṃyasya saṃyamanaṃ kṛtvā mano hṛdi hṛdaya-puṇḍārīke nirūdhya nirodhaṃ kṛtvā niṣpracāram āpādya, tatra vaśīkṛtena manasā hṛdayād
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3532: ūrdhva-gāminyā nāḍyordhvam ārūhya mūrdhny ādhāya ātmanaḥ prāṇam āsthitaḥ pṛvṛtto yoga-dhāraṇāṃ dhārayitum ||BhGS_8.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3534: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3535: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ||BhG_8.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3536: om iti ekākṣaraṃ brahma brahmaṇo 'bhidhāna-bhūtam oṃkāraṃ vyāharan ucārayan, tad-artha-bhūtaṃ mām īśvaram anusmaran anucintayan yaḥ prayāti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3537: mriyate, sa tyajan parityajan dehaṃ śarīram - tyajan deham iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3538: prayāṇa-viśeṣaṇārtham deha-tyāgena prayāṇam ātmanaḥ, na svarūpa-nāśenety
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3539: arthaḥ - sa evaṃ yāti gacchati paramāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatim ||BhGS_8.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3541: ananya-cetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3543: ananya-cetā nānya-viṣaye ceto yasya so 'yam ananya-cetāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3544: yogī satataṃ sarvadā yo māṃ parameśvaraṃ smarati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3548: kiṃ tarhi ? yāvaj-jīvaṃ nairantaryeṇa yo māṃ smaratīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3549: tasya yogino 'haṃ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyo he pārtha, nitya-yuktasya sadā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3551: yata evam, ato 'nanya-cetāḥ san mayi sadā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3553: tava saulabhyena kiṃ syāt ? ity ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3554: sṛṇu tan mama saulabhyena yad bhavati -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3557: mām upetya mām īśvaram upetya mad-bhāvam āpadya punar janma punar utpattiṃ nāpnuvanti na prāpnuvanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3559: tad-viśeṣaṇam āha - duḥkhālayaṃ duḥkhānām ādhyātmikādīnām ālayaṃ āśrayam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3564: mahātmāno yatayaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ mokṣākhyāṃ paramāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatāḥ prāptāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3565: ye punar māṃ na prāpnuvanti te punar āvartante ||BhGS_8.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3566: kiṃ punas tvatto 'nyat prāptāḥ punar āvartante ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3568: mām upetya tu kaunteya punar-janma na vidyate ||BhG_8.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3569: ā brahma-bhuvanāt bhavanty asmin bhūtānīti bhuvanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3570: brahmaṇo bhuvanaṃ brahma-bhuvanam, brahma-loka ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3575: mām ekam upetya tu kaunteya punar-janma punar-utpattiḥ na vidyate ||BhGS_8.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3580: sahasra-yuga-paryantaṃ sahasrāṇi yugāni paryantaḥ paryavasānaṃ yasyāhnas tat ahaḥ sahasra-yuga-paryantam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3585: yata evaṃ kāla-paricchinnās te, ataḥ punar-āvartino lokāḥ ||BhGS_8.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3586: prajāpater ahani yad bhavati rātrau ca, tad ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3590: tasmād avyaktād vyaktayo vyajyanta iti vyaktayaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgama-lakṣaṇāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ prabhavanty abhivyajyante, ahna āgamo 'har-āgamas tasmin ahar-āgame kāle brahmaṇaḥ prabodha-kāle tathā rātry-āgame brahmaṇaḥ svāpa-kāle
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3594: avidyādi-kleśa-mūla-karmāśaya-vaśāc cāvaśo bhūta-grāmo bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyata ity ataḥ saṃsāre vairāgya-pradarśanārthaṃ cedam āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3595: bhūta-grāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3597: bhūta-grāmo bhūta-samudāyaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgama-lakṣaṇo yaḥ pūrvasmin kalpa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3604: yad upanyastam akṣaram, tasya prāpty-upāyo nirdiṣṭa om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma [Gītā 8.13] ity ādinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3605: athedānīm akṣarasyaiva svarūpa-nirdidikṣayedam ucyate, anena yoga-mārgeṇedaṃ gantavyam iti -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3607: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati ||BhG_8.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3621: sanātanaś cirantano yaḥ sa bhāvaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahmādiṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati ||BhGS_8.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3622: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3623: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama ||BhG_8.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3624: yo 'sāv avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam evākṣara-saṃjñakam avyaktaṃ bhāvam āhuḥ paramāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatim |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3625: yaṃ paraṃ bhāvaṃ prāpya gatvā na nivartante
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3626: saṃsārāya, tad dhāma sthānaṃ paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ mama, viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3629: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3630: yasyāntaḥ-sthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam ||BhG_8.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3639: | yena puruṣeṇa sarvaṃ idaṃ jagat tataṃ vyāptam ākāśeneva ghaṭādi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3641: brahma-pratipattaya uttaro mārgo vaktavya iti yatra kāle ity ādi vivakṣitārtha-samarpaṇārtham ucyate, āvṛtti-mārgopanyāsaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3643: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3644: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha ||BhG_8.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3645: yatra kāle prayātā iti vyavahitena saṃbandhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3646: yatra yasmin kāle tv anāvṛttim apunar-janma āvṛttiṃ tad-viparītāṃ caiva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3648: karmiṇas tu guṇataḥ karma-yogena yoginām iti viśeṣaṇād
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3650: yatra kāle prayātā mṛtā yogino 'nāvṛttiṃ yānti, yatra kāle ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3651: prayātāḥ āvṛttiṃ yānti, taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3653: agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇ-māsā uttarāyaṇam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3654: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahma-vido janāḥ ||BhG_8.24||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3657: athavā, agni-jyotiṣī yathā śrute eva devate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3658: bhūyasā tu nirdeśo yatra kāle taṃ kālam iti āmra-vanavat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3664: tatra tasmin mārge prayātā mṛtā gacchanti brahma brahma-vido brahmopāsakā brahmopāsana-parā janāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3668: na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti [BAU 4.4.6] iti śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3670: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇ-māsā dakṣiṇāyanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3671: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate ||BhG_8.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3672: dhūmo rātrir dhūmābhimāninī rātry-abhimāninī ca devatā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3674: ṣaṇ-māsā dakṣiṇāyanam iti ca pūrvavat devataiva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3675: tatra candramasi bhavaṃ cāndramasaṃ jyotiḥ phalam iṣṭādi-kārī yogī karmī prāpya bhuktvā tat-kṣayād iha punar nivartate ||BhGS_8.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3676: śukla-kṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3678: śukla-kṛṣṇe śuklā ca kṛṣṇā ca śukla-kṛṣṇe, jñāna-prakāśakatvāt śuklā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3680: ete śukla-kṛṣṇe hi gatī jagataḥ ity adhikṛtānāṃ jñāna-karmaṇoḥ, na jagataḥ sarvasyaiva ete gatī saṃbhavataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3684: anāvṛttim, anyayā itarayā āvartate punar bhūyaḥ ||BhGS_8.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3685: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaścana |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3687: na ete yathokte sṛtī mārgau pārtha jānan saṃsārāya ekā, anyā mokṣāyeti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3688: yogī na muhyati kaścana kaścid api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3692: vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapaḥsu caiva dāneṣu yat puṇya-phalaṃ pradiṣṭam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3693: atyeti tat sarvam idaṃ viditvā yogī paraṃ sthānam upaiti cādyam ||BhG_8.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3694: vedeṣu samyag-adhīteṣu yajñeṣu ca sādguṇyenānutiṣṭhiteṣu tapaḥsu ca sutapteṣu dāneṣu ca samyag-datteṣu yad eteṣu puṇya-phalaṃ puṇyasya phalaṃ puṇya-phalaṃ pradiṣṭaṃ śāstreṇa, atyety atītya gacchati sat sarvaṃ phala-jātam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3695: idaṃ viditvā sapta-praśna-nirṇaya-dvāreṇoktam arthaṃ samyag avadhāryānuṣṭhāya yogī paraṃ prakṛṣṭam aiśvaraṃ sthānam upaiti ca pratipadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3696: ādyam ādau bhavaṃ kāraṇaṃ brahmety arthaḥ ||BhGS_8.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3709: nānyathā iti tad āśaṅkā-vyāvivartayiṣayā śrī-bhagavān uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3710: idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3712: idaṃ brahma-jñānaṃ vakṣyamāṇam uktaṃ ca pūrveṣu adhyāyeṣu, tat buddhau saṃnidhīkṛtya idam ity āha |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3715: samyag-jñānaṃ sākṣāt mokṣa-prāpti-sādhanam vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti [Gītā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3718: nānyat, atha te ye 'nyathāto vidur anya-rājānas te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3720: te tubhyaṃ guhyatamaṃ gopyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmi kathayiṣyāmy anasūyave 'sūyā-rahitāya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3722: kiṃ-viśiṣṭam ? vijñāna-sahitam anubhava-yuktam, yaj jñātvā prāpya mokṣyase 'śubhāt saṃsāra-bandhanāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3730: pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ idam uttamaṃ sarveṣāṃ pāvanānāṃ śuddhi-kāraṇaṃ brahma-jñānam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3733: karma kṣaṇa-mātrād eva bhasmīkarotīty ataḥ kiṃ tasya pāvanatvaṃ vaktavyam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3734: ? kiṃ ca - pratyakṣāvagamaṃ pratyakṣeṇa sukhāder ivāvagamo yasya tat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3737: tathātma-jñānaṃ dharma-virodhi, kiṃtu dharmyaṃ dharmād anapetam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3739: api, syād duḥkha-saṃpādyam ity ata āha - susukhaṃ kartum, yathā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3742: alpa-phalatvaṃ duṣkarāṇāṃ ca mahā-phalatvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti, idaṃ tu sukha-saṃpādyatvāt phala-kṣayāt vyetīti prāpte, āha - avyayam iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3748: aśraddadhānāḥ śraddhā-virahitā ātma-jñānasya dharmasyāsya svarūpe tat-phale ca nāstikāḥ pāpa-kāriṇaḥ, asurāṇām upaniṣadaṃ deha-mātrātma-darśanam eva pratipannāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3751: naivāśaṅketi mat-prāpti-mārga-bheda-bhakti-mātram apy aprāpya ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3754: mṛtyu-yuktaḥ saṃsāro mṛtyu-saṃsāras, tasya vartma naraka-tiryag-ādi-prāpti-mārgaḥ, tasminn eva vartanta ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_9.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3756: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyakta-mūrtinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3757: mat-sthāni sarva-bhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ ||BhG_9.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3758: mayā mama yaḥ paro bhāvas tena tataṃ vyāptaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagad avyakta-mūrtinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3759: na vyaktā mūrtiḥ svarūpaṃ yasya mama so 'ham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3761: tasmin mayy avyakta-mūrtau sthitāni mat-sthāni, sarva-bhūtāni brahmādīni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3763: na hi nirātmakaṃ kiṃcit bhūtaṃ vyavahārāyāvakalpate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3766: teṣāṃ bhūtānām aham evātmā ity atas teṣu sthita iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3768: ato bravīmi - na cāhaṃ teṣu bhūteṣv avasthitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3769: mūrtavat saṃśleṣābhāvena ākāśasyāpy antaratamo hy aham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3770: na hy asaṃsargi vastu kvacit ādheya-bhāvenāvasthitaṃ bhavati ||BhGS_9.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3772: na ca mat-sthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3773: bhūta-bhṛn na ca bhūta-stho mamātmā bhūta-bhāvanaḥ ||BhG_9.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3775: paśya me yogaṃ yuktiṃ ghaṭānaṃ me mama aiśvaram īśvarasyemam aiśvaram, yogam ātmano yāthātmyam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3776: tathā ca śrutir asaṃsargitvād asaṅgatāṃ darśayati - asaṅgo na hi sajjate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3778: idaṃ cāścaryam anyat paśya - bhūta-bhṛd asaṅgo 'pi san bhūtāni bibharti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3783: dehādi-saṅghātaṃ tasminn ahaṃkāram adhyāropya loka-buddhim anusaran vyapadiśati mamātmeti, na punar ātmana ātmānya iti lokavad ajānan |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3785: bhūta-bhāvano bhūtāni bhāvayaty utpādayati vardhayatīti vā bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3789: yathā loke ākāśa-sthita ākāśe sthito nityaṃ sadā vāyuḥ sarvatra gacchatīti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3790: sarvatra-go mahān parimāṇataḥ, tathā ākāśavat sarva-gate mayy asaṃśleṣeṇaiva sthitānīty evam upadhāraya vijānīhi ||BhGS_9.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3791: evaṃ vāyur ākāśe iva mayi sthitāni sarva-bhūtāni sthiti-kāle |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3794: kalpa-kṣaye punas tāni kalpādau visṛjāmy aham ||BhG_9.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3795: sarva-bhūtāni kaunteya prakṛtiṃ triguṇātmikām aparāṃ nikṛṣṭaṃ yānti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3798: utpatti-kāle kalpādau visṛjāmi utpādayāmy ahaṃ pūrvavat ||BhGS_9.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3800: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3801: bhūta-grāmam imaṃ kṛtsnam avaśaṃ prakṛter vaśāt ||BhG_9.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3802: prakṛtiṃ svāṃ svīyām avaṣṭabhya vaśīkṛtya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ prakṛtito jātaṃ bhūta-grāmaṃ bhūta-samudāyam imaṃ vartamānaṃ kṛtsnam avaśam asvatantram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3805: tarhi tasya te parameśvarasya bhūta-grāmam imaṃ viṣamaṃ vidadhataḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3806: tan-nimittābhyāṃ dharmādharmābhyāṃ saṃbandhaḥ syād itīdam āha bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3807: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3809: na ca mām īśvaraṃ tāni bhūta-grāmasya viṣama-sarga-nimittāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3811: udāsīnavat āsīnaṃ yathā udīsīna upekṣakaḥ kaścit tadvad āsīnam ātmano
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3813: asaktaṃ phalāsaṅga-rahitam, abhimāna-varjitam, ahaṃ karomīti teṣu karmasu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3814: ato 'nyasyāpi kartṛtvābhimānābhāvaḥ phalāsaṅgābhāvaś cāsaṃbandha-kāraṇam, anyathā karmabhir badhyate mūḍhaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3816: tatra bhūta-grāmam imaṃ visṛjāmy udāsīnavad āsīnam iti ca viruddham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3820: mayādhyakṣeṇa sarvato dṛśi-mātra-svarupeṇāvikriyātmanādhyakṣeṇa mayā, mama māyā triguṇātmikāvidyā-lakṣaṇā prakṛtiḥ sūyate utpādayati sa-carācaraṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3826: sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaś ca || [ŚvetU 6.11] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3829: dṛśi-karmatvāpatti-nimittā hi jagataḥ sarvā pravṛttiḥ - aham idaṃ bhokṣye,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3830: paśyāmīdam, śṛṇomīdam, sukham anubhavāmi, duḥkham anubhavāmi, tad-artham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3831: idaṃ kariṣye, idaṃ jñāsyāmi, ity ādyāvagati-niṣṭhāvagaty-avasānaiva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3832: yo asyādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman [Ṛk 8.7.17.7, TaittB 2.8.9] ity ādayaś ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3838: 'nupapanne, ko addhā veda ka iha pravocat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3839: kuta ājātā kuta iyaṃ visṛṣṭiḥ [Ṛk 8.7.17.8] ity ādi-mantra-varṇebhyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3841: ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tena muhyanti jantavaḥ [Gītā 5.15] iti ||BhGS_9.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3842: evaṃ māṃ nitya-śuddha-buddham ukta-svabhāvaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarva-jantūnām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3844: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3846: avajānanty avajñāṃ paribhavaṃ kurvanti māṃ mūḍhā avivekinaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3847: mānuṣīṃ manuṣyasaṃbandhinīṃ tanuṃ deham āśritam, manuṣyadehena vyavaharantamity etat, paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ bhāvaṃ param ātma-tattvam ākāśa-kalpam ākāśād apy antaratamam ajānanto mama bhūta-maheśvaraṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ mahāntam īśvaraṃ svātmānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3848: tataś ca tasya mamāvajñāna-bhāvanena āhatās te varākāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3851: rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ ||BhG_9.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3852: moghāśā vṛthā āśā āśiṣo yeṣāṃ te moghāśāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3853: tathā mogha-karmāṇo yāni cāgnihotrādīni tair anuṣṭhīyamānāni karmāṇi tāni ca, teṣāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3856: tathā mogha-jñānā moghaṃ niṣphalaṃ jñānaṃ yeṣāṃ te mogha-jñānāḥ, jñānam api teṣāṃ niṣphalam eva syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3857: vicetaso vigata-vivekāś ca te bhavantīty abhiprāyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3858: kiṃ ca - te bhavanti rākṣasīṃ rakṣasāṃ prakṛtiṃ svabhāvam āsurīm asurāṇāṃ ca prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3861: khāda, parasvam apahara, ity evaṃ vadana-śīlāḥ krūra-karmāṇo bhavantīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3862: asuryā nāma te lokāḥ [ĪśaU 3] iti śruteḥ ||BhGS_9.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3863: ye punaḥ śraddadhānā bhagavad-bhakti-lakṣaṇe mokṣa-mārge pravṛttāḥ -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3864: mahātmānas tu māṃ pārtha daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3866: mahātamānas tv akṣudra-cittāḥ mām īśvaraṃ pārtha daivīṃ devānāṃ prakṛtiṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3868: 'nanya-manaso 'nanya-cittā jñātvā bhūtādiṃ bhūtānāṃ viyad-ādīnāṃ prāṇināṃ cādiṃ kāraṇam avyayam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3870: satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍha-vratāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3871: namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nitya-yuktā upāsate ||BhG_9.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3872: satataṃ sarvadā bhagavantaṃ brahma-svarūpaṃ māṃ kīrtayantaḥ, yatantaś ca indriyopasaṃhāra-śama-dama-dayāhiṃsādi-lakṣaṇair dharmaiḥ prayatantaś ca,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3873: dṛḍha-vratā dṛḍhaṃ sthiram acālyaṃ vrataṃ yeṣāṃ te dṛḍha-vratā namasyantaś ca māṃ hṛdayeśayam ātmānaṃ bhaktyā nitya-yuktāḥ santa upāsate sevante
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3874: te kena kena prakāreṇa upāsate ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3875: jñāna-yajñena cāpy anye yajanto mām upāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3877: jñāna-yajñena jñānam eva bhagavad-viṣayaṃ yajñas tena jñāna-yajñena,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3878: yajantaḥ pūjayantaḥ mām īśvaraṃ cāpy anye 'nyām upāsanāṃ parityajyopāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3879: tac ca jñānam - ekatvenaikam eva paraṃ brahmeti paramārtha-darśanena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3881: kecic ca pṛthaktvena āditya-candrādi-bhedena sa eva bhagavān viṣṇur avasthita ity upāsate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3882: kecit bahudhāvasthitaḥ sa eva bhagavān sarvato-mukho viśva-rūpa iti taṃ viśva-rūpaṃ sarvato-mukhaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3884: yadi bahubhiḥ prakārair upāsate, kathaṃ tvām eva upāsata iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3886: ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajñaḥ svadhāham aham auṣadham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3887: mantro 'ham aham evājyam aham agnir ahaṃ hutam ||BhG_9.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3890: kiṃ ca svadhānnam aham, pitṛbhyo yad dīyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3891: aham auṣadhaṃ sarva-prāṇibhir yat adyate tat auṣadha-śabda-śabditaṃ vrīhi-yavādi-sādhāraṇam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3892: athavā svadheti sarva-prāṇi-sādhāraṇam annam, auṣadham iti vyādhy-upaśamanārthaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3894: mantro 'ham, yena pitṛbhyo devatābhyaś ca havir dīyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3896: aham agniḥ, yasmin hūte haviḥ so 'gnir aham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3899: pitāham asya jagato mātā dhātā pitāmahaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3900: vedyaṃ pavitram oṃkāra ṛk sāma yajur eva ca ||BhG_9.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3901: pitā janayitāham asya jagataḥ, mātā janayitrī, dhātā karma-phalasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3902: prāṇibhyo vidhātā, pitāmahaḥ pituḥ pitā, vedyaṃ veditavyam, pavitraṃ pāvanam oṃkāraḥ, ṛk sāma yajue eva ca ||BhGS_9.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3904: gatir bhartā prabhuḥ sākṣī nivāsaḥ śaraṇaṃ suhṛt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3905: prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ sthānaṃ nidhānaṃ bījam avyayam ||BhG_9.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3906: gatiḥ karma-phalam, bhartā poṣṭā, prabhuḥ svāmī, sākṣī prāṇināṃ kṛtākṛtasya, nivāso yasmin prāṇino nivasanti, śaraṇam ārtānām, prapannānām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3908: suhṛt pratyupakārānapekṣaḥ sann upakārī, prabhava utpattir jagataḥ, pralayaḥ pralīyate 'smin iti, tathā sthānaṃ tiṣṭhaty asminn iti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3909: nidhānaṃ nikṣepaḥ kālāntaropabhogyaṃ prāṇinām, bījaṃ praroha-kāraṇaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3910: praroha-dharmiṇām, avyayaṃ yāvat-saṃsāra-bhāvitvāt avyayam, na hy abījaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3912: nityaṃ ca praroha-darśanād bīja-saṃtatir na vyetīti gamyate ||BhGS_9.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3914: tapāmy aham ahaṃ varṣaṃ nigṛhṇāmy utsṛjāmi ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3915: amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuś ca sad asac cāham arjuna ||BhG_9.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3916: tapāmy aham ādityo bhūtvā kaiścit raśmibhir ulbaṇaiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3918: utsṛjya punar nigṛhṇāmi kaiścid raśmibhir aṣṭabhir māsaiḥ punar utsṛjāmi prāvṛṣi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3919: amṛtaṃ caiva devānām, mṛtyuś ca martyānām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3920: | sad yasya yat saṃbandhitayā vidyamānaṃ tat, tad-viparītam asac caivāham arjuna |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3921: na punar atyantam evāsad bhagavān, svayaṃ kārya-kāraṇe vā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3923: ye pūrvoktair nivṛtti-prakārair ekatva-pṛthaktvādi-vijñānair yajñair māṃ pūjayanta upāsate jñāna-vidaḥ, te yathā-vijñānaṃ mām eva prāpnuvanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3929: traividyā ṛg-yajuḥ-sāma-vido māṃ vasv-ādi-deva-rūpiṇaṃ somapāḥ somaṃ pibantīti somapāḥ, tenaiva soma-pānena pūta-pāpāḥ śuddha-kilbiṣāḥ, yajñair agniṣṭomādibhir iṣṭvā pūjayitvā svar-gatiṃ svarga-gamanaṃ svar eva gatiḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3931: te ca puṇyaṃ puṇya-phalam āsādya saṃprāpya surendra-lokaṃ śatakratoḥ sthānam aśnanti bhuñjate divyān divi bhavān aprākṛtān deva-bhogān devānāṃ bhogān ||BhGS_9.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3932: te taṃ bhuktvā svarga-lokaṃ viśālaṃ kṣīṇe puṇye martya-lokaṃ viśanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3933: evaṃ trayī-dharmam anuprapannā gatāgataṃ kāma-kāmā labhante ||BhG_9.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3934: te taṃ bhuktvā svarga-lokaṃ viśālaṃ vistīrṇaṃ kṣīṇe puṇye martya-lokaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3936: evaṃ yathoktena prakāreṇa trayī-dharmaṃ kevalaṃ vaidikaṃ karmānuprapannā gatāgataṃ gataṃ cāgataṃ ca gatāgataṃ gamanāgamanaṃ kāma-kāmāḥ kāmān kāmayanta iti kāma-kāmā labhante gatāgatam eva, na tu svātantryaṃ kvacil labhanta ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_9.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3938: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3940: ananyā apṛthag-bhūtāḥ paraṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇam ātmatvena gatāḥ santaś
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3941: cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ saṃnyāsinaḥ paryupāsate, teṣāṃ paramārtha-darśināṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3942: nityābhiyuktānāṃ satatābhiyogināṃ yoga-kṣemaṃ yogo 'prāptasya prāpaṇaṃ kṣemas tad-rakṣaṇaṃ tad-ubhayaṃ vahāmi prāpayāmy aham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3943: jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam [Gītā 7.18] sa ca mama priyaḥ [Gītā 7.17] yasmād tasmāt te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3945: nanv anyeṣām api bhaktānāṃ yoga-kṣemaṃ vahaty eva bhagavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3947: kiṃtv ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ - anye ye bhaktās te ātmārthaṃ svayam api
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3950: na hi te jīvite maraṇe vātmano gṛddhiṃ kurvanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3952: ato bhagavān eva teṣāṃ yoga-kṣemaṃ vahatīti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3953: nanv anyāpi devatās tvam eva cet tad-bhaktāś ca tvām eva yajante |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3956: te 'pi mām eva kaunteya yajanty avidhi-pūrvakam ||BhG_9.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3957: ye 'py anya-devatā-bhaktā anyāsu devatāsu bhaktā anya-devatā-bhaktāḥ santo yajante pūjayanti śraddhayā āstikya-buddhyānvitā anugatāḥ, te 'pi mām eva kaunteya yajanty avidhi-pūrvakam avidhir ajñānaṃ tat-pūrvakaṃ yajanta ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_9.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3960: ahaṃ hi sarva-yajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3961: na tu mām abhijānanti tattvenātaś cyavanti te ||BhG_9.24||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3962: ahaṃ hi sarva-yajñānāṃ śrautānāṃ smārtānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yajñānāṃ devatātmatvena bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3965: tathā na tu mām abhijānanti tattvena yathāvat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3966: ataś cāvidhi-pūrvakam iṣṭvā yāga-phalāc cyavanti pracyavante te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3967: ye 'py anya-devatā-bhakti-mattvenāvidhi-pūrvakaṃ yajante, teṣām api yāga-phalam avaśyaṃbhāvi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3969: yānti deva-vratā devān pitṝn yānti pitṛ-vratāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3970: bhūtāni yānti bhūtejyā yānti mad-yājino 'pi mām ||BhG_9.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3971: yānti gacchanti deva-vratā deveṣu vrataṃ niyamo bhaktiś ca yeṣāṃ te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3977: yānti mad-yājino mad-yajana-śīlā vaiṣṇavā mām eva yānti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3978: samāne 'py āyāse mām eva na bhajante 'jñānāt, tena te 'lpa-phala-bhājo bhavantīty arthaḥ na kevalaṃ mad-bhaktānām anāvṛtti-lakṣaṇam ananta-phalam, sukhārādhanaś cāham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3980: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3982: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyam udakaṃ yaḥ me mahyaṃ bhaktyā prayacchati, tat ahaṃ patrādi bhaktyā upahṛtaṃ bhakti-pūrvakaṃ prāpitaṃ bhakty-upahṛtam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3985: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3986: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva mad-arpaṇam ||BhG_9.27||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3987: yat karoṣi svataḥ prāptam, yad aśnāsi, yac ca juhoṣi havanaṃ nirvartayasi śrautaṃ smārtaṃ vā, yad dadāsi prayacchasi brāhmaṇādibhyo hiraṇyānnājyādi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3988: yat tapasyasi tapaś carasi kaunteya, tat kuruṣva mad-arpaṇaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3990: evaṃ kurvatas tava yat bhavati, tat sṛṇu -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3993: śubhāśubha-phalaiḥ śubhāśubhe iṣṭāniṣṭe phale yeṣāṃ tāni śubhāśubha-phalāni karmāṇi taiḥ śubhāśubha-phalaiḥ karma-bandhanaiḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3994: karmāṇy eva bandhanāni karma-bandhanāni taiḥ karma-bandhanair evaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3996: so 'yaṃ saṃnyāsa-yogo nāma, saṃnyāsaś cāsau mat-samarpaṇatayā karmatvād yogaś cāsāv iti, tena saṃnyāsa-yogena yukta
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3997: ātmāntaḥ-karaṇaṃ yasya tava sa tvaṃ saṃnyāsa-yoga-yuktātmā san vimuktaḥ karma-bandhanair jīvann eva patite cāsmin śarīre mām upaiṣyasi āgamiṣyasi ||BhGS_9.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3998: rāga-dveṣavāṃs tarhi bhagavān, yato bhaktān anugṛhṇāti, netarān iti tan na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3999: samo 'haṃ sarva-bhūteṣu na me dveṣyo 'sti na priyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4000: ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham ||BhG_9.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4003: agnivad aham - dūra-sthānāṃ yathāgniḥ śītaṃ nāpanayati, samīpam upasarpatām apanayati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4005: ye bhajanti tu mām īśvaraṃ bhaktyā mayi te - svabhāvata eva, na mama rāga-nimittam - vartante
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4006: | teṣu cāpy ahaṃ svabhāvata eva varte, netareṣu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4009: api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananya-bhāk |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4010: sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ ||BhG_9.30||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4011: api cet yady api sudurācāraḥ suṣṭhu durācāro 'tīva kutsitācāro 'pi bhajate mām ananya-bhāk ananya-bhaktiḥ san, sādhur eva samyag-vṛtta eva sa mantavyo jñātavyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4012: samyag yathāvad vyavasito hi saḥ, yasmāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4014: utsṛjyaś ca bāhyāṃ durācāratām antaḥ samyag-vyavasāya-sāmarthyāt -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4016: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati ||BhG_9.31||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4017: kṣipraṃ śīghraṃ bhavati dharmātmā dharma-citta eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4018: śaśvan nityaṃ śāntiṃ copaśamaṃ nigacchati prāpnoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4019: sṛṇu paramārtham, kaunteya pratijānīhi niścitāṃ pratijñāṃ kuru, na me mama bhakto mayi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4022: māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpa-yonayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4023: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim ||BhG_9.32||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4024: māṃ hi yasmāt pārtha vyapāśritya mām āśrayatvena gṛhītvā ye 'pi syuḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4025: pāpa-yonayaḥ pāpā yonir yeṣāṃ te pāpa-yonayaḥ syur bhaveyuḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4027: pāpā yonir yeṣāṃ te pāpa-yonayaḥ pāpa-janmānaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4029: vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti gacchanti parāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatim ||BhGS_9.32||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4030: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4031: anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām ||BhG_9.33||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4032: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyāḥ puṇya-yonayo bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā rājānaś ca te ṛṣayaś ceti rājarṣayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4033: yata evam, ato 'nityaṃ kṣaṇa-bhaṅguram asukhaṃ ca sukha-varjitam imaṃ lokaṃ manuṣya-lokaṃ prāpya puruṣārtha-sādhanaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4034: durlabhaṃ manuṣyatvaṃ labdhvā bhajasva sevasva mām ||BhGS_9.33||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4036: man-manā bhava mad-bhakto mad-yājī māṃ namaskuru |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4038: mayi vāsudeve mano yasya tava sa tvaṃ man-manā bhava |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4044: evam ātmānaṃ māṃ ahaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātmā parā ca gatiḥ param ayanaṃ taṃ mām evambhūtam eṣyastīty atītena padena sambandhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4053: saptame 'dhyāye bhagavatas tattvaṃ vibhūtayaś ca prakāśitāḥ, navame ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4054: athedānīṃ yeṣu yeṣu bhāveṣu cintyo bhagavāṃs te te bhāvā vaktavyāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4055: tattvaṃ ca bhagavato vaktavyam uktam api, durvijñeyatvāt, ity ataḥ śrī-bhagavān uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4056: bhūya eva mahā-bāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4058: bhūya eva bhūyaḥ punar he mahābāho sṛṇu me madīyaṃ paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ niratiśaya-vastunaḥ prakāśakaṃ vaco vākyaṃ yat paramaṃ te tubhyaṃ prīyamāṇāya - mad-vacanāt prīyase tvam atīvāmṛtam iva piban, tataḥ -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4061: na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4062: aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ ||BhG_10.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4063: na me vidur na jānanti sura-gaṇā brahmādayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4064: kiṃ te na viduḥ ? mama prabhavaṃ prabhāvaṃ prabhu-śakty-atiśayam, athavā prabhavaṃ prabhavanam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4067: kasmāt te na vidur ity ucyate - aham ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ hi yasmād devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4070: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti loka-maheśvaram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4072: yaḥ mām ajam anādiṃ ca, yasmāt aham ādir devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca, na mamānyaḥ ādiḥ vidyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4075: taṃ mām ajam anādiṃ ca yo vetti vijānāti lokamaheśvaraṃ lokānāṃ mahāntam īśvaraṃ turīyam ajñānatatkāryavarjitam asaṃmūḍhaḥ saṃmohavarjitaḥ saḥ matryeṣu manuṣyeṣu, sarvapāpaiḥ sarveḥ pāpair mati-pūrvāmatipūrva-kṛtaiḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4078: buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4079: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo 'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca ||BhG_10.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4080: buddhir antaḥ-karaṇasya sūkṣmādy-arthāvabodhana-sāmarthyam, tadvantaṃ buddhimān iti hi vadanti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4093: bhayaṃ ca trāsaḥ, abhayam eva ca tad-viparītam ||BhGS_10.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4094: ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṃ yaśo 'yaśaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4095: bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthag-vidhāḥ ||BhG_10.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4103: bhavanti bhāvā yathoktā buddhy-ādayo bhūtānāṃ prāṇināṃ matta eveśvarāt pṛthag-vidhāḥ nānā-vidhāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4105: maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4106: mad-bhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ ||BhG_10.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4107: maharṣayaḥ sapta bhṛgv-ādayaḥ pūrve 'tīta-kāla-saṃbandhinaḥ, catvāro manavas tathā sāvarṇā iti prasiddhāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4111: yeṣāṃ manūnāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sṛṣṭir loka imāḥ sthāvara-jaṅgama-lakṣaṇāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4113: etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4115: etāṃ yathoktāṃ vibhūtiṃ vistāraṃ yogaṃ ca yuktiṃ cātmano ghaṭanam, athavā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4116: yogaiśvarya-sāmarthyaṃ sarva-jñatvaṃ yoga-jaṃ yoga ucyate, mama madīyaṃ yogaṃ yo vetti tattvatas tattvena yathāvad ity etat, so
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4120: ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4121: iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāva-samanvitāḥ ||BhG_10.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4122: ahaṃ paraṃ brahma vāsudevākhyaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ prabhava utpattiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4123: matta eva sthiti-nāśa-kriyā-phalopabhoga-lakṣaṇaṃ vikriyā-rūpaṃ sarvaṃ jagat pravartate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4124: ity evaṃ matvā bhajante sevante māṃ budhā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4126: bhāva-samanvitā bhāvo bhāvanā paramārtha-tattvābhiniveśas tena samanvitāḥ saṃyuktāḥ ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_10.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4129: kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca ||BhG_10.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4130: mac-cittāḥ, mayi cittaṃ yeṣāṃ te mac-cittāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4131: mad-gata-prāṇāḥ māṃ gatāḥ prāptāś cakṣur-ādayaḥ prāṇā yeṣāṃ te mad-gata-prāṇāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4136: bodhayanto 'vagamayantaḥ parasparam anyonyam, kathayantaś ca jñāna-bala-vīryādi-dharmair viśiṣṭaṃ mām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4137: tuṣyanti ca paritoṣam upayānti ca ramanti ca ratiṃ ca prāpnuvanti priya-saṃgatyeva ||BhGS_10.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4138: ye yathoktaiḥ prakārair bhajante māṃ bhaktāḥ santaḥ -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4140: dadāmi buddhi-yogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te ||BhG_10.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4144: -prīti-pūrvakaṃ prītiḥ snehas tat-pūrvakaṃ māṃ bhajatām ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4145: dadāmi prayacchāmi buddhi-yogaṃ buddhiḥ samyag darśanaṃ mat-tattva-viṣayaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4146: tena yogo buddhi-yogas taṃ buddhi-yogam, yena buddhi-yogena samyag
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4147: darśana-lakṣaṇena māṃ parameśvaram ātma-bhūtam ātmatvena upayānti pratipadyante |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4148: ke ? te ye mac-cittatvādi-prakārair māṃ bhajante ||BhGS_10.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4149: kim-artham kasya vā tvat-prāpti-pratibandha-hetor nāśakaṃ buddhi-yogaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4150: teṣāṃ tvad-bhaktānāṃ dadāsi ? ity apekṣāyām āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4153: teṣām eva kathaṃ nu nāma śreyaḥ syāt ity anukampārthaṃ dayā-hetor aham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4154: ajñāna-jam avivekato jātaṃ mithyā-pratyaya-lakṣaṇaṃ mohāndhakāraṃ tamo nāśayāmi, ātma-bhāva-stha ātmano bhāvo 'ntaḥ-karaṇāśayas tasminn eva sthitaḥ san jñāna-dīpena viveka-pratyaya-rūpeṇa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4160: yathoktāṃ bhagavato vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca śrutvārjuna uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4161: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4162: puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādi-devam ajaṃ vibhum ||BhG_10.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4163: paraṃ brahma paramātmā paraṃ dhāma paraṃ tejaḥ pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ bhavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4164: puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ nityaṃ divyaṃ divi bhavam ādi-devaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4165: sarva-devānām ādau bhavam ādi-devam ajaṃ vibhuṃ vibhavana-śīlam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4167: āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4168: asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me ||BhG_10.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4169: āhuḥ kathayanti tvām ṛṣayo vasiṣṭhādayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4170: asito devalo 'pi evam evāha, vyāsaś ca, svayaṃ caiva tvaṃ ca bravīṣi me
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4171: sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4172: na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ ||BhG_10.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4173: sarvam etad yathoktam ṛṣibhis tvayā caitad ṛtaṃ satyam eva manye, yan māṃ prati vadasi bhāṣase he keśava |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4174: na hi te tava bhagavan vyaktiṃ prabhavaṃ vidur na devā na dānavāḥ ||BhGS_10.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4178: svayam eva ātmanātmānaṃ vettha jānāsi tvaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4183: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātma-vibhūtayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4184: yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi ||BhG_10.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4187: ātmano vibhūtayo yās tāḥ vaktum arhasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4189: māhātmya-vistarair imān lokān tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi ||BhGS_10.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4190: kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogiṃs tvāṃ sadā paricintayan |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4191: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo 'si bhagavan mayā ||BhG_10.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4192: kathaṃ vidyāṃ vijānīyām ahaṃ he yogin tvāṃ sadā paricintayan |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4193: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu vastuṣu cintyo 'si dhyeyo 'si bhagavan mayā ||BhGS_10.17||

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4196: vistareṇātmano yogaṃ yogaiśvarya-śakti-viśeṣaṃ vibhūtiṃ ca vistaraṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4197: dhyeya-padārthānāṃ he janārdana, ardater gati-karmaṇo rūpam, asurāṇāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4201: tṛptiḥ paritoṣo hi yasmān nāsti me mama śṛṇvatas tvan-mukha-niḥsṛta-vākyāmṛtam ||BhGS_10.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4203: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyā hy ātma-vibhūtayaḥ |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4206: prādhānyato yatra yatra pradhānā yā yā vibhūtis tāṃ tāṃ pradhānāṃ prādhānyataḥ kathayiṣyāmy ahaṃ kuru-śreṣṭha !
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4207: aśeṣatas tu varṣa-śatenāpi na śakyā vaktum, yato nāsty anto vistarasya me mama vibhūtīnām ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_10.19||

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4216: yasmād aham eva ādir bhūtānāṃ kāraṇaṃ tathā madhyaṃ ca sthitir antaḥ pralayaś ca ||BhGS_10.20||

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4240: purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4242: purodhasāṃ ca rāja-purohitānāṃ ca mukhyaṃ pradhānaṃ māṃ viddhi he pārtha bṛhaspatim |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4246: maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ girām asmy ekam akṣaram |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4260: ucaiḥśravasam a vānāṃ ucaiḥśravāḥ nāmā varājas taṃ māṃ viddhi vijānīhy amṛtodbhavam amṛta-nimitta-mathanodbhavam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4261: airāvatam irāvatyāḥ apatyaṃ gajendrāṇāṃ hastīśvarāṇām, tam māṃ viddhīty anuvartate |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4263: āyudhānām ahaṃ vajraṃ dhenūnām asmi kāma-dhuk |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4267: kāma-dhuk vasiṣṭhasya sarva-kāmānāṃ dogdhrī, sāmānyā vā kāma-dhuk |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4270: anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ varuṇo yādasām aham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4271: pitṝṇām aryamā cāsmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham ||BhG_10.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4272: anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ nāga-viśeṣāṇāṃ nāgarājaś cāsmi |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4278: mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendro 'haṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām ||BhG_10.30||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4280: kālaḥ kalayatāṃ kalanaṃ gaṇanaṃ kurvatām aham |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4347: yac cāpi sarva-bhūtānāṃ bījaṃ praroha-kāraṇam, tad aham arjuna |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4395: evam etan nānyathā yathā yena prakāreṇa āttha kathayasi tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4397: manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4402: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4439: aneka-vaktra-nayanam anekāni vaktrāṇi nayanāni ca yasmin rūpe tad

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4450: divyaṃ gandhānulepanaṃ yasya taṃ divya-gandhānulepanam, sarvāścarya-mayaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4451: sarvāścarya-prāyaṃ devam anantaṃ nāsyānto 'stīty anantas tam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4454: yā punar bhagavato viśva-rūpasya bhāḥ, tasyā upamocyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4456: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ ||BhG_11.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4457: antarikṣe vā divi sūryāṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūrya-sahasraṃ tasya yugapad utthitasya sūrya-sahasrasya yā yugapad utthitā bhāḥ, sā yadi, sadṛśī syāt tasya mahātmano viśva-rūpasyaiva bhāsaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4463: tatra tasmin viśva-rūpa ekasmin sthitam eka-sthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pravibhaktam anekadhā deva-pitṛ-manuṣyādi-bhedair apaśyad dṛṣṭavān deva-devasya hareḥ śarīre pāṇḍāvo 'rjunas tadā ||BhGS_11.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4466: tatas taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa vismayenāviṣṭo vismayāviṣṭo hṛṣṭāni romāṇi yasya so
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4469: prahvī-bhūtaḥ san śirasā devaṃ viśva-rūpa-dharaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ namaskārārthaṃ saṃpuṭīkṛta-hastaḥ sann abhāṣata uktavān ||BhGS_11.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4470: katham ? yat tvayā darśitaṃ viśva-rūpam, tad ahaṃ paśyāmīti svānubhavam āviṣkurvann arjuna uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4471: paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe sarvāṃs tathā bhūta-viśeṣa-saṃghān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4473: ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān ||BhG_11.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4474: paśyāmy upalabhe he deva, tava dehe devān sarvān, tathā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4476: nānā-saṃsthāna-viśeṣāṇāṃ saṃghā bhūta-viśeṣa-saṃghās tān, kiṃ ca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4477: brahmāṇaṃ catur-mukham īśam īśitāraṃ prajānāṃ kamalāsana-sthaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4479: ṛṣīṃś ca vasiṣṭhādīn sarvān, uragāṃś ca vāsuki-prabhṛtīn divyān divi bhavān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4482: nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ paśyāmi viśveśvara viśva-rūpa ||BhG_11.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4483: aneka-bāhūdara-vaktra-netram aneke bāhavar udarāṇi vaktrāṇi netrāṇi ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4484: yasya tava sa tvam aneka-bāhūdara-vaktra-netras tam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4487: sarvatrānanta-rūpam anantāni rūpāṇy asya ity ananta-rūpas tam ananta-rūpam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4488: | nāntam, anto 'vasānam, na madhyam, madhyaṃ nāma dvayoḥ koṭyor antaram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4489: na punas tavādim - na devasyāntaṃ paśyāmi, na madhyaṃ paśyāmi, na punar ādiṃ paśyāmi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4496: kirīṭiānaṃ kirīṭāṃ nāma śirobhūṣaṇaviśeṣas tat yasyāsti saḥ kirīṭī taṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4497: kirīṭiānam, tathā gadinaṃ gadāsya vidyate iti gadī taṃ gadinam, tathā cakriṇaṃ caktram asyāstīti cakrī taṃ cakriṇaṃ ca, tejo-rāśiṃ tejaḥpujaṃ sarvatodīptimantaṃ sarvatodīptir asyāstīti sarvatodīptimān, taṃ sarvatodīptimantaṃ paśyāmi tvāṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ samantāt samantataḥ sarvatra dīptānalārkadyutim analaś cārkaś cānalārkau dīptau analārkau dīptānalārkau tayoḥ dīptānalārkayoḥ dyutiriva dyutis tejo yasya tava sa tvaṃ dīptānalārkadyutis taṃ tvāṃ dīptānalārkadyatim aprameyaṃ na prameyam aśakyaparicchedam ity etat ||BhGS_11.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4499: tvam akṣaraṃ paramaṃ veditavyaṃ tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4502: tvam akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīti, paramaṃ brahma veditavyaṃ jñātavyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4503: tvam asya viśvasya samastasya jagataḥ paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ nidhānaṃ nidhīyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4504: 'sminn iti nidhānaṃ para āśraya ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4505: kiṃ ca, tvam avyayo na tava vyayo vidyata ity avyayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4506: śāśvata-dharma-goptā śaśvad-bhavaḥ śāśvato nityo dharmas tasya goptā śāśvata-dharma-goptā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4507: sanātanaś cirantanas tvaṃ puruṣaḥ paramaḥ mato 'bhipretaḥ me mama ||BhGS_11.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4513: anādi-madhyāntam ādi ca madhyaṃ cāntaś ca na vidyate yasya so 'yam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4515: ananta-vīryaṃ na tava vīryasyānto 'stīty ananta-vīryas, taṃ tvām ananta-vīryam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4516: tathānanta-bāhum anantā bāhavo yasya tava sa tvam, ananta-bāhus taṃ tvām ananta-bāhum |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4517: śaśi-sūrya-netraṃ śaśi-sūryau netre yasya tava sa tvaṃ śaśi-sūrya-netras, taṃ tvāṃ śaśi-sūrya-netraṃ candrāditya-nayanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4518: paśyāmi tvāṃ dīpta-hutāśa-vaktraṃ dīptaś cāsau hutāśaś ca vaktraṃ yasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4519: tava sa tvaṃ dīpta-hutāśa-vaktras, taṃ tvāṃ dīpta-hutāśa-vaktram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4525: dyāv-āpṛthivyor idam antaraṃ hy antarikṣaṃ vyāptaṃ tvayaikena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4527: dṛṣṭvā upalabhyādbhutaṃ vismāpakaṃ rūpam idaṃ tavograṃ krūraṃ lokānāṃ trayaṃ loka-trayaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4530: athādhunā purā yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ [Gītā 2.6] ity arjunasya yaḥ saṃśaya āsīt, tan-nirṇayāya pāṇḍava-jayam aikāntikaṃ darśayāmīti pravṛtto bhagavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4533: amī hi tvā sura-saṃghā viśanti kecid bhītāḥ prāñjalayo gṛṇanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4536: amī hi yudhyamānā yoddhāras tvā tvāṃ sura-saṃghāḥ ye 'tra
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4537: bhū-bhārāvatārāyāvatīrṇā vasv-ādi-deva-saṃghā manuṣya-saṃsthānās tvāṃ viśanti praviśanto dṛśyante
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4538: tatra kecit bhītāḥ prāñjalayaḥ santo gṛṇanti stuvanti tvām anye palāyane 'py aśaktāḥ santaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4539: yuddhe pratyupasthita utpātādi-nimittāni upalakṣya svasty astu jagata iti uktvā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4540: maharṣi-siddha-saṃghāḥ maharṣīṇāṃ siddhānāṃ ca saṃghāḥ stuvanti tvāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4543: rudrādityā vasavo ye ca sādhyā viśve 'śvinau marutaś coṣmapāś ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4546: rudrādityāḥ vasavo ye ca sādhyāḥ rudrādayo gaṇāḥ viśve-devā aśvinau ca devau marutaś ca ūṣmapā ca pitaraḥ, gandharvayakṣāsurasiddhasaṃghāḥ gandharṣaḥ hāhāhūhūprabhṛtayo yakṣāḥ kuberaprabhṛtayo 'surāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4547: virocanaprabhṛtayaḥ siddhāḥ kapilādayas teṣāṃ saṃghāḥ gandharvayakṣāsurasiddhasaṃghāḥ, te vīkṣante paśyanti tvāṃ vismitāḥ vismayamāpannāḥ santas te eva sarve ||BhGS_11.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4553: rūpaṃ mahad atipramāṇaṃ te tava bahu-vaktra-netraṃ bahūni vaktrāṇi mukhāni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4554: cakṣūṃṣi ca yasmin tad rūpaṃ bahu-vaktra-netram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4556: bahu-bāhūru-pādaṃ bahavo bāhava ūravaḥ pādāś ca yasmin rūpe tad bahu-bāhūru-pādam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4557: kiṃ ca, bahūdaraṃ bahūni udarāṇi yasminn iti bahūdaram
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4558: | bahu-daṃṣṭrā-karālaṃ bahvībhir daṃṣṭrābhiḥ karālaṃ vikṛtaṃ tad bahu-daṃṣṭrā-karālam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4559: dṛṣṭvā rūpam īdṛśaṃ lokā laukikāḥ prāṇinaḥ pravyathitāḥ pracalitā bhayena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4564: dṛṣṭvā hi tvāṃ pravyathitāntarātmā dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo ||BhG_11.24||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4568: aneke varṇā bhayaṅkarāḥ nānā-saṃsthānā yasmin tvayi taṃ tvām aneka-varṇam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4569: | vyāttānanaṃ vyāttāni vivṛtāni ānanāni mukhāni yasmin tvayi taṃ tvāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4571: dīpta-viśāla-netraṃ dīptāni prajvalitāni viśālāni vistīrṇāni netrāṇi yasmin tvayi taṃ tvāṃ dīpta-viśāla-netraṃ dṛṣṭvā hi tvāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4572: pravyathitāntarātmā pravyathitaḥ prabhīto 'ntarātmā mano yasya mama so
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4573: 'haṃ pravyathitāntarātmā san dhṛtiṃ dhairyaṃ na vindāmi na labhe śamaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4579: diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma prasīda deveśa jagan-nivāsa ||BhG_11.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4580: daṃṣṭrā-karālāni daṃṣṭrābhiḥ karālāni vikṛtāni te tava mukhāni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4582: kālānalas tat-sadṛśāni kālānala-saṃnibhāni mukhāni dṛṣṭvety etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4585: ato na labhe ca nopalabhe ca śarma sukham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4586: ataḥ prasīda prasanno bhava he deveśa, jagan-nivāsa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4587: yebhyo mama parājayāśaṅkā yāsīt sā cāpagatā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4589: amī ca tvāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ sarve sahaivāvanipāla-saṃghaiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4590: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūta-putras tathāsau sahāsmadīyair api yodha-mukhyaiḥ ||BhG_11.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4591: amī ca tvāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ duryodhana-prabhṛtayaḥ - tvaramāṇāḥ viśantīti vyavahitena saṃbandhaḥ - sarve sahaiva sahitāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4592: avani-pāla-saṃghair avaniṃ pṛthvīṃ pālayantīty avani-pālās teṣāṃ saṃghaiḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4593: kiṃ ca bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūta-putraḥ karṇas tathāsau sahāsmadīyair api
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4594: dhṛṣṭadyumna-prabhṛtibhir yodha-mukhyair yodhānāṃ mukhyaiḥ pradhānaiḥ saha
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4598: kecid vilagnā daśanāntareṣu sandṛśyante cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ ||BhG_11.27||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4599: vaktrāṇi mukhāni te tava tvaramāṇās tvarā-yuktāḥ santo viśanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4602: ca, kecit mukhāni praviṣṭānāṃ madhye vilagnā daśanāntareṣu māṃsam iva bhakṣitaṃ saṃdṛśyanta upalabhyante cūrṇitaiś cūrṇīkṛtair uttamāṅgaiḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4609: yathā nadīnāṃ sravantīnāṃ bahavo 'neke 'mbūnāṃ vegā ambu-vegās
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4610: tvarā-viśeṣāḥ samudram evābhimukhāḥ pratimukhā dravanti praviśanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4611: tathā tadvat tavāmī bhīṣmādayo nara-loka-vīrā manuṣya-loke śūrāḥ viśanti vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti prakāśamānāni ||BhGS_11.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4612: te kim-arthaṃ praviśanti kathaṃ ca ? ity āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4613: yathā pradīptaṃ jvalanaṃ pataṅgā viśanti nāśāya samṛddha-vegāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4614: tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokās tavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddha-vegāḥ ||BhG_11.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4615: yathā pradīptaṃ jvalanam agniṃ pataṅgāḥ pakṣiṇo viśanti nāśāya vināśāya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4616: samṛddha-vegāḥ samṛddha udbhūto vego gatir yeṣāṃ te samṛddha-vegāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4617: tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokāḥ prāṇinas tavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddha-vegāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4619: lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāl lokān samagrān vadanair jvaladbhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4620: tejobhir āpūrya jagat samagraṃ bhāsas tavogrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo ||BhG_11.30||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4621: lelihyase āsvādayasi grasamāno 'ntaḥ praveśayan samantāt samantataḥ lokān samagrān samastān vadanair vaktrair jvaladbhir dīpyamānais tejobhir āpūrya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4622: saṃvyāpya jagat samagraṃ sahāgreṇa samastam ity etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4623: kiṃ ca, bhāso dīptayas tavogrāḥ krūrāḥ pratapanti pratāpaṃ kurvanti he viṣṇo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4628: vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim ||BhG_11.31||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4629: ākhyāhi kathaya me mahyaṃ ko bhavān ugra-rūpaḥ krūrākāraḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4630: namo 'stu te tubhyaṃ he deva-vara devānāṃ pradhāna, prasīda prasādaṃ kuru |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4631: vijñātuṃ viśeṣeṇa jñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyam ādau bhavam ādyam, na hi yasmāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4634: kālo 'smi loka-kṣaya-kṛt pravṛddho lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4635: ṛte 'pi tvā na bhaviṣyanti sarve ye 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ ||BhG_11.32||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4636: kālo 'smi loka-kṣaya-kṛt lokānāṃ kṣayaṃ karotīti loka-kṣaya-kṛt pravṛddho vṛddhiṃ gataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4637: yad-arthaṃ pravṛddhas tac chṛṇu - lokān samāhartuṃ saṃhartum ihāsmin kāle pravṛttaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4638: ṛte 'pi vināpi tvā tvāṃ na bhaviṣyanti bhīṣma-droṇa-karṇa-prabhṛtayaḥ sarve, yebhyas tava āśaṅkā, ye 'vasthitāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4639: pratyanīkeṣu anīkam anīkaṃ prati pratyanīkeṣu pratipakṣa-bhūteṣu anīkeṣu yodhā yoddhāraḥ ||BhGS_11.32||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4641: tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśo labhasva jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4644: tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha bhīṣma-prabhṛtayo 'tirathā ajeyā devair apy arjunena jitā iti yaśaḥ labhasva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4646: jitvā śatrūn duryodhana-prabhṛtīn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham asapatnam akaṇṭakam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4647: mayaivaite nihatā niścayena hatāḥ prāṇair viyojitāḥ pūrvam eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4651: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca karṇaṃ tathānyān api yodha-vīrān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4652: mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān ||BhG_11.34||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4653: droṇaṃ ca, yeṣu yeṣu yodheṣv arjunasyāśaṅkā tāṃs tān vyapadiśati bhagavān mayā hatān iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4657: bhīṣmaś ca svacchanda-mṛtyur divyāstra-saṃpannaś ca paraśurāmeṇa dvandva-yuddham agamat, na ca parājitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4659: yasya pitā tapaś carati mama putrasya śiro bhūmau nipātayiṣyati yaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4662: saṃpannaḥ sūrya-putraḥ kānīno yataḥ, atas tan-nāmnaiva nirdeśaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4664: mā vyathiṣṭhās tebhyo bhayaṃ mā kārṣīḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4665: yudhyasva jetāsi duryodhana-prabhṛtīn raṇe yuddhe sapatnān śatrūn
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4667: etac chrutvā vacanaṃ keśavasya kṛtāñjalir vepamānaḥ kirīṭī |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4670: etat śrutvā vacanaṃ keśavasya pūrvoktaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ san vepamānaḥ kampamānaḥ kirīṭī namaskṛtvā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4675: manda-śabdatvaṃ yat sa-gadgadas tena saha vartateti sa-gadgadaṃ vacanam āheti vacana-kriyā-viśeṣaṇam etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4676: bhīta-bhītaḥ punaḥ punar bhayāviṣṭa-cetāḥ san praṇamya prahvo bhūtvā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4679: sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā jagat prahṛṣyaty anurajyate ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4680: rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśo dravanti sarve namasyanti ca siddha-saṃghāḥ ||BhG_11.36||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4682: kiṃ tat ? tava prakītryā tvan-māhātmya-kīrtanena śrutena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4683: he hṛṣīkeśa ! yat jagat prahṛṣyati praharṣam upaiti, tat sthāne yuktam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4686: bhagavān, yata īśvaraḥ sarvātmā sarva-bhūta-suhṛc ceti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4690: kiṃ ca, rakṣāṃsi bhītāni bhayāviṣṭani diśo dravanti gacchanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4692: sarve namasyanti namaskurvanti ca siddha-saṃghāḥ siddhānāṃ samudāyāḥ kapilādīnām, tac ca sthāne ||BhGS_11.36||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4694: kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman garīyase brahmaṇo 'py ādi-kartre |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4696: tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tat-paraṃ yat ||BhG_11.37||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4697: kasmāc ca hetos te tubhyaṃ na nameran namaskuryur he mahātman ! garīyase gurutarāya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4698: yato brahmaṇo hiraṇyagarbhasyāpi ādi-kartā kāraṇam atas tasmād ādi-kartre |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4699: katham ete na namaskuryuḥ ? ato harṣādīnāṃ namaskārasya ca sthānaṃ tvam arho viṣaya ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4700: he 'nanta deveśa he jagan-nivāsa tvam akṣaraṃ tat param, yad vedānteṣu śrūyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4702: sad vidyamānam, asac ca yatra nāstīti buddhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4704: upadhāna-bhūte sad-asatī yasyākṣarasya, yad-dvāreṇa sad asad ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4706: paramārthatas tu sad-asatoḥ paraṃ tat akṣaraṃ yad akṣaraṃ veda-vido vadanti [Gītā 8.11]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4707: tat tvam eva, nānyad ity abhiprāyaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4709: tvam ādi-devaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇas tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4710: vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma tvayā tataṃ viśvam ananta-rūpa ||BhG_11.38||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4713: cirantanas tvam evāsya viśvasya paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ nidhānaṃ nidhīyate 'smin
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4715: kiṃ ca, vettāsi, veditāsi sarvasyaiva vedya-jātasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4716: yac ca vedyaṃ vedanārhaṃ tac cāsi paraṃ ca dhāma paramaṃ padaṃ vaiṣṇavam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4721: vāyur yamo 'gnir varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ prajāpatis tvaṃ prapitāmahaś ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4723: punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te ||BhG_11.39||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4724: vāyus tvaṃ yamaś cāgniḥ varuṇo 'pāṃ patiḥ śaśāṅkaś candramāḥ prajāpatis tvaṃ kaśyapādiḥ prapitāmahaś ca pitāmahasyāpi pitā prapitāmahaḥ, brahmaṇo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4726: namo namas te tubhyam astu sahasra-kṛtvaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4727: punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4733: namaḥ purastād atha pṛṣṭhatas te namo 'stu te sarvata eva sarva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4734: ananta-vīryāmita-vikramas tvaṃ sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tato 'si sarvaḥ ||BhG_11.40||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4735: namaḥ purastāt pūrvasyāṃ diśi tubhyam, atha pṛṣṭhatas te pṛṣṭhato 'pi ca te namo 'stu te sarvata eva sarvāsu dikṣu sarvatra sthitāya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4743: sarvaṃ samastaṃ jagat samāpnoṣi samyag ekenātmanā vyāpnoṣi yataḥ, tatas tasmād asi bhavasi sarvas tvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4744: tvayā vinābhūtaṃ na kiṃcid astīty abhiprāyaḥ ||BhGS_11.40||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4747: sakheti matvā prasabhaṃ yad uktaṃ he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4748: ajānatā mahimānaṃ tavedaṃ mayā pramādāt praṇayena vāpi ||BhG_11.41||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4749: sakhā samāna-vayā iti matvā jñātvā viparīta-buddhyā prasabham abhibhūya prasahya yad uktaṃ he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti cājānatājñāninā mūḍhena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4750: kim ajānatā ? ity āha - mahimānaṃ māhātmyaṃ tavedam īśvarasya viśva-rūpam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4752: tavemam iti pāṭho yady asti, tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyam eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4764: śayyā, āsanam āsthāyikā, bhojanam adanam, ity eteṣu vihāra-śayyāsana-bhojaneṣu, ekaḥ parokṣaḥ sann asatkṛto 'si paribhūto 'si
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4765: | athavāpi he 'cyuta ! tat samakṣam, tac-chabdaḥ kriyā-viśeṣaṇārthaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4766: pratyakṣaṃ vāsatkṛto 'si tat sarvam aparādha-jātaṃ kṣāmaye kṣamāṃ kāraye
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4769: pitāsi lokasya carācarasya tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4772: pitāsi janayitāsi lokasya prāṇi-jātasya carācarasya sthāvara-jaṅgamasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4773: na kevalaṃ tvam asya jagataḥ pitā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4774: pūjyaś ca pūjārhaḥ, yato gurur garīyān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4776: kasmād gurutaras tvam ity āha - na tvat-samas tvat-tulyo 'sti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4777: | na hīśvara-dvayaṃ saṃbhavati, aneke varatve vyavahārānupapatteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4778: tvat-sama eva tāvad anyo na saṃbhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4780: loka-traye 'pi sarvasmin ? apratima-prabhāva ! pratimīyate yayā sā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4781: pratimā, na vidyate pratimā yasya tava prabhāvasya sa tvam apratima-prabhāvo he 'pratima-prabhāva niratiśaya-prabhāva ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_11.43||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4783: tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāyaṃ prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4784: piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum ||BhG_11.44||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4785: tasmāt praṇamya namaskṛtya, praṇidhāya prakarṣeṇa nīcair dhṛtvā kāyaṃ śarīram, prasādaye prasādaṃ kāraye tvām aham īśam īśitāram, īḍyaṃ stutyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4786: tvaṃ punaḥ putrasyāparādhaṃ pitā yathā kṣamate, sarvaṃ sakheva sakhyur
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4787: aparādham, yathā vā priyaḥ priyāyā aparādhaṃ kṣamate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4790: adṛṣṭa-pūrvaṃ hṛṣito 'smi dṛṣṭvā bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4791: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ prasīda deveśa jagan-nivāsa ||BhG_11.45||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4792: adṛṣṭa-pūrvaṃ na kadācid api dṛṣṭa-pūrvam idaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ tava
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4795: atas tad eva me mama darśaya he deva rūpaṃ yat matsakham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4797: deveśa, jagan-nivāsa jagato nivāso jagan-nivāsaḥ, he jagan-nivāsa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4802: kirīṭinaṃ kirīṭavantaṃ tathā gadinaṃ gadāvantaṃ cakra-hastam icchāmi tvāṃ prārthaye tvāṃ draṣṭum aham, tathaiva pūrvavad ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4804: tasmāt tenaiva rūpeṇa vasudeva-putra-rūpeṇa catur-bhujena, sahasra-bāho !
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4808: arjunaṃ bhītam upalabhya, upasaṃhṛtya viśva-rūpam, priya-vacanena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4810: mayā prasannena tavārjunedaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ darśitam ātma-yogāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4811: tejo-mayaṃ viśvam anantam ādyaṃ yan me tvad-anyena na dṛṣṭa-pūrvam ||BhG_11.47||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4812: mayā prasannena, prasādo nāma tvayy anugraha-buddhiḥ, tadvatā prasannena mayā tava |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4813: he 'rjuna ! idaṃ paraṃ rūpaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ darśitam ātma-yogād
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4815: tejo-mayaṃ tejaḥ-prāyaṃ viśvaṃ samastam anantam anta-rahitaṃ ādau bhavam ādyaṃ, yad rūpaṃ me mama tvad-anyena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4817: ātmano mama rūpa-darśanena kṛtārtha eva tvaṃ saṃvṛtta iti tat stauti -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4818: na veda yajñādhyayanair na dānair na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4821: na veda-yajñādhyayanaiś caturṇām api vedānām adhyayanair yathāvat yajñādhyayanaiś ca - vedādhyayanair eva yajñādhyayanasya siddhatvāt pṛthak yajñādhyayana-grahaṇaṃ yajña-vijñānopalakṣaṇārtham - tathā na dānais
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4822: tulā-puruṣādibhiḥ, na ca kriyābhir agnihotrādibhiḥ śrautādibhiḥ, nāpi tapobhir ugraiś cāndrāyaṇādibhir ugrair ghoraiḥ, evaṃ-rūpo yathā-darśitaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4823: viśva-rūpaṃ yasya so 'ham evaṃ-rūpo na śakyo 'haṃ nṛ-loke manuṣya-loke
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4825: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍha-bhāvo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4827: vyapeta-bhīḥ prīta-manāḥ punas tvaṃ tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya ||BhG_11.49||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4828: mā te vyathā mā bhūt te bhayam, mā ca vimūḍha-bhāvo vimūḍha-cittatā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4829: dṛṣṭvopalabhya rūpaṃ ghoram īdṛk yathā-darśitaṃ mamedam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4831: vigata-bhayaḥ, prīta-manāś ca san punar bhūyas tvaṃ tad eva catur-bhujaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4832: rūpaṃ śaṅkha-cakra-gadādharaṃ taveṣṭaṃ rūpam idaṃ prapaśya ||BhGS_11.49||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4834: ity arjunaṃ vāsudevas tathoktvā svakaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa bhūyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4835: āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enaṃ bhūtvā punaḥ saumya-vapur mahātmā ||BhG_11.50||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4836: ity evam arjunaṃ vāsudevas tathā-bhūtaṃ vacanam uktvā, svakaṃ vasudevasya gṛhe jātaṃ rūpaṃ darśayāmāsa darśitavān bhūyaḥ punaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4837: āśvāsayāmāsa ca āśvāsitavān bhītam enam, bhūtvā punaḥ saumya-vapuḥ prasanna-deho mahātmā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4839: dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4840: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sa-cetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ ||BhG_11.51||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4841: dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ mat-sakhaṃ prasannaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4846: sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4847: devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśana-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ ||BhG_11.52||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4848: sudurdarśaṃ suṣṭhu duḥkhena darśanam asyeti sudurdarśam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4849: idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama, devā apy asya mama rūpasya nityaṃ sarvadā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4851: darśanepsavo 'pi na tvam iva dṛṣṭavantaḥ, na drakṣyanti cety abhiprāyaḥ ||BhGS_11.52||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4853: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4854: śakya evaṃ-vidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā ||BhG_11.53||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4855: nāhaṃ vedaiḥ ṛg-yajuḥ-sāmātharva-vedaiś caturbhir api, na tapasā ugreṇa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4856: cāndrāyaṇādinā, na dānena go-bhū-hiraṇyādinā, na cejyayā yajñena pūjayā vā śakyaḥ evaṃ-vidho yathā-darśita-prakāro draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā tvam ||BhGS_11.53||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4858: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃ-vidho 'rjuna |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4859: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca parantapa ||BhG_11.54||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4860: bhaktyā tu kiṃ-viśiṣṭayā ity āha - ananyayāpṛthag-bhūtayā, bhagavato
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4861: 'nyatra pṛthaṅ na kadācid api yā bhavati sā tv ananyā bhaktiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4862: sarvair api karaṇaiḥ vāsudevād anyan na upalabhyate yayā, sānanyā bhaktiḥ, tayā bhaktyā śakyo 'ham evaṃ-vidho viśva-rūpa-prakāro he 'rjuna, jñātuṃ śāstrataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4863: na kevalaṃ jñātuṃ śāstrataḥ, draṣṭuṃ ca sākṣāt-kartuṃ tattvena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4864: tattvataḥ, praveṣṭuṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca gantuṃ parantapa ||BhGS_11.54||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4868: nirvairaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava ||BhG_11.55||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4869: mat-karma-kṛn mad-arthaṃ karma mat-karma, tat karotīti mat-karma-kṛt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4870: mat-paramaḥ - karoti bhṛtyaḥ svāmi-karma, na tv ātmanaḥ paramā pretya gantavyā gatir iti svāminaṃ pratipadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4871: ayaṃ tu mat-karma-kṛn mām eva paramāṃ gatiṃ pratipadyate iti mat-paramaḥ, ahaṃ paramaḥ parā gatir yasya so 'yaṃ mat-paramaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4873: sarva-prakāraiḥ sarvātmanā sarvotsāhena bhajate iti mad-bhaktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4878: ya īdṛśo mad-bhaktaḥ sa mām eti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4879: aham eva tasya parā gatiḥ, nānyā gatiḥ kācit
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4894: samasta-jagad-ātma-rūpaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ tvadīyaṃ darśitam upāsanārtham eva tvayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4895: tac ca darśayitvā uktavān asi mat-karma-kṛd [Gītā 11.55] ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4896: ato 'ham anayor ubhayoḥ pakṣayor viśiṣṭatara-bubhutsayā tvāṃ pṛcchāmīty arjuna uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4897: evaṃ satata-yuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4898: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yoga-vittamāḥ ||BhG_12.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4899: evam ity atītānantara-lokena uktam arthaṃ parāmṛśati mat-karma-kṛd ity ādinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4902: ye bhaktā ananya-śaraṇāḥ santas tvāṃ yathā-darśitaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ paryupāsate dhyāyanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4907: tad vyaktam ucyate, añjer dhātos tat-karmakatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4909: tad-viparītam, śiṣṭau ca ucyamānair viśeṣaṇair viśiṣṭam, tad ye cāpi
