GSP33bhgsbh_u:4910: paryupāsate, teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ madhye ke yogi-vittamāḥ ? ke 'tiśayena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4912: śrī-bhagavān uvāca - ye tv akṣaropāsakāḥ samyag-darśino nivṛttaiṣaṇās te tāvat tiṣṭhantu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4913: tān prati yad vaktavyam, tad upariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4915: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nitya-yuktā upāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4916: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ ||BhG_12.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4917: mayi viśva-rūpe parameśvara āveśya samādhāya mano ye bhaktāḥ santaḥ, māṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4920: atītānantarādhyāyāntokta-ślokārtha-nyāyena satata-yuktāḥ santa upāsate śraddhayā parayā prakṛṣṭayopetāḥ, te me mama matā abhipretā yuktatamā iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4922: ato yuktaṃ tān prati yuktatamā iti vaktum ||BhGS_12.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4923: kim itare yuktatamā na bhavanti ? na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4924: kiṃtu tān prati yad vaktavyam, tac chṛṇu -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4925: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4926: sarvatra-gam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam ||BhG_12.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4927: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam, avyaktatvād aśabda-gocareti na nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyate, ato 'nirdeśyam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4928: avyaktaṃ na kenāpi pramāṇena vyajyata ity avyaktaṃ paryupāsate pari samantād upāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4931: samāna-pratyaya-pravāheṇa dīrgha-kālaṃ yad āsanam, tad upāsanam ācakṣate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4932: akṣarasya viśeṣaṇam āha - sarvatra-gaṃ vyomavad vyāpy acintyaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4934: yad dhi karaṇa-gocaram, tan manasāpi cintyam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4935: tad-viparītatvād acintyam akṣaram, kūṭa-sthaṃ dṛśyamāna-guṇam antar-doṣaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4937: kūṭa-rūpam kūṭa-sākṣyam ity ādau kūṭa-śabdaḥ prasiddho loke |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4939: māyā-vyākṛtādi-śabda-vācyatayā māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4940: maheśvaram [ŚvetU 4.10], mama māyā duratyayā [Gītā 7.14] ity ādau prasiddhaṃ yat tat kūṭam, tasmin kūṭe sthitaṃ kūṭa-sthaṃ tad-adhyakṣatayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4941: | athavā, rāśir iva sthitaṃ kūṭa-stham ata evācalam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4945: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarva-bhūta-hite ratāḥ ||BhG_12.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4946: saṃniyamya samyak niyamya upasaṃhṛtya indriya-grāmam indriya-samudāyaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4947: sarvatra sarvasmin kāle sama-buddhayaḥ samā tulyā buddhir yeṣām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4949: te ye evaṃ-vidhās te prāpnuvanti mām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4951: na tu teṣāṃ vaktavyaṃ kiṃcit māṃ te prāpnuvantīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4952: jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam iti hy uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4953: na hi bhagavat-svarūpāṇāṃ satāṃ yuktatamatvam ayuktatamatvaṃ vā vācyam ||BhGS_12.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4956: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate ||BhG_12.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4964: avyaktā hi yasmād yā gatir akṣarātmikā duḥkhaṃ sā dehavadbhir dehābhimānavadbhir avāpyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4966: akṣaropāsakānāṃ yad vartanam, tad upariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ ||BhGS_12.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4967: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mat-parāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4969: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayīśvare saṃnyasya mat-parā ahaṃ paro yeṣāṃ te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4970: mat-parāḥ santo 'nanyenaivāvidyamānam anyat ālambanaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ devam ātmānaṃ muktvā yasya so 'nanyas tenānanyenaiva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4971: kena ? yogena samādhinā māṃ dhyāyantaś cintayanta upāsate ||BhGS_12.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4977: mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarān mṛtyu-yuktaḥ saṃsāro mṛtyu-saṃsāraḥ, sa eva sāgara
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4978: iva sāgaraḥ, dustaratvāt, tasmāt mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarāt ahaṃ teṣāṃ samuddhartā bhavāmi na cirāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4979: kiṃ tarhi ? kṣipram eva he pārtha, mayi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4980: āveśita-cetasāṃ mayi viśva-rūpa āveśitaṃ samāhitaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ te mayy
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4983: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4984: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ||BhG_12.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4985: mayy eva viśva-rūpa īśvare manaḥ saṃkalpa-vikalpātmakaṃ ādhatsva sthāpaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4986: mayy evādhyavasāyaṃ kurvatīṃ buddhim ādhatsva niveśaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4987: tatas te kiṃ syād iti sṛṇu - nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi niścayena mad-ātmanā mayi nivāsaṃ kariṣyasi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4990: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4992: atha evaṃ yathāvocaṃ tathā mayi cittaṃ samādhātuṃ sthāpayituṃ sthiram acalaṃ na śaknoṣi cet, tataḥ paścād abhyāsa-yogena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4993: cittasyaikasmin ālambane sarvataḥ samāhṛtya punaḥ punaḥ sthāpanam abhyāsaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4995: yogaḥ samādhāna-lakṣaṇas tenābhyāsa-yogena māṃ viśva-rūpam iccha prārthayasva āptuṃ prāptum
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4998: mad-artham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi ||BhG_12.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4999: abhyāse 'py asamartho 'sy aśakto 'si, tarhi mat-karma-paramo bhava
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5002: abhyāsena vinā mad-artham api karmāṇi kevalaṃ kurvan siddhiṃ sattva-śuddhi-yoga-jñāna-prāpti-dvāreṇāvāpsyasi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5003: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ mad-yogam āśritaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5005: atha punar etad api yad uktaṃ mat-karma-paramatvam, tat kartum aśakto 'si,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5006: mad-yogam, āśrito mayi kriyamāṇāni karmāṇi saṃnyasya yat karaṇaṃ teṣām anuṣṭhānaṃ sa mad-yogaḥ, tam āśritaḥ san, sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5008: kuru yatātmavān saṃyata-cittaḥ san ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_12.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5010: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5014: tasmād api jñānāj jñāna-pūrvakaṃ dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5018: pūrva-viśeṣaṇavataḥ śāntir upaśamaḥ sa-hetukasya saṃsārasyānantaram eva syāt, na tu kālāntaram apekṣate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5020: phala-tyāgaḥ śreyaḥ-sādhanam upadiṣṭam, na prathamam eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5021: ataś ca śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsād ity uttarottara-viśiṣṭatvopadeśena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5024: kena sādharmyeṇa stutitvam ? yadā sarve pramucyanta iti sarva-kāma-prahāṇād amṛtatvam uktam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5027: tat-tyāge ca viduṣo dhyāna-niṣṭhasyānantaraiva śāntir iti sarva-kāma-tyāga-sāmānyam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5030: yathāgastyena brāhmaṇena samudraḥ pīta itīdānīṃtanā api brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇatva-sāmānyāt stūyante, evaṃ karma-phala-tyāgāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5032: atra cātmeśvara-bhedam āśritya viśva-rūpa īśvare cetaḥ-samādhāna-lakṣaṇo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5038: te prāpnuvanti mām eva [Gītā 12.4] ity akṣaropāsakānāṃ kaivalya-prāptau
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5039: svātantryam uktvā, itareṣāṃ pāratantryād īśvarādhīnatāṃ darśitavān teṣām ahaṃ samuddhartā [Gītā 12.7] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5040: yadi hīśvarasyātma-bhūtās te matā abheda-darśitvāt, akṣara-svarūpā eva ta iti samuddharaṇa-karma-vacanaṃ tān praty apeśalaṃ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5041: yasmāc cārjunasyātyantam eva hitaiṣī bhagavān tasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5043: na cātmānam īśvaraṃ pramāṇato buddhvā kasyacid guṇa-bhāvaṃ jigamiṣati kaścid,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5046: tyakta-sarveṣaṇānām adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām ity ādi-dharma-pūgaṃ sākṣād
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5048: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5050: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ na dveṣṭā, ātmano duḥkha-hetum api na kiṃcid
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5051: dveṣṭi, sarvāṇi bhūtāny ātmatvena hi paśyati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5052: maitro mitra-bhāvo maitrī mitratayā vartata iti maitraḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5053: karuṇa eva ca, karuṇā kṛpā duḥkhiteṣu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5054: dayā, tadvān karuṇaḥ, sarva-bhūtābhaya-pradaḥ, saṃnyāsīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5058: sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ same duḥkha-sukhe dveṣa-rāgayor apravartake yasya sa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5062: mayy arpita-mano-buddhir yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||BhG_12.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5063: saṃtuṣṭaḥ satataṃ nityaṃ deha-sthiti-kāraṇasya lābhe 'lābhe ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5069: dṛḍhaḥ sthiro niścayo 'dhyavasāyo yasyātma-tattva-viṣaye sa dṛḍha-niścayaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5071: adhyavasāya-lakṣaṇā buddhiḥ, te mayy evārpite sthāpite yasya saṃnyāsinaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5073: ya īdṛśo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5074: priyo hi jñānino 'ty artham ahaṃ sa ca mama priya iti saptame 'dhyāye sūcitam, tad iha prapañcyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5075: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5076: harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ ||BhG_12.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5077: yasmāt saṃnyāsino nodvijate nodvegaṃ gacchati na santapyate na saṃkṣubhyati lokaḥ, tathā lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ, harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5078: harṣaś cāmarṣaś ca bhayaṃ codvegaś ca tair harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair muktaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5083: tair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ ||BhGS_12.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5085: sarvārambha-parityāgī yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||BhG_12.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5087: śucir bāhyena ābhyantareṇa ca śaucena saṃpannaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5088: dakṣaḥ pratyutpanneṣu kāryeṣu sadyo yathāvat pratipattuṃ samarthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5089: udāsīno na kasyacit mitrādeḥ pakṣaṃ bhajate yaḥ, sa udāsīno yatiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5093: kāma-hetūni karmāṇi sarvārambhāḥ, tān parityaktuṃ śīlam asyeti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5094: sarvārambha-parityāgī yaḥ mad-bhaktaḥ saḥ me priyaḥ ||BhGS_12.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5096: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5097: śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||BhG_12.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5098: yo na hṛṣyatīṣṭa-prāptau, na dveṣṭy aniṣṭa-prāptau, na śocati priya-viyoge, na cāprāptaṃ kāṅkṣati, śubhāśubhe karmaṇī parityaktuṃ śīlam asyeti śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||BhGS_12.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5099: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5101: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca, tathā mānāpamānayoḥ pūjā-paribhavayoḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5106: aniketaḥ sthira-matir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ ||BhG_12.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5115: yena kenacid ācchanno yena kenacid āśitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5116: yatra kvacana śāyī syāt taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ || [Mbh 12.245.12] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5117: kiṃ ca, aniketo niketa āśrayo nivāso niyato na vidyate yasya so 'niketaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5119: sthira-matiḥ sthirā paramārtha-viṣayā yasya matiḥ saḥ sthira-matiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5121: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām [Gītā 12.13] ity ādinākṣaropāsakānāṃ nivṛtta-sarveṣaṇānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ paramārtha-jñāna-niṣṭhānāṃ dharma-jātaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5123: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5124: śraddadhānā mat-paramā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ ||BhG_12.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5125: ye tu saṃnyāsino dharmyāmṛtaṃ dharmād anapetaṃ dharmyaṃ ca tad amṛtaṃ ca tat, amṛtatva-hetutvāt, idaṃ yathoktam, adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām ity ādinā paryupāsate 'nutiṣṭhanti śraddadhānāḥ santaḥ mat-paramāḥ yathokto 'ham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5126: akṣarātmā paramo niratiśayā gatir yeṣāṃ te mat-paramāḥ, mad-bhaktāś
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5127: cottamāṃ paramārtha-jñāna-lakṣaṇāṃ bhaktim āśritāḥ, te 'tīva me priyāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5128: priyo hi jñānino 'ty artham [Gītā 7.18] iti yat sūcitaṃ tat vyākhyāyehopasaṃhṛtam bhaktās te 'tīva me priyā iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5129: yasmād dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktam anutiṣṭhan bhagavato viṣṇoḥ parameśvarasyātīva priyo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5130: bhavati, tasmād idaṃ dharmyāmṛtaṃ mumukṣuṇā yatnato 'nuṣṭheyaṃ viṣṇoḥ priyaṃ paraṃ dhāma jigamiṣuṇeti vākyārthaḥ ||BhGS_12.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5136: [*NOTE: Numbering of this adhyaya out of tune with standard editions and probably defective; “13.33” missing!]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5139: saptame 'dhyāye sūcite dve prakṛtī īśvarasya triguṇātmikāṣṭadhā bhinnāparā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5145: atītānantarādhyāye ca adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ [Gītā 12.13] ity ādinā yāvad-adhyāya-parisamāptis
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5146: tāvat tattva-jñānināṃ sannyāsināṃ niṣṭhā yathā te vartanta ity etad uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5147: kena punas te tattva-jñānena yuktā yathokta-dharmācaraṇād bhagavataḥ priyā bhavanty evam arthaś cāyam adhyāya ārabhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5148: prakṛtiś ca triguṇātmikā sarva-kārya-karaṇa-viṣayākāreṇa pariṇatā puruṣasya bhogāpavargārtha-kartavyatayā dehendriyādyākāreṇa saṃhanyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5152: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5153: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tad-vidaḥ ||BhG_13.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5154: idam iti sarva-nāmnoktaṃ viśinaṣṭi śariram iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5156: kṣata-trāṇāt kṣayāt kṣaraṇāt, kṣetravad vāsmin karma-phala-niṣpatteḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5160: etac charīraṃ kṣetraṃ yo vetti vijānāti, āpāda-tala-mastakaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5161: jñānena viṣayīkaroti, svābhāvikenaupadeśikena vā vedanena viṣayīkaroti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5162: vibhāgaśaḥ, taṃ veditāraṃ prāhuḥ kathayanti kṣetrajña iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5167: tad-vidas tau kṣetra-kṣetrajñau ye vidanti te tad-vidaḥ ||BhGS_13.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5169: kim etāvan-mātreṇa jñānena jñātavyau? iti nety ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5170: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarva-kṣetreṣu bhārata |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5171: kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama ||BhG_13.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5172: kṣetrajñaṃ yathokta-lakṣaṇaṃ cāpi māṃ parameśvaram asaṃsāriṇaṃ viddhi jānīhi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5177: kṣetra-kṣetrajñeśvara-yāthātmya-vyatirekeṇa na jñāna-gocaram anyad avaśiṣṭam asti, tasmāt kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor jñeya-bhūtayor yaj jñānaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajñau yena jñānena viṣayīkriyete, taj jñānaṃ samyag-jñānam iti matam abhiprāyaḥ mameśvarasya viṣṇoḥ ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5179: nānyas tad-vyatirikto bhoktā vidyate cet, tata īśvarasya saṃsāritvaṃ prāptam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5189: dūram ete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyeti jñātā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5190: [KaṭhU 1.2.4] tathā tayor vidyāvidyā-viṣayayoḥ phala-bhedo 'pi viruddho nirdiṣṭaḥ - śreyaś ca preyaś ca [KaṭhU 1.2.2] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5193: tathā ca vyāsaḥ - dvāv imāv atha panthānau
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5194: [Mbh 12.241.6] ity ādi, imau dvāv eva panthānāv ity ādi ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5196: avidyā ca saha kāryeṇa vidyayā hātavyeti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5198: śrutayas tāvat - iha ced avedīd atha satyam asti na ced ihāvedīn mahatī vinaṣṭiḥ [KenaU 2.5],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5199: tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati [TaittĀ 3.12], nānyaḥ panthā vidyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5201: aviduṣas tu - atha tasya bhayaṃ bhavati [TaittU 2.7], avidyāyām antare vartamānāḥ [KaṭhU 1.2.5], brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati [MuṇḍU 3.2.9],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5202: anyo 'sāv anyo 'ham asmīti na sa veda yathā paśur evaṃ sa devānām [BAU
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5203: ātmavid yaḥ sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati [BAU 1.4.10], yadā carmavat [ŚvetU 6.20] ity ādyāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5204: smṛtayaś ca - ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tena muhyanti jantavaḥ [Gītā 5.25],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5205: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ [Gītā 5.19], samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra [Gītā 13.29] ity ādyāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5207: sarpān kuśāgrāṇi tathodapānaṃ jñātvā manuṣyāḥ parivarjayanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5208: ajñānatas tatra patanti kecij jñāne phalaṃ paśya yathā-viśiṣṭam || [Mbh 12.201.17] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5209: tathā ca - dehādiṣu ātma-buddhir avidvān rāga-dveṣādi-prayukto
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5215: kṣetrajñasyeśvarasyaiva sato 'vidyā-kṛtopādhi-bhedataḥ saṃsāritvam iva bhavati, yathā dehādy-ātmatvam ātmanaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5216: sarva-jantūnāṃ hi prasiddho dehādiṣv anātmasu ātma-bhāvo niścito 'vidyā-kṛtaḥ, yathā sthāṇau puruṣa-niścayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5220: vā cetanasya sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakatvādir ātmano na yuktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5223: iti cet - sthāṇu-puruṣau jñeyāv eva santau
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5227: ato deha-dharmo jñeyo 'pi jñātur ātmano bhavatīti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5229: yadi hi jñeyasya dehādeḥ kṣetrasya dharmāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5230: sukha-duḥkha-mohecchādayo jñātur bhavanti, tarhi, jñeyasya kṣetrasya dharmāḥ kecit ātmano bhavanty avidyādhyāropitāḥ, jarā-maraṇādayas tu na bhavantīti viśeṣa-hetur vaktavyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5232: avidyādhyāropitatvāj jarā-maraṇādivad iti, heyatvāt, upādeyatvāc cety ādi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5233: tatraivaṃ sati, kartṛtva-bhoktṛtva-lakṣaṇaḥ saṃsāro jñeya-stho jñātary avidyayādhyāropita iti, na tena jñātuḥ kiṃcid duṣyati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5235: evaṃ ca sati, sarva-kṣetreṣv api sato bhagavataḥ kṣetrajñasyeśvarasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5237: na hi kvacid api loke 'vidyādhyastena dharmeṇa kasyacid upakāro 'pakāro vā dṛṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5238: yat tūktam - na samo dṛṣṭānta iti, tad asat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5242: yat tu jñātari vyabhicaratīti manyase, tasyāpy anaikāntikatvaṃ darśitaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5244: avidyāvattvāt kṣetrajñasya saṃsāritvam iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5246: tāmaso hi pratyayaḥ, āvaraṇātmakatvād avidyā viparīta-grāhakaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5249: tāmase cāvaraṇātmake timirādi-doṣe saty agrahaṇāder avidyā-trayasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5254: yat tu manyase - jñātṛ-dharmo 'vidyā, tad eva cāvidyā-dharmavattvaṃ kṣetrajñasya saṃsāritvam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5255: tatra yad uktam īśvara eva kṣetrajñaḥ, na saṃsārīty etad ayuktam iti, tan na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5258: viparītādi-grahaṇaṃ tan-nimittaṃ vā taimirikatvādi-doṣo grahītuḥ, cakṣuṣaḥ saṃskāreṇa timire 'panīte grahītur adarśanān na grahītur dharmo yathā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5260: karaṇasyaiva kasyacit bhavitum arhanti, na jñātuḥ kṣetrajñasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5261: saṃvedyatvāc ca teṣāṃ pradīpa-prakāśavan na jñātṛ-dharmatvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5264: ātmano yadi kṣetrajñasyāgny-uṣṇavat svo dharmaḥ, tato na kadācid api tena viyogaḥ syāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5265: | avikriyasya ca vyomavat sarva-gatasyāmūrtasya ātmanaḥ kenacit saṃyoga-viyogānupapatteḥ, siddhaṃ kṣetrajñasya nityam eveśvaratvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5267: nanv evaṃ sati saṃsāra-saṃsāritvābhāve śāstrānarthakyādi-doṣaḥ syād iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5269: sarvair hy ātma-vādibhir abhyupagato doṣo naikena parihartavyo bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5270: katham abhyupagata iti ? muktātmanāṃ hi saṃsāra-saṃsāritva-vyavahārābhāvaḥ sarvair eva ātma-vādibhir iṣyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5272: tathā naḥ kṣetrajñānām īśvaraikatve sati, śāstrānarthakyaṃ bhavatu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5274: cārthavattvam - yathā dvaitināṃ sarveṣāṃ bandhāvasthāyām eva śāstrādy-arthavattvam, na muktāvasthāyām, evam ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5275: nanv ātmano bandha-muktāvasthe paramārthata eva vastu-bhūte dvaitināṃ sarveṣām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5278: bandhāvasthāyāś cātmano 'paramārthatve nirviṣayatvāt, śāstrādyānarthakyam iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5282: yugapat tāvat virodhān na saṃbhavataḥ sthiti-gatī ivaikasmin |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5287: kiṃ ca, bandha-muktāvasthayoḥ paurvāparya-nirūpaṇāyāṃ bandhāvasthā pūrvaṃ prakalpyā, anādimaty antavatī ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5290: na cāvasthāvato 'vasthāntaraṃ gacchato nityatvam upapādayituṃ śakyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5295: | aviduṣāṃ hi phala-hetvor anātmanor ātma-darśanam, na viduṣām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5296: viduṣāṃ hi phala-hetubhyām ātmano 'nyatva-darśane sati, tayor aham ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5298: na hy atyanta-mūḍha unmattādir api jalāgnyoś
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5301: tasmān na vidhi-pratiṣedha-śāstraṃ tāvat phala-hetubhyām ātmano 'nyatva-darśino
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5303: na hi “devadatta, tvam idaṃ kuru” iti kasmiṃścit karmaṇi niyukte,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5304: “viṣṇumitro 'haṃ niyuktaḥ” iti tatra-stho niyogaṃ sṛṇvann api pratipadyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5314: vyatiriktātma-darśana-pratipatteḥ prāg eva phala-hetvor ātmābhimānasya siddhatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5319: nanu svarga-kāmo yajeta [Ap.Śr.S. 10.2.1] na kalañjaṃ bhakṣayed ity ādāv ātma-vyatireka-darśinām apravṛttau, kevala-dehādy-ātma-dṛṣṭīnāṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5320: ataḥ kartur abhāvāc chāstrānarthakyam iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5324: tathā nairātmyavādy api nāsti para-loka iti na pravartate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5330: vivekinām apravṛtti-darśanāt tad-anugāminām apravṛttau śāstrānarthakyam iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5332: anekeṣu hi prāṇiṣu kaścid eva vivekī syāt, yathedānīm |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5336: svabhāvas tu pravartate [Gītā 5.14] iti hi uktam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5341: na hy ūṣara-deśaṃ snehena paṅkī-kartuṃ śaknoti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5343: tathāvidyā kṣetrajñasya na kiṃcit kartuṃ śaknoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5344: ataś cedam uktam - kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5347: atha kim idaṃ saṃsāriṇām ivāham evam mamaivedam iti paṇḍitānām api ? sṛṇu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5348: | idaṃ tat pāṇḍityam, yat kṣetra evātma-darśanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5349: yadi punaḥ kṣetrajñam avikriyaṃ paśyeyus tato na bhogaṃ karma vākāṅkṣeyur mama syād iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5354: idaṃ cānyat pāṇḍityaṃ kasyacid astu - kṣetrajña īśvara eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5356: ahaṃ tu saṃsārī sukhī duḥkhī ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5357: saṃsāroparamaś ca mama kartavyaḥ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-vijñānena, dhyānena ceśvaraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā tat-svarūpāvasthāneneti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5358: yaś caivaṃ budhyate, yaś ca bodhayati, nāsau kṣetrajña iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5361: ātmahā svayaṃ mūḍho 'nyāṃ ca vyāmohayati śāstrārtha-saṃpradāya-rahitatvāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5365: yat tūktam īśvarasya kṣetrajñaikatve saṃsāritvaṃ prāpnoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5367: etau doṣau pratyuktau vidyāvidyayor vailakṣaṇyābhyupagamād iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5369: avidyā-parikalpita-doṣeṇa tad-viṣayaṃ vastu pāramārthikaṃ na duṣyatīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5370: tathā ca dṛṣṭanto darśitaḥ - marīcy-ambhasā ūṣara-deśo na paṅkīkriyata iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5375: sukhitva-duḥkhitvādi pratyakṣam upalabhyate iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5378: yāvat kiṃcit kṣetrajñasya doṣa-jātam avidyamānam āsañjayasi, tasya jñeyatvopapatteḥ kṣetra-dharmatvam eva, na kṣetrajña-dharmatvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5379: na ca tena kṣetrajño duṣyati, jñeyena jñātuḥ saṃsargānupapatteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5380: yadi hi saṃsargaḥ syāt, jñeyatvam eva nopapadyeta |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5382: 'vidyāvattvaṃ duḥkhitvādi ca kathaṃ bhoḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5384: jñeyaṃ ca sarvaṃ kṣetraṃ jñātaiva kṣetrajña ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5386: kṣetrajña-dharmatvaṃ tasya ca pratyakṣopalabhyatvam iti viruddham ucyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5392: atrocyate - avidyā kasya dṛśyate iti praśno nirarthakaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5394: dṛśyate ced avidyā, tadvantam api paśyasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5395: na ca tadvaty upalabhyamāne sā kasya ? iti praśno yuktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5396: na hi gomati upalabhyamāne gāvaḥ kasya ? iti praśno 'rthavān bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5403: jñāte, kiṃ tava syāt ? avidyāyā anartha-hetutvāt parihartavyā syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5406: jānāsi tarhy avidyāṃ tadvantaṃ ca ātmānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5408: anumānenaś cej jānāsi, kathaṃ saṃbandhagrahaṇam ? na hi tava jñātuḥ jñeya-bhūtayāvidyayā tat-kāle saṃbandho grahītuṃ śakyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5410: na ca jñātur avidyāyā ca saṃbandhasya yo grahītā, jñānaṃ cānyat tad-viṣayaṃ saṃbhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5412: yadi jñātrāpi jñeya-saṃbandho jñāyate, anyo jñātā kalpyaḥ syāt, tasyāpy anyaḥ, tasyāpy anyaḥ ity anavasthāparihāryā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5413: yadi punar avidyā jñeyā, anyad vā jñeyaṃ jñeyam eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5416: yadā caivam, avidyā-duḥkhitvādyair na jñātuḥ kṣetrajñasya kiṃcit duṣyati ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5417: nanu ayam eva doṣaḥ, yat doṣavat-kṣetra-vijñātṛtvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5421: yathātra bhagavatā kriyākāraka-phalātmatvābhāva ātmani svata eva darśitaḥ - avidyādhyāropita eva kriyā-kārakādir ātmany upacaryate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5422: tathā tatra tatra ya enaṃ vetti hantāram [Gītā 2.19], prakṛteḥ kriyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi sarvaśaḥ [Gītā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5423: 3.27], nādatte kasyacit pāpam [Gītā 5.15] ity ādi-prakaraṇeṣu darśitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5426: hanta ! tarhy ātmani kriyā-kāraka-phalātmatāyāḥ svato 'bhāve, avidyayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5427: cādhyāropitatve, karmāṇy avidvat-kartavyāny eva, na viduṣām iti prāptam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5428: satyam evaṃ prāptam, etad eva ca na hi deha-bhṛtā śakyam ity atra
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5430: sarva-śāstrārthopasaṃhāra-prakaraṇe ca samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā ity atra viśeṣato darśayiṣyāmaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5433: saṃgraha-śloko 'yam upanyasyate tat kṣetraṃ yac cety ādi, vyācikhyāsitasya hy arthasya saṃgrahopanyāso nyāyya iti -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5434: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yad-vikāri yataś ca yat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5435: sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu ||BhG_13.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5436: yan nirdiṣṭam idaṃ śarīram iti tat tac-chabdena parāmṛśati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5437: yac ca idaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ kṣetraṃ tat yādṛk yādṛśaṃ svakīyair dharmaiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5440: yad-vikāri yo vikāro yasya tat yad-vikāri, yato yasmāc ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5442: sa ca yaḥ kṣetrajño nirdiṣṭaḥ sa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5443: yat-prabhāvo ye prabhāvā upādhi-kṛtāḥ śaktayo yasya sa yat-prabhāvaś ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5444: tat kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor yāthātmyaṃ yathā-viśeṣitaṃ samāsena saṃkṣepeṇa me
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5448: ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5450: ṛṣibhir vasiṣṭhādibhir bahudhā bahu-prakāraṃ gītaṃ kathitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5451: chandobhiś chandāṃsi ṛg-ādīni taiś chandobhir vividhair nānā-bhāvair nānā-prakāraiḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5453: kiṃ ca, brahma-sūtra-padaiś caiva brahmaṇaḥ sūcakāni vākyāni brahma-sūtrāṇi taiḥ padyate gamyate jñāyata iti tāni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5454: padāny ucyante tair eva ca kṣetra-kṣetrajña-yāthātmyam gītam ity anuvartate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5455: ātmety evopāsīta ity evam ādibhir brahma-sūtra-padair ātmā jñāyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5459: mahā-bhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5461: mahā-bhūtāni mahānti ca tāni sarva-vikāra-vyāpakatvād bhūtāni ca sūkṣmāṇi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5467: tat-kāraṇam avyaktam eva ca, na vyaktam avyaktam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5468: avyākṛtam īśvara-śaktir mama māyā duratyayā ity uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5473: indriyāṇi daśa, śrotrādīni pañca buddhy-utpādakatvād buddhīndriyāṇi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5481: athedānīṃ ātma-guṇāḥ iti yān ācakṣate vaiśeṣikās te 'pi kṣetra-dharmā eva,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5483: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5485: icchā yaj-jātīyaṃ sukha-hetum artham upalabdhavān pūrvam, punas
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5486: taj-jātīyam upalabhamānas tam ādātum icchati sukha-hetur iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5490: arthaṃ duḥkha-hetutvenānubhūtavān, punas taj-jātīyam artham upalabhamānas taṃ dveṣṭi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5506: etat kṣetraṃ samāsena sa-vikāraṃ saha vikāreṇa mahad-ādinā udāhṛtam uktam ||BhGS_13.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5507: yasya kṣetra-bheda-jātasya saṃhatiḥ idaṃ śarīraṃ kṣetram [Gītā 13.2] ity uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5509: kṣetrajño vakṣyamāṇa-viśeṣaṇaḥ - yasya sa-prabhāvasya kṣetrajñasya parijñānād amṛtatvaṃ bhavati, tam jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmīty ādinā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5511: adhunā tu taj-jñāna-sādhana-gaṇam amānitvādi-lakṣaṇam, yasmin sati taj-jñeya-vijñāne
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5512: yogyo 'dhikṛto bhavati, yat-paraḥ saṃnyāsī jñāna-niṣṭha ucyate, tam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5516: amānitvaṃ mānino bhāvaḥ mānitvam ātmano ślāghanam, tad-abhāvo 'mānitvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5529: ātma-śabda-vācyasya kārya-karaṇa-saṃghātasya vinigrahaḥ svabhāvena sarvataḥ pravṛttasya san-mārga eva nirodha ātma-vinigrahaḥ ||BhGS_13.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5533: indriyārtheṣu śabdādiṣu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭeṣu bhogeṣu virāga-bhāvo vairāgyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5535: janma-mṛtyu-jarā-vyādhi-duḥkha-doṣānudarśanaṃ janma ca mṛtyuś ca jarā ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5536: vyādhayaś ca duḥkhāni ca teṣu janmādi-duḥkhānteṣu pratyekaṃ doṣānudarśanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5546: duḥkha-nimittatvāj janmādayo duḥkham, na punaḥ svarūpeṇaiva duḥkham iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5555: asaktiḥ saktiḥ saṅga-nimitteṣu viṣayeṣu prīti-mātram, tad-abhāvo 'saktiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5559: yathānyasmin sukhini duḥkhini vāham eva sukhī, duḥkhī ca, jīvati mṛte vāham eva jīvāmi mariṣyāmi ceti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5561: putreṣu dāreṣu gṛheṣv ādi-grahaṇād anyeṣv apy atyanteṣṭeṣu dāsa-vargādiṣu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5564: kva ? iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣv iṣṭānām aniṣṭānāṃ copapattayaḥ saṃprāptayas tāsv iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu nityam eva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5566: iṣṭopapattiṣu na hṛṣyati, na kupyati cāniṣṭopapattiṣu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5571: mayi ceśvare 'nanya-yogena apṛthak-samādhinā nānyo bhagavato vāsudevāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5572: paro 'sti, ataḥ sa eva no gatir ity evaṃ niścitāvyabhicāriṇī buddhir
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5573: ananya-yogaḥ, tena bhajanaṃ bhaktir na vyabhicaraṇa-śīlā avyabhicāriṇī |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5577: vāśucy-ādibhiḥ sarpa-vyāghrādibhiś ca rahito 'raṇya-nadī-pulina-deva-gṛhādibhir vivikto deśaḥ, taṃ sevituṃ śīlam asyeti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5579: vivikteṣu hi deśeṣu cittaṃ prasīdati yatas tataḥ ātmādi-bhāvanā vivikta upajāyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5583: janānāṃ prākṛtānāṃ saṃskāra-śūnyānām avinītānāṃ saṃsat samavāyo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5590: etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā ||BhG_13.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5599: amānitvādi-tattva-jñānārtha-darśanāntam uktaṃ jñānam iti proktaṃ jñānārthatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5600: ajñānaṃ yad ato 'smād yathoktād anyathā viparyayeṇa |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5601: mānitvaṃ dambhitvaṃ hiṃsā kṣāntir anārjavam ity ādy ajñānaṃ vijñeyaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5603: yathoktena jñānena jñātavyaṃ kim ? ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5604: jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5605: anādimat paraṃ brahma na sat tan nāsad ucyate ||BhG_13.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5608: na hy amānitvādi kasyacit vastunaḥ paricchedakaṃ dṛṣṭam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5609: sarvatraiva ca yad-viṣayaṃ jñānaṃ tad eva tasya jñeyasya paricchedakaṃ dṛśyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5610: na hy anya-viṣayeṇa jñānenānyad upalabhyate, yathā ghaṭa-viṣayeṇa jñānenāgniḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5612: jñāna-nimittatvāj jñānam ucyata iti hy avocāma |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5614: jñeyaṃ jñātavyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi prakarṣeṇa yathāvat vakṣyāmi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5616: abhimukhīkaraṇāyāha - yaj jñeyaṃ jñātvāmṛtam amṛtatvam aśnute, na punar mriyata ity arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5617: anādimat ādir asyāstīti ādimat, nādimad anādimat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5618: kiṃ tat ? paraṃ niratiśayaṃ brahma, jñeyam iti prakṛtam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5619: atra kecit anādi mat-param iti padaṃ chindanti, bahu-vrīhiṇokte 'rthe
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5621: artha-viśeṣaṃ ca darśayanti - ahaṃ vāsudevākhyā parā śaktir yasya tan mat-param iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5625: brahmaṇaḥ sarva-viśeṣa-pratiṣedhenaiva vijijñāpayiṣitvān na sat tan nāsad ucyate iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5630: prarocanenābhimukhīkṛtyāha - na sat taj jñeyam ucyate iti nāpy asat tad
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5632: nanu mahatā parikara-bandhena kaṇṭha-raveṇodghuṣya jñeyaṃ pravakṣyāmīti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5633: ananurūpam uktaṃ na sat tan nāsad ucyata iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5635: katham ? sarvāsu hy upaniṣatsu jñeyaṃ brahma neti neti [BAU 2.3.6]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5638: nanu na tad asti, yad vastv asti-śabdena nocyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5645: tatraivaṃ sati jñeyam apy asti-buddhy-anugata-pratyaya-viṣayaṃ vā syāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5653: idaṃ tu jñeyam atīndriyatvena śabdaika-pramāṇa-gamyatvān na ghaṭādivad ubhaya-buddhy-anugata-pratyaya-viṣayam ity ato na sat tan nāsad ity ucyate ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5654: yat tūktam - viruddham ucyate, jñeyaṃ tan na sat tan nāsad ucyata iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5656: viruddham, anyad eva tad-viditād atho aviditād adhi [KenaU 1.3] iti śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5657: śrutir api viruddhārthā iti cet - yathā yajñāya śālām ārabhya yajñam ko
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5658: hi tad veda yady amuṣmin loke 'sti vā na veti [TaittS 6.1.1] ity evam iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5661: avaśya-vijñeyārtha-pratipādana-paratvāt yady amuṣmin ity ādi tu vidhi-śeṣo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5663: upapatteś ca sad-asad-ādi-śabdair brahma nocyata iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5664: sarvo hi śabdo 'rtha-prakāśanāya prayuktaḥ śrūyamāṇaś ca śrotṛbhir
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5668: tad yathā - gaur aśva iti vā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5669: jātitaḥ, pacati paṭhatīti vā kriyātaḥ, śuklaḥ kṛṣṇa iti vā guṇataḥ, dhanī gomān iti vā saṃbandhataḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5670: na tu brahma jātimat, ato na sad-ādi-śabda-vācyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5672: nāpi kriyā-śabda-vācyaṃ niṣkriyatvān niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntam [ŚvetU
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5675: advayatvād aviṣayatvād ātmatvāc ca na kenacit, śabdenocyata iti yuktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5678: sac-chabda-pratyayāviṣayatvād asattvāśaṅkāyāṃ jñeyasya sarva-prāṇi-karaṇopādhi-dvāreṇa tad-astitvaṃ pratipādayan
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5681: sarvataḥ śrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati ||BhG_13.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5682: sarvataḥ pāṇi-pādaṃ sarvataḥ pāṇayaḥ pādāś cāsyeti sarvataḥ pāṇi-pādaṃ taj jñeyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5687: tad-apanayanena jñeyatvam uktam na sat tan nāsad ucyate iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5689: mithyā-rūpam apy astitvādhigamāya jñeya-dharmavat parikalpya ucyate sarvataḥ pāṇi-pādam ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5694: jñeya-śakti-sad-bhāva-nimitta-svakāryā iti jñeya-sad-bhāve liṅgāni jñeyasyeti upacārata ucyante
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5698: sarvato 'kṣi-śiro-mukhaṃ sarvato 'kṣīṇi śirāṃsi mukhāni ca yasya tat sarvato 'kṣi-śiro-mukham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5703: sarvam āvṛtya saṃvyāpya tiṣṭhati sthitiṃ labhate ||BhGS_13.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5704: upādhibhūta-pāṇi-pādādīndriyādhyāropaṇāj jñeyasya tadvattāśaṅkā mā bhūd ity evam arthaḥ ślokārambhaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5706: asaktaṃ sarva-bhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇa-bhoktṛ ca ||BhG_13.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5711: antaḥ-karaṇopādhi-dvāreṇaiva śrotrādīnām api upādhitvam ity ato 'ntaḥ-karaṇa-bahiṣkaraṇopādhi-bhūtaiḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5712: adhyavasāya-saṃkalpa-śravaṇa-vacanādibhir avabhāsate iti sarvendriya-guṇābhāsaṃ sarvendriya-vyāpārair vyāpṛtam iva taj jñeyam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5714: kasmāt punaḥ kāraṇān na vyāpṛtam eveti gṛhyata ity ataḥ āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5716: ato na karaṇa-vyāpāraiḥ vyāpṛtaṃ taj jñeyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5718: javano grahītā paśyaty acakṣuḥ sa sṛṇoty akarṇaḥ [ŚvetU 3.19] ity ādiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5720: pradarśanārthaḥ, na tu sākṣād eva javanādi-kriyāvattva-pradarśanārthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5721: andho maṇim avindad [TaittĀ 1.11] ity ādi-mantrārthavat tasya mantrasyārthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5722: yasmāt sarva-karaṇa-varjitaṃ jñeyam, tasmād asaktaṃ sarva-saṃśleṣavarjitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5728: syād idaṃ cānyaj jñeyasya sattvādhigama-dvāram - nirguṇaṃ sattva-rajas-tamāṃsi guṇās tair varjitaṃ taj jñeyam, tathāpi guṇa-bhoktṛ ca guṇānāṃ sattva-rajas-tamasāṃ śabdādi-dvāreṇa sukha-duḥkha-mohākāra-pariṇatānāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5729: bhoktṛ copalabdhṛ ca taj jñeyam ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_13.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5731: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5732: sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūra-sthaṃ cāntike ca tat ||BhG_13.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5733: bahis tvak-paryantaṃ deham ātmatvenāvidyā-kalpitam apekṣya tam evāvavadhiṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5735: tathā pratyag-ātmānam apekṣya deham evāvadhiṃ kṛtvā antar ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5736: bahir antaś cety ukte madhye 'bhāve prāpte, idam ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5737: acaraṃ caram eva ca, yac carācaraṃ dehābhāsam api tad eva jñeyaṃ, yathā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5739: yady acaraṃ caram eva ca syāt vyavahāra-viṣayaṃ sarvaṃ jñeyam, kim-artham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5740: idam iti sarvair na vijñeyam ? ity ucyate - satyaṃ sarvābhāsaṃ tat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5742: ataḥ sūkṣmatvāt svena rūpeṇa taj jñeyam apy avijñeyam aviduṣām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5744: brahmaivedaṃ sarvam [BAU 2.5.1] ity ādi-pramāṇato nityaṃ vijñātam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5748: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5749: bhūta-bhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca ||BhG_13.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5750: avibhaktaṃ ca pratidehaṃ vyomavat tad ekam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5752: vibhaktam iva ca sthitaṃ deheṣv eva vibhāvyamānatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5753: bhūta-bhartṛ ca bhūtāni bibharti taj jñeyaṃ bhūta-bhartṛ ca sthiti-kāle |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5758: kiṃ ca, sarvatra vidyamānam api san nopalabhyate cet, jñeyaṃ tamas tarhi ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5761: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5762: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñāna-gamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam ||BhG_13.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5763: jyotiṣām ādity-ādīnām api taj jñeyaṃ jyotiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5765: hy ādity-ādīni jyotīṃṣi dīpyante, yena sūryas tapati tejaseddhaḥ [TaittBr
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5766: 3.12.9], tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti [ŚvetU 6.14] īty ādi-śrutibhyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5767: smṛte ca ihaiva - yad āditya-gataṃ tejaḥ [Gītā 15.12] ity ādeḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5772: jñeyam jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmīty [Gītā 13.13] ādinoktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5776: tad etat trayam api hṛdi buddhau sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya viṣṭhitaṃ viśeṣeṇa sthitam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5779: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5781: ity evaṃ kṣetraṃ mahā-bhūtādi-dhṛty-antaṃ, tathā jñānam amānitvādi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5782: tattva-jñānārtha-darśana-paryantaṃ, jñeyaṃ ca jñeyaṃ yat tat ity ādi tamasaḥ param ucyate ity evam antam uktaṃ samāsataḥ saṃkṣepataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5783: etāvān sarvo hi vedārtho gītārthaś copasaṃhṛtyoktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5785: 'dhikriyate ? ity ucyate - mad-bhakto mayīśvare sarvajñe parama-gurau
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5786: vāsudeve samarpita-sarvātma-bhāvo yat paśyati śṛṇoti spṛśati vā sarvam eva bhagavān vāsudevaḥ ity evaṃ-grahāviṣṭa-buddhir mad-bhaktaḥ sa etad yathoktaṃ samyag darśanaṃ vijñāya, mad-bhāvāya mama bhāvo mad-bhāvaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5787: paramātma-bhāvas tasmai mad-bhāvāya upapadyate, mokṣaṃ gacchati ||BhGS_13.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5788: tatra saptame īśvarasya dve prakṛtī upanyaste parāpare
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5791: kṣetra-kṣetrajña-prakṛti-dvaya-yonitvaṃ kathaṃ bhūtānām ity ayam artho 'dhunocyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5792: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5793: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛti-saṃbhavān ||BhG_13.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5795: tau prakṛti-puruṣau ubhāv apy anādi viddhi, na vidyate ādir yayos tau anādī |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5796: nityeśvaratvād īśvarasya tat-prakṛtyor api yuktaṃ nityatvena bhavitum |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5799: jagad-utpatti-sthiti-pralaya-hetus te dve 'nādī satyau saṃsārasya kāraṇam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5800: nādī anādī iti tat-puruṣa-samāsaṃ kecit varṇayanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5802: yadi punaḥ prakṛti-puruṣāv eva nityau syātāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5803: tat-kṛtam eva jagat, neśvarasya jagataḥ kartṛtvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5809: nityatve punar īśvarasya prakṛtyoḥ sarvam etad upapannaṃ bhavet |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5811: vakṣyamāṇān vikārān buddhy-ādi-dehendriyāntān guṇāṃś ca sukha-duḥkha-moha-pratyayākāra-pariṇatān viddhi jānīhi prakṛti-saṃbhavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5813: sā saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ vikārāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ ca tān vikārān guṇāṃś ca viddhi prakṛti-saṃbhavān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5815: ke punas te vikārāḥ guṇāś ca prakṛti-saṃbhavāḥ ? ity āha --
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5818: kārya-karaṇa-kartṛtve - kāryaṃ śarīraṃ karaṇāni tat-sthāni trayodaśa |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5819: dehasyārambhakāṇi bhūtāni pañca viṣayāś ca prakṛti-saṃbhavāḥ vikārāḥ pūrvoktā iha kārya-grahaṇena gṛhyante |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5823: kārya-karaṇānāṃ kartṛtvam utpādakatvaṃ yat tat kārya-karaṇa-kartṛtvaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5824: tasmin kārya-karaṇa-kartṛtve hetuḥ kāraṇam ārambhakatvena prakṛtir ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5826: kārya-kāraṇa-kartṛtve ity asminn api pāṭhe, kāryaṃ yat yasya pariṇāmas tat tasya kāryaṃ vikāro vikāri kāraṇaṃ tayor vikāra-vikāriṇoḥ kārya-kāraṇayoḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5828: athavā, ṣoḍāśa vikārāḥ kāryaṃ sapta prakṛti-vikṛtayaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5829: kāraṇam tāny eva kārya-kāraṇāny ucyante teṣāṃ kartṛtve hetuḥ prakṛtir ucyate, ārambhakatvenaiva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5830: puruṣaś ca saṃsārasya kāraṇaṃ yathā syāt tad ucyate - puruṣo jīvaḥ kṣetrajño bhoktā iti paryāyaḥ, sukha-duḥkhānāṃ bhogyānāṃ bhoktṛtve upalabdhṛtve hetur ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5834: pariṇāmābhāve, puruṣasya ca cetanasyāsati tad-upalabdhṛtve, kutaḥ saṃsāraḥ syāt ? yadā punaḥ kārya-karaṇa-sukha-duḥkha-svarūpeṇa hetu-phalātmanā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5836: bhoktṛtvenāvidyā-rūpaḥ saṃyogaḥ syāt, tadā saṃsāraḥ syād iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5837: ato yat prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ kārya-karaṇa-kartṛtvena sukha-duḥkha-bhoktṛtvena ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5843: yat puruṣasya sukha-duḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ saṃsāritvam ity uktaṃ tasya tat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5845: puruṣaḥ prakṛti-stho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5853: prakṛtijān prakṛtito jātān sukha-duḥkha-mohākārābhivyaktān guṇān sukhī,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5856: sukha-duḥkha-moheṣu guṇeṣu bhujyamāneṣu yaḥ saṅga ātma-bhāvaḥ saṃsārasya sa pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasya puruṣasya janmanaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5857: sa yathā-kāmo bhavati tat kratur bhavati [BAU 4.4.5] ity ādi śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5858: tad etad āha - kāraṇaṃ hetur guṇa-saṅgo guṇeṣu saṅgo 'sya puruṣasya bhoktuḥ sad-asad-yoni-janmasu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5859: satyaś cāsatyaś ca yonayaḥ sad-asad-yonayas tāsu sad-asad-yonuṣu janmāni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5868: etad uktaṃ bhavati - prakṛti-sthatvākhyāvidyā guṇeṣu ca saṅgaḥ kāmaḥ saṃsārasya kāraṇam iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5870: asya ca nivṛtti-kāraṇaṃ jñāna-vairāgye sa-saṃnyāse gītā-śāstre prasiddham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5871: tac ca jñānaṃ purastād upanyastaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-viṣayam yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5876: paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ ||BhG_13.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5877: upadraṣṭā samīpa-sthaḥ san draṣṭā svayam avyāpṛtaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5880: yajña-vidyā-kuśalaḥ ṛtvig-yajamāna-vyāpāra-guṇa-doṣāṇām īkṣitā, tadvac ca kārya-karaṇa-vyāpāreṣu sa-vyāpārāṇāṃ sāmīpyena draṣṭā upadraṣṭā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5884: tata ārabhyāntaratamaś ca pratyak samīpe ātmā draṣṭā, yataḥ paro 'ntaratamo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5889: anumodanam anumananaṃ kurvatsu tat-kriyāsu paritoṣas tat-kartānumantā ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5890: athavā, anumantā kārya-karaṇa-pravṛttiṣu svayam apravṛtto 'pi pravṛtta iva tad-anukūlo vibhāvyate, tenānumantā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5892: tat-sākṣi-bhūtaḥ kadācid api na nivārayatīty anumantā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5894: caitanyātma-pārārthyena nimitta-bhūtena caitanyābhāsānāṃ yat svarūpa-dhāraṇam, tac caitanyātma-kṛtam eveti bhartā ātmety ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5898: iva jāyamānā vibhaktā vibhāvyante iti bhoktā ātmocyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5900: sarvātmatvāt svatantratvāc ca mahān īśvaraś ceti maheśvaraḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5902: dehādīnāṃ buddhy-antānāṃ pratyag-ātmatvena kalpitānām avidyayā parama
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5908: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ [Gītā 13.3] iti yo vakṣyamāṇaḥ kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi [Gītā 13.2] iti upanyasto vyākhyāyopasaṃhṛtaś ca ||BhGS_13.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5910: ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5912: ya evaṃ yathokta-prakāreṇa vetti puruṣaṃ sākṣād ātma-bhāvena “ayam aham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5913: asmi” iti prakṛtiṃ ca yathoktām avidyā-lakṣaṇāṃ guṇaiḥ sva-vikāraiḥ saha nivartitām abhāvam āpāditāṃ vidyayā, sarvathā sarva-prakāreṇa vartamāno
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5914: 'pi sa bhūyaḥ punaḥ patite 'smin vidvac-charīre dehāntarāya nābhijāyate notpadyate, dehāntaraṃ na gṛhṇātīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5917: nanu, yady api jñānotpatty-anantaraṃ punar-janmābhāva uktaḥ, tathāpi prāg jñānotpatteḥ kṛtānāṃ karmaṇām uttara-kāla-bhāvināṃ ca yāni cātikrāntāneka-janma-kṛtāni teṣāṃ ca phalam adattvā nāśo na yukta iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5918: syus trīṇi janmāni kṛta-vipraṇāśo hi na yukta iti, yathā phale pravṛttānām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5922: tri-prakārāṇy api karmāṇi trīṇi janmāny ārabheran |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5926: ity ataḥ idam ayuktam uktam na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5928: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi [MuṇḍU 2.2.8], brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati [MuṇḍU 3.2.9], tasya tāvad eva ciram [ChāU 6.14.2],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5931: ihāpi cokto yathaidhāṃsi [Gītā 4.37] ity ādinā sarva-karma-dāhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5936: bījāny agny-upadagdhāni na rohanti yathā punaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5937: jñāna-dagdhais tathā kleśair nātmā saṃpadyate punaḥ [Mbh 3.200.10] iti ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5938: astu tāvaj jñānotpatty-uttara-kāla-kṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ jñānena dāhaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5940: na tv iha janmani jñānotpatteḥ prāk kṛtānāṃ karmaṇām atīta-janma-kṛtānāṃ ca dāho yuktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5944: jñānottara-kāla-bhāvinām eva sarva-karmaṇām iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5947: karmāṇi na kṣīyante phala-dānāya pravṛttāny eva saty api jñāne,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5948: tathānārabdha-phalānām api karmaṇāṃ kṣayo na yukta iti, tad asat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5951: yathā pūrvaṃ lakṣya-vedhāya mukta iṣuḥ dhanuṣo lakṣya-vedhottara-kālam api ārabdha-vega-kṣayāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5952: nivartate, evaṃ śarīrārambhakaṃ karma śarīra-sthiti-prayojane nivṛtte 'pi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5956: upasaṃhriyate, tathānārabdha-phalāni karmāṇi svāśraya-sthāny eva jñānena nirbījī-kriyanta iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5963: dhyānaṃ nāma śabdādibhyo viṣayebhyaḥ śrotrādīni karaṇāni manasy
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5964: upasaṃhṛtya, manaś ca pratyak-cetanayitari, ekāgratayā yac cintanaṃ tad dhyānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5965: tathā, dhyāyatīva bakaḥ, dhyāyatīva pṛthivī, dhyāyantīva parvatāḥ [ChāU 7.6.1] iti upamopādānāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5968: tena dhyānena ātmani buddhau paśyanty ātmānaṃ pratyak-cetanam ātmanā svenaiva pratyak-cetanena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5971: sāṃkhyaṃ nāma ime sattva-rajas-tamāṃsi guṇā mayā dṛśyā ahaṃ tebhyo 'nyas
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5972: tad-vyāpāra-sākṣi-bhūto nityo guṇa-vilakṣaṇa ātmeti cintanam eṣa sāṃkhyo yogaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5980: anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhya upāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5982: anye tv eṣu vikalpeṣu anyatamenāpy evaṃ yathoktam ātmānam ajānanto
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5983: 'nyebhyaḥ ācāryebhyaḥ śrutvā “idam eva cintayata” ity uktā upāsate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5985: te 'pi cātitaranty eva atikrāmanty eva mṛtyum mṛtyu-yuktaṃ saṃsāram ity etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5986: śruti-parāyaṇāḥ śrutiḥ śravaṇaṃ param ayanaṃ gamanaṃ mokṣa-mārga-pravṛttau paraṃ sādhanaṃ yeṣāṃ te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5989: kim u vaktavyam pramāṇaṃ prati svatantrā vivekino mṛtyum atitarantīty abhiprāyaḥ ||BhGS_13.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5990: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi [Gītā 13.3] iti kṣetrajñeśvarakatva-viṣayaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5991: jñānaṃ mokṣa-sādhanaṃ, yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute [Gītā 13.13] ity uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5992: tat kasmāt hetoḥ ? iti tad-dhetu-pradarśanārthaṃ śloka ārabhyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5995: yāvat yat kiṃcit saṃjāyate samutpadyate sattvaṃ vastu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5997: nety āha - sthāvara-jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5998: kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogāt taj jāyate ity evaṃ viddhi jānīhi bharatarṣabha
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5999: kaḥ punar ayaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogo 'bhipretaḥ ? na tāvat rajjveva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6000: ghaṭasyāvayava-saṃśleṣa-dvārakaḥ saṃbandha-viśeṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ kṣetreṇa kṣetrajñasya saṃbhavati, ākāśavat niravayavatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6012: darśita-rūpāt kṣetrān muñjād iveṣīkāṃ yathokta-lakṣaṇaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ pravibhajya na sat tan nāsad ucyate [Gītā 13.13] ity anena nirasta-sarvopādhi-viśeṣaṃ jñeyaṃ brahma-svarūpeṇa yaḥ paśyati, kṣetraṃ ca māyā-nirmita-hasti-svapna-dṛṣṭa-vastuvad gandharva-nagarādivad asad eva sad ivāvabhāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6016: janma-hetor apagamād ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha [Gītā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6017: 13.25] ity anena vidvān bhūyo nābhijāyate iti yad uktam, tad upapannam uktam ||BhGS_13.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6018: na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate [Gītā 13.24] iti samyag darśana-phalam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6022: atas tasyāḥ avidyāyā nivartakaṃ samyag-darśanam uktam api punaḥ śabdāntareṇocyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6024: vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ||BhG_13.27||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6026: kva ? sarveṣu samasteṣu bhūteṣu brahmādi-sthāvarānteṣu prāṇiṣu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6028: dehendriya-mano-buddhy-avyaktātmano 'pekṣya parameśvaraḥ, taṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu samaṃ tiṣṭhantam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6030: taṃ ca parameśvaram avinaśyantam iti, bhūtānāṃ parameśvarasya cātyanta-vailakṣaṇya-pradarśanārtham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6031: katham ? sarveṣāṃ hi bhāva-vikārāṇāṃ jani-lakṣaṇo bhāva-vikāro mūlam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6034: vināśāt paro na kaścid asti bhāva-vikāraḥ, bhāvābhāvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6039: tasmāt sarva-bhūtaiḥ vailakṣaṇyam atyantam eva parameśvarasya siddham, nirviśeṣatvam ekatvaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6040: ya evaṃ yathoktaṃ parameśvaraṃ paśyati, sa paśyati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6041: nanu sarvo 'pi lokaḥ paśyati, kiṃ viśeṣaṇeneti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6046: anekaṃ candraṃ paśyati, tam apekṣya eka-candra-darśī viśiṣyate - sa eva paśyatīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6047: tathaivehāpy ekam avibhaktaṃ yathoktaṃ ātmānaṃ yaḥ paśyati, sa vibhaktān ekātma-viparīta-darśibhyo viśiṣyate - sa eva paśyatīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6050: yathoktasya samyag-darśanasya phala-vacanena stutiḥ kartavyā iti śloka ārabhyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6051: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6052: na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim ||BhG_13.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6053: samaṃ paśyann upalabhamāno hi yasmāt sarvatra sarva-bhūteṣu samavasthitaṃ tulyatayāvasthitam īśvaram atītānantara-ślokokta-lakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6054: samaṃ paśyan kim ? na hinasti hiṃsāṃ na karoti ātmanā svenaiva svam ātmānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6055: tat-tad-ahiṃsanād yāti parāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatiṃ mokṣākhyām ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6056: nanu naiva kaścit prāṇī svayaṃ svam ātmānaṃ hinasti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6057: katham ucyate 'prāptam na hinastīti ? yathā na pṛthivyām nāntarikṣe na divy agniś cetavyaḥ [TaittS 5.2.7.1] ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6060: sarvo hy ajño 'tyanta-prasiddhaṃ sākṣād aparokṣād ātmānaṃ tiraskṛtyānātmānam ātmatvena parigṛhya, tam api dharmādharmau kṛtvopāttam ātmānaṃ hatvānyam ātmānam upādatte navaṃ, taṃ caivaṃ hatvānyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6061: evaṃ tam api hatvānyam ity evam upāttam upāttam ātmānaṃ hantīty ātmahā sarvo 'jñaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6062: yas tu paramārthātmāsāv api sarvadāvidyayā hata iva vidyamāna-phalābhāvād iti sarve ātma-hana evāvidvāṃsaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6063: yas tv itaro yathoktātma-darśī, sa ubhayathāpi ātmanātmānaṃ na hinasti na hanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6064: tato yāti parāṃ gatim yathoktaṃ phalaṃ tasya bhavatīty arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6065: sarva-bhūta-stham īśvaraṃ samaṃ paśyan na hinasty ātmanātmānam [Gītā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6067: tad anupapannaṃ sva-guṇa-karma-vailakṣaṇya-bheda-bhinneṣv ātmasu, ity etad āśaṅkyāha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6069: yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati ||BhG_13.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6075: kriyamāṇāni nirvartyamānāni sarvaśaḥ sarva-prakārair yaḥ paśyaty upalabhate, tathātmānaṃ kṣetrajñam akartāraṃ sarvopādhi-vivarjitaṃ sa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6077: nirguṇasyākartur nirviśeṣasyākāśasyeva bhede pramāṇānupapattir ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_13.29||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6078: punar api tad eva samyag darśanaṃ śabdāntareṇa prapañcayati -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6080: tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā ||BhG_13.30||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6081: yadā yasmin kāle bhūta-pṛthag-bhāvaṃ bhūtānāṃ pṛthag-bhāvaṃ pṛthaktvam ekasminn ātmani sthitaṃ eka-stham anupaśyati śāstrācāryopadeśam anu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6082: ātmānaṃ pratyakṣatvena paśyaty ātmaivedaṃ sarvam [ChāU 7.25.2] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6083: tata eva ca tasmād eva ca vistāraṃ utpattiṃ vikāsam ātmataḥ prāṇa ātmata āśā ātmataḥ smara ātmata ākāśa ātmatas teja ātmata āpa ātmata
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6085: vistāraṃ yadā paśyati brahma saṃpadyate bhavati tadā tasmin kāla ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_13.30||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6086: ekasyātmānaḥ sarva-dehātmatve tad-doṣa-saṃbandhe prāpte, idam ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6088: śarīra-stho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate ||BhG_13.31||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6090: anāder bhāvo 'nāditvam, ādiḥ kāraṇam, tad yasya nāsti tad anādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6091: yad dhy ādimat tat svenātmanā vyeti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6092: ayaṃ tv anāditvān niravayava iti kṛtvā na vyeti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6095: ayaṃ tu nirguṇatvāc ca na vyeti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6098: yata evam ataḥ śarīra-stho 'pi, śarīreṣu ātmana upalabdhir bhavatīti śarīra-stha ucyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6102: yo hi kartā, sa karma-phalena lipyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6103: ayaṃ tv akartā, ato na phalena lipyate ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6104: kaḥ punar deheṣu karoti lipyate ca ? yadi tāvat anyaḥ paramātmano dehī karoti lipyate ca, tataḥ idam anupapannam uktaṃ kṣetrajñeśvaraikatvam kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi [Gītā 13.2] ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6106: kaḥ karoti lipyate ca ? iti vācyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6107: paro vā nāstīti sarvathā durvijñeyaṃ durvācyaṃ ceti bhagavat-proktam aupaniṣadaṃ darśanaṃ parityaktaṃ vaiśeṣikaiḥ sāṃkhyārhata-bauddhaiś ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6108: tatrāyaṃ parihāro bhagavatā svenaiva uktaḥ svabhāvas tu pravartate [Gītā 5.14] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6109: avidyā-mātra-svabhāvo hi karoti lipyate iti vyavahāro bhavati, na tu paramārthata ekasmin paramātmani tad asti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6111: paramahaṃsa-parivrājakānāṃ tiraskṛtāvidyā-vyavahārāṇāṃ karmādhikāro nāstīti tatra tatra darśitaṃ bhagavatā ||BhGS_13.31||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6112: kim iva na karoti na lipyate ity atra dṛṣṭāntam āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6115: yathā sarva-gataṃ vyāpy api sat saukṣmyāt sūkṣma-bhāvād ākāśaṃ khaṃ nopalipyate na saṃbadhyate, sarvatrāvasthito dehe tathātmā nopalipyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6117: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6118: kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata ||BhG_13.34||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6119: yathā prakāśayaty avabhāsayati ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ savitā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6120: ādityaḥ, tathā tadvat mahā-bhūtādi-dhṛty-antaṃ kṣetram ekaḥ san
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6129: bhūta-prakṛti-mokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param ||BhG_13.35||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6133: cakṣuḥ, tena jñāna-cakṣuṣā, bhūta-prakṛti-mokṣaṃ ca, bhūtānāṃ prakṛtir avidyā-lakṣaṇāvyaktākhyā, tasyā bhūta-prakṛter mokṣaṇam abhāva-gamanaṃ ca ye vidur vijānanti, yānti gacchanti te paraṃ paramātma-tattvaṃ brahma, na punar dehaṃ ādadate ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_13.35||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6141: sarvam utpadyamānaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogād utpadyata ity uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6143: kathamiti, tat-pradarśanārtham paraṃ bhūya ity ādir adhyāya ārabhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6144: athavā, īśvara-paratantrayoḥ kṣetra-kṣetrajñayoḥ jagat-kāraṇatvaṃ na tu sāṃkhyānām iva svatantrayor ity evam artham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6145: prakṛti-sthatvaṃ guṇeṣu ca saṅgaḥ saṃsāra-kāraṇam ity uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6146: kasmin guṇe kathaṃ saṅgaḥ ? ke vā guṇāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6147: ? kathaṃ vā te badhnantīti ? guṇebhyaś ca mokṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ syāt ? muktasya ca lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam, ity evam arthaṃ ca bhagavān uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6148: paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6149: yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ ||BhG_14.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6151: bhūyaḥ punaḥ pūrveṣu sarveṣv adhyāyeṣu asakṛd uktam api pravakṣyāmi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6154: kiṃ tat ? jñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ jñānānām uttamam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6159: tāni na mokṣāya, idaṃ tu mokṣāyeti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6161: yaj jñātvā yaj jñānaṃ jñātvā prāpya munayaḥ saṃnyāsino manana-śīlāḥ sarve parāṃ siddhiṃ mokṣākhyām ito 'smāt deha-bandhanāt ūrdhvaṃ gatāḥ prāptāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6163: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6164: sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca ||BhG_14.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6165: idaṃ jñānaṃ yathoktam upāśritya, jñāna-sādhanam anuṣṭhāya ity etat, mama parameśvarasya sādharmyaṃ mat-svarūpatām āgatāḥ prāptā ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6166: na tu samāna-dharmatā sādharmyam, kṣetrajñeśvarayor bhedānabhyupagamād gītā-śāstre |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6171: pralaye brahmaṇo 'pi vināśa-kāle na vyathanti ca vyathāṃ nāpadyante, na cyavantīty arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6173: mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6175: mama sva-bhūtā madīyā māyā triguṇātmikā prakṛtir yoniḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6177: sarva-kāryebhyo mahattvāt kāraṇatvād bṛṃhaṇāc ca [bharaṇāc ca]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6178: sva-vikārāṇāṃ mahad brahma iti yonir eva viśiṣyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6179: tasmin mahati brahmaṇi yonau garbhaṃ hiraṇyagarbhasya janmano bījaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6187: tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bīja-pradaḥ pitā ||BhG_14.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6189: deha-saṃsthāna-lakṣaṇā mūrcchitāṅgāvayavā mūrtayaḥ saṃbhavanti yāḥ, tāsāṃ mūrtīnāṃ brahma mahat sarvāvasthaṃ yoniḥ kāraṇam aham īśvaro bīja-prado
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6191: ke guṇāḥ ? kathaṃ badhnanti ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6192: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛti-saṃbhavāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6194: sattvaṃ rajas tama ity evaṃ-nāmāno guṇā iti pāribhāṣikaḥ śabdaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6196: na ca guṇa-guṇinor anyatvam atra vivakṣitam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6197: | tasmād guṇā iva nitya-para-tantrāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ praty avidyātmakatvāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6198: kṣetrajñaṃ nibadhnantīva tam āspadīkṛtyātmānaṃ pratilabhanta iti nibadhnantīty ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6202: mahāntau samarthatarāv ājānu-pralambau bāhū yasya saḥ mahābāhuḥ he mahābāho |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6204: avyayatvaṃ coktam anāditvād [Gītā 13.32] ity ādi ślokena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6205: nanu dehī na lipyate [Gītā 13.32] ity uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6206: tat katham iha nibadhnantīty anyathocyate ? parihṛtam asmābhir iva-śabdena nibadhnantīveti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6207: tatra sattvādīnāṃ sattvasyaiva tāval lakṣaṇam ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6210: nirmalatvāt sphaṭika-maṇir iva prakāśakam anāmayaṃ nirupadravaṃ sattvaṃ tan nibadhnāti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6211: katham ? sukha-saṅgena sukhy aham iti viṣaya-bhūtasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6212: sukhasya viṣayiṇy ātmani saṃśleṣāpādanaṃ mṛṣaiva sukhe sañjanam iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6216: kṣetrasyaiva viṣayasya dharmaḥ ity uktaṃ bhagavatā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6219: saṃjayatīva, āsaktam iva karoti, asaṅgaṃ saktam iva karoti, asukhinaṃ sukhinam iva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6220: tathā jñāna-saṅgena ca, jñānam iti sukha-sāhacaryāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6228: rajaḥ rāgātmakaṃ rajanād rāgo gairikād iva drāg ātmakaṃ viddhi jānīhi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6230: āsaṅgaḥ prāpte viṣaye manasaḥ prīti-lakṣaṇaḥ saṃśleṣaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6232: tan nibadhnāti tad rajo nibadhnāti kaunteya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6233: karma-saṅgena, dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu sañjanaṃ tat-paratā karma-saṅgas
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6235: tamas tv ajñāna-jaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarva-dehinām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6237: tamas tṛtīyo guṇo 'jñāna-jam ajñānāj jātam ajñāna-jaṃ viddhi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6240: pramādālasya-nidrābhiḥ pramādaś cālasyaṃ ca nidrā ca pramādālasya-nidrās
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6241: tābhiḥ pramādālasya-nidrābhis tat tamo nibadhnāti bhārata ||BhGS_14.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6243: sattvaṃ sukhe saṃjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6244: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde saṃjayaty uta ||BhG_14.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6245: sattvaṃ sukhe saṃjayati saṃśleṣayati, rajaḥ karmaṇi he bhārata saṃjayatīty anuvartate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6246: jñānaṃ sattva-kṛtaṃ vivekam āvṛtya ācchādya tu tamaḥ svena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6249: uktaṃ kāryaṃ kadā kurvanti guṇāḥ ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6250: rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6251: rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā ||BhG_14.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6252: rajas tamaś ca ubhāv apy abhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati udbhavati vardhate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6253: yadā, tadā labdhātmakaṃ sattvaṃ sva-kāryaṃ jñāna-sukhādy ārabhate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6254: he bhārata ! tathā rajo-guṇaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva ubhāv apy abhibhūya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6255: vardhate yadā, tadā karma tṛṣṇādi sva-kāryam ārabhate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6256: tama-ākhyo guṇaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś ca ubhāv apy abhibhūya tathaiva vardhate yadā, tadā jñānāvaraṇādi sva-kāryam ārabhate ||BhGS_14.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6257: yadā yo guṇa udbhūto bhavati, tadā tasya kiṃ liṅgam ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6259: jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta ||BhG_14.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6260: sarva-dvāreṣu, ātmana upalabdhi-dvārāṇi śrotrādīni sarvāṇi karaṇāni, teṣu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6261: sarva-dvāreṣu antaḥ-karaṇasya buddher vṛttiḥ prakāśo dehe 'smin upajāyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6264: jñāna-prakāśena liṅgena vidyād vivṛddham udbhūtaṃ sattvam ity utāpi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6266: lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6275: rajasi guṇe vivṛddha etāni liṅgāni jāyante |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6277: aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6283: tamasi guṇe vivṛddha etāni liṅgāni jāyante he kuru-nandana ! ||BhGS_14.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6284: maraṇa-dvāreṇāpi yat phalaṃ prāpyate, tad api saṅga-rāga-hetukaṃ sarvaṃ gauṇam eveti darśayan āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6285: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti deha-bhṛt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6287: yadā sattve pravṛddha udbhūte tu pralayaṃ maraṇaṃ yāti pratipadyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6288: deha-bhṛd ātmā, tadottama-vidāṃ mahad-ādi-tattva-vidām ity etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6289: lokān amalān mala-rahitān pratipadyate prāpnotīty etat ||BhGS_14.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6292: rajasi guṇe vivṛddhe pralayaṃ maraṇaṃ gatvā prāpya karma-saṅgiṣu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6294: tathā tadvad eva pralīno mṛtas tamasi vivṛddhe mūḍha-yoniṣu paśv-ādi-yoniṣu jāyate ||BhGS_14.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6297: rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam ||BhG_14.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6298: karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasya sāttvikasya ity arthaḥ, āhuḥ śiṣṭaḥ sāttvikam eva nirmalaṃ phalam iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6299: rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkhaṃ rājasasya karmaṇa ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6300: arthaḥ, karmādhikārāt phalam api duḥkham eva, kāraṇānurūpyāt, rājasam eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6301: tathā ajñānaṃ tamasas tāmasasya karmaṇo 'dharmasya pūrvavat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6303: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6305: sattvāl labdhātmakāt saṃjāyate samutpadyate jñānam, rajaso lobha eva ca,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6306: pramāda-mohau ca ubhau tamaso bhavataḥ, ajñānam eva ca bhavati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6308: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattva-sthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6313: jaghanya-guṇa-vṛtta-sthā jaghanyaś cāsau guṇaś ca jaghanya-guṇas tamaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6314: tasya vṛttaṃ nidrālasyādi, tasmin sthitāḥ jaghanya-guṇa-vṛtta-sthāḥ mūḍhāḥ adho gacchanti paśv-ādiṣūtpadyante tāmasāḥ ||BhGS_14.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6315: puruṣasya prakṛti-sthatva-rūpeṇa mithyā-jñānena yuktasya bhogyeṣu guṇeṣu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6316: sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakeṣu sukhī duḥkhī mūḍho 'ham asmīty evaṃ-rūpo yaḥ saṅgas tat-kāraṇaṃ puruṣasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6317: saṃsārasyeti samāsena pūrvādhyāye yad uktam, tad iha sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛti-saṃbhavā ity ārabhya guṇa-svarūpam, guṇa-vṛttam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6318: sva-vṛttena ca guṇānāṃ bandhakatvam, guṇa-vṛtta-nibaddhasya ca purūṣasya yā gatiḥ, ity etat sarvaṃ mithyā-jñāna-mūlaṃ bandha-kāraṇaṃ vistareṇoktvā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6319: adhunā samyag-darśanān mokṣo vaktavya ity ata āha bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6321: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti mad-bhāvaṃ so 'dhigacchati ||BhG_14.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6322: nānyaṃ kārya-karaṇa-viṣayākāra-pariṇatebhyo guṇebhyaḥ kartāram anyaṃ yadā draṣṭā vidvān san nānupaśyati, guṇā eva sarvāvasthāḥ sarva-karmaṇāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6323: kartāra ity evaṃ paśyati, guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ guṇa-vyāpāra-sākṣi-bhūtaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6324: vetti, mad-bhāvaṃ mama bhāvaṃ sa draṣṭādhigacchati ||BhGS_14.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6326: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī deha-samudbhavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6328: guṇān etān yathoktān atītya jīvann evātikramya māyopādhi-bhūtān trīn dehī deha-samudbhavān dehotpatti-bīja-bhūtān janma-mṛtyu-jarā-duḥkhair janma ca mṛtyuś ca jarā ca duḥkhāni ca janma-mṛtyu-jarā-duḥkhāni tair jīvann eva
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6331: jīvann eva guṇān atītyāmṛtam aśnute iti praśna-bījaṃ pratilabhyārjuna uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6332: kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6333: kim-ācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate ||BhG_14.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6334: kair liṅgaiś cihnais trīn etān vyākhyātān guṇān atīto 'tikrānto bhavati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6335: prabho, kim-ācāraḥ ? ko 'sya ācāra iti kim-ācāraḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6336: kathaṃ kena ca prakāreṇa etān trīn guṇān ativartate 'tītya vartate ||BhGS_14.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6337: guṇātītasya lakṣaṇaṃ guṇātītatvopāyaṃ cārjunena pṛṣṭo 'smin śloke
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6339: yat tāvat kair liṅgair yukto guṇātīto bhavatīti tat śṛṇu -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6340: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6341: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati ||BhG_14.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6342: prakāśaṃ ca sattvakāryaṃ pravṛttiṃ ca rajaḥkāryaṃ moham eva ca tamaḥkāryam ity etāni na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni samyagviṣayabhāvena udbhūtāni - mama tāmasaḥ pratyayo jātaḥ, tenāhaṃ mūḍhaḥ tathā rājasī pravṛttir mama utpannā duḥkhātmikā, tenāhaṃ rajasā pravartitaḥ pracalitaḥ svarūpāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6343: kaṣṭaṃ mama vartate yo 'yaṃ matsvarūpāvasthānāt bhraṃśaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6344: tathā sāttviko guṇaḥ prakāśātmā māṃ vivekitvam āpādayan sukhe ca sajayan badhnātīti tāni dveṣṭy asamyag-darśitvena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6345: tat evaṃ guṇātīto na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6346: yathā ca sāttvikādipuruṣaḥ sattvādikāryāṇi ātmānaṃ prati prakāśya nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati, na tathā guṇātīto nivṛttāni kāṅkṣatīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6350: na hi svātmaviṣayaṃ dveṣamākāṅkṣāṃ vā paraḥ paśyati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6351: atha idānīm guṇātītaḥ kim-ācāraḥ ? iti praśnasya prativacanam āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6352: udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6353: guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate ||BhG_14.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6354: udāsīnavad yathā udāsīno na kasyacit pakṣaṃ bhajate, tathāyaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6355: guṇātītatvopāya-mārge 'vasthita āsīna ātmavid guṇair yaḥ saṃnyāsī na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6361: neṅgate na calati, svarūpāvastha eva bhavatīty arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6365: sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ same duḥkha-sukhe yasya saḥ sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6366: svasthaḥ sve ātmani sthitaḥ prasannaḥ sama-loṣṭāśma-kāñcanaḥ loṣṭaṃ cāśmā ca kāñcanaṃ ca loṣṭāśmakāñcanāni samāni yasya saḥ samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6367: tulyapriyāpriyaḥ priyaṃ cāpriyaṃ ca priyāpriye tulye same yasya so 'yaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6368: tulyapriyāpriyaḥ, dhīro dhīmān, tulyanindātmasaṃstutiḥ nindā ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6369: ātmasaṃstuti ca nindātmasaṃstutī, tulye nindātmasaṃstutī yasya yateḥ sa tulyanindātmasaṃstutiḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6375: yadyapy udāsīnā bhavanti kecit svābhiprāyeṇa, tathāpi parābhiprāyeṇa mitrāri-pakṣayor iva bhavantīti tulyo mitrāri-pakṣayor ity āha |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6378: sarvān ārambhān parityaktuṃ śīlam asyeti sarvārambha-parityāgī |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6381: udāsīnavad ity ādi guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate ity etad-antam uktaṃ yāvat yatna-sādhyaṃ tāvat saṃnyāsino 'nuṣṭheyaṃ guṇātītatva-sādhanaṃ mumukṣoḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6382: sthirī-bhūtaṃ tu sva-saṃvedyaṃ sad guṇātītasya yater lakṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6383: adhunā kathaṃ ca trīnguṇān ativartate ? ity asya praśnasya prativacanam āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6386: māṃ ca īśvaraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ sarva-bhūta-hṛdayāśritaṃ yo yatiḥ karmī vā avyabhicāreṇa na kadācid yo vyabhicarati bhakti-yogena bhajanaṃ bhaktiḥ saiva yogas tena bhakti-yogena sevate, sa guṇān samatītya etān yathoktān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6388: bhavanaṃ bhūyaḥ, brahma-bhūyāya brahma-bhavanāya mokṣāya kalpate samartho bhavatīty arthaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6392: brahmaṇaḥ paramātmano hi yasmāt pratiṣṭhāhaṃ pratitiṣṭhaty asmin iti pratiṣṭhāhaṃ pratyag-ātmā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6396: jñāna-yoga-dharma-prāpyasya sukhasya ānanda-rūpasya aikāntikasya avyabhicāriṇo 'mṛtādi-svabhāvasya paramānanda-rūpasya paramātmanaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6399: tad etad brahma-bhūyāya kalpata ity uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6400: yayā ceśvara-śaktyā bhaktānugrahādi-prayojanāya brahma pratiṣṭhate pravartate, sā śaktir brahmaivāham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6405: tasya brahmaṇo nirvikalpako 'ham eva nānyaḥ pratiṣṭhāśrayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6408: ca, śāśvatasya ca nityasya dharmasya jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇasya sukhasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6409: taj-janitasya aikāntikasya ekānta-niyatasya ca, pratiṣṭhāham iti vartate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6417: yasmān mad-adhīnaṃ karmiṇāṃ karma-phalaṃ jñānināṃ ca jñāna-phalam, ato
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6418: bhakti-yogena māṃ ye sevante te mama prasādāj jñāna-prāpti-krameṇa
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6420: kim u vaktavyam ātmanas tattvam eva samyak vijānanta ity ato bhagavān arjunenāpṛṣṭo 'py ātmanas tattvaṃ vivakṣur
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6423: vairāgya-hetoḥ saṃsāra-svarūpaṃ varṇayati - viraktasya hi saṃsārāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6428: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa veda-vit ||BhG_15.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6429: ūrdhva-mūlaṃ kālataḥ sūkṣmatvāt kāraṇatvān nityatvāt mahattvāc cordhvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6430: ucyate brahmāvyaktaṃ māyā śaktimat, tan mūlam asyeti so 'yaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6441: etac chittvā ca bhittvā ca jñānena paramāsinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6442: tataś cātma-gatiṃ prāpya tasmān nāvartate punaḥ || [Mbh 14.35.20-22] ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6443: tam ūrdhva-mūlaṃ saṃsāraṃ māyā-mayaṃ vṛkṣam āhuḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6448: kṣaṇa-pradhvaṃsinam aśvatthaṃ prāhuḥ kathayanty avyayaṃ saṃsāra-māyāyā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6452: saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya idam anyat viśeṣaṇam - chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni, chandāṃsi cchādanād ṛg-yajuḥ-sāma-lakṣaṇāni yasya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya parṇānīva parṇāni |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6453: yathā vṛkṣasya parirakṣaṇārthāni parṇāni, tathā vedāḥ saṃsāra-vṛkṣa-parirakṣaṇārthā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6456: saṃsāra-vṛkṣaṃ sa-mūlaṃ yas taṃ veda sa veda-vit, vedārtha-vid ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6457: na hi sa-mūlāt saṃsāra-vṛkṣād asmāj jñeyo 'nyo 'ṇu-mātro 'py avaśiṣṭo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6461: adhaś cordhvaṃ prasṛtās tasya śākhā guṇa-pravṛddhā viṣaya-pravālāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6462: adhaś ca mūlāny anusaṃtatāni karmānubandhīni manuṣya-loke ||BhG_15.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6463: adho manuṣyādibhyo yāvat sthāvaram, ata ūrdhvaṃ ca yāvad brahmaṇo viśva-sṛjo dhāma ity etad-antaṃ yathā-karma yathā-śrutaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6464: jñāna-karma-phalāni, tasya vṛkṣasya śākhā iva śākhāḥ prasṛtāḥ pragatāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6465: guṇa-pravṛddhāḥ guṇaiḥ sattva-rajas-tamobhiḥ pravṛddhāḥ sthūlīkṛtā upādāna-bhūtaiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6472: devādy-apekṣayā mūlāny anusantatāny anupraviṣṭani karmānubandhīni karma dharmādharma-lakṣaṇam anubandhaḥ paścād-bhāvi, yeṣām udbhūtim anu
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6476: na rūpam asyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6479: na rūpam asyeha yathopavarṇitaṃ tathā naiva upalabhyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6482: hi sa ity ata eva nānto na paryanto niṣṭhā parisamāptir vā vidyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6484: “ita ārabhyāyaṃ pravṛttaḥ” iti na kenacid gamyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6485: na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā sthitir madhyam asya na kenacid upalabhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6486: aśvattham enaṃ yathoktaṃ suvirūḍha-mūlaṃ suṣṭhu virūḍhāni virohaṃ gatāni sudṛḍhāni mūlāni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6490: paramātmābhimukhya-niścaya-dṛḍhīkṛtena punaḥ punar vivekābhyāsāśma-niśitena cchitvā saṃsāra-vṛkṣaṃ sa-bījam uddhṛtya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6491: tataḥ padaṃ tat parimārgitavyaṃ yasmin gatā na nivartanti bhūyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6492: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye yataḥ pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī ||BhG_15.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6493: tataḥ paścāt yat padaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tat parimārgitavyam, parimārgaṇam anveṣaṇaṃ jñātavyam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6494: yasmin pade gatāḥ praviṣṭā na nivartanti nāvartante bhūyaḥ punaḥ saṃsārāya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6495: kathaṃ parimārgitavyam ity āha - tam eva ca yaḥ pada-śabdenokta ādyam ādau bhavam ādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye ity evaṃ parimārgitavyaṃ tac-charaṇatayā ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6496: ko 'sau puruṣaḥ ? ity ucyate - yato yasmāt puruṣāt saṃsāra-māyā-vṛkṣa-pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā niḥsṛtā aindrajālikād iva māyā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6503: nirmāna-mohā mānaś ca mohaś ca māna-mohau, tau nirgatau yebhyas te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6506: saṅga-doṣaḥ, jitaḥ saṅga-doṣo yais te jita-saṅga-doṣāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6509: vinivṛtta-kāmā viśeṣato nirlepena nivṛttāḥ kāmā yeṣāṃ te vinivṛtta-kāmāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6510: yatayaḥ saṃnyāsino dvandvaiḥ priyāpriyādibhir vimuktāḥ sukha-duḥkha-saṃjñaiḥ parityaktā gacchanty amūḍhā moha-varjitāḥ padam avyayaṃ tad yathoktam ||BhGS_15.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6512: na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6513: yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama ||BhG_15.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6515: tad dhāma tejo-rūpaṃ padaṃ na bhāsayate sūrya ādityaḥ sarvāvabhāsana-śaktimattve 'pi sati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6516: tathā na śaśāṅkaś candraḥ, na pāvako nāgnir api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6517: yad dhāma vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ gatvā prāpya na nivartante, yac ca sūryādir na bhāsayate, tad dhāma
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6521: katham ucyate tat dhāma gatānāṃ nāsti nivṛttiḥ ? iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6525: mamaiva param ātmano nārāyaṇasya, aṃśo bhāgo 'vayava eka-deśa ity anarthāntaraṃ jīva-loke jīvānāṃ loke saṃsāre jīva-bhūtaḥ kartā bhokteti prasiddhaḥ sanātanaś cirantanaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6527: jala-nimittāpāye sūryam eva gatvā na nivartate ca tenaivātmanā gacchati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6529: yathā ghaṭādy-upādhi-paricchinno ghaṭādy-ākāśa ākāśāṃśaḥ san ghaṭādi-nimittāpāye ākāśaṃ prāpya na nivartate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6530: ata upapannam uktam yad gatvā na nivartante iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6531: nanu niravayavasya paramātmanaḥ kuto 'vayava eka-deśo 'ṃśaḥ iti ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6536: sa ca jīvo mad-aṃśatvena kalpitaḥ kathaṃ saṃsaraty utkrāmati ca ? ity ucyate - manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6537: śrotrādīni prakṛti-sthāni sva-sthāne karṇa-śaṣkuly-ādau prakṛtau sthitāni karṣati ākarṣati
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6539: śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6541: yac cāpi yadā cāpi utkrāmatīśvaro dehādi-saṃghāta-svāmī jīvaḥ, tadā karṣati [15.8] iti ślokasya dvitīya-pādo 'rtha-vaśāt prāthamyena saṃbadhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6542: yadā ca pūrvasmāt śarīrāt śarīrāntaram avāpnoti tadā gṛhītvaitāni manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi saṃyāti samyak yāti gacchati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6543: kim iva ? ity āha - vāyuḥ pavano gandhān iva āśayāt puṣpādeḥ ||BhGS_15.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6545: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6547: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca tvag-indriyaṃ rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca manaś ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6548: ṣaṣṭhaṃ pratyekam indriyeṇa saha, adhiṣṭhāya deha-stho viṣayān śabdādīn upasevate ||BhGS_15.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6550: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6552: utkrāmantaṃ dehaṃ pūrvopāttaṃ parityajantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi dehe tiṣṭhantaṃ bhuñjānāṃ vā śabdādīṃś copalabhamānaṃ guṇānvitaṃ sukha-duḥkha-mohādyair
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6553: guṇair anvitam anugataṃ saṃyuktam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6556: aho kaṣṭaṃ vartate ity anukrośati ca bhagavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6560: yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6562: yatantaḥ prayatnaṃ kurvanto yoginaś ca samāhita-cittā enaṃ prakṛtam ātmānaṃ paśyanty ayam aham asmīty upalabhanta ātmani svasyāṃ buddhāv
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6565: tapasā indriya-jayena ca, duścaritād anuparatāḥ, aśānta-darpāḥ prayatnaṃ kurvanto 'pi nainaṃ paśyanty acetaso 'vivekinaḥ ||BhGS_15.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6566: yat padaṃ sarvasyāvabhāsakamapy agnyādity ādikaṃ jyotiḥ nāvabhāsayate, yat prāptā ca mumukṣavaḥ punaḥ saṃsārābhimukhāḥ na nivartante, yasya ca padasya upādhi-bhedam anuvidhīyamānāḥ jīvāḥ - ghaṭākāśādayaḥ iva ākāśasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6567: - aṃśāḥ, tasya padasya sarvātmatvaṃ sarvavyavahārāspadatvaṃ ca vivakṣuś
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6570: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam ||BhG_15.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6572: kiṃ tat ? tejo dīptiḥ prakāśo jagad bhāsayate prakāśayaty akhilaṃ samastam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6574: 'vabhāsakaṃ vartate, yac cāgnau hutavahe, tat tejo viddhi vijānīhi māmakaṃ madīyaṃ mama viṣṇos taj jyotiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6575: athavā, āditya-gataṃ tejaś caitanyātmakaṃ jyotir yac candramasi, yac cāgnau vartate tat tejo viddhi māmakaṃ madīyaṃ mama viṣṇos taj jyotiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6576: nanu sthāvareṣu jaṅgameṣu ca tat samānaṃ caitanyātmakaṃ jyotiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6577: tatra katham idaṃ viśeṣaṇam - yad āditya-gatam ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6582: atas tatraivāvistaraṃ jyotir iti tad viśiṣyate, na tu tatraiva tad adhikam iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6583: yathā hi loke tulye 'pi mukha-saṃsthāne na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6584: kāṣṭha-kuḍyādau mukham āvirbhavati, ādarśādau tu svacche svacchatare ca tāratamyenāvirbhavati, tadvat ||BhGS_15.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6586: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6587: puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ ||BhG_15.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6588: gāṃ pṛthivīm āviśya praviśya dhārayāmi bhūtāni jagad aham ojasā balena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6589: yad balaṃ kāma-rāga-vivarjitam aiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ jagad-vidhāraṇāya pṛthivyām praviṣṭaṃ yena pṛthivī gurvī nādhaḥ patati na vidīryate ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6590: tathā ca mantra-varṇaḥ - yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā [TaittS 4.1.8] iti, sa dādhāra pṛthivīm [Ṛk 8.7.3.1] ity ādiś ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6591: ato gām āviśya ca bhūtāni carācarāṇi dhārayāmīti yuktam uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6593: sarvāḥ vrīhi-yavādyāḥ puṣṇāmi puṣṭi-matīḥ rasa-svādumatī ca karomi somo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6594: bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ somaḥ san rasātmakaḥ rasa-svabhāvaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6597: sa hi sarva-rasātmakaḥ sarvāḥ oṣadhīḥ svātma-rasān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6600: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6602: aham eva vai vaiśvānara udara-stho 'gnir bhūtvā - ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6603: 'yam antaḥ puruṣe yenedam annaṃ pacyate yad idam adyate [BAU 5.9.1] ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6605: vaiśvānaraḥ san prāṇināṃ prāṇavatāṃ deham āśritaḥ praviṣṭaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6606: prāṇāpāna-samāyuktaḥ prāṇāpānābhyāṃ samāyuktaḥ saṃyuktaḥ pacāmi paṅkti karomy annam aśanaṃ caturvidhaṃ catuṣprakāraṃ bhojyaṃ bhakṣyaṃ coṣyaṃ lehyaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6609: tad etad ubhayam agnīṣomau sarvam iti paśyato 'nna-doṣa-lepo na bhavati ||BhGS_15.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6611: sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi saṃniviṣṭo mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6612: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6614: sarvasya ca prāṇi-jātasyāham ātmā san hṛdi buddhau saṃniviṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6615: ato matta ātmanaḥ sarva-prāṇināṃ smṛtir jñānaṃ tad-apohanaṃ cāpagamanaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6616: yeṣāṃ yathā puṇya-karmaṇāṃ puṇya-karmānurodhena jñāna-smṛtī bhavataḥ, tathā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6617: pāpa-karmaṇāṃ pāpa-karmānurūpeṇa smṛti-jñānayor apohanaṃ cāpāyanam apagamanaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6618: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva paramātmā vedyo veditavyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6619: vedānta-kṛd vedāntārtha-saṃpradāya-kṛd ity arthaḥ, veda-vid vedārtha-vid
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6622: viśiṣṭopādhi-kṛto yad āditya-gataṃ tejaḥ [Gītā 15.12] ity ādinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6623: athādhunā tasyaiva kṣarākṣaropādhi-pravibhaktatayā nirupādhikasya kevalasya tattva-svarūpa-nirdidhārayiṣayottara-ślokā ārabhyante |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6624: tatra sarvam evātītān āgatān antarādhyāyārtha-jātaṃ tridhā rāśīkṛtya āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6625: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6627: dvāv imau pṛthag-rāśī-kṛtau puruṣāv ity ucyete loke saṃsāre - kṣaraś ca kṣaratīti kṣaro vināśī ity eko rāśiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6629: tad-viparītaḥ, bhagavato māyā-śaktiḥ, kṣarākhyasya puruṣasya utpatti-bījam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6631: kau tau puruṣau ? ity āha svayam eva bhagavān - kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6633: kūṭāsthaḥ kūṭāḥ rāśī rāśir iva sthitaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6634: | athavā, kūṭā māyā vacanā jihmatā kuṭilatā iti paryāyāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6639: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6640: yo loka-trayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ ||BhG_15.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6641: uttama utkṛṣṭatamaḥ puruṣas tv anyo 'tyanta-vilakṣaṇa ābhyāṃ paramātmeti paramaś cāsau dehādy-avidyā-kṛtātmabhyaḥ, ātmaś ca sarva-bhūtānāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6642: pratyak-cetanaḥ, ity ataḥ paramātmety udāhṛta ukto vedānteṣu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6643: sa eva viśiṣyate yo loka-trayaṃ bhūr-bhuvaḥ-svar-ākhyaṃ svakīyayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6646: avyayo nāsya vyayo vidyata ity avyayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6649: yathā-vyākhyātasyeśvarasya puruṣottama ity etat nāma prasiddham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6653: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6654: ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ||BhG_15.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6655: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'haṃ saṃsāra-māyā-vṛkṣam aśvatthākhyam atikrānto 'ham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6656: akṣarād api saṃsāra-māyā-rūpa-vṛkṣa-bīja-bhūtād api cottama utkṛṣṭatamaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6658: atas tābhyāṃ kṣarākṣarābhyām uttamatvād asmi loke vede ca prathitaḥ prakhyātaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6659: puruṣottama ity evaṃ māṃ bhakta-janā viduḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6662: athedānīṃ yathā-niruktam ātmānaṃ yo veda, tasyedaṃ phalam ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6663: yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6664: sa sarva-vid bhajati māṃ sarva-bhāvena bhārata ||BhG_15.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6665: yo mām īśvaraṃ yathokta-viśeṣaṇam evaṃ yathoktena prakāreṇa asaṃmūḍhaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6666: saṃmoha-varjitaḥ san jānāty ayam aham asmīti puruṣottamaṃ, sa sarva-vit
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6667: sarvātmanā sarvaṃ vettīti sarvajñaḥ sarva-bhūta-sthaṃ bhajati māṃ sarva-bhāvena sarvātmatayā he bhārata ||BhGS_15.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6668: asmin adhyāye bhagavat-tattva-jñānaṃ mokṣa-phalam uktvā, atha idānīṃ tat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6670: iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6671: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛta-kṛtyaś ca bhārata ||BhG_15.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6672: iti etad guhyatamaṃ gopyatamam, atyanta-rahasyaṃ ity etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6675: yady api gītākhyaṃ samastam śāstram ucyate, tathāpy ayam evādhyāya iha śāstram ity ucyate stuty-arthaṃ prakaraṇāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6676: sarvo hi gītā-śāstrārtho 'smin adhyāye samāsena uktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6678: eva, kiṃtu sarvaś ca vedārtha iha parisamāptaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6680: [Gītā 15.1] vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyaḥ [Gītā 15.15] iti coktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6681: idam uktaṃ kathitaṃ mayā he 'nagha apāpa ! etac chāstraṃ yathā-darśitārthaṃ buddhvā buddhimān syāt bhavet nānyathā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6682: kṛta-kṛtyaś ca bhārata kṛtaṃ kṛtyaṃ kartavyaṃ yena sa kṛta-kṛtyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6683: viśiṣṭa-janma-prasūtena brāhmaṇena yat kartavyaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhagavat-tattve vidite kṛtaṃ bhaved ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6684: na cānyathā kartavyaṃ parisamāpyate kasyacid ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6685: sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate [Gītā 4.33] iti coktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6687: prāpyaitat kṛta-kṛtyo hi dvijo bhavati nānyathā || [Manu 12.93]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6689: yataḥ etat paramārthatattvaṃ mattaḥ śrutavān asi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6698: daivī āsurī rākṣasī ceti prāṇiṇāṃ prakṛtayo navame 'dhyāye sūcitāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6699: tāsāṃ vistareṇa pradarśanāya abhayaṃ sattva-saṃśuddhir ity ādir adhyāyaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6701: tatra saṃsāra-mokṣāya daivī prakṛtiḥ, nibandhāyāsurī rākṣasī ceti daivyā ādānāya pradarśanaṃ kriyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6705: dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam ||BhG_16.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6727: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6728: dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam ||BhG_16.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6732: akrodhaḥ parair ākruṣṭasyābhihatasya vā prāptasya krodhasya upaśamanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6745: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6750: utpannāyāṃ vikriyāyām praaśamanam akrodha ity avocāma |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6752: dhṛtir dehendriyeṣv avasādaṃ prāpteṣu tasya pratiṣedhako 'ntaḥ-karaṇa-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6755: mṛj-jala-kṛtaṃ bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ ca mano-buddhayor nairmalyaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6760: nātimānitā atyarthaṃ māno 'timānaḥ, sa yasya vidyate so 'timānī |
