GSP33bhgsbh_u:6762: tad-abhāvo nātimānitā ātmanaḥ pūjyatātiśaya-bhāvanābhāva ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6764: kiṃ-viśiṣṭaṃ saṃpadam ? daivīṃ devānāṃ yā saṃpat tām abhilakṣya jātasya deva-vibhūty-arhasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6768: dambho darpo 'timānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6775: yathā kāṇam cakṣuṣmān, virūpaṃ rūpavān, hīnābhijanam uttamābhijana ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6779: saṃpat āsurī tām abhijātasya ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_16.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6782: mā śucaḥ saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijāto 'si pāṇḍava ||BhG_16.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6783: daivī saṃpat yā sā vimokṣāya saṃsāra-bandhanāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6784: nibandhāya niyato bandho nibandhas tad-artham āsurī saṃpat matā abhipretā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6786: tatraivam ukte saty ar junasyāntar-gataṃ bhāvam kim aham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6787: āsura-saṃpad-yuktaḥ ? kiṃ vā daiva-saṃpad-yuktaḥ ? ity evam ālocanā-rūpam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6788: ālakṣya āha bhagavān - mā śucaḥ śokaṃ mā kārṣīḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6793: dvau bhūta-sargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6794: daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu ||BhG_16.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6795: dvau dvi-saṃkhyākau bhūta-sargau bhūtānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ sargau sṛṣṭī
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6796: bhūta-sargau sṛjyeteti sargau bhūtāny eva sṛjyamānāni daivāsura-saṃpad-dvaya-yuktānīti dvau bhūta-sargāv ity ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6797: dvayā ha vai prājāpatyā devāś cāsurā ca [BAU 1.3.1] iti śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6802: ity ucyate - prakṛtāv eva daiva āsura eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6803: uktayor eva punar anuvāde prayojanam āha - daivo bhūta-sargo 'bhayaṃ sattva-saṃśuddhir ity ādinā vistaraśo vistara-prakāraiḥ proktaḥ kathitaḥ, na tu āsuro vistaraśaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6804: atas tat-parivarjanārtham āsuraṃ pārtha me mama vacanād ucyamānaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6806: ā adhyāya-parisamāpter āsurī saṃpat prāṇi-viśeṣaṇatvena pradarśyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6807: pratyakṣī-karaṇena ca śakyate tasyāḥ parivarjanaṃ kartum iti -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6808: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6809: na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate ||BhG_16.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6810: pravṛttiṃ ca pravartanaṃ yasmin puruṣārtha-sādhane kartavye pravṛttis tām,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6811: nivṛttiṃ ca etad-viparītāṃ yasmāt anartha-hetoḥ nivartitavyaṃ sā nivṛttis
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6812: tāṃ ca, janā āsurā na vidur na jānanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6813: na kevalaṃ pravṛtti-nivṛttī eva te na viduḥ, na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6816: asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6818: asatyaṃ yathā vayam anṛta-prāyās tathedaṃ jagat sarvam asatyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6819: apratiṣṭhaṃ ca nāsya dharmādharmau pratiṣṭhāto 'pratiṣṭhaṃ ceti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6820: te āsurāḥ janāḥ jagad āhur anīśvaram na ca dharmādharma-sa-vyapekṣako 'sya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6821: śāsiteśvaro vidyata ity ato 'nīśvaraṃ jagad āhuḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6828: kim anyaj jagataḥ kāraṇam ? na kiṃcit adṛṣṭaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6830: jagataḥ kāma eva prāṇināṃ kāraṇam iti lokāyatika-dṛṣṭir iyam ||BhGS_16.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6833: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya āśritya naṣṭatmāno naṣṭa-svabhāvā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6834: vibhraṣṭa-para-loka-sādhanā alpa-buddhayo viṣaya-viṣayālpaiva buddhir yeṣāṃ te 'lpa-buddhayaḥ prabhavanti udbhavanti ugra-karmāṇaḥ krūra-karmāṇo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6841: kāmam icchā-viśeṣam āśritya avaṣṭabhya duṣpūram aśakya-pūraṇaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6842: dambha-māna-madānvitā dambhaś ca mānaś ca madaś ca dambha-māna-madās tair anvitāḥ dambha-māna-madānvitā mohād avivekato gṛhītvā upādāya asad-grāhān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6843: aśubha-niścayān pravartante loke aśuci-vratāḥ aśucīni vratāni yeṣāṃ te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6848: cintām aparimeyāṃ ca, na parimātuṃ śakyate yasyāś cintāyā iyattā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6849: sāparimeyā, tām aparimeyām, pralayāntāṃ maraṇāntām upāśritāḥ, sadā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6851: kāmopabhoga-paramāḥ, kāmyante iti kāmā viṣayāḥ śabdādayas tad-upabhoga-paramā ayam eva paramaḥ puruṣārtho yaḥ kāmopabhoga
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6856: āśā-pāśa-śatair āśaiva pāśās tac-chatair baddhāḥ niyantritāḥ santaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6857: sarvata ākṛṣyamāṇāḥ, kāma-krodha-parāyaṇāḥ kāma-krodhau param ayanam āśrayo yeṣāṃ te kāma-krodha-parāyaṇāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6864: idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ prāpsye manoratham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6865: idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam ||BhG_16.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6866: idaṃ dravyam adya idānīṃ mayā labdham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6869: idaṃ cāstīdam api me bhaviṣyati āgāmini saṃvatsare punar dhanaṃ tenāhaṃ dhanī vikhyāto bhaviṣyāmīti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6870: asau mayā hataḥ śatrur haniṣye cāparān api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6871: īśvaro 'ham ahaṃ bhogī siddho 'haṃ balavān sukhī ||BhG_16.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6872: asau devadattanāmā mayā hato durjayaḥ śatruḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6878: saṃpannaḥ putraiḥ naptṛbhiḥ, na kevalaṃ mānuṣaḥ, balavān sukhī cāham eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6882: āḍhaḍḥ dhanena, abhijanavān saptapuruṣaṃ śrotriyatvādisaṃpannaḥ - tenāpi na mama tulyo 'sti kaścit |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6883: ko 'nyo 'sti sadṛśas tulyaḥ mayā ? kiṃ ca,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6884: yakṣye yāgenāpy anyān abhibhaviṣyāmi, dāsyāmi naṭādibhyaḥ, modiṣye harṣaṃ cātiśayaṃ prāpsyāmi, iti evam ajñānavimohitāḥ ajñānena vimohitāḥ vividham
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6888: aneka-citta-vibhrāntā ukta-prakārair anekaiś cittaiḥ vividhaṃ bhrāntāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6889: aneka-citta-vibhrāntāḥ, mohajālasamāvṛtāḥ moho 'viveko 'jñānaṃ tad eva jālamiva āvaraṇātmakatvāt, tena samāvṛtāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6890: prasaktāḥ kāmabhogeṣu tatraiva niṣaṇṇāḥ santas tena upacita-kalmaṣāḥ patanti narake 'śucau
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6896: dhanamānamadānvitāḥ dhananimittaḥ mānaḥ madaś ca, tābhyāṃ dhanamānamadābhyām anvitāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6897: yajante nāmayajñaiḥ nāmamātrair yajñais te dambhena dharmadhvajitayāvidhipūrvakaṃ vidhivihitāṅgetikartavyatārahitam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6898: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6901: vidyamānair avidyamānaiś ca guṇair ātmany adhyāropitair viśiṣṭam ātmānam aham iti manyate, so 'haṃkāro
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6902: 'vidyākhyaḥ kaṣṭatamaḥ sarva-doṣāṇāṃ mūlaṃ sarvānartha-pravṛttīnāṃ ca, tam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6904: darpaṃ darpo nāma yasya udbhave dharmam atikrāmati so 'yam antaḥkaraṇāśrayo doṣa-viśeṣaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6907: etān anyāṃś ca mahato doṣān saṃśritāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6908: kiṃ ca te mām īśvaram ātma-para-deheṣu sva-dehe
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6912: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6913: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu ||BhG_16.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6914: tān ahaṃ sanmārgapratipakṣabhūtān sādhudveṣiṇo dviṣataś ca māṃ krūrān saṃsāreṣu evānekanarakasaṃsaraṇamārgeṣu narādhamān adharmadoṣavattvāt kṣipāmi prakṣipāmy ajasraṃ saṃtatam aśubhān aśubhakarmakāriṇaḥ āsurīṣveva krūra-karma-prāyāsu vyāghraṆsahādiyoniṣu kṣipāmītyanena saṃbandhaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6915: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6916: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim ||BhG_16.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6917: āsurīṃ yonim āpannāḥ pratipannāḥ mūḍhāḥ avivekino janmani janmani pratijanma tamobahulāsveva yoniṣu jāyamānāḥ adho gacchanto mūḍhāḥ mām īśvaram aprāpyānāsādya eva he kaunteya, tatas tasmādapi yānty adhamāṃ gatiṃ nikṛṣṭatamāṃ gatim |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6918: mām aprāpyaiveti na mat-prāptau kācid api āśaṅkāsti, ataḥ macchiṣṭasādhumārgam aprāpya ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_16.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6919: sarvasyā āsuryāḥ saṃpadaḥ saṃkṣepo 'yam ucyate, yasmin trividhe sarvaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6922: bhavati, yat mūlaṃ sarvasyānarthasya, tat etad ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6924: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet ||BhG_16.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6925: trividhaṃ triprakāraṃ narakasya prāptāv idaṃ dvāraṃ nāśanam ātmanaḥ, yat dvāraṃ praviśanneva naśyati ātmā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6927: bhavatītyetat, atar ucyate dvāraṃ nāśanam ātmanaḥ iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6928: kiṃ tat ? kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6930: yataḥ etat dvāraṃ nāśanam ātmanas tasmāt kāmāditrayametat tyajet ||BhGS_16.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6932: etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamo-dvārais tribhir naraḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6933: ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim ||BhG_16.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6934: etaiḥ vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamo-dvārais tamaso narakasya duḥkha-mohātmakasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6935: dvārāṇi kāmādayas taiḥ, etais tribhiḥ vimukto nara ācaraty anutiṣṭhati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6939: tatas tad-ācaraṇāt yāti parāṃ gatiṃ mokṣam apīti ||BhGS_16.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6940: sarvasya etasya āsurī-saṃpat-parivarjanasya śreya-ācaraṇasya ca śāstraṃ kāraṇam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6944: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim ||BhG_16.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6945: yaḥ śāstra-vidhiṃ śāstraṃ vedas tasya vidhiṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6946: kartavyākartavya-jñāna-kāraṇaṃ vidhi-pratiṣedhākhyam utsṛjya tyaktvā vartate kāma-kārataḥ kāma-prayuktaḥ san, na sa siddhiṃ puruṣārtha-yogyatām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6947: avāpnoti, nāpy asmin loke sukhaṃ nāpi parāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatiṃ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ vā ||BhGS_16.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6950: tasmāt śāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ jñāna-sādhanaṃ te tava kāryākārya-vyavasthitau
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6953: vidhir vidhānaṃ śāstram eva vidhānaṃ śāstra-vidhānaṃ kuryān na kuryād ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6954: evaṃ-lakṣaṇam, tena uktaṃ sva-karma yat tat kartum ihārhasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6964: tasmāc chāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ ta [Gītā 16.24] iti bhagavad-vākyāl
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6967: teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ ||BhG_17.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6969: śruti-smṛti-śāstra-codanām utsṛjya parityajya yajante devādīn pūjayanti śraddhayānvitāḥ śraddhayāstikya-buddhyānvitāḥ saṃyuktāḥ santaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6970: śruti-lakṣaṇaṃ smṛti-lakṣaṇaṃ vā kaṃcit śāstra-vidhim apaśyanto
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6971: vṛddha-vyavahāra-darśanād eva śraddadhānatayā ye devādīn pūjayanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6972: te iha ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajante śraddhayānvitā ity evaṃ gṛhyante |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6973: ye punaḥ kaṃcit śāstra-vidhiṃ upalabhamānaiva tam utsṛjyāyathā-vidhi devādīn pūjayanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6974: ta iha ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajanta iti na parigṛhyante |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6976: devādi-pūjā-vidhi-paraṃ kiṃcit śāstraṃ paśyanta eva tad utsṛjyāśraddadhānatayā tad-vihitāyāṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6977: devādi-pūjāyāṃ śraddhayānvitāḥ pravartanta iti na śakyaṃ kalpayituṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6978: yasmāt, tasmāt pūrvoktaiva ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajante śraddhayānvitā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6980: teṣām evaṃ-bhūtānāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6981: rajas tamaḥ, kiṃ sattvaṃ niṣṭhāvasthānam, āho svit rajaḥ, athavā tama iti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6982: | etad uktaṃ bhavati - yā teṣāṃ devādi-viṣayā pūjā, sā kiṃ sāttvikī, āho svit rājasī, uta tāmasīti ||BhGS_17.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6983: sāmānya-viṣayo 'yaṃ praśno nāpravibhajrya prativacanam arhatīti śrībhagavānuvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6984: tri-vidhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāva-jā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6985: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu ||BhG_17.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6990: maraṇa-kāle 'bhivyaktaḥ svabhāva ucyate, tato jātā svabhāva-jā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6997: evaṃ tri-vidhāṃ tām ucyamānāṃ śraddhāṃ śṛṇv avadhāraya ||BhGS_17.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7000: śraddhā-mayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yac-chraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ ||BhG_17.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7003: yady evaṃ tataḥ kiṃ syāt ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7006: yac-chraddho yā śraddhā yasya jīvasya sa yac-chraddhaḥ sa eva tac-chraddhānurūpa eva sa jīvaḥ ||BhGS_17.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7007: tataś ca kāryeṇa liṅgena devādipūjayā sattvādiniṣṭhānumeyā ity āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7009: pretān bhūta-gaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ ||BhG_17.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7010: yajante pūjayanti sāttvikāḥ sattva-niṣṭhā devān, yakṣa-rakṣāṃsi rājasāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7011: pretān bhūta-gaṇāṃś ca sapta-mātṛkādīṃś cānye yajante tāmasāḥ janāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7013: tatra kaścid eva sahasreṣu deva-pūjādi-paraḥ sattva-niṣṭho bhavati, bāhulyena tu rajo-niṣṭhās tamo-niṣṭhāś caiva prāṇino bhavanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7015: aśāstra-vihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7017: aśāstra-vihitaṃ na śāstra-vihitam aśāstra-vihitaṃ ghoraṃ pīḍā-karaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7018: prāṇinām ātmanaś ca tapas tapyante nirvartayanti ye janās te ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7020: dambhaś cāhaṃkāraś ca dambhāhaṃkārau, tābhyāṃ saṃyuktāḥ dambhāhaṃkāra-saṃyuktāḥ, kāma-rāga-balānvitāḥ kāmaś ca rāgaś ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7021: kāma-rāgau tat-kṛtaṃ balaṃ kāma-rāga-balaṃ tenānvitāḥ kāma-rāga-balānvitāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7028: tān viddhy āsura-niścayān āsuro niścayo yeṣāṃ te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7031: sāttvika-rājasa-tāmasa-puruṣa-priyatva-darśanam iha kriyate rasya-snigdhādiṣu āhāra-viśeṣeṣv ātmanaḥ prīty-atirekeṇa liṅgena sāttvikatvaṃ rājasatvaṃ tāmasatvaṃ ca buddhvā rajas-tamo-liṅgānām āhārāṇāṃ parivarjanārthaṃ sattva-liṅgānāṃ copādānārtham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7033: sattvādi-guṇa-bhedena tri-vidhatva-pratipādanam iha rājasa-tāmasān buddhvā kathaṃ nu nāma parityajet, sāttvikān evānutiṣṭhed ity evam artham āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7034: āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7035: yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu ||BhG_17.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7036: āhāras tv api sarvasya bhoktuḥ prāṇinas tri-vidho bhavati priyaḥ iṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7037: tathā yajñas tathā tapas tathā dānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7038: teṣām āhārādīnāṃ bhedam imaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ sṛṇu ||BhGS_17.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7040: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvika-priyāḥ ||BhG_17.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7041: āyuś ca sattvaṃ ca balaṃ ca ārogyaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca prītiś ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7044: snigdhāḥ snehavantaḥ, sthirāś cira-kāla-sthāyino dehe, hṛdyāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7050: kaṭuś cāmlaś ca lavaṇaś cātyuṣṇaś ca tīkṣṇaś ca rūkṣaś ca vidāhī ca te āhārā rājasasyeṣṭā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7051: duḥkha-śokāmaya-pradāḥ duḥkhaṃ ca śokaṃ cāmayaṃ ca prayacchantīti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7053: yāta-yāmaṃ gata-rasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7057: rasa-viyuktam, pūti durgandhi, paryuṣitaṃ ca pakvaṃ sad rātry-antaritaṃ ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7058: yat, ucchiṣṭam api bhukta-śiṣṭam ucchiṣṭam, amedhyam ayajñārhaṃ bhojanam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7062: yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ ||BhG_17.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7063: aphalākāṅkṣibhir aphalārthibhir yajño vidhi-dṛṣṭaḥ śāstra-codanādṛṣṭau yo yajña ijyate nirvartyate, yaṣṭavyam eveti yajña-svarūpa-nirvartanam eva kāryam iti manaḥ samādhāya, nānena puruṣārtho mama kartavya ity evaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7065: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7066: ijyate bharata-śreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam ||BhG_17.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7067: abhisandhāya tu uddiśya phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yad ijyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7071: vidhi-hīnaṃ yathā-codita-viparītam, asṛṣṭānnaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo na sṛṣṭaṃ na dattam, annaṃ yasmin yajñe so 'sṛṣṭānnas tam asṛṣṭānnam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7073: mantrataḥ svarato varṇato vā viyuktaṃ mantra-hīnam, adakṣiṇam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7078: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate ||BhG_17.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7079: devā ca dvijā ca guravaś ca prājñāś ca deva-dvija-guru-prājñās teṣāṃ pūjanaṃ deva-dvija-guru-prājña-pūjanam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7082: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śarīra-nirvartyaṃ śārīraṃ śarīra-pradhānaiḥ sarvair eva kārya-karaṇaiḥ kartrādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ śārīraṃ tapa ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7083: pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ [Gītā 18.15] iti hi vakṣyati ||BhGS_17.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7084: anudvega-karaṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priya-hitaṃ ca yat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7086: anudvega-karaṃ prāṇinām aduḥkha-karaṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priya-hitaṃ ca yat priya-hite dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthe
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7090: prayuktasya vākyasya satya-priya-hitānudvega-karatvānām anyatamena dvābhyāṃ tribhir vā hīnatā syād yadi, na tad vāṅ-mayaṃ tapaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7092: satya-vākyasya itareṣām anyatamena dvābhyāṃ tribhir vā vihīnatāyāṃ na
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7094: tathā priya-vākyasyāpītareṣām anyatamena dvābhyāṃ tribhir vā vihīnasya na vāṅ-maya-tapastvam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7096: anyatamena dvābhyāṃ tribhir vā vihīnasya na vāṅ-maya-tapastvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7097: kiṃ punas tat tapaḥ ? yat satyaṃ vākyam anudvega-karaṃ priyaṃ hitaṃ ca, tat tapo vāṅ-mayam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7098: yathā śānto bhava vatsa, svādhyāyaṃ yogaṃ cānutiṣṭha, tathā te śreyo bhaviṣyatīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7099: svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ caiva yathā-vidhi vāṅ-mayaṃ tapa ucyate ||BhGS_17.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7101: bhāva-saṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate ||BhG_17.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7105: maunaṃ vāṅ-niyamo 'pi manaḥ-saṃyama-pūrvako bhavatīti kāryeṇa kāraṇam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7114: yathoktaṃ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca tapas taptaṃ naraiḥ sattvādi-guṇa-bhedena kathaṃ tri-vidhaṃ bhavatīti, ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7115: śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7117: śraddhayā āstikya-buddhyā parayā prakṛṣṭayā taptam anuṣṭhitaṃ tapas tat
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7118: prakṛtaṃ tri-vidhaṃ tri-prakāraṃ try-adhiṣṭhānaṃ narair anuṣṭhātṛbhir aphalākāṅkṣibhiḥ phalākāṅkṣā-rahitair yuktaiḥ samāhitair yad īdṛśaṃ tapaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7119: tat sāttvikaṃ sattva-nirvṛttaṃ paricakṣate kathayanti śiṣṭāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7121: kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam ||BhG_17.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7122: satkāraḥ sādhu-kāraḥ sādhu ayaṃ tapasvī brāhmaṇa ity evam artham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7126: dambhena caiva yat kriyate tapas tad iha proktaṃ kathitaṃ rājasaṃ calaṃ kādācitka-phalatvena adhruvam ||BhGS_17.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7129: mūḍha-grāheṇa aviveka-niścayena ātmanaḥ pīḍayā yat kriyate tapaḥ parasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7130: utsādanārthaṃ vināśārthaṃ vā, tat tāmasaṃ tapa udāhṛtam ||BhGS_17.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7133: deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam ||BhG_17.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7134: dātavyam iti evaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yad dānaṃ dīyate 'nupakāriṇe
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7141: yat tu pratyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7142: dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam ||BhG_17.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7143: yat tu dānaṃ pratyupakārārthaṃ kāle tv ayaṃ māṃ pratyupakariṣyatīty evam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7144: artham, phalaṃ vāsya dānasya me bhaviṣyaty adṛṣṭam iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7145: tad uddiśya punar dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ kheda-saṃyuktam, tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7146: adeśa-kāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7153: pātra-paribhava-yuktaṃ ca yad dānam, tat tāmasam udāhṛtam ||BhGS_17.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7155: oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7156: brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā ||BhG_17.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7157: oṃ tat sad iti evaṃ nirdeśaḥ, nirdiśyate 'neneti nirdeśaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7158: trividho nāma nirdeśo brahmaṇaḥ smṛtaś cintito vedānteṣu brahma-vidbhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7159: brāhmaṇās tena nirdeśena trividhena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ nirmitāḥ purā pūrvam iti nirdeśa-stuty-artham ucyate ||BhGS_17.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7162: tasmāt om ity udāhṛtya uccārya yajña-dāna-tapaḥ-kriyā yajñādi-svarūpāḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7163: kriyāḥ pravartante vidhānoktāḥ śāstra-coditāḥ satataṃ sarvadā brahma-vādināṃ brahma-vadana-śīlānām
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7167: tad iti brahmābhidhānam uccāryānabhisaṃdhāyaś ca yajñādi-karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ yajña-tapaḥ-kriyā yajña-kriyāś ca tapaḥ-kriyāś ca
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7168: yajña-tapaḥ-kriyā dāna-kriyāś ca vividhāḥ kṣetra-hiraṇya-pradānādi-lakṣaṇāḥ kriyante nirvartyante
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7172: sad-bhāve sādhu-bhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7173: praśaste karmaṇi tathā sac-chabdaḥ pārtha yujyate ||BhG_17.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7179: sad ity etad abhidhānaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prayujyate 'bhidhīyate
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7180: | praśaste karmaṇi vivāhādau ca tathā sac-chabdaḥ pārtha yujyate prayujyata ity etat ||BhGS_17.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7181: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7182: karma caiva tad-arthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate ||BhG_17.27||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7183: yajñe yajña-karmaṇi yā sthitiḥ, tapasi ca yā sthitiḥ, dāne ca yā sthitiḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7190: tad etad yajña-dāna-tapa-ādi-karmāsāttvikaṃ viguṇam api śraddhā-pūrvakaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7192: tatra ca sarvatra śraddhā-pradhānatayā sarvaṃ saṃpādyate yasmāt, tasmāt -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7193: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7194: asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha ||BhG_17.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7199: stuti-namaskārādi, tat sarvam asad ity ucyate mat-prāpti-sādhana-mārga-bāhyatvāt pārtha
GSP33bhgsbh_u:7200: na ca tad bahulāyāsam api pretya phalāya no apīhārtham, sādhubhir ninditatvād iti ||BhGS_17.28||
